1b1(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su s+thi ta ma ti de ba put+tA
1b2(dkon brtsegs): pa smIn+d+ha nA ma ma hA n+naT+TatI/ dod na du/ 'phags pa
1b3(dkon brtsegs): b u blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
2a1(dkon brtsegs): mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
2a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
2a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri li/ dge slong
2a4(dkon brtsegs): drug khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa/ dgra bcom pa sha stag
2b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ra 'jam dpal dang / seng ga'i tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong la/ byang chub sems
2b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / spobs pa bcug
2b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / rab tu mi skul dang //
2b4(dkon brtsegs): don rab sems dang / legs par bsam pa sems dang / sems dpa' ba dang / sems kyi blo gros dang // sems
2b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dang / nor bu brtsegs dang / ri 'joms rgyal po dang / lag ni rin po che dang / sems dpa' rin po che dang / lag
3a1(dkon brtsegs): na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag bteg dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / rtag tu lag brtson dang / sems can sgrol dang / brtson
3a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus mos dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa la gnas pa dang / smon lam 'phags dang / lag ni sgron ma dang / sems mnyam pa dang / ngan song
3a3(dkon brtsegs): spong dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / rdo rjes rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par
3a4(dkon brtsegs): gnon dang / dpag med rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo gnas kyis rnam par gnon dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / blo gros dam pa dang / khyad par blo gros dang /
3a5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros 'phel dang / 'gro grub dang / sa 'dzin dang / zla 'od dang / zla ba'i tog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / snang ba thob pas rnam par gnon dang /
3a6(dkon brtsegs): seng ge ltar rnam par gnon pas mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / spobs pa thogs med dang / spobs pa gzhad pa dang / spobs pa dpa' ba dang / rnam
3b1(dkon brtsegs): par gnon dang / nyi zla'i 'od zer mog mog por byed pa'i 'od dang / dmigs med dang / blo gros dpe med dang / rtag tu bzhad dgyes dbang po dang / nor bu dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
3b2(dkon brtsegs): bud med rnam sbyar go cha dang / rab tu snang ba dang / rnam par snang byed dang / mas byin dang / tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra skad zab mo dang / de dag la
3b3(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po bzhi khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / de dag dang /
3b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri tsam dang yang thabs cig go// lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzangs dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu blo gros bzang po dang / de dag la sog pa thams cad
3b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu bdun khri sum stong dang yang thabs cig go/ / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po lhun po dang / de dag la sogs pa
3b6(dkon brtsegs): / thams cad kyang byang chub sem dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhug pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po nyis khri dang yang thab cig go// klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog pa dang / de dag la sogs pa thams
3b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po drug khri dang yang thabs cig go/ / de dag dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
4a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ de nas bcom ldan
4a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ / de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas khang na 'dug pa/ gcig pu dben pa na 'dug
4a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems med cing sems dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
4a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu
4a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yos so/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
4a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni brgyal brgya lam na ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na u dum wa ra'i me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ba de
4a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ gang dag skye ba'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir/ zhi ba/ gsal ba/ brtag tu med pa/ rtog ge dang bral ba/ zab pa shes par dka' ba'i chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs/
4b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na ni chos mnyan pa'ang med do// chos mnyan pa med
4b2(dkon brtsegs): na ni sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad pa'ang med pas/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ste/ zhu ba zhus pa ji lta bus
4b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la nem nur
4b4(dkon brtsegs): med cing the tsom med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sems can 'di dag ni/ 'dod chags che ba/
4b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang che ba/ gti mug che ba/ dkar po'i chos dang bral ba/ mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa/ glen pa/ blun pa/ mi gus pa/ sangs rgyas dang bral ba/ chos dang bral ba/ dge 'dun dang
4b6(dkon brtsegs): bral ba sha stag yin pas/ ci nas kyang sems can 'di dag gis chos thos nas/ shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i zhu ba zhu'o snyam mo// de nas yang 'jam
4b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag zab mo'i
5a1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa 'di la lus kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo/ / de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun tu snang ba/
5a2(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/
5a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i mod la/ shar phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag mnyen pa/ 'jam pa/ rnam par dag pa/ 'od gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ yongs su dag
5a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'od chen po dang / snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// 'od de dang snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun naka dang / ri'i rtse mo dang / shing ljon pa dang / ri dang /
5a5(dkon brtsegs): khor yug dang / btang zung dang / btang zung chen po dang / gangs dang / ri rab dang / lhun po chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i
5a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag la rang rang gi bsnyen bkur bdag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i 'od
5a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar yid du mchi ba/ 'di ltar 'od gsal ba'i snang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba 'di/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'dis bdag cag
5b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dang ba dang / lus sim pa chen po dang ldan zhing / sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag kyang kun tu mi 'byung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gang khri 'od 'di lta
5b2(dkon brtsegs): bu bkye ba 'di su'i mthu lags/ 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsnyen bkur ba de dag la cang mi gsung bar gyur to// sangs
5b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na lha'i sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / lha ma yin gyi sgra dang / nam mkha' lding gi sgra dang / dri za'i sgra dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra dang / lto 'phye
5b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i sgra dang / mi'i sgra dang / mi ma yin pa'i sgra dang / bya'i sgra dang / ri dgas kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grags par gyur to// rlung gi sgra dang / chu'i phung po'i sgra dang / rgya mtsho
5b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i shugs kyi sgra dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / glu'i dbyangs kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur te/ 'ga' yang sgra mi 'byin cing / thams cad zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi bar
5b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ / yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde
5b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis 'od 'di lta bu bkye zhing / des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag thams cad
6a1(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i mthu lags pa bshad du gsol/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
6a2(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus nas gsung gi 'phrin las brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan yang de bzhin du gsung
6a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing / de dag gis gsung gi 'phrin las sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus pa de lta bu des bsnyen bkur ba de dag la bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gsung brjod pa des sangs rgyas
6a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur te/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang sgra mngon par 'byin cing / rol mo'i sgra dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra grag par gyur to// rol mo'i
6a5(dkon brtsegs): sgra de dag las mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung zhing / stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
6a6(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / bzod pa'i sgra dang /
6a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gyi sgra dang / shes rab kyi sgra dang / nges pa'i sgra dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i sgra dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dka' ba dang / btang snyoms
6b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgra dag dang / de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos kyi sgo 'bum phrag du ma dag gi sgra byung bar gyur to// sgra byung ba de dag gis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu meng grangs med pa dag bla
6b2(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / nyan thos nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su 'grub pa
6b3(dkon brtsegs): las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas
6b4(dkon brtsegs): khyed la ci zhig byas thong zhig/ 'od 'di ni ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
6b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yin te/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs
6b6(dkon brtsegs): pas 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro// 'od 'di ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
6b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis yongs su bsgos pas/ yongs su tshim par byed pa ste/ 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang bsngags pa brjod pa'i
7a1(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin no/ / rigs kyi bu dag de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung zhig dang / khyed la bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
7a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to/ / skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
7a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di
7a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/
7a5(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
7a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas par 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis gzir ba'i sems can mi gus pa/ dbang po rtul ba/ ngo tsha shes pa dang
7a7(dkon brtsegs): khrel yod pa dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa can gyi las la spyod pa de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
7b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas te chos ston to/ / rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
7b2(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed de na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba mthu che ba/ shes pa che ba/ brtson 'grus che ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par ston par byed pa/
7b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rab tu dka' bar byed pa/
7b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i go 'byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma'i ko 'byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi gzhi rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ chags pa med pa'i shes
7b5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pa de/ 'di lta ste/
7b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya
7b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la chos kyi zhu ba zhu bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
8a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan pa de nyan cing 'du bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag phyogs bcu nas
8a2(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i phyir 'od 'di bkye ste/ rigs kyi bu dag snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba 'di'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
8a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed
8a4(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin kun tu snang ba dri med bkod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed do//
8a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di ltar gsal ba/ 'di ltar rnam par dag pa/ 'di ltar lus dang sems dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bar
8a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa'i 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed par mi mdzad lags so/ / bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
8a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa gad+hA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
8b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba der song ste
8b2(dkon brtsegs): lhags nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong
8b3(dkon brtsegs): ma thos pa yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od 'di lta bu dang / snang ba 'di lta bu dang / 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di dag ga las mchis/ su'i 'od lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
8b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu dka 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
8b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug
8b6(dkon brtsegs): pa des/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'od 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di bkye'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la
8b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
9a1(dkon brtsegs): thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang / zhu blag bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dang
9a2(dkon brtsegs): de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang blta ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na dreng zhig
9a3(dkon brtsegs): d e nas de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'di
9a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na mi stobs po che'i lag pa bskums pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskums pa tsam la/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
9a5(dkon brtsegs): mi mdzad 'dir lhags par gyur to/ / de na byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
9a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so/ / la la dag ni phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog 'phreng dang / spos kyi char dag dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang /
9a7(dkon brtsegs): ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / skya snar dang / d+ha nuska ri dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / bA ra shi ka dang / bA ra shi ka chen po dang / man+da ra ba dang /
9b1(dkon brtsegs): man+da ra ba chen po dang / pA ru sha ka dang / pA ru sha ka chen po dang / zla mdog dang / zla mdog chen po dang / zla mdog rab mdzes la sogs pa me tog gi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dag
9b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / spos kyi char dag dang / 'phreng ba'i char dag dang / phye ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
9b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni sil snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu gsil zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
9b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ka la ba der lhags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs re res kyang / stong gsum gyi
9b5(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sgra skad kyis go bar byed cing lhags te/ de lta bu'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
9b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la 'di lta ste/
9b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can
10a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar gyur to/ / sems can gang la'ang 'dod chags kyi gnod pa med/ zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/
10a2(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal gyis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ 'chab pas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ yongs su gdung bas ma yin te/ sems can thams cad byams pa'i sem
10a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de
10a4(dkon brtsegs): dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
10a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ steng gi bar snang la lus
10a6(dkon brtsegs): mi snang bar byas te/ lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i pad+ma kha dog sna tshogs 'dab ma 'bum phrag
10a7(dkon brtsegs): dum dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos chos kyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de dang
10b1(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi char dang / spos kyi char dang / phye ma'i char de dag dang / sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po sgra 'byin pa de dag dang / snang ba chen po de'ang mthong / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams/
10b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur pa'ang mthong / 'khor phal po che lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
10b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyi lus kaser gyi kha dog lta bur
10b4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba dag kyang mthong ngo / / de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po stan las langs te/ chos kos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
10b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rab dga' bde ba stsol ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i
10b6(dkon brtsegs): zhal/ / mi yi dam pa stobs bcu yon tan brgya dag nges bsags pa// bsam yas gzhal du ma mchis yid gnyis mun pa sel ba po// sa bla lha yul rnam par rgyu ba khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis
10b7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar sbyin dang dul ba legs par spyad/ / bde gshegs khyod kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma mchis// bzod stobs shin tu stobs dang ldan pa stobs
11a1(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i stobs ldan pa/ / yon tan mnga' ba 'dzum mdzad bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas bskal pa brgya dag rnam spyad kyang //
11a2(dkon brtsegs): skyo zhing spong ba mi mnga' dgyes pa gzhal du ma mchis brnyes// sras dang sras mo btsun mo rgyal srid spyan dang sna tshogs btang // sbyin dgyes thams cad gtong ba bdag gi the tsom bsal du
11a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ / khyod kyis sngon chad chibs dang glang po shing rta dpung chung stsal// gtong la dgyes pas dbu dang na bza' khrag khrig brgya yang btang // thub pas zhal zas sdung nan de bzhin po brang
11a4(dkon brtsegs): dkor yang stsal/ / sbyin dang gtong la rtag tu dgyes pa bde gshegs khyod la zhu// stong pa'i chos rnams nges par bsten cing thugs la legs dgongs pas// rdul bral skya lus gtubs
11a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang sdug bsngal 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing / / gsungs shes zhus na bzod pa gsung ba'i stobs la brtson pa yi// yon tan mnga' ba rdul dang bral ba khyod la zhu bar 'tshal// 'dod chags zhe
11a6(dkon brtsegs): sdang dag gis rab dkrugs rmongs shing kun dkris la/ / bdag tu 'du shes brtson pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// thugs rje bskyed nas bskal pa brgya dag srid pa 'dir
11a7(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa/ / dpa' bo lam rab ston par mdzad pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig/ bde gshegs legs pa mdzad pa khyod ni 'gro la thogs mi mnga'// spyad pa legs par spyad pas rdzu 'phrul
11b1(dkon brtsegs): zhabs dang ye shes brnyes/ / bdag dang sems can rnam par bshig cing stong pa'i chos la brtson// shin tu dri ma mchis bsam bsgoms dag gi the tsom khrum// khyod kyis sngon ni sbyin dang tshul
11b2(dkon brtsegs): khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang / / bsam gtan shes rab snying rje byams pa mtshungs pa ma mchis bsten// khyod kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab chu 'dzin rgya mtsho bzhin// 'byung gnas
11b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang po shin tu gnas pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig/ rdul bral khyod kyis sku las dum bu dum bur bcad cing ni// srang la gcal ba mdzad cing dam dum lhag rol ma lus par// sku kun
11b4(dkon brtsegs): ril gyis btang ste phug ron phrug gu gcig ma btang / rdul bral 'od mdzad thugs rje mnga' ba the tsom gcad du gsol// lha tshogs gnas pa'i ri bo g.yos shing dgung ni rdib gyur la// lha
11b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin gyi tshogs kyi gnas mal rgya mtsho bas gyur cing / / mkha' la gnas shing rgyu ba'i dkung zla dog sar lhung gyur kyang // rgyal ba grags pa mdzad pa khyod ni log pa'i tshig mi gsung //
11b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos bcom ldan 'das lnga tshogs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
11b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung zhing / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol
12a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyod la ci zhig byas
12a2(dkon brtsegs): thong zhig/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan par gyur na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs
12a3(dkon brtsegs): shing bslad par 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa
12a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad par bya'o// gnas
12a5(dkon brtsegs): brtan 'od srungs chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs 'di na 'jam dpal
12a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa kun tu snang ba dri med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dgra 'od kyis snang
12a7(dkon brtsegs): bar byas nas/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yang dag par bskul te/ 'jig rten gyi
12b1(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ de dag gis dgazod nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/ ngal lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ steng gi bar snang la ta la srid tsam na pad+ma dgal 'khod do// de nas
12b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing /
12b3(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi char dag dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la/ sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs
12b4(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing / spos kyi char dag dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la/ sil snyan 'bum phrag
12b5(dkon brtsegs): mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin to/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang mi gda' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de dag ni
12b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying rje chen po gang dang / byams
12b7(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po gang dang / phan par 'dod pa gang dang / spyod pa gang la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
13a1(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang / shes rab gang la gnas pa de la mi gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang la spyod pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de la'ang mi spyod pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs byang
13a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas/ de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta bar mi nus te/
13a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs pa kha nor zad do// 'od srungs rigs kyi bu de dag ni 'di ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang
13a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang re zhig mi mthong na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
13a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dag dang / spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
13a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
13a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang /
13b1(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing / de la rlom sems med pa dang / nyan
13b2(dkon brtsegs): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la lhag par dmigs pa med cing / de las ye shes yongs su tshol ba dang / lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong na/ dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te/ bdog pa
13b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / tshogs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin cing / tshogs des rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
13b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / shes rab dpag tu med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la rtog pa med pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
13b5(dkon brtsegs): la bkod nas/ phyis byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar bya'o snyam yang sems can rnams dang / byang chub mi dmigs pa ste/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na//
13b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad
13b7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas nam yang sems 'ga' yang ma bskyed pa'i legs
14a1(dkon brtsegs): @par gsungs pa gsung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos rnams pa'ang dgod par bgyi na/ sangs
14a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de lta bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ lus thams cad rnam par 'jig
14a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mi nus te/ ting nge 'dzin de'i ming yang mi shes na/ snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
14a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
14a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag mthong bar dka' ba'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ongs kyi bar du khyod re zhig sdod cig/
14a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de las sdang zhing / de'i 'og tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de lta mod kyi/ khyod nyid ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi gnas thob pa yin gyis/
14a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa rtogs shig/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
14b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa blta ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong /
14b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'ang ma shes/ de dag gi gnas dang rab tu gnas pa'ang ma shes/ ci byed pa dang / ci ston pa dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du ma shes
14b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs kyang /
14b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma mthong ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag
14b5(dkon brtsegs): da dung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par/ de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pas kyang de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dgra
14b6(dkon brtsegs): lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/
14b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi slad du go cha 'tshal bar bgyid pa de ni go cha legs par 'tshal ba lags pas/ ting nge 'dzin 'di ni slad kyis kyang
15a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de de bzhin no// ji ska du smras pa de bzhin te/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
15a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sa'ang ma yin na/ sems can gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab can rnams kyi
15a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu bstan pa yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam mo// de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
15a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin sum khri la snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par langs kyang de dag gi mtshan ma'ang shes par ma nus so// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byo/
15a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu/
15a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par langs kyang / de dag gi 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'ang ma shes/ 'greng ba'ang ma mthong / 'chag pa'ang /
15a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong / 'dug pa'ang ma mthong / nyal ba'ang ma mthong ste/ de dag blta bar ma nus so// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom
15b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan te/ bdag zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin
15b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams thob pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur cing / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
15b3(dkon brtsegs): cig shos kyang rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur la/ der mi la la zhig skyes nas/ des ri rab tsam gyi rnga shing thogs te/ bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdun du
15b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis nas/ sug las gzhan mi bgyid par bskal pa'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par rnga bo che de gnyis brdungs par gyur kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i slad
15b5(dkon brtsegs): du/ de ltar bsgrubs te zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa la re zhig bskal pa 'das par gnas pa'i rnga bo che de gnyis kyi sgra de dag bdag gi rna ba'i rnam par rig pa tsam du'ang grag par mi 'gyur na//
15b6(dkon brtsegs): des ting nge 'dzin de las slong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni gnas ma mchis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa de lta bu dang ldan zhing / ye shes de
15b7(dkon brtsegs): lta bu dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i slad du ting nge 'dzin bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ de dag gi gnas kyang ma 'tshal lakra
16a1(dkon brtsegs): so/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes de lta bu yongs su tshol ba na/ sems can re re'i slad du bskul pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
16a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg par gyur kyang spro bar bgyi zhing / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu yongs su gtang bar mi 'gyi'o//
16a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag len pa ma mchis par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na ni/ bdag slad ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'khor bar spyod cing / de lta bu'i theg pa chen
16a4(dkon brtsegs): po'ang yongs su spong bar mi bgyid do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus tshig de skad
16a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa legs so legs so/ / rab 'byor khyod gal te phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma gyur tu zin na/ khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid
16a6(dkon brtsegs): gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byed du 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
16a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nan gyi
16b1(dkon brtsegs): dper byas te/ gal te sems can de dag thams cad dge slong rab 'byor dang / shA ri'i byA dang / 'od srungs chen po ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes pa dang ldan par gyur la/ rab 'byor nyan thos/
16b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po de lta bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar brtags kyang mthong bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nyan thos
16b3(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang dag la spyod pa de dag la mi spyod pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ma yin
16b4(dkon brtsegs): no/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas 'jam
16b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas de nyid na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po 'di dag 'dus kyis/ bdag gis lha 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang /
16b6(dkon brtsegs): bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas na/ 'di ltar 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya/
16b7(dkon brtsegs): ba mngon par 'du byas nas/ pad+ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam/ 'dab ma ni ka ser/ sdong bu ni dngul/ snying po ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po/ ze ba ni bai DUR+Ya las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
17a1(dkon brtsegs): @brgyad su cu bzhi mngon par sprul cing / pad+ma de dgal byang chub sems dpa'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpal dang /
17a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ 'od gsal ba dag pa pad+ma'i snying po dag gi dbus na skyil mo krung gis 'jug pa'i lus gzugs drag kyang mngon par sprul to// de nas pad+ma de
17a3(dkon brtsegs): dag rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris nas bzung ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs
17a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang
17a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar dang / de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong
17a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris ther 'bum nas/ 'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar gyi 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas ji snyed pa thams
17a7(dkon brtsegs): cad du 'dong zhing / sgra sgrogs par byed/ dbyangs rjod par byed/ yang dag par skul bar byed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
17b1(dkon brtsegs): khams 'drin rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rtsa lag rnams// 'jig rten du ni lan 'ga' 'byung // u dum la ra'i me tog ltar/ sangs
17b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas de bzhin shin tu dkon/ / shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/ de ni 'jig rten 'dir byung ste// sdug bsngal thams cad zang byed pa'i// chos ni yang dag de ston mdzad// lha yi 'dod pa yid dka'
17b3(dkon brtsegs): la/ / ji srid yun ring spyad byas la// gang du tshor ba myong 'gyur ba'i// ngan song rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur// ji srid 'dod pa rnams bsten pa// srid pa phyir zhing rab tu 'phel// khams gsum 'khor
17b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i srog chags la/ / bde ba yod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab dkon dang // khom pa dam pa rnyed nas ni// gang dag bag med mi rtogs pa// de dag sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur// sangs
17b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas blta ba'i phyir deng la/ / chos kyi dam pa mnyan par gyis// 'jig rten 'dren pa 'das 'og tu// phyis dus 'gyod par ma byed cig/ mi rnams gang dag rtag myos shing // 'jigs chen bdud
17b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhags pa yi/ / bag med spyod pa byed rnams la// thar pa yod par ga la 'gyur// de ni 'di skad smra bar bya// bsod nams byas pa'i sems can gang // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i//
17b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs sangs rgyas dang zur phrang byos// gang dag byams pa bsamams pa'i// 'jig rten mgon rnams ma gtogs par// sems can rnams kyi skyabs gzhan med// dpung gnyen gzhan yang yod
18a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ / skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal pa bye bar spyad mdzad nas// ye shes dam pa brnyes nas ni// gang la sems can
18a2(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs shing / / srog dang gang zag yod min pa'i// chos mchog zhi ba zab mo dang // mthong bar dka' ba rab tu ston// rtag pa dang ni de bzhin du// chad pa'ang rab tu spangs gyur cing // mtshan
18a3(dkon brtsegs): ma thams cad spangs pa'i chos/ / srog chags rnams la ston par mdzad// gang la 'jig rten mi gnas pa'i// stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang // smon par byed pa ma yin pa'i// yang dag mtha'
18a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu ston/ / rtags med mtshan ma yod min zhing // skye med 'byung ba med pa dang // 'ong ba med cing 'gro med pa'i// chos ni mkhas pa ston par mdzad// zad med 'byung ba yod min zhing //
18a5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med dang // bltar med mtshan ma yod min pa// ston kyang rlom pa'i sems mi mnga'// sems can gang yang skye med cing // 'ga' yang 'chi ba yod ma yin// mya ngan 'das pa'ang/
18a6(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med// sems can 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin// skad kyis chos rnams bstan byas kyang // skad la rten pa yod yin zhing // yi ge rnams dang bral ba'i chos// mi yi 'dren pa ston par mdzad//
18a7(dkon brtsegs): gang la rlung ni mi gnas shing // chu dang me yang mi dmigs la// sar yang rtogs pa med pa'i chos// spyan dang ldan pa ston par mdzad// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnams
18b1(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam shes ni/ / stong zhing phung po lnga po dag/ dngos po med par ston par mdzad// mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid// rang bzhin stong par ston mdzad kyang // stong pa de yang
18b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med/ / gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya yid 'ong ba// de dag rnam par rtog pas bskyed// rtog pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa yin// de ltar sangs rgyas skyob pa ni// srog
18b3(dkon brtsegs): chags rnams la chos ston gyi/ / gang dag sdug bsngal thar 'dod pa// de dag rnam 'dren drung du shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
18b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis chos bstan pas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams las lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos rnams
18b5(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis ni 'dod chags dang bral ba rjes su thob bo// lha'i bu sa ya phrag gsum dang nyis 'bum ni byang chub tu
18b6(dkon brtsegs): sems skyes so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs
18b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis lha'i bu gang dag yang dag par bskul ba de dag las/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
19a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ka la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
19a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang
19a3(dkon brtsegs): phye ma dang / spos dang / byug pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor to// steng gi bar snang la'ang lha'i glu dbyangs mang po dag rab tu len par gyur to// de'i tshe na gling
19a4(dkon brtsegs): c hen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang du lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba dag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang med pa de snyed
19a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha'i bu dag 'dus par gyur cing / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab
19a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzangs dang / lha'i bu dri med dang / lha'i bu ngo tsha shes pa'i nor can zhes bya ba lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
19a7(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
19b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas kyi phyi rol nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ me tog ma sbar ba'i char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo// me tog man+dar ba'i char de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas su
19b2(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi phung po 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa kun nas gnas par gyur to/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs ji lta bu byin gyis brlabs na/ 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i
19b3(dkon brtsegs): byin gyi rlabs byin gyis brlabs pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi bar snang la me tog gi dra ba kun nas bkram par gyur to// me tog gi 'od des stong gsum gyi
19b4(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur to/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ smon lam lan byung ba'i stan la 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab
19b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so/ / lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so//
19b6(dkon brtsegs): / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag su dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par
19b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhi rnams dang / shes par dka' ba'i gzhi rnams dang / gnas med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / spros pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / spros pa dang bral ba'i gzhi rnams
20a1(dkon brtsegs): @dang / brjod du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / bstan du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / zab mo'i gzhi rnams dang / bden pa'i gzhi rnams dang / chags pa med pa'i gzhi
20a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / mi byed pa'i gzhi rnams dang / stong pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / smon pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / de bzhin nyid bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang
20a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha'i gzhi rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi rnams dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / blang ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / dor ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
20a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhi rnams dang / chos kyi gzhi rnams dang / dge 'dun gyi gzhi rnams dang / ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob pa'i gzhi rnams dang / khams gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang / chos thams
20a5(dkon brtsegs): cad mi dmigs pa'i gzhi rnams dang / chos thams cad skye ba med par bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang / sang+ge'i gzhi rnams dang / dpa' bo'i gzhi rnams dang / gzhi med pa'i gzhi de dag bstan pa na
20a6(dkon brtsegs): snod du 'gyur ba ni su yod snyam mo/ / de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ zab mo la bzod pa
20a7(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag 'di dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya'o snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
20b1(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod ni zab mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kho bo dang lhan
20b2(dkon brtsegs): cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par nus sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lnga'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gal te khyod
20b3(dkon brtsegs): gsung bar mi mdzad/ rjod par mi mdzad/ 'don par yang mi mdzad/ yi ge'ang mi mdzad/ sgra'ang mi gsan pa lta na/ bdag gis de bzhin bstan par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
20b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gal te khyod nyan par mi byed/ 'dzin par mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/ rig par mi byed/ rnam par rig par mi byed/ len par mi byed/
20b5(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar mi byed cing / thos nas kyang gzhan dag la ston par mi byed pa lta na/ kho bos kyang de bzhin bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yi ge med pa/ sems
20b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ sems dang bral ba ste/ gang gis ming brjod cing / ming de'ang g.yo ba med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lha'i bu 'di dag ni khyod las chos bstan pa nyan par 'tshal gyi
20b7(dkon brtsegs): sa phyogs 'di nyid du khyod kyis lha'i bu 'di dag la chos kyi bka' mchid gsungs shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni nyan par 'dod pa rnams la chos ston par mi byed de/
21a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par 'dod pa rnams la'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu bdag tu 'dzin na nyan 'dod par 'gyur la/ sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin
21a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin na nyan 'dod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa de ni 'di snyam du 'di ni ston par byed pa'o// bdag ni nyan pa'o//
21a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bshad par bya ba'o snyam du sems pas/ de ni chags pa gsum gyis chags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag tu dmigs pa dang / sems can du dmigs pa dang / chos su
21a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa'o/ / lha'i bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pa de ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas chos ston par byed de/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/
21a5(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su mi byed do// de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ bdag tu dmigs pa med cing / rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ sems par mi byed pa
21a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos smra bar dmigs pa med cing / rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ sems par mi byed pa dang / chos su dmigs pa med cing / rnam par rtog par mi byed//
21a7(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su mi byed/ sems par mi byed pa ste/ lha'i bu gang dag de ltar nyan pa de dag ni mnyam par nyan pa yin te/ mi mnyam par ma yin no// lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis
21b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci nas kyang mi ldog pa nyid kyi slad du bstan pa bshad pa legs so legs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ci rung rnam par ma rtog cig/ byang chub
21b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang ldog pa de ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang las ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
21b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'dod chags las ldog go/ zhe sdang las ldog go// gti mug las ldog go// sred pa las ldog go/ ma rig pa las ldog go/ 'khor bar skye ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi bar las ldog go/ rgya las
21b4(dkon brtsegs): ldog go/ lta ba las ldog go/ ming las ldog go/ gzugs las ldog go/ 'dod pa'i khams las ldog go/ gzugs kyi khams las ldog ko/ gzugs med pa'i khams las ldog go/ nyan thos
21b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa las ldog go/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las ldog go/ rtog pa las ldog go/ 'dzin pa las ldog go/ mtshan ma las ldog go/ dngos por 'dzin pa las ldog go/ chad par lta ba las
21b6(dkon brtsegs): ldog go/ / rtag par lta ba las ldog go// blang ba las ldog go/ dor ba las ldog go/ bdag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go/ sems can du 'du shes pa las ldog go/ srog tu 'du shes pa las ldog go//
21b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go// yid la byed pa dag las ldog go/ chags pa dag las ldog go/ phyin ci log dag las ldog go/ 'jigs tshogs las ldog go/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba
22a1(dkon brtsegs): las ldog go/ / 'jigs tshogs kyi rtsa ba las byung blta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las ldog go// sgrib pa dag las ldog go// phung po lngar 'dzin pa dag las ldog go/ rgya
22a2(dkon brtsegs): dang nang gi skye mched thams cad las ldog go/ / khams rnams las ldog go// sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa las ldog go// chos su 'du shes pa las ldog go// dge 'dun du 'du shes pa las ldog go//
22a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// bdag chos ston par 'gyur ro// bdag sems can grol bar byed par 'gyur ro// bdag bdud 'dul bar 'gyur ro// bdag ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i 'du
22a4(dkon brtsegs): shes de dag las ldog go/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rtog par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rtog par mi byed do// dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang /
22a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do// mtshan ma rnams la rtog par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa la rtog
22a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed cing / rtog pa thams cad las ldog ste/ lha'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang de las ldog pa de ni mi ldog pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang las mi ldog/ 'jam
22a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las mi ldog go/ stong pa nyid las mi ldog go// mtshan ma med pa las mi ldog go/ smon pa med pa las mi ldog go/ de bzhin nyid las mi ldog go/
22b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings las mi ldog go// yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi ldog go// mnyam pa nyid las mi ldog go// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' gang rtog pa dang
22b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i chos de dag las ldog pa de ni des na ldog pa zhes bya'o// zhes gsung ba de ci gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on te ma mchis pa
22b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig gam/ 'on te mchis pa dang ma mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on te mchis pa'ang ma lags/ ma mchis pa'ang ma lags pa zhig lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag las ldog
22b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos de dag ni yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ yod pa dang med pa'ang ma yin/ yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa'ang ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
22b5(dkon brtsegs): 'o na gang las ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / legs pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / ldog par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de 'dzin par mi byed/
22b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong bar mi byed/ mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya ste/ de ni yod par yang bstan par mi bya/ med par yang bstan par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te yod
22b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang med pa las ldog par gyur na/ de ni skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te yod pa las ldog par gyur na/ rtag par 'gyur la/ med pa las ldog par gyur na/ chad
23a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa dang chad pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni rtag pa'i/
23a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang ma yin/ chad pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// lha'i bu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sngon ma byung bar gyur pa'o zhes 'du shes kyis yod pa ma yin par yongs su shes par zad kyi/ de la ni chad
23a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med/ rtag pa'ang med de/ lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//
23a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang //
23a5(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang / zhu blag bgyi ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhud kyis gshegs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam par
23a6(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa lam spyod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin to// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de gang na bzhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
23a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni mi gda' 'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te khyod kyis thams cad mthong na/
23b1(dkon brtsegs): des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i slad du de skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin te/ de ni kho bo'i mdun na
23b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs so zhes gsungs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ kho bo mdun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin snyam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'i
23b3(dkon brtsegs): khams lags so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i khams yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad nam
23b4(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' ji lta bu yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de lta bu yin pas/ nam mkha' dang de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med pa'i
23b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ / lha'i bu de lta bas na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar 'dod na/ mtha' 'di khong du chud par bya zhing / cung zad kyang rnam par brtag par mi bya'o// de nas yang
23b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/ khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi pa/ cha mnyam pa/ shin tu 'byes pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa sum khri nyis stong mngon par
23b7(dkon brtsegs): sprul to/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu rin po che'i khri stan lha'i dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos kyis bshams pa dag kyang sprul cing / khri stan re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs
24a1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dag sprul to/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'di lta bur
24a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs byin gyis brlabs pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rnam par spyod pa'i pad+ma gang dag yin pa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag du
24a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ka la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi
24a4(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor la snang bar byed cing / phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khor bar 'khod do// de nas pad+ma de dag la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang /
24a5(dkon brtsegs): khang pa brtsegs pa dag na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi/ bcom ldan 'das la sgra dbyangs mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
24a6(dkon brtsegs): bston to/ / kang+gA'i bye snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang khyod kyis mchod// byang chub mchog gi spyad pa stsal mdzad pas// de skad mi mchog khyod ni mdzes
24a7(dkon brtsegs): pa lags/ / thub pa mtshan gyis yongs su spras gyur pa// sku mchog srid pa gsum na lha de ste// 'dren pa gang la ming dang srog dang ni// gang zag ma mchis chos ni 'grol ston// rnam par
24b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pas sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad/ / bzod pa brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan bsten// khyod kyi shes rab srid gsum thogs mi mnga'// ye shes mthar byon khyod la phyag 'tshal
24b2(dkon brtsegs): lo/ / gang zhig chos rje lha dang mis mchod pa'i// 'jig rten 'dren pa la ni 'dun 'gyur zhing // stong pa nyid la mos par bgyi ba yi// mi de 'jig rten dag gi 'dren par 'gyur//
24b3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag sngon byung de bzhin gshegs pa dang // gang dag phyogs rnams bzhugs pa'i 'dren pa dag/ de dag gis ni mtshan med stong pa'i chos// rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis rtag tu bsgom//
24b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la rang bzhini sems can gang yang ni// skye dang 'chi ba dmigs su ma mchis shing // 'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba ma mchis te// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' ji bzhin no// ji ltar
24b5(dkon brtsegs): mi yis sgyu ma bstan gyur pa/ / snang yang de bzhin nyid du ma mchis ltar// de bzhin chos rnams sgyu ma 'dra ba dang // rmi lam lta bur bde bar gshegs pas bstan// gang zag la las
24b6(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi/ / 'jig rten khams rnams 'dir ni sbyin byin pas// 'dus byas stong par bzod pa gang lags pa// bzod pa de ni sbyin las khyad par 'phags// byang chub
24b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yis/ / bskal pa bye ba gad+hA'i bye snyed du// me tog spos dang de bzhin zas skom dag/ phul nas mi mchog sangs rgyas mchod pa bas// gang gis gang
25a1(dkon brtsegs): la mi dang srog dang ni/ / gang zag ma mchis de 'dra'i chos 'di dag/ thos nas de la 'od gsal bzod thob pa// de yis mi rnams dam pa mchod pa lags// gang
25a2(dkon brtsegs): la ming dang gang zag 'du shes mchis/ / bskal pa bye ba mang por zas skom dang // shing rta dpung chung khri stan sbyin bgyis kyang // des ni 'gro ba grol ba mi 'thob bo// mi mchog gang dag mya ngan
25a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / / de dag gis kyang sems can ma bkrol ba// mkhas rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa yi// chos rnams de ltar mkhyen pas rnam par grol// sangs rgyas 'byung dang yul du
25a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / / de bzhin bstan la dad pa thob par dka'// mi yi srid pa'ang rnyed par dka' bas na// rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la lags brtson gyis// mi khom brgyad po thams cad rnam spangs
25a5(dkon brtsegs): shing / / khom pa phun sum rnyed dka' thob gyur la// bde gshegs bstan la dad pa rnyed gyur pa'i// mkhas pa rnams kyis rigs pa'i rnal 'byor spyod// sgra la 'tshal zhing 'dug par ma byed
25a6(dkon brtsegs): par/ / chos thos gyur nas rtag tu nan tan gyis// khyed kyis rtag tu dkon pa'i gnas ston la// des ni mi rnams dam par 'gyur bar byos// chos smra'i dge bshes gang yin stan gyis
25a7(dkon brtsegs): / / sdig pa'i grags la 'ga' yang ma sten cig/ sems can kun la sems ni mnyam gyis la// sems can de la nam yang ma rlom zhig/ tshul khrims ldan dang mang du thos kyis
25b1(dkon brtsegs): la/ / rtag tu phyag dar khrod dang bsod snyoms spyod// g.yel ba med par shing drung sten gyis la// bkus te bor ba mchog la ma smod cig/ 'dus byas 'di dag thams cad 'dus byas min//
25b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gcig cing smig rgyu 'dra ba yis// dam pa'i don gyi mu gcig shes gyis la// myur du gzhal yas byang chub reg par gyis// phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma bzhin du ltos// nang gi skye mched
25b3(dkon brtsegs): drug dang phyi yi drug/ de dag grong stong 'dra bar gsungs pas na// de la nam yang rten par ma byed cig/ 'dod chags zhe sdang rang bzhin stong pa nyid// gti muka nga rgyal yongs su rtog pas bskyed// /
25b4(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa de yang ma byung 'byung med par// de ltar shes na 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur// de nas sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na
25b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ / dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong sum brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig
25b6(dkon brtsegs): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / dge slong ma sum stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam dag go/ dge bsnyen bdun stong dang // dge bsnyen ma stong
25b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha'i bu nyi khri bdun stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' sum brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// stong gsum
26a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos// 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu
26a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis stong
26a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs pad+ma dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag na mchis pa 'di rnams chos
26a4(dkon brtsegs): zab mo 'di lta bu ston par bgyid pa dang / 'khor 'di'ang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang / lha'i bu bye ba phrag 'di snyed 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po 'dus pa 'di
26a5(dkon brtsegs): dag su'i mthu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
26a6(dkon brtsegs): mthu yin te/ des bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kun tu snang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar deng de bzhin gshegs pa la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ lha'i bu blo gros rab
26a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhu
26b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing / zhu blag byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam
26b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'khor 'dus pa 'di na mi gda' 'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod re zhig sdod cig dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de de'u re 'dud
26b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis gnos cing / bkod pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
26b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal
26b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
26b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di na bdud kyi gnas bye ba brgya phrag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mog mog por gyur to/ / bdud sdig can de dag kyang rang rang gi lus rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs par gyur nas/ lag pa 'khar
26b7(dkon brtsegs): ba la rten cing 'gro bar gyur to/ / de dag gi lha'i bu mo rnams kyang rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs par gyur pa dang / rang rang gi gzhal med khang dag kyang brnyings shing rab tu 'jig la mun pa mun
27a1(dkon brtsegs): nag tu gyur par mthong ngo / / de nas bdud sdig can de dag skrag cing sngangs la yi chad cing sgyid lug ste/ spu'i khung bu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du rnam par/
27a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog ste/ gang gis bdag cag bdud kyi gnas rnams 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang yin/ rkyen ni gang yin/ bdag cag 'di nas 'chi 'pho zhing med pa 'am/ cig tu mi 'gyur
27a3(dkon brtsegs): grang snyam mo/ / bdud de dag gi rnam par rtog pa de lta bu de skyes ma thag tu/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu sprul pa ther 'bum sprul te/ bdud de dag gi mdun du bkod do//
27a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba de
27a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de'i mthu yin te/ khyed la 'tshe ba 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis
27a6(dkon brtsegs): ma skrag cig/ lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis sgra de'ang thos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming yang thos nas/ yang
27a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher sngangs shing skrag ste/ bdud kyi gnas de dag thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis lha'i bu sprul pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag
27b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su skyobs shig/ grogs po dag yongs su skyobs shig/ de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig
27b2(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dgra ma 'jigs shig/ khyed cag deng bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa kA la bya der song zhig dang
27b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje dang ldan pa de ni sems can 'jigs par gyur pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar mdzad do/ / de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras
27b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can 'bum phrag ther 'bum du ma dang bcas pa de dag thams cad rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs shing lag pa
27b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khar ba la rten bzhin du 'dong zhing skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la
27b6(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thams cad kyis sgra skad mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag las
27b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa ni mi rdo lags kyi/ 'jam
28a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming ni de lta ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos nas bdag cag 'jigs shing sngangs la skrag
28a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ 'chi 'pho ba snyam du 'tshal cing / ma mchis par 'gyur ba snyam du 'tshal ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
28a3(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par dbye ba med par sems can rnams kyi don byas pa dang /
28a4(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur ba de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don ma mdzad mi mdzad pas/ de'i phyir ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming yongs su
28a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pas ni/ khyed cag sdug bsngal zhing rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can de
28a6(dkon brtsegs): dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'di ltar lus 'khogs pa 'dris nyam thag cing ngo tsha lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag cag gi kha dog rgyas par
28a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa gang lags pa de lta bu 'tshal lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma 'ongs kyi bar du re zhig 'di nyid du sdod cig dang /
28b1(dkon brtsegs): des khyed cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ stan las langs
28b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du mas kyang yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang
28b3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag rab tu gsil zhing / me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma
28b4(dkon brtsegs): dkar po'i char dag rab tu 'bebs pa sha stag kis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bkod pa chen po dang / rnam par rtse ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
28b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
28b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / 'jam dpal khyod bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
28b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug gam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snyoms par 'jug lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin
29a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa de de bzhin gshegs pa gang las thos/ khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs nas ni ji srid cig lon/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
29a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe bdag gis ting nge 'dzini bsgrub pa de thos shing / bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs pa de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu thugs bskyed par yang ma gyur lags so//

29a7(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal bsgrub pa de dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
29b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa nyi shu dang ldan na bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/

30b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/

30b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po spong ba dang / sbyangs pa dang / tshul khrims dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang ldan pa dang /

30b7(dkon brtsegs): nag nog ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos
31a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spong ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la lhag par mi dmigs pa dang /

31b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / nyi zla thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba byung bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin
31b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs so/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' khris ni ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs so//
