67a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang mi rnams kyi rngam ma'i sgra gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ma dkrol bar sgra grag cing / shing ljon pa thams cad las kyang me tog sna tshogs
67a2(dkon brtsegs): dag rab tu rgyas la lhags par gyur to/ / rdzing bu dag nas kyang pad+ma mang po dag rab tu 'thon par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing
67a3(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// lha bye ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas me tog gi/
67a4(dkon brtsegs): char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa'i char dag kyang mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// sil snyan dag kyang rab tu gsil zhing / lha'i glu dbyang
67a5(dkon brtsegs): mang po dag kyang bsgrags nas/ thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ kha mthun par tshig 'di skad ces/ a la la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa'i chos/ a la la chos/ a la la chos/ 'jig rten
67a6(dkon brtsegs): du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba'ang mthong ngo / / sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / zos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no//
67a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ zab mo la bzod pa yin no zhes kyang smras so// de nas bcom
67b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i slad du snga ltas 'di dag byung ba las na/ 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i
67b2(dkon brtsegs): dus na spyod par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir snga ltas byung ba 'di dag yin no// 'jam dpal gyis
67b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlab mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
67b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la brten nas/ rnam par grol ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha
67b5(dkon brtsegs): ma na spyod par gyur cig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma mchis pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa dang / srog ma mchis pa dang / gang zag/
67b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang / shed las skyes ma mchis pa dang / shed bu ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam
67b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha man spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'dod chags ma mchis pa dang / zhe sdang ma mchis pa dang /
68a1(dkon brtsegs): gti mug ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rgyu ma mchis pa dang / lta ba ma mchis pa dang / srid pa ma mchis pa dang / srid pa
68a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'tshal ba ma mchis pa dang / lus ma mchis pa dang / lus su gdags pa ma mchis pa dang / sem ma mchis pa dang / sems su gdags pa ma mchis pa dang / dran pa ma mchis pa dang /
68a3(dkon brtsegs): dran par bgyid pa dag ma mchis pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag ma mchis pa dang / gzhag pa ma mchis pa dang / nye bar gzhag pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba ma mchis
68a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'du shes ma mchis pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang / mig ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rna ba ma mchis pa dang / sgra
68a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang / sna ma mchis pa dang / dri ma mchis pa dang / lce ma mchis pa dang / ro ma mchis pa dang / lus ma mchis pa dang / reg bya ma mchis pa dang / yid ma mchis pa dang / chos ma
68a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang / gzugs khams ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang / 'di la rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / chad pa ma mchis
68a7(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa ma mchis
68b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / phyir mi 'ong
68b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / dgra bcom pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma mchis pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma mchis pa dang /
68b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang / stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis pa dang / ye shes ma mchis
68b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang / stong pa nyid ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid/
68b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang / rang bzhin ma mchis pa dang / 'thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon sum du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa dang / rig pa ma mchis pa dang
68b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gram ma mchis pa dang / pha rol ma mchis pa dang / tshu rol ma mchis pa dang / thar pa ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / ming du gdags pa ma
68b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos
69a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'dis 'ga' yang ma sbyar/ ma grol/ mi sbyor/ mi 'grol ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na
69a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang
69a3(dkon brtsegs): ma bkrol/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das/ de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang ma brnyes/ ma bshig/ chos 'ga' yang ma bskyed/ ma bkag/ rnam par ma bshig/ ma bskyod pa dang /
69a4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sems can 'ga' yang 'grol bar mi 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar mi 'gyur/ de dag
69a5(dkon brtsegs): gis sems can 'ga' yang brnyes par mi 'gyur/ 'jig par mi 'gyur/ chos 'ga' yang skyed par mi 'gyur/ 'gog par mi 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur/ spyod par mi 'gyur
69a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / da ltar byang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sems can 'ga' yang mi 'grol/ yongs su mya ngan las mi zlo// de dag sems
69a7(dkon brtsegs): can 'ga' yang mi brnyas/ mi 'jig/ chos 'ga' yang mi skyed/ mi 'gog/ rnam par mi 'jig/ mi skyod pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs
69b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus lnga brgya tha man spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos bstan pa 'di la cung zad kyang ma spras/ ma brjod/ ma bshad/ ma bstan/
69b2(dkon brtsegs): brtags// ma bsgrags/ ma bsnyad/ ma smos/ ma bzlas shing / chos bstan pa 'di la yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod la/ chos bstan pa 'di gang gis kyang ma mnyan/ 'ga' yang nyan par mi 'gyur/ 'ga' yang
69b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha man 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i
69b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig gang gis 'di la tshul khrims ma mchis pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma mchis pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas ma mchis pa dang / shes rab ma mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi
69b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na 'dzam bu'i gling
69b6(dkon brtsegs): na smod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa stsol bar mi bgyid/ tshul khrims srung bar mi bgyid/ bzod pa sgrub par mi bgyid/ brtson 'grus
69b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsom par mi bgyid/ bsam gtan rnams sgom par mi bgyid/ shes rab spyod par mi bgyid/ byang chub don du gnyer bar mi bgyid/ yang dag pa la 'jug par mi bgyid/ byang chub thob par mi bgyid/ stobs
70a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams thob par mi bgyid/ mi 'jigs pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ dbang po rnams thob par mi bgyid/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ chos kyi 'khor
70a2(dkon brtsegs): lo skor bar mi bgyid/ sems can grol bar mi bgyid/ smra bar mi bgyid pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig dre tshwa kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par
70a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
70a4(dkon brtsegs): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'ji rten du dog sa cher g.yos par gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
70a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / byams pa dman pa la mos pa'i sems can 'di dag 'dzin par mi 'gyur na/ ma legs kyis thong zhig/ de skad ces
70a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang
70a7(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams kyi don gyi slad du bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis phyogs 'di nyid du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun
70b1(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa bzhis bstan te/ thams cad du'ang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus so// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang //
70b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas ji srid cig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa phrag
70b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bum 'das pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas me tog mngon par 'phags pa seng ge'i rtsal gyi yon tan phung po zhes bya ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
70b4(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na/ sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de'i nyis 'gyur snyed kyis na phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob bo// de'i
70b5(dkon brtsegs): nyis 'gyur snyed ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / 'jam
70b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / ji ltar 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / gnas brtan 'od srung
70b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
71a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ lha bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu drug pa rdzogs so//
71a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren rnga bo d+hi dang / badz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsab zhang ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po bzhi/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya/
71a3(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sing ha pa ri prits+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa seng ges zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs
71a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga
71a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// /
71a6(dkon brtsegs): / rgyal ba gang zag mtshungs pa med// rgyal po ma skyes dgra yi bu// seng ge zhes ni grags pa zhig/ tshong dpon bu mo lnga brgya yis// mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu// rgyal po'i khab nas de byung nas// rgyal
71a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'byor pa chen po yis/ / gser las byas pa'i gdugs thogs te// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gan song nas// zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// lnga brgya po yis gdugs de dag/ tshang bar thub pa
71b1(dkon brtsegs): tsheche la phul/ / kun kyang byang chub don du zhugs// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mthu yis ni// de dag mi 'jigs skyes gyur nas// seng ges thal mo sbyar byas te// rdzogs sangs rgyas la zhus pa ni// byang chub
71b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa gang / / de ni 'dren pas bdag la gsungs// gang gis mdzes par 'gyur ba lags// gang gis rdzus te skye bar 'gyur// skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur// thub pa chen pos lung bstan
71b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ / de dag lhag bsam ye shes kyis// mkhyen nas sangs rgyas lung bstan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang zhes// khyod kyis dris pa de bstan to// bzod pa yi ni mdzes par 'gyur//
71b4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyad pas rdzus te skye// chos kyi sbyin pas skye ba dran// gzhon nu de ltar shes par gyis// gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang // gser mdog 'dra ba'i lus
71b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / / de mthong sems can dga' bar 'gyur// sbyin pa kun gyi mtshan du 'gyur// byams pas de bzhin dpe byad bzang // sems can kun la sems mnyam pas// rgyal ba gser
71b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur/ / gzungs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur// gang gis ting 'dzin skyes 'gyur lags// gzung ba'i tshig tu gang gis 'gyur// thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol// chos
71b7(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pas gzungs rnams 'thob/ / sems bsgoms pas ni ting 'dzin skye// bkyal pa'i tshig rnams spang byas na// gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur// dran dang ldan par ji ltar
72a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / thub pa ji ltar blo gros ldan// ji ltar chos spyod 'gyur ba lags// skyes bu dam pa mkhas cis 'gyur// g.yo med pas ni dran ldan 'gyur// don la sems pa
72a2(dkon brtsegs): blo gros ldan/ / gus dang bcas pas chos spyod 'gyur// chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa mkhas// 'jig rten mgon po'i spun sngar ni// las gang gis ni skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mngon sum du// zhu ba/
72a3(dkon brtsegs): zhu bar ji ltar 'gyur// gang gis chos kyi sbyin pa la// nam yang bar chad mi byed pa// de ni des na myur rab tu// 'jig rten mgon dang phrad par 'gyur// gang gis mi khom spong bar 'gyur// gang gis bzang
72a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gror mchi 'gyur lags/ / skye ba kun tu skye ba na// bag mchis par ni ji ltar 'gyur// dad pas mi khom spong bar 'gyur// tshul khrims kyis ni bzang 'gror 'gro// stong pa nyid ni bsgom byas na// rtag tu
72a5(dkon brtsegs): bag dang ldan par 'gyur/ / thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams// ji ltar las rnams dag par 'gyur// ji ltar bdud kyis snyas mi thogs// ji ltar chos kyis 'phongs 'gyur spong // rnam par grol
72a6(dkon brtsegs): bas las rnams 'dag/ brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud 'dul 'gyur// ci smras de bzhin byed pas ni// chos kyis 'phongs pa spong bar 'gyur// ka la bing ka'i sgra snyan dang // tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'drar ji
72a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'gyur/ / thub pa mos pa sna tshogs kyi// sems can rnams ni gang gis dga'// bden par smras pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs// ngag rtsub spangs pas sgra snyan 'gyur// bkyil pa'i tshig dang
72b1(dkon brtsegs): phra ma rnams/ / spangs pas sems can dga' bar 'gyur// ji ltar tshe ring 'gyur ba lags// bro nang nyung bar ji ltar 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa gang gis na// g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi byed 'gyur//
72b2(dkon brtsegs): gsod pa mi byed tshe ring 'gyur// mi 'tshe bas ni nang nyung 'gyur// mi mthun pa dag bsdums byas na// g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyed 'gyur// don rnams ji ltar 'grub 'gyur lags// gang gis longs
72b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod nyams mi 'gyur/ / gang dang gang du skye ba der// dbang chen grags pa ji ltar 'gyur// chags pa med pas don rnams 'grub// ser sna med pas longs spyod 'phel// gang dang gang du skye
72b4(dkon brtsegs): ba der/ / phrag dog med pas dpa' cher grags// ji ltar lha yi mig 'thob 'gyur// lha yi rna ba ji ltar thob// sems can 'chi 'pho skye ba dag/ 'dren pa gang gis 'tshal bar 'gyur// mar me sbyin
72b5(dkon brtsegs): pas mig 'thob 'gyur/ / rol mo'i sgra yis rna ba dag/ 'chi 'pho skye shes ye shes kyis// de bas de ltar 'grub par 'gyur// 'dren pa byang chub sems dpa' yi// zag pa gang gis bas par 'gyur//
72b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs snga dran cis 'gyur lags// rdzu 'phrul ci yis thob par 'gyur// bzhon pa sbyin pas rdzu 'phrul 'thob// dran pa bsgoms pas rjes su dran// mtha' gnyis rab tu spang byas na// zag pa
72b7(dkon brtsegs): zad pas reg par 'gyur/ / gang gis zhing ni phun sum tshogs// cis na dge 'dun phur sum tshogs// gang gis phun sum tshogs 'od 'gyur// gang gis phyogs bcur lhang nger gda'/
73a1(dkon brtsegs): smon lam gyis ni phun sum zhing // bsdu bas dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// 'dir ni rin chen gdugs phul bas// phyogs bcur lhang nger snang bar 'gyur// chos rnams
73a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsdu ba ni/ / chos gang gis ni thob par 'gyur// gang dang gang du skyes pa der// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba thob// sems can thams cad thar bya'i phyir// byang chub don du sems
73a3(dkon brtsegs): btud pas/ / des na chos rnams bsdu ba'ang 'thob// des ni dga' ba'ang 'thob par 'gyur// bslab pa ci 'dra bslabs pa dang // sems ni ci 'dra bsgoms pa yis// thub pa chen po khyod 'dra ba'i// /
73a4(dkon brtsegs): ston pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// sems can ma lus thams cad la// mnyam pa'i sems nyid bslabs pa dang // mnyam par sems ni bsgoms pas na// thams cad zil gnon rgyal bar
73a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / skye ba kun tu byang chub sems// rmi lam na yang sems de ni// 'dor mi 'gyur na mnyal tshe// smos ci 'tshal bar gang gis 'gyur// grong dang grong khyer rnams su 'am// gang du gan
73a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yul rnams su/ / byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud// des na sems 'dor mi 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar yang // ji ltar stobs ni cher 'gyur dang // rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang //
73a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud rnams bye bas tshugs mi 'gyur// 'dir ni snying po lnga byin zhing // skrag la mi 'jigs byin na ni// gang dang gang du skyes par yang // des na stobs ni cher 'gyur te// rtag tu mthu yis pa lag/
73b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de// 'jig rten mgon gyis mngon sum du// lung bstan pa 'di thos nas su// seng ge yid ni dga' bar gyur//
73b2(dkon brtsegs): seng ge grogs dang lhan cig tu// 'di skad kyi ni tshig smra ste// spyod pa bstan pa 'di la ni// bdag cag rjes su bslab par bgyi// de nas sangs rgyas 'dzum mdzad de// stong gsum po yang
73b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yos gyur nas/ / ma pham pas ni sangs rgyas la// ci zhig slad du 'dzum mdzad pa// thub chen lung bstan gsol zhes zhus// de skad zhu ba zhus pa dang // ma pham pa la sangs rgyas kyis 'di
73b4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces ni bka' stsal to/ / gang gi phyir ni 'dzum mdzad pa// ma pham nga las 'dir nyon cig/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu dang // gzhan yang khrag khrig phrag bcu la// byang chub don du 'dus nas
73b5(dkon brtsegs): ni/ / mi yi 'dren pa rnams la mchod// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du// bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag rnams// nga yis yongs su smin par byas// snang ba che
73b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba yi/ / bskal pa chen po 'byung 'gyur te// de dag bskal pa gcig de la// rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ba ste// ye shes tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes// 'jig rten 'den pa rnams su
73b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa ltar// de dag gi yang de 'drar 'gyur// byams pa nas ni bzung nas su// bskal pa sum brgya tshad ni// de yi bar du dus kun tu// rtag tu sangs rgyas phrad par 'gyur//
74a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag byang chub thob pa yi// ming ni gang sus thos pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'jig rten du// kun mkhyen gang zag mtshungs med 'gyur// gang zhig lung bstan
74a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos nas/ / mos pa skyed par byed pa ni// 'jig rten gsum po 'di dag na// de dang mtshungs bu'i bsod nams med// gang gis bskal pa drug stong du// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du//
74a3(dkon brtsegs): rin chen rnams kyis bkang byas nas// byang chub phyir 'dir byin pa bas// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di// thos nas byang chub phyir 'jug na// sngar smos pa yi bsod nams kyis// grangs dang
74a4(dkon brtsegs): char yang mi phod do/ / chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe na ni// 'jig rten mgon po'i mthu yis ni// lha rnams me tog char pa 'bebs// stong gsum po yang gsos par gyur// seng ge grogs dang bcas pa yis//
74a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas// nyin bdun par du mchod byas te// bstan pa la ni rab tu byung // de kun gyis ni ting 'dzin thob// zad mi shes kyi gzungs kyang thob// sems can rnams
74a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi don byed de/ / sangs rgyas chos la 'dzud par byed// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa// sems can bye ba phrag brgyad cu byang chub mchog la zhugs so// bcom ldan
74a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ seng ge grogs dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
74b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam mangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa seng ges nus nga'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa bdun
74b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dAn shI la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas
74b3(dkon brtsegs): gtan la phab pa'o/ / sh+lau ka drug cu'o// / ts+ya/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba bud+d+ha ra ha s+yo pA ya ko'u shal l+ya/ dz+nyA nod ta ra bo d+hi satwa pa ri brits+tsha/
74b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ri brton ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg
74b5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i mdo/ / // bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
74b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems
74b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri drug stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa/ mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa sgrub pa la mkhas pa
75a1(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ yon tan 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma
75a2(dkon brtsegs): red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ ring po ma lon par 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog
75a3(dkon brtsegs): mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston to//
75a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa stan las
75a5(dkon brtsegs): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
75a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ / gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
75a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la
75b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di sad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems radas par bya'o// de skar
75b2(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
75b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa zhes bgyi na/ thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
75b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
75b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i
75b6(dkon brtsegs): don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes pa rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
75b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te// rigs
76a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi babs la mkhas pa yongs su dri bar sems pa ni rigs kyi bu yang khyod legs so/ / rigs kyi bu de'i
76a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung zhig dang / ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa khyod la bshad par bya'o// byang chub sems
76a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
76a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni zan kham gcig tsam yang sems can thams cad la sbyin par byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems
76a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa la zan kham gcig tsam sbyin par byed na'ang / de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin
76a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya bar yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro// de rgyu gnyis kyis na sems can thams cad la yongs su
76a7(dkon brtsegs): sngo bar byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa nyid kyis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la
76b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa la rjes su yi rang
76b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed cing / rjes su yi rang nas kyang sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo zhing btang ste/ yongs su sngo bar yang byed do// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des//
76b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par byed la/ len pa po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par
76b4(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ rigs kyi bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
76b5(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu dag na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / spos kyi shing ljon pa dang / me tog dang / me tog 'phreng dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa bdag gir ma
76b6(dkon brtsegs): byas shing / yongs su ma gzung ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung zhing / yongs su bsdus nas sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang
76b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la gtong bar byed de/ yongs su btang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do// phyogs bcu dag na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / spos kyi shing ljon pa dang / me
77a1(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / me tog 'phreng dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa bdag gi dang bcas shing yongs su gzung ba dang bcas pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi dri rlung gis btab/
77a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngad de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa
77a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/ / de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
77a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa
77a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar
77a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad bsdus te 'chags par byed cing / 'di ltar sems can
77a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gi lus la 'bab par 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag bde bar gyur cig ces go cha gyon par yang byed do// phyogs
77b1(dkon brtsegs): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas de dag yang dag par bsdus te rjes su
77b2(dkon brtsegs): yi rang bar byed cing / rjes su yi rang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
77b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do/ / de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
77b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig
77b5(dkon brtsegs): la phyag byas/ bkur sti byas bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas/ bsnyen bkur byas nas/ 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
77b6(dkon brtsegs): ni chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges par byung ba dang / tshul khrims gcig pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gcig pa dang / shes rab gcig pa dang / rnam par grol ba gcig pa dang / rnam par grol
77b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes mthong ba gcig pa dang / ye shes gcig pa dang / rig pa gcig pa yin no zhes so sor rtogs par byed do// des de ltar so sor brtags nas 'di ltar shes par byed de
78a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/ bkur stir byas/ tha mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas/ bsnyen bkur byas pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
78a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / bkur sti byas pa dang / bla mar byas pa dang / ri mor byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par byed do// byang chub
78a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mchod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung nas/ thams
78a4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed de/ / rigs kyi bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
78a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe blo rtul bar gyur na'ang / de bdag nyid khyad du gsod par mi byed cing zhum par mi byed par/ de tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gci
78a6(dkon brtsegs): tsam la'ang 'jug par byed cing / de 'di ltar so sor rtog par yang byed de/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig po 'di'i don gang yin pa de ni gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams cad kyi
78a7(dkon brtsegs): don yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do/ / des de ltar tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig kha ton du bslabs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po bskyed de/ rnyed pa dang / bkur
78b1(dkon brtsegs): sti dang / grags pa 'dod pa med pas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu skye bo mang po la tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa de/
78b2(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed cing / 'di ltar smon lam 'debs par yang byed de/ sems can gang su gang dag gis bdag gi tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams
78b3(dkon brtsegs): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par yang byed do/ / de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa des sems can thams cad
78b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo ltar mang du thos par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
78b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgya la brgya lam na dbul por gyur na'ang / des tha na gzhan gyi las kyang byas te/
78b6(dkon brtsegs): kha zas nal ze gang tsam yang blangs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis dge 'dun nam/ gang zag la 'bul bar yang byed do// phul nas kyang de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ bcom ldan 'dra/
78b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems rgyas chen pos byin na sbyin pa'ang rgya chen por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas na/ 'di ltar bdag gis sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'di ni rlung mod kyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis
79a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pas dpag tu med par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor rtog par byed do/ / de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems tshad med par gyur pa des kha zas nal za gang tsam po de sbyin par
79a2(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs shAkya thub pa ji
79a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur zhing / lag na rin po che grub par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed do// de dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su/
79a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngos pa des/ byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa lnga byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po'ang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur la/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog kyang
79a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur/ lag na rin po che'ang 'grub par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
79a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur
79a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / de dge la dga' bar mi byed cing / gal te byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod la/ bdag la de lta ma yin
79b1(dkon brtsegs): par mthong na'ang / de rgyu gnyis kyis bdag la rtog par byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yin la/ sangs rgyas/
79b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams las nges par byung ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams yin no snyam du bdag nyid la rtog par byed cing / de 'di ltar so sor rtog par yang byed de/ bde dag la
79b3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dir ni bdag shin tu mchog dang / shin tu gtso bo yin gyi/ 'di dag ni ma yin no// 'di dag ni bdag gi pha'i nor gyi phung po la yongs su spyod
79b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa yin pas/ bdag gis 'di dag la dag la dga' bar yang mi bya la/ 'di dag la phrag dog kyang mi bya'o snyam du so sor rtog par byed do// des lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa des
79b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas kyang khengs par mi 'gyur la/ bsnyen bkur ma byas kyang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad la thugs mnyam pa kun tu 'dzin par
79b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa lta bu'i rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs
79b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ sbyin pa byin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ji ltar yongs
80a1(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe slong mo pa mthong ba na/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
80a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs te/ ser sna'i sems tshar gcod par byed cing / gtong ba chen po'ang spel bar byed la/ sbyin no snyam pa'i sems kyang skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
80a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs shing tshul khrims ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag yin pa de dag tshul khrims la 'god par byed
80a4(dkon brtsegs): cing / sbyin pa byin nas 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// byams pa'i sems dang /
80a5(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang / le lo med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par
80a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa dang / myang ba dag la mngon par gus pa yang dag par sgrub par byed
80a7(dkon brtsegs): cing / rtsol bar byed pa dang / lus kyis zhal ta byed pa dang / sems kyis zhal ta byed pa dang / ldang ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
80b1(dkon brtsegs): byin pa yin no/ / byin pa gang yin pa de la sems rtse gcig pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba med pa gang yin pa de ni//
80b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// sbyin pa byin nas chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed de/ sus byin/ su la byin/ ci zhig byin/ 'di'i rnam par smin pa sus myong bar 'gyur/
80b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed cing / des de ltar yongs su btsal nas kyang / gang gis byin pa dang / gang la byin pa dang / ci zhig byin pa dang / de'i rnam par smin pa myong bar
80b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa sbyin
80b5(dkon brtsegs): pa byin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di
80b6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas sbyin pa gang gis sems can rnams kyang 'khor ba las yongs su 'dzin
80b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid la/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa de ni ngo mtshar
81a1(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs
81a2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa ni/ thabs la mkhas pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas/ sbyin pa chung ngu'ang chen por byed la/ chen po ni dpag tu med pa dang grangs med par byed do//
81a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
81a4(dkon brtsegs): po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ gal te brgya la brgya la brgya la ma na sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang 'am/ sems kun tu rmongs pas nyes pa byung na'ang / de 'di ltar so ser slob ste/ gal te bdag phung
81a5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / khams dang / skye mched 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur na ni/ de lta na bdag gis yongs su gdung bar bya dgos par 'gyur bas/ bdag gis 'di ltar
81a6(dkon brtsegs): go cha bgo bar bya ste/ bdag sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor bar 'khor bar bya ba la bdag gi sems zhum par mi bya/ 'jigs par
81a7(dkon brtsegs): mi bya/ sems skrag par mi bya/ yongs su gdung bar mi bya zhing / ji lta ji ltar 'khor ba na 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / nyes pa 'di'ang
81b1(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhin du phyir bya zhing / phyin chad kyang nyes pa mi 'byung bar bya ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang nyes pa las dbyung ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes go cha gyon par byed do//
81b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa nye bar gzung na/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni/ gal te rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhi po thams cad byung bar gyur na'ang thabs la mkhas pa des sel bar
81b3(dkon brtsegs): byed na/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa' la nyes pa med ces smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas
81b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nongs pa dang bcas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub
81b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' so so thar pa'i bslab pa la slob par byed pa na/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za bar byed cing / sems can thams cad kyis legs par smras pa dang / nyes par
81b6(dkon brtsegs): smras so cog bzod par byed du zin kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gnas par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i nyes pa lci ba
81b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rtsa ba'i nyes pa byung bar gyur pa ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
82a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i skal ba med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ma bshags/ ma spangs kyi bar
82a2(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med cing / sangs rgyas kyi sa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba med de/ de ni gnas med
82a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ston pa
82a4(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/ mngon sum du ma mdzad pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad
82a5(dkon brtsegs): ces dge slong gis nyes pa byung ba mthong na bcab par mi bya bar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyaspyan sngar smros shig ces bka' stsal lags pas// btsun
82a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi slad du mchi ba na/ grong khyer gzhan zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal
82a7(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bgyi ba khri'i steng na bud med gcig dang lhan cig mchis pa mthong ba de bdag byams pa dang ldan pa dang / nongs pa ma mchis pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lags
82b1(dkon brtsegs): so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig de skad ces gsol nas/ ring po malon par de nas de'i mod la sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub
82b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags te 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras
82b3(dkon brtsegs): so/ / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pas bar snang la 'dug par nus snyam mam/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni mi nus so// byang chub
82b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa 'di la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa'i chos dang ldan
82b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dris shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yul yul por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
82b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis gtso bo chen po 'di lta bu la nongs pa yongs su glengs pa gang lags pa'i nongs pa la nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi nongs pa la nongs
82b7(dkon brtsegs): par bshags pa gang lags pa de nongs pa la nongs par yongs su gzung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod
83a1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag la nyes pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag
83a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu zla med par zhi gnas kyi gnas pas gnas par byed pa ni zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba la bar chad med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
83a3(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pa bud med kyi 'khor dam pa'i nang na 'dug cing / dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' dgur smod par byed pa'ang thams cad mkhyen
83a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la bar du gcod pa med par rig par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni dkon mchog gsum po'o// gsum gang zhen
83a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor gang
83a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/ / kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba 'dod pa'i
83a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' dgur spyod par byed pa mthong na/ kun dag bo khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta bu'i po lnga da
83b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing gnas pa yin par shes par bya'o/ / kun dga' bo gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po khri gcig gi steng na bud med dang lhan cig 'dug par gyur pa
83b2(dkon brtsegs): las nyon cig/ kun dga' bo bud med de ni 'das pa'i dus na tshe rabs lnga brgyar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/ de sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa de nyid kyis
83b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la lhag par sems kyis 'brel bar gyur kyang / byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po de'i dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / tshul khrims kyi stobs bskyed pa ma mthong nas/
83b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas ngan len gyi tshig brjod par ma nus nas/ de gcig pu dben par 'dug pa na 'di lta bu'i sems skyed par gyur te/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bdag dang lhan
83b5(dkon brtsegs): cig khri gcig gi steng na 'dug par gyur na/ bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o snyam me// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshegs can rab
83b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog rgyal pos sring mo de'i sems kyis yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos ges bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas/
83b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na/ sring mo de'i khyim ga la ba der zhugs nas nang gi sa'i
84a1(dkon brtsegs): khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa'i sa'i khams de dag ni gcig pa'i chos kyi sgo 'dis des sa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis lag pa g.yas pas sring mo
84a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzung ste khri gcig la 'khod do/ / 'khod ma thag tu des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so// sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags mi mdzad/ doni byis pa'i spyod yul yin
84a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod la sred pa spangs byas na/ / mi mchog sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur// kun dga' bo de nas sring mo des tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/
84a4(dkon brtsegs): khri de las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtubs te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dod gang sangs rgyas smad pa dag/ sran chad don
84a5(dkon brtsegs): du gnyer mi bgyid/ / 'dod la sred pa spangs bgyis nas// mi mchog sangs rgyas 'grub gyur cig bdag gi sems kyis gang bsams pa'i// nongs pa de ni khyod la 'chags// srog chags
84a6(dkon brtsegs): kun la sman slad du/ / bdag ni byang chub 'dun pa skyed// kun dga' bo de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po thabs la mkhas pa des/ sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
84a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par rab tu bzhag nas/ stan las langs te song ngo // kun dga' bo de'i lhag pa'i bsam
84b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khyad par la ltos/ kun dga' bo nga ni sring me de 'di nas shing bos nas bud med kyi lus bsgyur te/ bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa
84b2(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / des byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na'ang sems can
84b3(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar lung ston to/ / kun dga' bo rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gang bzung na log par ltung ba'i
84b4(dkon brtsegs): chos su 'gyur ba de 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
84b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs la mkhas pa dang snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi lags te/ btsun
84b6(dkon brtsegs): p a bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag ni 'di snyam du gal te byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i slad du 'di lta bu'i rmongs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing
84b7(dkon brtsegs): nongs pa ji la bu byung bas bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg par 'gyur yang btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni nongs pa 'byung ba de dang / sems
85a1(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la spro bar bgyi lags kyi/ sems can gcig po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btang ba la ni ma legs so snyam du sems lags so//
85a2(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' snying
85a3(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa ni nyes pa'i chos dang yang ldan par mi 'gyur la/ nyes pa thams cad spong bar yang byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ 'das
85a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba
85a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig byung bar gyur te/ des lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du nags 'dab dag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyad nas/ de lo bzhi khri nyis stong po de 'das pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang legs 'byor ces bya bar zhubs so//
85a6(dkon brtsegs): re grong khyer chen po der zhugs pa na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis bram ze'i khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa de mthong nas// de 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems
85a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bram ze'i khye'u de'i mdun du rab tu brgyugs te rkang pa la gtugs so/ / rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma des bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo khyod ci 'dod/ des de la 'di skad ces smras
85b1(dkon brtsegs): so/ / bram ze'i khye'u kho bo no khyod 'tshal lo// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo kho ba ni 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ kho bo na tshangs par spyod pa yin no// des de la 'di skad
85b2(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ / bram ze'i khye'u gal te khyod dang lhan cig tu 'grob par mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag 'gum par 'gyur lags so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag gis
85b3(dkon brtsegs): lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tsha dra bang spyad pa spyad nas/ deng brtul zhugs bshig pa 'di ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ des bu mo de mthus spangs te bor nas/
85b4(dkon brtsegs): gom pa bdun bor ba dang / de gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe snying rje chen po skyes par gyur nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis brtul zhugs bshig ste/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang //
85b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de bzod par bya zhing / bu mo 'di bde bar 'gyur ba dang / 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// rigs kyi
85b6(dkon brtsegs): bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de de nas phyir log ste/ lag pa g.yas pas bu mo de bzung ste/ de la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang mo longs shig dang / kho bos khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o//
85b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bram ze'i khya lta 'am de lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de'i khyim na gnas nas/ yang mngon par byung ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bskyed nas/ de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
86a1(dkon brtsegs): du skyes par gyur to/ / rigs kyi ngu rab tshade'i dus na bram ze'i rkyen sangs zhes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan migayin tas du spyod 'daganyis dang tsam zab sgyun/ khyod
86a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nganyid do'i cha de'i dus na bras zo'i khyeru skar ma zhes bya ba der gyur to// shAkya'i bu sos 'tsho ma da ni de'i tshe de'i dus na tshang dpon gyi bu mor gyur to// ga kyi
86a3(dkon brtsegs): bungs snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa des cung zad tsam zhig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang bskal pa khrir 'khor ba bsnyil cing sbas par gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu sems ca gzhan dag gi sems
86a4(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba la ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
86a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dag thabs la mkhas pa
86a6(dkon brtsegs): yin par gyur na ni/ dge slong ko ka li ka'ang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin
86a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la dge slong dri med ces bya ba'i chos smra ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ de dgon pa'i phug cig na gnas so//
86b1(dkon brtsegs): de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na drang srong lnga brgya zhig kyang gnas te/ de'i tshe na dus ma yin par sprin chen po 'dus shing / char chen po bab par gyur to// de nas bud med gnyis shig grong bar gyi lam
86b2(dkon brtsegs): na 'dug pa de gnyis char pa de bskyab pa'i phyir dge slong dri med gnas pa'i phug tu zhugs te/ phug de nas phyir byung ba dang / drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis bud med de gnyis dge slong dri med kyi phug
86b3(dkon brtsegs): nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag 'di snyam du/ e ma'o dge slong dri med 'di ni sdig pa 'dod pa/ mi tshangs par spyod pa yin no snyam nas/ tha ba dang zhe
86b4(dkon brtsegs): sdang gi 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ / de nas dge slong dri med kyis drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ de'i tshe steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la
86b5(dkon brtsegs): ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa drang srong de dag gis mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi bstan bcos dag las ni mi tshangs par spyod pas ni ste dgi bar
86b6(dkon brtsegs): snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par mi nus so zhes 'byung ngo snyam nas/ de dag gis de'i mod la dge slong dri med kyi rkang pa la yan lag lngas gtugs te nyes pa la nyes par bshags so//
86b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong dri med de de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par ma gyur na ni/ drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba
87a1(dkon brtsegs): chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang
87a2(dkon brtsegs): the tshom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya ba der gyur to// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs
87a3(dkon brtsegs): des khyod kyis 'di ltar gal te dge slong shA ra'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur na ni/ dge slong ko ka li ka'ang sems can
87a4(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur
87a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na smad 'tshong ma sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bya ba shes shing legs par
87a6(dkon brtsegs): lobs pa ni/ de'i 'og tu nor 'dod pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan gyi drung du ci nas kyang bdag nyid yongs su btang zhing dga' ba ston pa dang / ji srid du skyes bu de las don thams cad ma
87a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs kyi bar du de la yo byad thams cad kyang sri bar mi byed pa de lta de ltar gnas par byed do/ / de nas don bsgrubs zin pa'i 'og tu ni de la mi lta mi sems par spong bar byed cing
87b1(dkon brtsegs): de gzhi de las 'gyod pa'i sems gcig tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'ang / thabs la mkhas pa des sems can 'di
87b2(dkon brtsegs): dag yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya bar shes te/ rnam grangs des sems can de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du drung du sbyor bar byed cing / de dag la yo byad thams cad kyang mi sri bar byed
87b3(dkon brtsegs): do/ / sems can rnams kyi dge ba la dga' bas/ bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong bar byed kyi/ yo byad la dga' bas ni ma yin no// gang gi tshe kye ma sems can 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
87b4(dkon brtsegs): byas par gyur pa dag ste/ 'di dag gis phyir yongs su nyams par byed mi nus par shes nas ni/ de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mo thams cad la mi lta bar spangs te/ 'gro zhing de
87b5(dkon brtsegs): de dang 'brel ba'i sems la gnas par mi byed do/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mes yongs su gdungs pa'i sa bon rnams ni kha dog yongs su nyams pa med kyang myu gu 'byung ba'i skal
87b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni med pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes
87b7(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gdungs na/ de 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed kyang / log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dzin
88a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi kha dog las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dud 'gro'o skye gnas su song ba'i
88a2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bung ba ni me tog thams cad las dri snom zhing ro myang bar byed kyang / gang la'ang rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par mi byed/ gnas kyi sred pa skyed par mi byed cing // de dag las dri dang
88a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dab ma dang / sdong bu dang / me tog 'phrog par mi byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'ang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod
88a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dga' ba dang / rtser mo thams cad la yongs su longs spyod par byed kyang / de dag la rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par yang mi byed/ gnas kyi srid pa skyed par yang mi byed la/ bdag kyang
88a5(dkon brtsegs): smas par mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang smas par mi 'gyur bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nya ba shin tu legs par bslabs pa ni sras bu gcig la gzan ma btags te
88a6(dkon brtsegs): mchil pa byas nas/ mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dor ro// de srad bu legs par bsrungs pa gcig po des/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na mtsho chen po nas mchil pa de 'dren par byed pa de bzhin
88a7(dkon brtsegs): du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'ang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms
88b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par gtad pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dam chen por 'jug par byed kyang / de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa des/ gang gi
88b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de'i tshe na 'dod pa'i khams spangs te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang ba ni/ rgyal po'i mi
88b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis bzung ste zhags pa lnga'i chings mas bcings par gyur kyang / de ni gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe na rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis chings ma de dag thams
88b4(dkon brtsegs): cad bcad nas gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'ang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gang gi tshe 'dod
88b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' ba myong bar byed cing / de dag dang 'dres par gnas par byed kyang / de gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na shes rab kyi rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa dang /
88b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i chings ma de dag thams cad rab tu bshad de/ de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
88b7(dkon brtsegs): du skye bar byed do/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'phong gi slob dpon legs par bslabs pa zhig ral gri rnon po ras bcos bus dkris pa zhig thogs te/ 'gron pa mang po
89a1(dkon brtsegs): sgrol bar byed pa de na/ sems can mi mkhas pa 'phong gi shes pa'i bya ba mi shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'phong gi slob dpon de la snying rje ba dang / brnyas
89a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces gzhu'ang med/ ral gri'ang med/ dong pa'ang med/ 'khor yang med pa 'dis ni 'gron pa 'di dag bsgral bar mi nus te/ 'dis ni bdag
89a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na/ 'gron pa thams cad bsgral ba dang / chom rkun pa'i sde pham par bya ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med pas/ 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro//
89a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes kyang zer bar gyur la/ de nas 'phong gi slob dpon de 'brog dgon par song te/ chom rkun pa'i tshogs lhags par gyur pa na mda' gzhu thogs te/ go cha srab bgos nas/ mtshon cha de
89a5(dkon brtsegs): gzas te chom rkun pa rnams la 'debs par byed cing / des chom rkun pa de dag thams cad srog dang phral nas/ yang mtshon cha lag tu len par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
89a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'ang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon cha legs par thogs te/ thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po
89a7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i shes pa de khong du ma chud pa de dag gis de mthong ba'i
89b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ de dag de la ma dad pa dang / snying rje skyed par byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na/ sems
89b2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad bsgral ba lta ci smos shing / bdud kyi sde pham par byed par lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med pas/ 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer mod kyi/ byang chub
89b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na shes rab kyi mtshon des nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad dral zhing rab tu gtubs
89b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ shre rab dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med dang bral ba dang / 'khrig pa dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro bar byed do// gtam 'di brjod par gyur pa
89b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ces bya ba mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs par gyur te/ de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por
89b6(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms spyod pa na/ tshong dpon zhig gi khyim du phyin pa dang / tshong dpon de la bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog ces bya ba phyugs chung zhig yod par gyur pa khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pa des dge
89b7(dkon brtsegs): slong de'i skad thos nas/ bsod bsnyoms thogs te byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed ga la ba der song ngo // de nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed mthong
90a1(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu/ 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis/ dpe byad las byang bzhin dang / sgra skad dang / kha dog gi mtshan mazung ba dang / de 'dod cham
90a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang ba'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gtugs pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs pa'i
90a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis bsregs pas/ lus rdul bar gyur nas/ 'greng bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed kyang bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog mthong nas/
90a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems skyes par gyur nas/ yud tsam zhig na de la dran pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/ chos gang la
90a5(dkon brtsegs): chags par gyur pa'i chos de gang yin/ ci mig mig la chags sam/ mig ni chags pa ma yin te/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ sems pa med pa/ 'dus byas pa/ rim pa bdun pa/
90a6(dkon brtsegs): sha'i ri lu yin te/ mig de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir te/ sems par mi byed/ tshor bar mi byed do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / pags pa dang / mdog dang / 2nga
90a7(dkon brtsegs): de dang 'dra ste/ des rkang mthil yan chad klad pa man chad kyi bar la so sor brtags na/ nang dang phyi rol na gang chags par 'gyur ba 'am/ sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mongs par 'gyur ba'i chos dka'
90b1(dkon brtsegs): yang ma dmigs so/ / des ma dmigs nas/ 'dod chags kyi sems de dang bral bar gyur cing / des sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags pas/ chos thams cad ma skyes
90b2(dkon brtsegs): par rig nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te/ mnyan yod kyi grong
90b3(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen po la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ nam mkhara' de nyid las rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // bam
90b4(dkon brtsegs): po gnyis pa/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong ba gzigs so// gzigs
90b5(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par
90b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga'
90b7(dkon brtsegs): byed 'dis ni 'dod chags kyi sems la brten te chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas/ bdud kyi sde brtul cing chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor to// de nas bu mo dpal yon
91a1(dkon brtsegs): can gyi mchog 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ bud med kyi lus spangs te/ mtho ras kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thob cing / sum cu cugasum pa'i lha rnams dang
91a2(dkon brtsegs): skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ / skyes ma thag tu de la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gzhal med khang dpag tshad bcu gnyis par 'byung bar gyur// de'i rimagro byed pa'i bsnyen bkur ma lha'i bu mo bri ba
91a3(dkon brtsegs): sto yang nye bar gnas par gyur to/ / de'i mod la des bdag gis las ci zhig byas shing bsags pas 'dir skyes par gyur snyam du bsams pa dang / de 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag ni mnyan yod
91a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi grong khyer chen por tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur pa las/ de na bdag gis kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgar byed la bltas pa dang / bdag 'dod
91a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ bud med kyi lus brjes te/ bdag gis 'dir skyes pa'i lus thob cing / bdag la 'byor pa
91a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa 'di lta bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to snyam nas/ sngon gyi las rjes su dran pa'i shes pa'ang skyes par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod chags kyi sems
91a7(dkon brtsegs): las kyang rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur na/ bdag gis dad pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgar byed la phyag byas shing / bsnyen bkur byas na lta smos kyang
91b1(dkon brtsegs): ci dgos te/ bdag 'dod pas dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod cing bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa ni/ bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin zhing mi rigs kyis/ bdag bcom
91b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der 'gro bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu de 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu
91b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dag thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der song nas
91b4(dkon brtsegs): kha dog shin tu 'phags pa shin tu 'phags pa'i snang ba chen pos rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal snang bar byas te/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa de dag gis bcom
91b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / byang chub sems dpa'
91b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la'ang mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo pug
91b7(dkon brtsegs): bug por sbyar nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ / sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab// byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams bsam mi khyab/ bde
92a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rnams kyi chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ / grags chen rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam mi khyab// mnyan yod du ni bdag sngon bu mor gyur// tshong dpon bu mo
92a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal yon mchog ces bgyi/ / mdzes shing thog mar phyugs chung gyur pa lags// pha ma'i glo bar mchi zhing rab tu byams// sangs rgyas sras po smad par ma gyur pa// mthu chen dga'
92a3(dkon brtsegs): byed ces bgyi gang lags pa/ / bsod snyoms spyod cing mnyan yod rgyu ba'i tshe// de ni bdag gi pha yi khyim du mchis// skad snyan yid du mchi ba thos gyur nas// bdag cag sems kyis bsod
92a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms thogs nas ni/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po gang lags pa// dga' byed mthu chen ga la mchis par mchis// mthong ma thag tu bdag ni 'dod chags dang // ldan pa tshul
92a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma lags sems skyes te/ / gal te ji ltar bsam bzhin ma mjal na// srog la mi lta 'gum pa'i dus bgyid snyam// tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod pas rab gdungs nas// de la
92a6(dkon brtsegs): dka' mchid brjod par bgyi ba dang / / bsod snyoms stsol ba'i rdo yang ma thogs nas// rdul byung der ni 'greng bzhin gum par gyur// bcom ldan bdag ni 'chi 'phor gyur pa'i tshe// skad
92a7(dkon brtsegs): cig de la bud med lus spangs te/ / shi 'phos mtho ris 'jig rten skyes gyur nas// bdag gis 'od gsal skyes pa 'di nyid thob// rin chen sna tshogs blta na sdug pa yi// gzhal med khar
92b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog mdzes pa grub gyur cing / / bdag gi g.yog 'khor lha yi bu mo ni// khri dang bzhi stong tshang ba'ang byung bar gyur// bdag la sems bzang byung bar gyur pa ni// sug las gang gis rnam
92b2(dkon brtsegs): smin 'di 'dra ba/ / rjes su dran nas ngan bu 'di snyam bgyid// chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste// dga' byed yid dga' 'od gsal mkhas pa la// chags bcas sems kyis
92b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bltas gyur pas/ / sug las de yi rnam smin bzang po des// ngan bu gzi brjid mthu stobs 'di 'dra bas// chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra na// gang gis de
92b4(dkon brtsegs): la mchod bgyis ci smos te/ / gang la bde gshegs mkhyen pa 'jug 'gyur ba// de ni nyan thos rang rgyal sa ma lags// ngan bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar ni// sangs rgyas
92b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mchog rab bsgrub pa dang / / bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed spyad bgyi bar// bdag gi dam bcas 'di ni spang mi bgyi// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dga' byed dam pa la// chos
92b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchod pa mchog gis mchod par bgyi/ / gang dag byang chub 'tshal ba ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis 'di la 'dren rnams mchod mi 'gyur// bud med gang dag 'dod chags sems kyis ni//
92b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag la rtog pa bud med lus bsgyur nas// de kun 'jigs med skyes pa 'thob 'gyur ba// byang chub spyad mchod dam pa spyad par bgyi// lus rdul shi bar gyur pa mthong nas ni//
93a1(dkon brtsegs): mo'i pha mcho nges 'debs byed cing // dge sbyong de yis byad stems byas snyam ste// ngu zhing dge sbyong rnams la mi snyan brjod// sangs rgyas mthu yis lha'i bu de ni/
93a2(dkon brtsegs): song nas pha ma dag la tshig spras pa// dge sbyong la ni zhe sdang khro ma byed// yun ring sdug bsngal 'grub par ma byed cig/ bu mo dpal yon shi 'phos gang yin de// sum cu rtsa gsum skal
93a3(dkon brtsegs): ba mnyam gyur cing / / des ni bud med lus kyang spangs byas te// de ni lha yi bu pho 'od gsal gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar khyed deng la// khro ba'i sems kyi nyes pa 'di shogs shig/
93a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni ma gtogs par// sems can rnams kyi dpung gnyen gnas gzhan med// 'jigs med de yis legs par bskul byas pas// pha ma gnyis kyis sangs rgyas sgra
93a5(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ / nye du tshogs dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur te// shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar dong bar gyur// mi mchog zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// khro ba'i sems kyi nyes pa bshags byas nas//
93a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs la gus dang bcas byas te// bde gshegs rang byung la ni zhu zhus pa// ji tsam gyis na 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur// chos dang dge 'dun ji ltar mchod pa lags// zhus pa de
93a7(dkon brtsegs): yilan ni stsal du gsol/ / thos nas de bzhin gnas bgyi gzhan ma lags// rgyal bas de dag bsam padag mkhyen nas// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang zhig sangs
93b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad mchod 'dod pa/ / de yis brtan par byang chub sems skyed cig/ bu mor ba dang ma dang nye du ni// lnga brgya tshang ba nyung ba ma yin pas// skyes bu khyu mchog da yigasung thos/
93b2(dkon brtsegs): nas// byang chub phyir ni sems kyang brtan par bskyed// rgyal ba kun dga' bzang la bka' stsal ba// kun dga' ji skad bshad pa 'di nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam yas
93b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ / shes rab thabs la mkhas pa'ang de bzhin no// dga' byed smon lam yang dang yang 'debs pa// bud med gang dag chags pa'i sems kyis ni// bdag la rtog pa bud med lus spangs nas//
93b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag myur du skyes bu 'jigs med shog/ bud med gcig min gnyis dang gsum min te// bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mang po rnams// gang dag dga' byed la ni chags gyur pa// de dag thams
93b5(dkon brtsegs): cad shi 'phos skyes par 'gyur/ / kun dga' 'dod chags bskyed pa gang gis ni// sems can gzhan dag sems dmyal 'gro 'gyur ba// de yis dpa' rnams mtho ris 'gro 'gyur zhing //
93b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes par 'gyur ba'i yon tan de 'dra ltos// lha'i bu gang gis nga la mchod byas te// gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog zhugs pa// des ni sangs rgyas bye bang mchod byas nas// rgyal ba/
93b7(dkon brtsegs): blta na mdzes zhes bya bar 'gyur// lnga brgya gang dag byang chub zhugs gyur pa// de dag mi mchog rnams su 'byung 'gyur bas// gang la dang byas bde ba bas ma yas pa'i// 'jig
94a1(dkon brtsegs): rten mgon la su zhig gus mi byed/ / gang dag nyon mongs rnams kyang bde sbyin na// gang dag gus byed de la ci smos pa// grabs chen sman gyi rgyal po lta bu yi/
94a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la su sdang skyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste// dper
94a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi na/ sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am// chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang
94a4(dkon brtsegs): la la dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du mchis na/ de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can rab tu snang
94a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du
94a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis na'ang / de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi kha dog tu sems gcig tu 'gyur lags pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng slan chad byang chub sems
94a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang 'dra bar 'dzin lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na sman gyi rigs chen po blta mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ sems can rab tu
94b1(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can bro nad sna tshogs kyis thebs pa gang la la ngag gis de mthong na/ de dag thams cad kyi bro nang rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
94b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na/ de dag
94b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa'i bro nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
94b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ legs so legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs
