94b5(dkon brtsegs): chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas dag gis kyang gnas par
94b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid la/ sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du 'dod pa'i khams na rang kun tu gda' ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon
94b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang gnas par bgyid la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'ang reg par mi bgyid pa dang / snying rje chen po'ang kun tu skyed par
95a1(dkon brtsegs): / mas ba byamams nga dzun pa / bdun pa sa na das kyang chub sems bya sa ya na pa k
95a2(dkon brtsegs): yi ngonatshar lags te/ bde ba ga shegs pa de ni mchob tu mtshar lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan padas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag nags pa thams cad srung
95a3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid cing / 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dI dang / ro dang / reg bya'i chags pa dag la spyod par bgyid kyang / de dag la chags par yang mi 'gyur ba de dag ni thabs la ma
95a4(dkon brtsegs): ba bsas mi khyab pa la gnas pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te/ dge 'gar zhig brjod par spyongs
95a5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs chen po khyod spobs par gyis shig/ 'od srungs chen pos
95a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyin 'brog dgon pa zhig mchis par gyur la/ 'brog dgon pa chen po la rang srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i rab mchis par
95a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur tshong/ 'brog dgor ba chen po der yang thog chags 'bum brag du ma mig lpags par gyur la/ 'brog dkon pa chen po de la'ang chab sgoni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing // 'bros dgon ma/
95b1(dkon brtsegs): de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na grong khyer chen po 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ gtsang ba/ bde ba/ mo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos kun tu gtams pa/ nyams dga' ba zhig kyang mchis par
95b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/ grong khyer chen po de la'ang chab sgo ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing / gang dag grong khyer chen po der zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni rga ba dang / 'gum pa ma mchis par gyur la
95b3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer chen po de na'ang mtho gang tsam gyi tshad kyi shul shin tu dog cing nyam nga ba zhig kyang mchis shing / de'i g.yas g.yon na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yang sa chen po dag kyang mchis par gyur la/
95b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'gron dgon pa chen po de'i dbus nas/ sems can mkhas pa/ zhib pa/ gro ba gzhungs pa/ sems can thams cad la don du 'gyur bar 'tshal ba/ sman par
95b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba/ bde bar 'tshal ba/ grub pa dang bde bar 'tshal ba/ sman par 'tshal ba/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig byung bar gyur nas/ des 'brog dgon pa chen po der
95b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces kye grogs po dag kho bo ni khyed cag gi yogs su skyob pa yin te/ 'brog dgon pa chen po 'di nas ha cang yang mi 'ong ba na/ grong khyer chen po 'byor pa/ rgyas pa
95b7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba/ lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba zhig yod de/ gang dag der zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni/ rga ba med pa dang / 'chi ba med par 'gyur zhing / sems can dpag tu
96a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos ston par yang 'gyur bas/ sems can shes pa dang
96a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag tshur shog/ grong khyer chen po der 'dong ngo zhes sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis go bar bgyis par gyur na/ de na sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i bsam pa
96a3(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag lags pa de dag ni/ 'di skad ces bdag cag 'di nas kyang mi g.yo bar gdams shing rjes su bstan pa de'ang 'tshal la/ bdag cag 'di na gnas bzhin du grong khyer de na
96a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i yon tan de dag kyang 'byung bar gyur cig ces mchi lags so/ / sems can rgya chen po la mos pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni/ 'di skad ces bdag cag ni khyod ji lta ba de bzhin
96a5(dkon brtsegs): du grong khyer der mchi'o zhes mchi lags so/ / sems can bsod nams chung ba gang dag lags pa de dag ni sgra de nyan cing thos nas kyang dad par mi bgyid cing / skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang
96a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin can de'i srad bzhin du mchi bar mi bgyid lags te/ de nas skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can de 'brog dgon pa chen po de nas slar byung ba dang / des shul de'ang mthong bar gyur/
96a7(dkon brtsegs): des mtho gang tsam gyi shul shin tu dog cing nyam nga ba de'ang mthong bar gyur/ shul de'i g.yas g.yon na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yas sa chen po de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas/ des
96b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yas g.yon gyi g.yangs de dag rtsig pa dang spang leb kyis bkum ste/ rkang lag bzhis 'phye zhing shul de las 'das par bgyid la/ g.yas g.yon du rang mi lta bar slad bzhin du phyir/
96b2(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba sgra 'byin cing / 'jigs pa ston pa dag mchi'ang slar yang mi lta la/ skyo zhing yid byung ba'ang ma mchis par shul der mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji lta ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur
96b3(dkon brtsegs): bde lta de ltar grong khyer de mthong bar yang 'gyur la/ ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / grong khyer der
96b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs na rga ba dang / 'gum pa dang / bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur la/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyid cing skye ba dang / rga ba dang / bro 'tshal ba dang / 'gum pa las

96b6(dkon brtsegs): bla dag lags so/ / srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i ra ba zhes bgyi ba de ni/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// 'brog dgon pa chen po der yang
96b7(dkon brtsegs): srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhugs par gyur la zhes bgyi ba de ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// 'brog dgon pa chen po de la'ang chab sgo ni
97a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig cig mchis par gyur cing zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ bgrod pa gcig pa'i shul blta bar bgyi lags so// skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can
97a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams blta bar bgyi lags so// sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i bsam pa

97a4(dkon brtsegs): can rgya chen po la mos pa'i tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag ni khyod ji lta ba de bzhin du grong khyer der mchi lags so zhes mchi ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
97a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gzhan dag blta bar bgyi lags so/ / sems can bsod nams chung ngu sgra de nyan cing thos nas kyang dad par mi bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod
97a6(dkon brtsegs): pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dag gi tshig bla dgas lags so// 'brog dgon pa chen po de nas slar byung ba zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par bsngos/
97a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa blta bar bgyi lags so// mtho gang tsam gyi tshad kyi shul zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ chos kyi dbyings blta bar bgyi lags so// de'i gams
97b1(dkon brtsegs): / g.yon na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yang sa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par blta bar gyi lags so// g.yas g.yon gyi gsang /
97b2(dkon brtsegs): sa de dag rtsig pa dang spang leb kyis bkum ste zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa blta bar bgyi lags so// rkang lag bzhis 'phye zhing
97b3(dkon brtsegs): shul de las yang dag par 'da' bar bgyi la zhes bgyi ba de bzhin du ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams sdud cing yang dag par 'da'
97b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi ba dag blta bar bgyi lags so/ / slad bzhin du phyir rgol ba sgra 'byin cing 'jigs pa ston pa dag mchi'ang zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams
97b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang blta bar bgyi la/ de bzhin du sems can sdig pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su nyon mongs pa can gyi las kun tu spyod par bgyid pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'phya ba dang /
97b6(dkon brtsegs): smod par bgyi ba dag kyang blta bar bgyi lags so// slar yang mi lta la zhes bgyi ba ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa'i tshig bla dgas
97b7(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / g.yas g.yon du'ang mi lta bar zhes bgyi ba de ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi dga' ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// grong khyer
98a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi tshig bla dgas lags so// ji lta ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar grong khyer de mthong bar yang 'gyur
98a2(dkon brtsegs): la zhes bgyi ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshig bla dgas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang
98a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la nges par rtogs par bgyid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la shin tu legs par slob pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i
98a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur zhing zhes bgyi ba de ni// sems cad thams cad 'jigs pa ma mchis shing the tshom dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i tshig bla dgas lags so//
98a5(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer der zhugs na/ rga ba dang // 'gum pa dang / bro nang ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyid la/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / bro nang dang /
98a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gum pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i slad du/ chos ston par yang bgyid ces bgyi ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dgas lags
98a7(dkon brtsegs): so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni ye shes dang ldan pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
98b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'od srungs legs so legs so// 'od
98b2(dkon brtsegs): srungs khyod kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro ba bskyed pa ni/ yang khyod legs te/ 'od srungs khyod kyis dpe brjod pa des lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las
98b3(dkon brtsegs): srogs chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la legs par
98b4(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gis bdag la gnod par 'gyur ba 'am/ gzhan la gnod
98b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las mi byed cing / tshig gang gis bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig kyang mi smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // bcom
98b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad du/ byang chub sems
98b7(dkon brtsegs): dpar ni chog gang gis bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig mi smra'o zhes bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis
99a1(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'bring zhes bgyi bar gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar che/
99a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad kyi gsung rab la/ 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces
99a3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa de ci las dgongs te gsungs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
99a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshad rab tu rnam par dbye bas khyod ci zhig
99a5(dkon brtsegs): bya thong zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas/ skyes bu dam pa de dag
99a6(dkon brtsegs): ni ji lta ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro/ / rigs kyi bu de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang legs par rab tu nyon la/ tshul bzhin du yid la
99a7(dkon brtsegs): zung zhig dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
99b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad tshun chad du thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa gang yin pa de dag las phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya ste/ r
99b2(dkon brtsegs): igs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bar
99b3(dkon brtsegs): der/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / brjed pa med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med
99b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'dod na zhag bdun gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur/ 'dod/
99b5(dkon brtsegs): na bskal pas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pa brgyas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// 'dod na bskal pa stong gis kyang
99b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'dod na bskal pa 'bum gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can rnams
99b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod na bsam bzhin du srid pa len cing 'gro bar yang byed do// de na thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pas/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na
100a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed cing / 'dod na phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa brgya phrag mang por yang yid/
100a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su skyo ba med par gnas par byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang nyan thos kyang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyom par /
100a3(dkon brtsegs): la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar byed mod kyi/ de ni lus g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur/ sems g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur ro// nyan thos ni
100a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba kho nar shes par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug kyang // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams
100a5(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par yang byed la/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa na/ snying rje chen po
100a6(dkon brtsegs): skyed par yang byed de/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'dug bzhin
100a7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yang byed nus mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems
100b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jog par mi nus la/ lha rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du 'bab par nus so
100b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas 'dzam bu'i gling du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs
100b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos nas/ pa'i mngal du ma zhugs shing / mngal gyi dri mas ma reg pa kho nar de'i skad cig de
100b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yang nus mod kyi/ de la sems can kha cig 'di snyam du/ 'di lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/
100b5(dkon brtsegs): dri za 'am/ sprul pa zhig gam/ 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig snyam du nem nur dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag nem nur dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom skyes par
100b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ nyon mongs pa yongasu zad par bya ba'i phyir chos nyan par mi byed/ shes par mi byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom par mi byed pas/ byang chub sems dpas mngal na gan pa bstan pa'i
100b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ni de yin no/ / rkyen ni de yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' mngal gyi gnas su zhugs so snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
101a1(dkon brtsegs): @#dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas bzhin du/ de la snyoms par zhugs shing yongs su bsten/
101a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs bzhin du dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug tu nus mod kyi/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis de na de ma mthong bas/ byang chub sems
101a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs so snyam du shes par zad do/ / byang chub sems dpa' ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi g.yo bzhin du sprul pa dag gis 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang /
101a4(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba spyod pa'i bya ba thams cad kun tu ston par byed de/ de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa dag gis kun tu bstan pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
101a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba yin pas/ phyir mngal gyi gnas su mi 'gro ba'i phyir te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems
101a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' glang po che thal kar du bsgyur te/ ma'i mngal du 'jug pa ston par byed ce na/ de ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshig bla dgas yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
101a7(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin pas na/ des ni ci nas kyang lha 'am/ mi gzhan gang la'ang med pa de lta bu kho nas mngal du 'jug pa bstan par bya dgos
101b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas shing dgur ma yin zhe na/ sems can gang
101b2(dkon brtsegs): dag 'di snyam du kye ma gzhon nu 'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i dus yongs su ma rdzogs pas/ dbang po ma tshang bar gyur to snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom gcad pa dang / mngal gyi
101b3(dkon brtsegs): dus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas kyi/ dgur ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na
101b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa na'ang/ lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar gyur zhing / de dag gis byang chu sems dpa' ma mang lan gnas pa'i sa rgya chub sems dpa'i 'du rgyu sa
101b5(dkon brtsegs): che bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa lha'i longs spyod thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa mthong nas/ lha'i bu sa la phrag gnyis dang bzhi 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
101b6(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan brtol te/ mngal gyi gnas nas byung ba kun tu
101b7(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed ce na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni ba dang ma'i mer mer po lnga skyes pa yin gyi/ rdzus te skyes pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi
102a1(dkon brtsegs): thachoms cad pa'i phyir ma'i mtshan partul/ mangs kyi gnas nas 'byung bkun tu bstan to// b+hU las ca sa l+h+wam sgra 'bru gyi zas gang ma med cing sa
102a2(dkon brtsegs): med la/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis bde ba myong bar gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i bde ba ni sngon nam yang ma reg cing sngon nam yang ma myong ste/
102a3(dkon brtsegs): de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas shing grong du ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas dgon pa'i
102a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod pa dang / dben pa la dga' ba dang / kun spyod pa gtsang ba dang / grong du btsas na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyang lha'i phye ma dang / spos dang
102a5(dkon brtsegs): me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / me tog dag gis shin tu 'phags pa'i mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang brgyags pa dang / bag
102a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas shing grong du ma yin pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yum
102a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis shing blag pa'i yab ga la bzung ste/ bang ma la ma byas par byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byas she na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul ni ji lta bur bud
102b1(dkon brtsegs): med gzhan dag bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg cing byang chub sems dpa' btsas so snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom gcad pa dang / bde bar btsas pa kun tu bstan
102b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis shing blag sha'i yal ga la bzung ste/ bang ma la ma byas par byang chub sems dpa' bcas par byas so// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma
102b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan g.yas pa brtol te/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas nas byung zhing / skye gnas nas kyang ma yin/ lus kyi phyogs gzhan dag nas kyang ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
102b4(dkon brtsegs): ni kun spyod pa gtsang ba dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ des ni ji ltar sems can man pa sasan dag bzhin du
102b5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngol du sten cing gnas pa ma yin pa dang / btsa' ba ma yin pa de ltar skye ba bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan g.yas pa brtol te dran pa dang shes bzhin
102b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mngal gyi gnas nas byung zhing / byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi mtshan yang rma med cing spros med par gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas
102b7(dkon brtsegs): bab yin no/ / ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpar btsas ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bzung la/ mir gyur pa gzhan dag gis ma yin zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar bas
103a1(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams 'dun par byas pas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu gos rin po ches bzung bar bya'o zhes sngon smon lam bta/
103a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ de na byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las rgya chen po la brtson par byed pa yin te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas
103a3(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu yongs su ma bzung bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la/ drug kyang ma yin/ brgyad kyang ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ji ltar gzhan sus kyang sngon ma bstan pa de lta bu'i rdzu
103a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi stobs kyi brtson 'grus chen po dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rtsa la gdon mi za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos pa dang / gom pa bdun bor bas sems can gang dag gi don bya dgos pa de dag gi don
103a5(dkon brtsegs): gom pa drug gis kyang mi chog la/ brgyad ni lhag par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yongs su ma bzung bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la/ drug kyang ma yin/
103a6(dkon brtsegs): brgyad kyang ma yin te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gom pa bdun 'dor ba na tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/
103a7(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o zhes rjod par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu de 'khor de na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags
103b1(dkon brtsegs): padag 'dus par gyur te/ 'khod la nga rgyal gyis khengs pa de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni ches bla ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de lta ma yin no snyam du sems shing / 'dung bar mi
103b2(dkon brtsegs): byed/ rab tu 'dud par mi byed/ phyag 'tshal bar mi byed/ rab tu phyag 'tshal bar mi byed pas na/ des na byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
103b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'di dag yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten nathu
103b4(dkon brtsegs): bo yin no/ / nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o zhes smras te/ tshig gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
103b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di go bar gyur nas/ lha'i bu gang dag der ma lhags pa de dag kyang sgra de thos nas lhags par gyur cing / de nas lha'i bu de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag yid byung ba skyes shing ngo mtshar du
103b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par gyur nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas thal mo phug phug por sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar byed de/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpas tshig
103b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o zhes smras pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
104a1(dkon brtsegs): ni yang dag pa yin te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu gad mo cher ngadagod par byed ce na/ rigs
104a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags dang lhan cig skyes pa 'am/ zhe sdang dang lhan cig skyes pa 'am/ gti mug dang lhan cig skyes pa dgod pa'i gad mo'ang med/ rta gang du dgod pa'ang med mod
104a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis ni bdag dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las/ bdag gis ni byang chub thob par
104a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur gyi/ sems can 'di dag ni le lo'i dbang gis 'khor ba thibs por gnas par gyur pas/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rjes bgrod
104a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i chos thams cad la brtson 'grus rtsom par mi byed pa yin no zhes de ltar snying rje chen po bskyed na/ sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa
104a6(dkon brtsegs): yin par rig la/ bdag cag ni dman pa dang bag med pa yin par rig nas/ de dag bdag la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gad mo cher dgod
104a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa btsas ma thag tu brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag gis 'khru bar byed ce na/
104b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de ni brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag mchod pa'i las byed pa'ang yin la/ 'jig rten na'ang khye'u dag btsas ma thag tu gdon mi za bar khrus byed pa dag yod pas/ byang chub sems
104b2(dkon brtsegs): dpas kyang 'jig rten shes pa'i rjes su gdon mi za bar 'jug par bya dgos pas na/ don gyi dbang de mthong ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag gis
104b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khru bar byed de/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas ma thag kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar/ ci'i phyir grong
104b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug ce na/ dbang po rnams yongs su smin pa kun tu bstan pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bya ba kun tu bstan pa dang / dga' ba dang rtsed mo dag kun tu bstan nas kyang / gling chen po bzhi la mi
104b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bar spangs te/ mngon par 'byung ba kun tu bstan par bya ba dang / 'di ltar sems can gzhan dag kyang bdag gi rjes su slob pa na/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / longs spyod dang /
104b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rgya chen po dag spangs te rab tu byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsas ma thag kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar grong
104b7(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs nas mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas
105a1(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun lon pa na/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ce na/ de la ni byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i nyes pa med de/ yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyi tshe
105a2(dkon brtsegs): zad nas dus las 'das pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe na/ lha'i mig rnam
105a3(dkon brtsegs): bar dag pas yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe la so sor brtags na/ byang chub sems dpas yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe'i lhag ma ni zla ba bcu dang zhag bdun la sa ma las par shes nas/
105a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog nas shi 'phos te/ ma'i mngal du zhugs pa yin pas/ rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul
105a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid tshe zad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i nyes pa ma yin par rig par bya ste/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i
105a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir byang chub sems dpas yi ge dang / lag rtsis dang / bstan bcos dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / mda' gzhu'i thabs dang / 'gyed stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin
105a7(dkon brtsegs): stangs dang / skar ma'i dpyad dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dag legs par bslabs she na/ 'jig rten dang rjes su 'thun par bya ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas dang po nyid nas
105b1(dkon brtsegs): gang la legs par bslabs pa ma byas pa'i babo 'am/ gsang sngags sam/ rig sngags sam/ bstan bcos sam/ bro gar ram/ klu 'am/ rol mo'i sgra 'am/ bzhad gang ngam/
105b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jo sgeg gam/ dga' ba 'am/ rtsed mo kun tu bstan par bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ga' yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ni
105b3(dkon brtsegs): btsas ma thag kho nar 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon shin tu legs par bslabs pa dang /
105b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i dbang gi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' srid pa mtha' ma pa
105b5(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo dang / sras dang / g.yog 'khor len par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i gnas skabs na
105b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir te/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' srid pa mtha' ma pas ni btsun mo dang / sras dang / bu'i 'khor gdon mi za bar bstan par bya
105b7(dkon brtsegs): dgos te/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin gyi/ tha ma'i rigs shig yin no snyam du sems par gyur na/ de dag yun ring por don//
106a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur bas/ sems can de dag gi the tshom gcad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sras skra ga can/
106a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma blangs so// gang dag 'di snyam du sras sgra gcan 'dzin ni yab dang yum gyi mer mer po las skyes
106a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no snyam du sems na/ de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra gcan 'dzin 'dis ni sngon 'di skad du/ bdag srid pa mtha' ma pa'i bur gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na
106a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra gcan 'dzin ni lha nas shi 'phos nas 'dir rdzus te skyes pa yin bya/ pha dang ma'i mer mer po las skyes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma'ang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang
106a5(dkon brtsegs): gis blangs pa yin te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi spyan sngar bram ze'i khye'u khyod srid pa mtha' ma par gyur pa na/ bdag gi khyim thab tu gyur la/ bdag kyang khyod kyi
106a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun mor gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'i phyir ro/ / de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpas kyang 'di skad ces/ bzang mong ni 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod kyi
106a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa ji lta bzhin du gyur cig ces/ ut+pa la'i phyir khas blangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de ni mi slu ba yin pas na/ byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mos
106b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ma blangs so/ / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' srid pa mtha' ma pas ni/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog 'khor gdon mi za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos te/ 'di ltar shAkya'i bu mo
106b2(dkon brtsegs): sa 'tsho mas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / lha'i mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ 'di skad du kye ma
106b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang yon tan gyi chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur cig ces lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i phyir te/ de ltar
106b4(dkon brtsegs): na shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma byang chub kyi sems brtan par bskyed du gzhug pa'i phyir yang / byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tshom blangs so// gzhan yang sems can gang dag 'dod
106b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zan dang / chung ma dang / las kyi mtha' dang / khang khyim dang / nor rdzas kyi 'du 'dzis spags nas/ yongs su 'dzin pa spangs te/ rab tu 'byung bar mi nus pa'i sems
106b6(dkon brtsegs): can de dag la 'dod pa'i sred pa dang / longs spyod dang / nor rdzas dang / chung ma la mi lta ba kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir yang / byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma blangs na//
106b7(dkon brtsegs): khang khyim dang / nor rdzas dang / chung ma dang / 'khor rnams la mi lta bar spangs te mngon par byung na/ sems can de dag kyang 'di snyam du gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di'ang de
107a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar btsun mo dang / nor rdzas dang / 'khor dang / longs spyod rgya chen po dag la mi lta bar spangs te rab tu byung na/ de'i phyir bdag cag kyang ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar
107a2(dkon brtsegs): mi bya snyam du sems par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / / bam po gsum pa// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sngon byang chub sem dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/
107a3(dkon brtsegs): bud med gzhon nu bsnyen bkur ma gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams kyis yongs su smin par byas shing yid gcugs par gyur pa de dag gis 'di skad ces bdag cag khyod srid pa mtha' ma par gyur
107a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar tshun chad kyi btsun mor 'gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na/ de dag gi dkar po'i chos rgya cher smin par bya ba'i phyir yang byang chub sem dpas 'khor rnams blangs te/ de na byang chub sems dpa'
107a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gnas pas/ bud med bzhi khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so// lhag ma rnams ni log par mi ltung ba'i chos can du
107a6(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpas 'khor rnams blangs so// gzhan yang bud med gang dag 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung ba chen pos yongs su gdung bar gyur pa de dag gis
107a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar kun tu shes par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid kyi chu zheng dang / kha dog dang / dbyi ba ci 'dra ba de/
107b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba'i sprul pa mngon par sprul nas/ sprul pa de dang bud med de dag lhan cig dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' dgur spyod par byed pa ma de dag so so nas 'di snyam du bdag ni byang chub sem/
107b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dang lhan cig dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' dgur spyod par byed do snyam du sems par zad kyi// byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i gnas pas gnas par byed do// sprul/
107b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad tshun chad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa'i longs
107b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ / shAkya'i bu 'dun pa dang rta bsngags ldan gnyis kyang de gnyis kyi sngon gyi smon lam nyid yin par blta bar bya ste/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs
107b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mkhas pa yin par blta bar bya'o/ / ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bsam gtan byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas pas lnga bye ba phrag bdun cu
107b6(dkon brtsegs): btul ba dang / yab dang yum dag yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpas bdag rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung ba dang / shes rab che ba nyid gdon mi za bar kun tu/
107b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya dgos pa dang / shing 'dzam bu'i grib mas ma gtang ba nyid kyang kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bsam gtan byed pa'i rgyu ni da
108a1(dkon brtsegs): yin darkyen ni de yin/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i babs la mkhas pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad don du mi gnyer bci'i phyir byed/
108a2(dkon brtsegs): mos tshal gyi sar byung zhe na/ rgang po dang / nad pa dang / shi ba kun tu bstan par bya ba dang / nye du rnams kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni nye du rnams mi 'dod pa ma yin gyi
108a3(dkon brtsegs): rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / khyim na gnas pa ni nyes pa mang po'i skyon chags gnas pa ma yin par rig nas/ mngon par byung ba yin no zhes shes par
108a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba kun tu bstan par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas 'jigs pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ de'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa'
108a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang rtsed mo don du mi gnyer ba'ang skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ste/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' nam phyed kyi dus kyi tshe
108a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par byung la nyin mo ma yin zhe na/ sems can rnams gang la gnas na dge ba'i rtsa ba dag 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ dkar po'i chos don du gnyer
108a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rigs kyi bus ni bde ba rgya chen po ji snyed pa'ang yongs su spangs te/ nam phyed kyi dus kyi tshen ma chis mi ltos par mngon par 'byung bar bya ba dang / bde ba'i yo byad ji snyed pa dag kyang yongs su
108b1(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bya ba dang / dkar po'i phyogs yongs su nyams par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas skye bo rnams
108b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyid log par byas te mngon par byung zhe na/ skye bo rnams ni lha rnams kyis gnyid log par byas pas/ lha rnams kyis nyes par kun tu bstan pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa' la nye
108b3(dkon brtsegs): du rnams dang / skye bo rnams tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par gyur na/ de dag la yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur
108b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi de dag gis skye bo rnams lha rnams kyis gnyid log par byas shing / lha rnams kyis sgo phye ste bar snang la khyer bas/ de ni byang chub sems dpas ma nyes so zhes shes par gyur
108b5(dkon brtsegs): na de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dad pa rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur bas/ don gyi dbang de mthong ba'i phyir/ skye bo rnams gnyid log par byas nas mngon par byung ste/ de'ang
108b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas rta dang rgyan rnams shAkya'i bu 'dun pa la phyir bskur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chog shes pa kun tu bstan par
108b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir te/ gzhan dag 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' ni dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar rab tu byung bas na/ gser dang dngul dag don du gnyer ba ma yin no zhes brjod
109a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas phyi ma'i skye bo dag rjes su slob tu gzhug par bya ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gang dag bstan pa 'di la rab tu 'byung /
109a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba de dag gis ni nga'i rjes su bslab cing / dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la brten nas rab tu 'byung bar bya ste/ rab tu 'byung bas ni dang po kho na nas
109a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba la ltos shing rab tu 'byung bar mi bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid
109a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis ral gris skra bregs te rab tu byung zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te/ skra breg par bzod pa'i lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod
109a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ga' yang med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rab tu 'byung ba don du gnyer bas
109a6(dkon brtsegs): non dad pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes kun tu bstan pa dang / bdag nyid kyis skra bregs te rab tu byung na/ rgyal po zas gtsang yang sus nga'i bu'i sgra bregs pa de chad pas gcad do zhes mi dga'
109a7(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis rang gi ral gris skra bregs so zhes rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas cang mi zer bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ de'ang byang chub
109b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang
109b2(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad pa'ang nyon cig/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dag la
109b3(dkon brtsegs): nges par skyo bar bya zhing / 'dun par bya ba'i phyir te// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi
109b4(dkon brtsegs): gsung rab la tshig 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras
109b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / ldem po ngag yin par blta bar bya ste/ las kyi sgrib pa de'i rgyus byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad do//
109b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas ci las bsam te tshig de skad ces smras she na/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs
109b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi gsung rab la/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng de la ne'u ldangs bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag pa zhugs pa lnga zhig yod pa de dag sdig pa'i
110a1(dkon brtsegs): grogs pa'i dbang dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'phrad pas/ byang chub kyi sems de dag brjed par gyur nas/ de'i tshe na rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag mu stegs can gyi
110a2(dkon brtsegs): brtul zhugs spyod par gyur cing / sangs rgyas kyi brtul zhugs mi spyod pa dang / mu stegs can gyi gsang sngags la brtson zhing / sangs rgyas kyi gsang sngags la mi brtson pa dang / mu
110a3(dkon brtsegs): stegs can la mos shing / / mu stegs can gyi dbang gis byang chub ni bdag cag la yod de/ bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas yin no zhes bdag nyid ston pa yin par las 'che bar byed do// bram ze'i
110a4(dkon brtsegs): khye'u 'od zer 'phreng gis rigs kyi bu de dag snod yin par rig nas/ de thabs la mkhas pas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag rim gyis mu stegs can de dag gi drung nas phyir
110a5(dkon brtsegs): ldog par 'dod pas/ des thabs la mkhas pas rdza mkhan bum byed la tshig 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin
110a6(dkon brtsegs): pabs dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras te/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng des phyogs gzhan zhig tu bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de
110a7(dkon brtsegs): dag dang lhan cig tu 'khod do/ / de nas rdza mkhan bum byed de sa phyogs de ga la ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung kyi bsngags pa
110b1(dkon brtsegs): brjod cing / bsngags pa brjod nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng la 'di skad ces smras so// kye 'od zer 'phreng tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
110b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar 'dong ngo / / rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa yin pas/
110b3(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs dang byang chub kyi bsngags pa brjod cing / mu stegs can rnams kyi bsngags pa ma
110b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa brjod par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag yongs su dogs par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar 'gro/
110b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod do snyam nas/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng de sngar dam bcas pa de nyid rjes su srung bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la
110b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas tshig 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras
110b7(dkon brtsegs): so/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni byang chub kyi 'du shes
111a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang med/ ngas rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang med/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong byang chub kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ byang chub ni nang du'ang yang dag
111a2(dkon brtsegs): bar rjes su mi mthong / byang chub ni phyi rol tu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub ni nang dang phyi rol tu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// de ltar chos thams cad ma skye mi dmig pa'i
111a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ byang chub ni gtan stong pa nyid yin pas/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pa des tshig 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong mgo rog
111a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ / byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras so// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na bram ze'i khye'u 'od
111a5(dkon brtsegs): zer 'phreng de ne'u ldangs lnga po de dag dang chu 'gram zhig na 'khod par gyur pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ rdza mkhan bum byed chu 'gram de ga
111a6(dkon brtsegs): la ba der song ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye 'od zer 'phreng tshur shog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis/
111a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng gis smras pa/
111b1(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong sgre bo mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras te/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng de de bzhin
111b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gror ma btub pa dang / de nas rdza mkhan bum byed des bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng gi thor to nas bzung ste// de
111b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs ga la ba der khrid de song ngo / / bram ze'i khye'u lnga po de dag gis kyang bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng yongs su
111b4(dkon brtsegs): bskor te/ yid 'dun par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la
111b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po lta bu'i bu log par lta ba'i khyim du skyes pa lnga po de dag cher 'dun par gyur nas 'di snyam du/ 'di ltar bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
111b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / drung du 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzog
111b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir rdza mkhan bum byed 'dis thor to nas bzung bzhin du'ang bdag nyid kyi srog yongs su btang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
112a1(dkon brtsegs): srungs kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas de ni ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de ni ci 'dra ba zhig yin snyam nas/ de nas bram ze'i rigs shing
112a2(dkon brtsegs): sa la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag gis 'dun par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs la blta ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyi thang du dong ngo // de dag gis de
112a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs mthong ma thag tu sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul bas dad pa thob par gyur to/ / de dag gis
112a4(dkon brtsegs): da pa thob nas/ bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng la smras pa/ ston pa'i yon tan 'di lta bu dag khyod kyis sngan chad kho bo cag la ma smras so zhes spyos so// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i
112a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi dpal dang gzi brjid kyang mthong / spobs pa'ang
112a6(dkon brtsegs): thos tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa'ang thos nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sam+ba bskyed do// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
112a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grang
112b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i gzungs rdo rje'i tshig chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba de lta de ltar yang dag par bstan par mdzad de/ des rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la
112b2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar na nga ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' bas khyed cag la/ gal te bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng des/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi mdun
112b3(dkon brtsegs): du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bsngags pa brjod cing / mu stegs can rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur na ni/ des
112b4(dkon brtsegs): na rigs kyi bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i gnas dang skabs kyang med na/ dad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lta ci
112b5(dkon brtsegs): smos te/ de ni gnas med do zhes lung ston to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bram
112b6(dkon brtsegs): ze'i khye'u 'od zer 'phreng gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pas tshig 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/ byang chub ni mchog tu
112b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras par zad kyi/ rigs kyi bu phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing
113a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la'ang som nyi med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'ang som nyi med de/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang
113a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su smin par byas shing / las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan pa gang yin pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des kyang / ngas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad par gyur
113a3(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can mi shes par spyod pa gzhan dag gis ni/ dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la lkog nas tshig rtsub po smras la/ de dag gis shes kyang rung //
113a4(dkon brtsegs): mi shes kyang rung // shes pa dang ldan yang rung / shes pa dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ brjod par gyur na/ de dag yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung
113a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur bas na/ sems can de dag la las kyi bya ba bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas las de kun tu ston par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do// /
113a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sems can gang dag dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la tshig rtsub po smras nas/ bdag la ni thar pa'i skal ba med do snyam nas/ 'gyod pa la gnas shing / phyin chad rtsol
113a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed pa'i sems can de dag gi 'gyod pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ yang las de kun tu bstan to// de dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pas/ de bzhin gshes
113b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la chog 'di skad ces byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub gal
113b2(dkon brtsegs): yod ces smras kyang / de la rnam par grol ba'i skal ba yod par gyur na/ bdag cag mi shes pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems shing / de dag sdig pa'i las kyi nyes pa de'ang
113b3(dkon brtsegs): 'chags la/ gzhan dag kyang mngon par 'du mi byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gzhan mu stegs can dag gdul ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas lo/
113b4(dkon brtsegs): drug tu dka' ba spyad pa kun tu bstan gyi/ las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyus ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rgya shug dang / til dang / 'bras 'bru gcig tsam za zhing / zas gzhan
113b5(dkon brtsegs): mi za bas rnam par dag par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag yod pas/ de dag tshar gcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas 'phags pa'i lam la ma brten par rgya shug dang / til dang / 'bras 'bru
113b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tsam gyi zas ngan pa za bas rnam par dag par mi nus par bstan pa'i phyir te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas tshig 'di skad ces/ byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas//
113b7(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin te/ las kyi bya ba de la dmigs nas/ lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa bstan to// byang chub sems dpas
114a1(dkon brtsegs): lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa bstan pas/ lha dang phyi rol pa'i drang srong ngan pa la mos pa sa ya phrag bzhi dang nyis 'bum yang kha zas ngan pa des 'atul nas/ de dag
114a2(dkon brtsegs): gis ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas zas la yongs su longs spyad de/
114a3(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi stobs dang / shugs dang / mthu yang dag par bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du song gi/ lus nyams pa dang / lus nyam chung bzhin du ma song zhe na/ byang chub sems dpes ni/
114a4(dkon brtsegs): zas ma zos shing / lus nyams pa dang / lus nyam chung bas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus na/ zas ngan pa zos pas lta ci smos te/ 'on kyang skye bo phyi ma dge ba'i rtsa ba yong
114a5(dkon brtsegs): su ma smin pa zas mi za bas byang chub yongs su btsal bar sems pa de dag bkres pas yongs su gdungs pas/ ye shes bsgrub par mi nus pa de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
114a6(dkon brtsegs): dpas zas la yongs su longs spyad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bde bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni chos rnams mngon par brjod par nus kyi/ sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni mi nus pas/ ngas
114a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag la bde bas ye shes rtogs pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ ji lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang grong mi'i bu mo'i zas la yongs su longs spyad nas/ zas kyi bde ba
114b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis byang chub thob bo zhes sems can rnams nga'i rjes su slob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / des na byang chub sems dpas grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su
114b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba dang / skye bo phyi ma rnams la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas de'i kha zas yongs su longs spyad nas/ byang chub thob par kun tu bstan par zad kyi/ rigs kyi bu
114b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas ni bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba gcig gis kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag mang por kha zas med par gnas par nus te/ de'ang byang chub sems
114b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rtswa dge slong bar byed ce na/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang rtswa'i gdang ba la mos shing / gdan la gdu ba ma
114b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/ chog shes pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro// des kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rtsa dag
114b6(dkon brtsegs): phul nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas na/ de'ang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
114b7(dkon brtsegs): rdul bral zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes ngas lung bstan te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas
115a1(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can ma 'ongs par myur ba myur bar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas skabs ma bye bar bdud sdig can
115a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi shing drung du 'ong ba ni gnas med cing skabs med de/ de ni gnas med mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug pa na 'di snyam du sems te/
115a3(dkon brtsegs): gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'dod pa'i khams 'di na dbang phyug ni su yin/ sems can 'di dag ni su'i dbang du song snyam pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ni bdud sdig can yin te//
115a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i dbang du song ngo snyam nas/ de na byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bdud sdig can dang g.yul sprad de/ de las rgyal bar byas na/ 'dod pa'i khams
115a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur la/ bdud kyi 'khor mang po'ang 'du bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor dang / srin po'i 'khor dang / dri za'i 'khor dang / lha ma yin gyi 'khor yang 'du bar
115a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / 'khor mang po 'dus pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i rnam par brtse ba mthong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cing / smon lam
115a7(dkon brtsegs): 'debs par yang 'gyur la/ gzhan gang dag gis mthong ba de dag la'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro snyam ste/ rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi
115b1(dkon brtsegs): shing drung na 'dug pas mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkye'o/ / 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas shing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od dag kyang yongs su gtugs te/
115b2(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong nas/ 'od de las sgra 'di lta bu byung ngo // shAkya'i sras po de shAkya'i khab nas mngon par byung ste/ de ni de byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
115b3(dkon brtsegs): bas/ bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' zhing / sems can brgya stong dpag tu med pa gzhan dag kyang bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' bar byed par 'gyur bas/ bdud kyi phyog nyung
115b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdud kyi 'khor nyung bar 'gyur gyi/ khyod song la de dang g.yul spyod cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas 'od des bdud sdig can la yang dag par bskul ba na/ de mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen pos gzir
115b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te/ khro zhing rnga ma bzhin du de'i mod la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bshams shing bsdus nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung ga la ba der song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la bgegs bya ba'i phyir
115b6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis kho ra khor yug tu bdud kyi dmag gis gang bar byas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rin po che dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas
115b7(dkon brtsegs): nas shes rab rin po che las nges par byung ba'i phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bus sa gzhi chen po la brdabs te/ byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi sde thams cad pham par mdzod/ bdud kyi
116a1(dkon brtsegs): sde pham par mdzad ma zag tu/ g+ha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum bye ba phrag brgyad du
116a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / sku mdog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs kyang mthong / stobs dang / shugs dang / mthu dang / seng ge rnam par
116a3(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba'ang mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
116a4(dkon brtsegs): pas byang chub brnyes nas/ zhag bdun du skyil mo krung mi 'jig par shing gi rgyal po la spun mi 'dzums par gzigs she na/ de na gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rab tu zhi bar spyod pa dag kyang 'khod
116a5(dkon brtsegs): la de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa mthong nas/ dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes shing / dga' ba dang / dang ba dang /
116a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba skyes pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i sems ci la rten pa nges par brtag par bya'o snyam nas/ de dag gis zhag bdun du sems gcig tu
116a7(dkon brtsegs): bsdus te brtags kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ci la rten pa ma rtogs nas/ de dag dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyes nas/ lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis bdag
116b1(dkon brtsegs): cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di ltar rab tu zhi ba'i spyod pas byang chub kyi shing la rtog par gyur cig ces/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ gang
116b2(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas/ zhag bdun du skyil mo krung mi 'jig par shing gi rgyal po la spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin te/ de ni
116b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med pa nas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgos sems can thams cad dbugs phyung
116b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing mgron du gnyer nas/ tshangs pas gsol ba ma btab par chos ston par mi mdzad ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i
116b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten ni phal cher tshangs pa la rten cing / tshangs pa gtso bor 'dzin pa yin pas/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni tshangs pas sprul to// bdag cag ni tshangs pa las skyes te/ tshangs pa
116b6(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi byed pa po gzhan yang med la/ ston pa'ang gzhan med do snyam du sems pas/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis tshangs pa 'ong bar
116b7(dkon brtsegs): byas shing / tshangs pa la bsdad de/ tshangs pas phyag byas na/ tshangs pa la rten pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur la/ tshangs pas gsol ba
117a1(dkon brtsegs): btab nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mdzad kyi/ ma gsol bar ma bstan na/ de dag nga'i chos kyang 'dzin du nges so snyam du dgodadra ba'i phyir te/ tshangs pa'ang de bzhin
117a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa nyid kyi mthus/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'ongs par zad kyi/ tshangs pa nyid la ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o//
117a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes yid la byed pa'i sems gcig tsam yang med do// de ltar na tshangs pa la rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshangs pa la nges pa spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs pa 'ong bar mdzad cing / tshangs
117a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la gzhes te/ gang gi tshe tshangs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa de'i tshe na/ tshangs pa drug khri brgyad stong gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
117a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog yin no/ / 'di ni gtso bo yin no// 'di ni rab mchog yin te/ bdag cag kyang ye shes 'di lta bu dang / yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur cig ces bla
117a6(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang
117a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams la las kyi rgyud bcu po 'di dag bstan pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
117b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par yang blta bar bya/ ldem po ngag yin par yang blta bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba than skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam du zab
117b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' dang ldan na'ang byang chub kyi snying por byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i gnas med skabs ma yin te/ de
117b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gnas med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing / mi dge ba'i chos spang ba thams cad spangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
117b4(dkon brtsegs): la ni sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i lhag ma ma spangs pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba tsam yang mi mnga' na/ las kyi sgrib pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni gnas med pa'i phyir ro//
117b5(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang sems can gang dag las kyi rnam par smin pa chung gson cing / las kyi rnam par smin pa la ma dad pa'i sems can de dag la las kyi rnam par smin pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ de
117b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rgyud kun tu ston par yang mdzad de/ chos kyi bdag po nga la'ang las rnam par smin bar 'gyur na/ khyed cag la lta ci'i phyir las rnam par smin par mi 'gyur
117b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes de dag la las kyi rnam par smin pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rgyud ston par mdzad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi
118a1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' 'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yi ge dang / grangs dang / lag rtsis legs par bslabs pa'i slob dpon ni/ byis pa rnams bslab pa'i don du byis pa rnams bongad
118a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul gyis/ yi ge'i phyi mo dag klog tu 'jug par zad de/ de ni de la mi shes pa dang sgrib pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyis bdag las thos nas/ ci nas kyang yi ge dang
118a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs dang / lag rtsis dang / bgrang ba dag gi rjes su slob cing / byang bar bya ba de'i ched du yi ge'i phyi mo dag klog tu 'jug pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la legs
118a4(dkon brtsegs): par bslabs pa de'ang ji lta ji ltar sems can gzhan dag gi las yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gsung zhing / de lta de ltar las nye bar ston par yang mdzad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
118a5(dkon brtsegs): dper na sman pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la legs par bslabs pa ni/ nad med bzhin du sems can nad pa rnams kyi mdun du sman tsha ba dag gi ro myang bar byed cing / bsngags parjod
118a6(dkon brtsegs): par yang byed/ rab tu bsngags pa rjod par yang byed de/ nad pa rnams kyis de mthong nas sman tsha ba de dag 'thung bar byed/ yongs su longs spyod par byed cing / de dag nad de dag las yongs su
118a7(dkon brtsegs): thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa mi mnga' ba brnyes pa'ang /
118b1(dkon brtsegs): las dge ba dang mi dge ba 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no zhes las kun tu ston par mdzad cing / ji ltar na sems can rnams las kyi sgrib pas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang // lus
118b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag par 'gyur snyam nas/ bsam bzhin du las kun tu ston par yang mdzad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong
118b3(dkon brtsegs): dpon gyi bu 'am/ khyim bdag gi bu btsas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig la/ pha ma dag gis ma ma zhig byin par gyur na/ ma ma de nad med par gyur bzhin du/ 'di lta ste/ khye'u de'i
118b4(dkon brtsegs): 'o ma yongs su dag par bya'o snyam nas/ sman kha ba dang bsku ba dag so sor brtags shing 'thung bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi yab kyang
118b5(dkon brtsegs): snyun mi mnga' ba brnyes bzhin du/ las kyi bya ba chud gson pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ las kun tu ston par mdzad de/ las che ge mo zhig gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no/
118b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes thos na/ sems can de dag yid byung ba thob par 'gyur zhing / de dag yid byung na sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du byed par mi 'gyur te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
118b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
119a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ tshong pa nor 'dod pa lnga brgya tsam zhig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / de'i tshe na
119a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gron pa de dag nyid kyi nang na mi las nag po byed pa/ sdig pa'i las byed pa/ 'phong rtsal gyi rig pa legs par bslabs pa/ chom rkun byed pa/ tshong pa'i cha lugs kyis gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa zhig
119a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang gru po che de nyid kyi nang du zhugs par gyur to/ / de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gang gi tshe tshong pa 'di dag don grub cing bya ba byed pa de'i tshe na/ tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang phral la/
119a4(dkon brtsegs): nor rdzas kyi rnam pa thams cad khyer te 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro'o snyam du sems so// rigs kyi bu de nas tshong pa de dag don grub ste pha rol tu 'gro 'dod par 'gyur ba dang / de nas mi g.yon can gyi rang
119a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin can de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag gis tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang phral la/ nor rdzas kyi rnam pa 'di dag thams cad khyer te 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ba'i dus la bab bo snyam pa
119a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / de'i tshe na ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhig kyang gru bo che de nyid kyi nang du zhugs par gyur te/ de nas ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de gnyid log ste/ rmi lam rmib na/
119a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po de nyid na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des de'i rmi lam du bstan pa/ 'gron pa 'di nyid kyi nang na mi ming ni 'di zhes bya/ gzugs ni 'di 'ang/ cha byad dang / kha dog dang / dbyings
119b1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di 'dra ba/ chom rkun pa/ 'khu ba gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag gis tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang bral la/ nor rdzas kyi rnam pa 'di
119b2(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad khyer te 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro'o snyam du sems pas/ gal te mi 'dis tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang phral bar gyur na ni/ de'i tshe sdig pa'i las dam po byas par 'gyur ro//
119b3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs shing / byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha sdug yin
119b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir te/ gal te mi 'dis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bsad par gyur na/ de las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' re re'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' gcig gis
119b5(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po ji srid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su sreg par 'gyur bas/ de la
119b6(dkon brtsegs): ded dpon khyod kyis de lta bu las brten te/ ci nas kyang mi 'dis tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag gsad par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'di'ang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
119b7(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa bsam par gyis shig ces bstan to/ / rigs kyi bu de nas ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de sad nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ mi 'dis tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag
120a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang gsad par mi 'gyur la/ 'di'ang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam nas/ de zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dzam bu'i glung
120a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang mi mthun pa'i rlung langs te sdod pa'i tshe zhag bdun du su la'ang mi smra bar sems pa la zhugs par gyur pa na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la tshong ba 'di dag kyang gsang bar mi
120a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ mi 'di'ang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ni/ mi 'di nyid srog dang dpral bar bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan med do snyam nas/ de 'di snyam du sems
120a4(dkon brtsegs): te gal te bdag gis don 'di tshong pa thams cad la bsgrags par gyur na ni/ 'di dag gis rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis mi 'di'ang srogs dang phral zhing gsad par 'gyur la/ 'di dag thams cad
120a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis mi 'di srog dang phral nas/ gzhi des bdag bskal pa 'bum du sems
120a6(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba chen po rnams su sreg par 'gyur yang / bdag gis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de la spro bar bya'i// tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag srog dang phral
120a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur na'ang mi rung / mi 'di la sdig pa'i las de snyed cig rab tu 'phel bar gyur na'ang mi rung bas/ bdag rang gis mi 'di srog dang dpral bar bya'o snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ded dpon
120b1(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po de dag kun tu bsrung ba dang / mi de'ang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro ba las kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po dedang thabs/
120b2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa des bsam bzhin du/ chom rkun pa'i mo de mdung thung gis btab ste srog dang phral nas/ 'gron pa thams cad kyang don grub cing rang rang gi grong khyer du phyin par gyur to// rigs kyi
120b3(dkon brtsegs): bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe/
120b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus na// ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba der gyur pa'i phyir ro// tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po gang dag gru bo che de nyid du zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni/ gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la
120b5(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya yin no/ / rigs kyi bu ngas thabs la mkhas pa de
120b6(dkon brtsegs): dang snying rje chen po des bskal pa 'bum du 'khor ba bsnyil te bor bar gyur to/ / chom rkun pa de'ang de nas shi 'phos nas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes so// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du
120b7(dkon brtsegs): sems/ gang gi phyir thabs la mkhas pa de dang / snying rje chen po des bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du 'khor ba bsnyil te bor bar gyur pa'i don de byang chub sems pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yin par blta snyam na//
121a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni thabs la mkhas pa nyid yin par blta bar bya'o// // bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma'o//
121a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can las kyi bya ba la gzud pa'i phyir/ thabs la mkhas pas seng ldeng gi tshol pa zhabs la zug par bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
121a3(dkon brtsegs): la seng ldeng gi tshal pas zug pa gang yin pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid yin par blta bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rdo rje mkhregs pa ltar mi shigs pa'i sku
121a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phyir ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'on kyang mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'di nyid na srid pa mtha' ma pa'i mi nyi shu dang / mi nyi shu po de dag nyid kyi dgra bo ma nyi shu zhig kyang yod par gyur te/ de
121a5(dkon brtsegs): nas mi dgra bo nyi shu po de dag rang rang gi sgyu dag gis 'di lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te/ bdag cag gis mdza' bshes ltar bcos te/ rang rang gi dgra bo rnams kyi khyim du zhugs la
121a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag srog dang dbral bar bya'o snyam du bsam te/ gcig la gcig tshig tu ni ma smras so// rigs kyi bu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus srid pa mtha' ma pa'i mi nyi shu po gang dag yin pa de dag dang
121a7(dkon brtsegs): mami de dag gi dgra bo gsod pa po'i mi nyi shu po gang dag yin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der dong ngo / / rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs
121b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mi bzhi bcu po de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir dang / skye bo phal po che gzhan dag kyang gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ gnas brgyar mo'u 'gal
121b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po deng sa phyogs 'di nas seng ldeng gi tshol pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs g.yas pa'i mthil du zug par
121b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring po ma lon par/ de nas de'i mod la sa phyogs de nyid nas seng ldeng gi tshal pa rnon po mtho gang tsam gyi tshad cig byung bar gyur to//
121b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis seng ldeng gi tshal pa 'di 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du dor bar bgyi/
121b5(dkon brtsegs): lags so// ngas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa 'dis phyogs 'di nas gzhan du dor bar mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de nas gnas
121b6(dkon brtsegs): brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos stobs kyi shugs kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa de bzung ba dang / 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kha gyen du bltas te/ rab tu
121b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yos par gyur kyang / seng ldeng gi tshal pa de ni tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang mi 'gul lo// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha/
122a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gnas su gshegs pa dang / seng ldeng gi tshil pa de'ang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su 'ongs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gsum
122a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su ri rab kyi steng du gshegs pa dang / seng ldeng gi tshal pa de'ang ri rab kyi steng du 'ongs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang/
122a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su'ang gshegs/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du'ang gshegs pa dang / seng ldeng gi tshal pa de'ang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'ongs so//
122a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas babs te/ gdan la bzhugs pa dang / seng ldeng gi tshal ba de'ang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
122a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go/ / rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag g.yas pas zhabs g.yas pa bzung ste/ seng ldeng gi tshel pa rtse mo ya gcig sa la zug la/ rtse mo ya gtsig sa las gyen du lha
122a6(dkon brtsegs): bde'i steng du zhabs bzhag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ldeng gi tshal ba'i steng du zhabs bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu
