122a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yos par gyur to/ / de nas nga la gnas brtan kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon 'phrin las kyi sgrib pa ci zhig mdzad lags na/
122b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i rnam par smin pa 'di lta bur gyur lags/ ngas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo sngon nga rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song ba na tshong pa g.yon can zhig mdung zung gis btab ste srog dang
122b2(dkon brtsegs): phral bar gyur pas/ 'di na les de'i lhag ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de nas mi nyi shu de dag gsod par 'dod pa'i mi mdza' bshes ltar bcos pa'i mi nyi shu po gang dag yin pa de dag 'di snyam du
122b3(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po la'ang las rnam par smin par 'gyur na/ bdag cag la lta ci'i phyir rnam par smin par mi 'gyur snyam nas/ de dag gis de'i mod la de
122b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang srog chags 'gums pa dang / rjes su 'gums par 'tshal ba lags te/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nor/
122b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gis nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa de dag rjes su gzung du gsol zhes nyes pa la nyes par bshags so//
122b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gsheg pas de dag la las kyi bya ba dang / las zad par 'gyur ba las brtsams te/ de lta de ltar chos bstan pas mi bzhi bcu po gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par bya/
122b7(dkon brtsegs): to/ srog chags gzhan bzhi khris ni chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to// gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabra la seng ldeng gi tshal pas rngu/
123a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de bzhin
123a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa snyun dang bral ba/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed las bkru sman ut+pa la ha sta gan d+ha bslangs te gsol bar mdzad ce na/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na so sor thar pa'i bslab pa bcas nas ring
123a3(dkon brtsegs): po ma lon pa zhig na/ dge slong rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba'i srid pa mtha' ma pa lnga brgya zhig nags khrod cig na gnas pa de dag la 'di ltar sman bkus te bor bas 'tsho bar mi nus pa de lta bu'i nang byung
123a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur nas/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pas sman gzhan sten par mi byed tshol bar mi byed do// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas dge slong de dag sman//
123a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig tshol zhing ston par rjes su gnang bar bya ba'i thabs ni ci yod/ rnam grangs ni ci yod snyam du dgongs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gal te de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong rnam la sman
123a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag rjes su ma gnang na/ phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dge slong rnams 'phags pa'i rigs kyi rjes su 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa'i rigs 'dral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de bas na de bzhin
123a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas thabs la mkhas pas/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed las bkru sman ut+pa la ha sta gan d+ha bslangs te gsol ba dang / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis dge slong de
123b1(dkon brtsegs): dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag sman gzhan dag tshol la 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig/ dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ lha'i bu dag kho bo
123b2(dkon brtsegs): cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i mthu med cing dbang med pa yin pas/ shi bar gyur kyang kho bo cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las yang dag par
123b3(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar mi byed do/ / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po de nyid kyis kyang
123b4(dkon brtsegs): sman bkus te bor ba spang nas sman gzhan btsal gyis/ khyod cag kyang sman gzhan tshol cig/ de nas dge slong de dag 'gyod pa dang bral nas sman gzhan btsal te bsten pa dang / de dag nad de las yongs su//
123b5(dkon brtsegs): thar nas nad dang bral ba de dag gis zhag bdun gyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so// rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas sman gzhan btsal ba ma mdzad du zin na/ dge slong de dag kyang sman
123b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan tshol bar mi byed pas/ de dag nad de las thar pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams las grol zhing / dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas med de/ skab ma yin zhing / de ni gnas med de/ de'ang de
123b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gsheg pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad dang ldan pa grong du bsod snyom gyi phyir ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa/
124a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du phyir yang byung bar gyur ce na/ rigs kyi bu de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mngar mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas ni skye bo phyi ma
124a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam la thugs brtse ba dang / rjes su bsrung bar bya dgos te/ dge slong bsod snyoms pa gang la la dag grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu bsod
124a3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de dag bdag nyid bsod nams chung bas bsod snyom mi rnyed pa de'i tshe mde dag de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams tham
124a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'bag pa de nyid kyang grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa de bzhin du bsod snyoms ma rnyed par phyir byung bar gyur na/ bdag cag dge ba'i
124a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na bdag cag bsod snyoms ma rnyed pas yi chad pa bskyed par mi bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ don gyi dbang de gzigs
124a6(dkon brtsegs): pas na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas grong du zhugs pa bzhin du phyir yang byung bar gyur to/ / gzhan yang gang la la dag 'di skad ces gang dag gis de bzhin
124a7(dkon brtsegs): gsheg pa la bsod snyoms ma phul ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag ni bdud sdig can gyis byin gyis bslab so zhes smra na/ rigs kyi bu de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdud sdig can gyis ni/ de bzhin
124b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la bar chad bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir te/ gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag byin gyis brla par zad kyi rang gyi
124b2(dkon brtsegs): blos ni ma yin no/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' mod kyi/ sems can de dag nyid yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar lhung bzed
124b3(dkon brtsegs): bkrus pas grong du zhug pa bzhin du phyir yang byung bar gyur to/ / zhal zas bcad pa de'i tshe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang mi bde ba med cing / sngon ji lta ba bzhin du phyis
124b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin te/ mtho ba'ang med/ dma' ba'ang med par gyur to// de nas de'i mod la lha'i bu bdun khris dad pa thob par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu btud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas
124b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dag la ci nas kyang de dag thams cad chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to/ / bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis kyang dus
124b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig gi tshe na/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang chog shes pa dag thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te nyes pa la nyes par bshags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas kyang
124b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i gtam yang dag par bstan pa mdzad pas/ de na lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srob chags nyi khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam
125a1(dkon brtsegs): par dag ste/ gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bram ze'i grong shing sa la chen po can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung ba'i rgyu ni de yin//
125a2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen ni de yin te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thab la mkhra ba yin no// ci'i phyir bram ze'i bu mo dregs mas shing gi gzhong bu lto bar bcings te/ dge sbyong khyod kyis kho mo sbrum
125a3(dkon brtsegs): par byas kyi/ kho mo la zas dang gos byin cig ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab par gyur ce na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/
125a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'bang bar yang spyod mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa des mkhyen bzhin du btang snyoms mdzad cing
125a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pas las kyi bya ba kun tu bstan pa mdzad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur
125a6(dkon brtsegs): pa btab pas/ de dag 'gyod pa dang / sems zhum par 'gyur zhing / de dag mngon par mi dga' ba dang / nyams pa la 'jug par 'gyur bas/ de dbaskur ba btab pa'i tshe na/ 'di skad du de bzhin
125a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dkar po'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa de nyid kyis kyang skur pa brnyes par gyur na/ bdag cag gis lta ci'i phyir mi rnyed ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byed cing / de dag
125b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na skur pa de zil gyis mnan nas/ tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba spyod par 'gyur ba dang / nyams pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro// bram ze'i bu mo dregs
125b2(dkon brtsegs): ma ni re zhig sdig pa'i las kun tu rgyas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ma dad pa mang ba yin pas/ de ltar las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa des na/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag
125b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis bstan pa 'di la gdon mi za bar rma 'byin par byed pa yin te/ de sdig pa'i las kun tu rgyas pa des gal te rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab par gyur na'ang / de nyid kyis
125b4(dkon brtsegs): sad pa'i tshe na dri mar yang 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas thabs 'ga' zhig gis de mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa de las rlog par spyod na ni klog par yang mdzad la/ de bzhin gshegs/
125b5(dkon brtsegs): pas srung bar spyod na srung bar yang mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'ga' yang yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas
125b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pas kun tu rgyu mdzes ma kun tu rgyu dag gis srog dang phral te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi 'obras kyi nang du bor ba
125b7(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms su mdzad ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dang ldan pa yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas de de ltar 'gyur bar mkhyen cing /
126a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs byin gyis rlob par yang spyod mod kyi/ kun tu rgyu mdzes ma nyid tshe'i tshad zad cing // gdon mi za bar gzhan gyi gnod pas tshul bzhin/
126a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ rnam grangs des na gzhan mu stegs can dag 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ni ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dkar po'i chos rnam par 'phel
126a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji lta ji ltar de la gzhag par bya ba de lta de ltar de la 'jog par mdzad do zhes bdag nyid kyi rang gi nyes pas shin tu tshar gcod par yang
126a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zhag bdun gyi bar du grong khyer du ma zhugs par lha bye ba phrag drug cu btul nas/ zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'khor bzhi po dag
126a5(dkon brtsegs): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dag ye shes mthong ba skyes par gyur pa de lta de ltar de dag la chos bstan te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabras
126a6(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yin no/ / ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nyon mongs med kyi ljongs su dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa na/ zla ba gsum du
126a7(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rnams la bag pa ba ste/ bram ze nyon mongs med kyi rta chas kyi nas dag gsol ce na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar khyim bdag des de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge
126b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas/ ri mo mi byed par yang mkhyen mod kyi/ des mkhyen bzhin du dang du blangs shing btang snyoms mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge
126b2(dkon brtsegs): s long gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas dbyar zla ba gsum du gang dag gi rta chas kyi nas dag gsol ba'i rta lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par
126b3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa sha stag yin te/ de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las dang / las dman pa byas shing mngon par 'dus byas pas/
126b4(dkon brtsegs): las des de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te/ rta lnga brgya po de dag gi nang na/ rta cang shes gcig yod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba smon lam gyi dbang
126b5(dkon brtsegs): gis bsams bzhin du der skyes pa yin la/ rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyang sngon mir gyur pa na// byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po de nyid kyis byang chub yang dag par
126b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du bcug pa yin pas/ / de de dag yongs su thar par bya ba dang / yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir der skyes te/ rta cang shes de nyid kyi mthus/ rta lnga brgya po de dag
126b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur cing / de dag gi byang chub kyi sems de'ang mngon du gyur pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub
127a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rtar gyur pa lnga brgya po de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs bdud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa de dag gi don du dbyar zla ba gsum der gnas
127a2(dkon brtsegs): par zhal gyis bzhes so/ / de na rta lnga brgya po dag gi ches kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed phyed ni dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'bul lo// cang shes kyi chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag
127a3(dkon brtsegs): las phyed ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul lo/ / phyed ni rta cang shes de nyid za zhing / rta cang shes des rta'i skad kyis rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad sdig pa 'chags su bcug cing / sangs
127a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de dag la phyag 'tshal du'ang ba drug go/ / rta cang shes des rta lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces khyed cag gi chos kyi nas dag las phyed phyed de bzhin gshegs pa
127a5(dkon brtsegs): dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gsol to zhes go bar yang byas so/ / de ltar rta lnga brgya po de dag gis sdig pa bshags shing / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dad pa bskyed nas
127a6(dkon brtsegs): zla ba gsum po de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu/ dus gzhan gyi tshe na rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad shi 'phos te/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes nas/ lhar gyur pa de dag gis
127a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas phul zhing bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas// ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang de dag bla na med pa
127b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to/ / rta lnga brgya po de dag 'dul zhing 'tsho bar byed pa'i rta rdzi gang yin pa de'ang / de bzhin gshegs pas rang sangs/
127b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rab tu sems dul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pas rta cang shes de'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa la mchod pa byas shing / byang chub kyi
127b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu sems dul zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du
127b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ / rigs kyi bu de lta mod kyi/ mi'i khe zas gang yin pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mi bsod pa cung zad kyang med de/ rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag
127b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar bzung na/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dag zhal zas kyi phyir yongs su longs spyad par gyur na'ang / shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma
127b6(dkon brtsegs): dang gyo mo la sogs pa de dag gi ro de lta bu dang / ro bro ba'i mchog gi khyad par gang dag yin pa de lta bu dag ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi na'ang 'ga' yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
127b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhal zas mi bsod pa thams cad gsol ma thag tu rang
128a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i kha zas las yang dag par 'das pa'i ro dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas//
128a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni bsod pa yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na dge slong kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal snying spud te rab tu
128a3(dkon brtsegs): byung nas/ da rta chas kyi nas dag gsol bar mdzad pa lta zhes yid mi bde bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de'i sems la rnam par gzig nas/ kun dga' bo 'di ci'i ro yin shes sam
128a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes nas kyi 'bru gcig byin pa dang / des de zos nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur te/ nga la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgyal po'i khyim du skyes shing / rgyal po'i khyim du leg par rgyas pa la
128a5(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ro'i mchog 'di lta bu ni sngan chad ma 'tshal ma myong lags so zhes zer te/ de'i byin gyis dge slong kun dga' bo zas gzhan mi za bar dga' ba dang bde bas zhag/
128a6(dkon brtsegs): bdun 'das par gyur to// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin gyi/ las kyi sgrib pa ma yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan
128a7(dkon brtsegs): yang sems can gang dag dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag mgron du gnyer la/ sems rnam par g.yengs pas ri mo mi byed pa'i sem can de dag la ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa nyid dun/
128b1(dkon brtsegs): tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir las kyi rgyud de lta bu dag kun tu ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs la ri mo ma byas pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas log par ltung bar mi 'gyur/
128b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos su lung bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid la ltos/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par khas
128b3(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa'i dge slong lnga brgya po gang dag gis rnga chas kyi nas zos pa de dag las dge slong bzhi bcu ni 'dod chags spyod pa dang / sdug pa'i mtshan ma spyod pa yin pas/ gal te de'i tshe na de dag gis zas
128b4(dkon brtsegs): bsod pa dag zos par gyur na/ de dag gi 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa shin tu shas chen po dag skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de dag gis zas ngan pa zos pa des 'dod chags kyi kun nas ldang
128b5(dkon brtsegs): pa des bsrabs shing med par gyur te/ de dag gis 'dod chags kyi kun nas ldang ba dag rnam par bsal nas/ de dag thams cad kyis zla ba gsum po de dag 'das nas/ zhag bdun gyis dgra
128b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas
128b7(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa des zla ba gsum du rta chas kyi nas dag gsol bar zad kyi/ las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa ni ma yin te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de
129a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas gso sbyong la zhugs pa na/ 'od srungs nga ni ro rgyab na bas/ khyod kyis byang chub kyi yan lag dag shod cig ces bka' stsal ce na/ rigs kyi bu de'i/
129a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe na lha'i bu nyan thos kyis 'dul ba gang dag sngon dge slong 'od srungs kyis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / bag yod pa'i bya ba dag la yang dang yang du dad pa bskyed cing / yang dag par
129a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du bcug pa brgyad stong 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pas/ lha'i bu de dag gis sngon yang byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam dag thos la/ lha'i bu de dag la dge slong 'od srungs ma
129a4(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par/ gal te sangs rgyas 'bum gyis chos bstan par gyur kyang / de dag gis chos bstan pa kun shes par mi 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir dge slong 'od srungs kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rab
129a5(dkon brtsegs): tu dbye ba rgya cher bshad pas/ lha'i bu brgyad stong po de dag gis ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can gang la la dag nad kyis gnod par gyur cing / nad par gyur nas
129a6(dkon brtsegs): chos nyan du ma 'ongs shing / chos mnyan pa'i sems can chos ma thos pa de dag 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam dag gsan nas snyun nad las
129a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su thar bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis ci'i phyir chos mnyan par mi bya snyam du sems par yang 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir dang / sems can nad pa rnam
129b1(dkon brtsegs): chos la gus pa kun tu bstan par bya bar byer/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshig 'di skad ces/ 'od srungs ni ro rgyab na pas/ khyod kyis byang chub kyi yan lag dag shod cig ces gsung bar zad kyi/
129b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la snyun mnga' ba ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku yin te/
129b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag la 'byung ba'i lus rags pa yongs su grub pa med pa'i phyir te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas shA
129b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu rnam par 'jig par gyur pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces kun dga' bo daklad pa na zhing mi bde'o zhes gsungs she na/ rigs kyi bu de ni sems can gang la la dag de bzhin gshegs pas
129b5(dkon brtsegs): nye du rnams kyi srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po mthar mdzad pa mi shes pa'i sems can de dag 'di snyam du/ gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir
129b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung nas/ rgyal po'i gdung brgyud thams cad chud zos kyang des nye du rnams yongs su ma bskyabs pa las na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni nye du rnams la phan par bzhed
129b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang ma yin/ don du bzhed pa'ang ma yin/ bde bar bzhed pa'ang ma yin/ grub pa dang bde bar bzhed pa'ang ma yin no snyam du sems par mi 'gyur bar sems can de dag
130a1(dkon brtsegs): gi sems gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la tshig 'di skad ces/ nga klad pan zhing mi bde'o zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu
130a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la tshig 'di skad ces/ kun dga' bo nga klad pa na zhing mi bde'o zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe na/ lha'i bu chad par smra ba gsum stong 'dus
130a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa dang / sems can srog gcod pa rab tu mang po dag kyang 'dus par gyur pa dang / de na sems can chad par smra ba de dag dang / sems can srog gcod pa de dag las kyi bya ba la gzung
130a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas srog gcod pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i debu snang zhing mi bde'o zhes las kyi rgyud de kun tu bstan to// de na de bzhin gshegs pas gsung gi
130a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrin las brjod pa de bstan pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye gu las srog chags khri btul bar gyur te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir de
130a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa bram ze b+ha ra d+h+wa dzas spyo ba rnam pa brgyas spros pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa de dag dang du len par mdzad ce na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni bram ze b+ha ra d+h+wa dzas
130a7(dkon brtsegs): spro bar byed pa la phyir spro ba 'am/ yang na de phyogs gzhan du 'phang ba 'am/ yang na de de bzhin gshegs pa la tshig gcig tsam gyis spro bar yang mi spobs pa de ltar byin gyi rlabs kyis byin
130b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlab par yang spyod mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'khor der lha dang mi mang po 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma gum pa dang / ma khengs pa dang / thugs mnyam pa
130b2(dkon brtsegs): dang phan pa'i dngos po dang / mnyen pa dang / nges pa dang / sngon ji ltar bar phyis kyang de bzhin pas/ bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa mthong nas/ srog chags bzhi stong gis bla na med pa
130b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na/ bram ze b+ha ra d+ha dzas spros pa btang snyoms su bzhag go// des
130b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang spro bar byed pa bram ze b+ha ra d+h+wa dza de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dad par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song zhing / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi sa bon bskyed par gyur te/
130b5(dkon brtsegs): de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba thams cad dang / srid pa thams cad kyi lhas byin yang
130b6(dkon brtsegs): dang yang du rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhas byin la brten nas nga pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs
130b7(dkon brtsegs): shing / sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don kyang byas pa'i phyir ro// rnam grangs gang gis she na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la gang gi tshe sems can rnams bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig/
131a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe sbyin pa'ang mi shes len pa po'ang mi shes pa de'i tshe na/ lhas byin byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs te/ bu dag kyang slong bar byed/ chung ma dag kyang
131a2(dkon brtsegs): slong bar byed/ rgyal srid dag kyang slong bar byed/ lag pa dang rkang pa dag dang / mig dang mgo'ang slong bar byed cing / de dag la sogs pa dka' ba dang / sems can rnams la bde ba skyed
131a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa gzhan gang yang rung ba dag kyang slong bar byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' zhum pa med par de dag sbyin par byed pa de sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis mthong nas/ dga' ba dang //
131a4(dkon brtsegs): dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ spro ba bskyed nas/ 'di ji lta ba bzhin du bdag cag kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces/ de dag sbyin pa la mos shing / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par
131a5(dkon brtsegs): yang byed do/ / gzhan yang lhas byin dang / sems can dpag tu med pa gang dag tshul khrims 'dral bar 'dod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims mi 'dral ba mthong nas/ de dag
131a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang tshul khrims yang dag par len par byed pa dang / sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su slob pa na// bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas/ de dag la spyos sam/
131a7(dkon brtsegs): brgyad bkag gam/ brdegs na'ang 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing / bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rnam grangs des kyang sems can rnams kyi don byas pa yin no// gang gi tshe lhas byin
131b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgrongs pa'i phyir gshed ma'i mi dag zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgrongs pa'i phyir glang po che gdug pa nor skyong zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgrongs pa'i
131b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rdo 'bangs pa gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par blta bar bya'i/ las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
131b3(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa de la brten nas sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi don mdzad pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu mdor na lhas byin de ni nga'i ston pa phan par 'dod pa yin no// las kyi rgyud bcu po
131b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par blta bar bya'i/ las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can las kyi bya ba dang rnam par
131b5(dkon brtsegs): smin pa chud gzon pa rnams las kyi bya ba dang rnam par smin pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams la las che ge mo zhig gi
131b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no/ / las che ge mo zhig gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no zhes las kyi rgyud kun tu bstan te/ de thos na sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang
131b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las la sgrib pa dang / dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba la mi g.yel bar spyod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa bshad pa 'di na gsang bar bya ba yin
132a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ sems can dman pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya/ bstan par mi bya/ bshad par mi bya/ bzag par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bstan pa/
132a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'ang ma yin na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni thab
132a3(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa 'di lam bslabs pa'i phyir ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la 'dis don du 'gyur ba med de/ thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa 'di'i snod du 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis bstan
132a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di la bslab par bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma gtogs par gzhan 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mtshan mo mun pa
132a5(dkon brtsegs): mun nag gi nang du 'bru mar gyi mar me phyung na khyim gyi snod thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas kyang thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa 'di thos na sems
132a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par mthong zhing / bdag gis kyang 'di la bsgrub par byas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa
132a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la 'jug cing 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de ni legs par yang dag par brtson pas snga'o snyam du sems pa dang / de thabs la mkhas pa de dag la legs par bslabs pa dang / sems
132b1(dkon brtsegs): / can rnams smras par mi byed pa de lta bu'i ming du rang 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bumo byang chub don du gnyer bas
132b2(dkon brtsegs): ni/ gang nas thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstan pa 'di rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba'i dpag tshad 'bum du'ang 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
132b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ snang ba thob par 'gyur zhing / the tshom dang bral ba dang / nem nur dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas lha dang bcas pa'i
132b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dang / 'khor bzhi po gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i snod du gyur pa 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
132b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ / gang dag snod du ma gyur cing mi shes pa 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa de dag la ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rna lam du zag par yang ma gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na
132b6(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bdun khri nyis stong dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
132b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi
133a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ rnam grangs 'di ni thibs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang drung shig/ thabs la mkhas pa bstan du/
133a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar yang byung zhig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhigabacom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
133a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang
133a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'i dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
133a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam
133a6(dkon brtsegs): pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba zhang ye shes
133a7(dkon brtsegs): sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ le'u 'di la sho lo ka stong nyis brgya rtsa bcu gsum mchis// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+hadra pA la shreSh+Na ba ri br-id
133b1(dkon brtsegs): tshwan+da ma ma hA yAn sUH/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshong dpon bzang skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang rtsang
133b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na/ shA ri'i bu la sogs pa bya ba
133b3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad na lus
133b4(dkon brtsegs): snyom pa dang / gnyis kyis gnas pas lus nyon mongs pa med cing lus snyom pa med par gnas so// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi mdangs me tog pad+ma'i tshal rgyas pa lta bur snang bar gyur
133b5(dkon brtsegs): to/ de nas dge slong de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi mdangs pad+ma'i tshal rgyas pa lta bu snang bar gyur pa las na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di chos kyi tshul ji lta bu zhig ston par
133b6(dkon brtsegs): dgongs shig gu snyam mo/ / de nas de'i tshe tshong dpon bzang skyong zhes bya ba 'khor tshong pa drug khri dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo // de nas bzang skyong shin tu gzhon sha can la lus
133b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin du zhugs par rab tu zhi ba dang / dul ba'i yon tan gyi gter du gyur pa/ gser gyi
134a1(dkon brtsegs): shing ljon pa ltar gzi brjid 'bar ba mthong ngo / / de nas bzang skyong dad pa skyes te/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyis 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma thams cad mkhyen pa de bzhin/
134a2(dkon brtsegs): gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes 'jig rten du snyan pa dag grags pa 'di ni mi 'ardzun no snyam mo// de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabra la gtugs nas/
134a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta ba gtad de 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang skyong la gzigs nas sku las 'od zer phyung ngo // 'od zer des kyang tshong dpon
134a4(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong mi 'jigs pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
134a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la dgadod dad pa thob lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ phyogs 'ga' la re ba/ chos 'tshol ba/ 'khor
134a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnod pa rnams kyis yongs su nyon mongs pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i shas che ba/ ngo mtshar du gyur pa can bdag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni the tshom can lags/ bde bar
134a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bdag ni som nyi can lags na/ gang gis bdag rmongs par 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba ma 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa lags te/ bde
134b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yo byad thams cad 'grub par mdzad pas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu 'jig rten du de'u ma byung ste byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das ni sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pas na pha/
134b2(dkon brtsegs): ma lta bu'ang lags so// de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang skyong de'i phyir khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas
134b3(dkon brtsegs): dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas sems rangs par bya'o/ / de nas bzang skyong zhu bar 'dod pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// tshong dpon bzang skyong gzi brjid 'bar zhing gzugs
134b4(dkon brtsegs): bzang po phun sum tshogs pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bzang skyong 'di'i mdog
134b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang zhing rgyas pas rgyal po'i dpal yang zil gyis non te/ lhag par mdzes pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
134b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo bzang skyong 'di'i bde ba'i yo byad gang yin pa dang / dga' zhing rtse la dga' dgur spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa ma gtogs par/ lha rnams kyi dbang
134b7(dkon brtsegs): po brgya byin la'ang med do/ / 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na khyad par du 'phags pa rnams la'ang med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//
135a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon bzang skyong 'di'i nor du gyur pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis tshong dpon dge ba'i rgya
135a2(dkon brtsegs): ba byas pa 'di'i 'byor pa dang longs spyod rgyas pa nyon cig/ kun dga' bo nor dang gser phun sum tshogs pa'i tshong pa drug khri 'di'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // mal khri tshon sna tshogs spel bas mdze
135a3(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa/ smig thags can la stan nang tshangs can bting ba/ g.yas g.yon du sngas dmar po bzhag pa drug khri dang / bud med bgo ba dar dang / du gu la'i ras dang / men dri dang / mon dar dang /
135a4(dkon brtsegs): mes sbyangs pa'i gos dang / la tshig gu'i stod kor dang / dmar po dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snam phran can gyi gos gyon pa/ 'od chags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lag mthil reg na
135a5(dkon brtsegs): snying zhing shin tu 'jam pa rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur ba/ rgod cing dga' ba dang / tshig 'chos shing sgeg la/ snyan pa'i gtam brjod pas bskyed pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas
135a6(dkon brtsegs): dgod par byed pa/ khyim thabs la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul gyis lus la stod par byed pa/ skyes pa gzhan la 'dod pa'i rgyud spangs pa/ 'dzem pas 'dud cing bla gos bzang po dgos
135a7(dkon brtsegs): papa gcig la gcig phrag dog gis 'thab pa dang / rtse bas bzhin khro gnyer gsigs shing mkhur ba 'gyur ba/ rkang lag dang sor mo shin tu 'jam pa/ rkang lag gi tshogs kyi bar mtsham mi
135b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa/ rkang lag rgyas pa/ sgra mnyam zhing bcos la g.yas su 'khyil zhing mdzes pa/ snying chags pa dang ldan zhing shin tu snying nye ba/ snyan par grags pa'i rigs dang / rus las byung
135b2(dkon brtsegs): bas grags pa dang / legs par bskyed pa/ lus shin tu 'jam pa/ rigs mtho ba'i bud med rtse bar 'os pa'i khang pa dang / mal cha rgyas pa dang ldan pa drug khri dang / btso zangs drug khri gang ba'i
135b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras chan bzang po tshod ma shin tu dri zhim pos sna tha dad par phye ba/ sA lu bzang po'i chan dang / chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa lta bu'i kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs dri zhim zhing yid du 'ong la dga'
135b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par byed pa na/ nyon ma mongs par grub cing / bsod nams kyis byung la/ dri nga zhing mi gtsang ba dang / lus kyi skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang / mu
135b5(dkon brtsegs): tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ rnam par phye la sdug cing mdzes par byas pa dang / ras spungs shing rlung gis bskyod pa'i bun long dang / me tog sil mar gtor ba
135b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsil ba'i chus reg na bde bas khyab pas/ bsil bar gyur pa/ 'khar rnga dang / pi lang rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga chen po las byung ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dar dir dang / phug ron gyi
135b7(dkon brtsegs): skad yid du 'ong zhing chags su rung bas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi 'khri shing gis rtse mo dkris la/ sbrang bu sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ lha'i gnas dang / ri rab kyi phrag gi bar lta bur rlung skyabs
136a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i mar me 'bar ba'i gzi brjid dang / sman gyi sgron ma dang ra ba drug khri dang / grong khyer bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / ba ga ma dang / srang sdug gus mdzes par
136a2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ yul sna tshogs kyi skad dang / spyod pa dang / zong dang / tshong khang sna tshogs spel bas mdzes par byas pa/ tshong pa'i tshogs stong dag gis lang long du gyur pa/ nag dang shing ljon pa sna
136a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs brgya stong dag gis 'khrigs pa/ ku mu da'i me tog rgyas pa dri med pa spel bas mdzes par byas pa/ rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta'i mchog gis bun lon du gyur pa drug khri yod do// kun
136a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo grong khyer de dag gi na ngan tshong dpon dang / tshong ba dang / yul gyi mi dang / ded dpon 'khod pa rnams kyang / tshong dpon gzhon nu bzang skyong de'i bsngags pa rjod cing snyan par smra bar byed de
136a5(dkon brtsegs): nyin gcig bzhin du thal mo sbyar nas 'dud par byed do/ / yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang de'i dbang phyug dang / 'byor pa dang / longs spyod rgyas pa mthong na/ bdag nyid la mi dbul po lta bur
136a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin to/ / kun dga' bo tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor ba 'di ni btso bangs 'bum gyis g.yos byed pa dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis lus bskor te/ kun dga' bo de'i bsnyen bkur byed pa'ang bud med
136a7(dkon brtsegs): lnga stong yod do/ / kun dga' bo zla ba 'byor pa de la ni/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bde ba'i yo byad kyis kyang cha tsam du'ang mi phod do// kun dga' bo tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa de
136b1(dkon brtsegs): la ni/ tshong dpon bzang skyong gi gzugs bzang ba dang / kha dog rgyas pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bde ba'i yo byad kyis brgya'i char yang mi bod do// kun dga' bo 'on kyang bzang skyong la ni lha
136b2(dkon brtsegs): shing rta lha'i nor bu rin po che 'od 'bar ba/ nam mkha' skar mas spras pa dang 'ang ba/ lha'i gser 'tsher bas ngos spras pa/ rdo rje dang / spug dang / me shel sna tshogs kyis mdzes par
136b3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs shing / nam mkha' lding gi shugs lhur 'gro ba de la zhon na rin po che'i gling du'ang 'gro zhing / bde ba dang ldan la/ rtsed mo nyams su myongs nas/
136b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba'i shing rta'i mchog yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod do// de nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
136b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon gzhon nu bzang skyong 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig bsags lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
136b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin te/ kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
136b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba'i 'od ces bya ba byung ngo / / kun dga' bo tshong dpon bzang skyong de ni de'i nyan thos gtsug phud bzang zhes bya bar gyur te/ bslab pa'i gzhi ma nyams shing tshul khrims
137a1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'chal bar spyod pa/ chos smra ba thos pa'i mdzod mdzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin par gyur te/ des nyin gcig bzhin du sems can rnams la skad snyan cing yid du
137a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba dang / zab cing brtan pa dang / gsang mtho zhing zur phyin pas chos bstan to// gang gis chos de thos shing / kun chub par byas pa de'ang phyin chad log par ltung bar 'gro bar
137a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo de chos kyi sbyin pa des bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du lha dang mi rnams mgu bar byas so// kun dga' bo de'i shing rta'i gzhal med khang gang yin pa
137a4(dkon brtsegs): de'ang bshad par bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'dis dge slong tshangs par spyod cing / tshul khrims dang ldan pa lus nyam chung ba zhig la dad pa'i sems kyis bsod snyoms byin nas/ lham zung gcig
137a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang byin te/ de'i bsod nams rnam par smin pa des ni lha'i shing rta'i mchog mngon par grub par gyur to// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
137a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od srungs kyis kyang / 'di skad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'byung ba des khyod lung bstan par
137a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ / kun dga' bo tshong dpon bzang skyong 'di ni nges 'dul ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
137b1(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon 'di no nor dang gser phun sum tshogs la/ 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yul rnams kyis kyang dregs par ma gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mkhas
137b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni 'dod pa'i yong sa spyon rgyas pa'i khyad par dag gis dregs par mi 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'di ni dge ba'i chos can/ dge ba'i rgyu banyas su stong ba yin/
137b3(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul nas/ tshong dpon gzhon nu bzang skyong gis// bdag nyid kyi skabs phye bar rtogs nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas
137b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la sman 'dogs shing / thugs brtse ba can la
137b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de'i phyir khyod kyis dri ba dang mthun pa'i dus la bab kyis/ bzang skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa
137b6(dkon brtsegs): dris shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rnams rnam par
137b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ma 'tshal te/ za ma tog gi nang gi rin po che mi rig pa bzhin du/ thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa mi rtogs na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa de gang lagra/ ji ltar na rnam par
138a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mi gum pa'i rkang lag dang / mig nyams shing 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe/ dbang po rnams 'gag cing khams rnams dang
138a2(dkon brtsegs): mi ldan par gyur pa na/ rnam par shes pa 'di lus las ji ltar 'pho zhing mchi/ gzugs ni ji lta bu lags/ rang bzhin ni ji lta bu lags/ lus dang ni ji ltar 'bral bar 'gyur/ rnam
138a3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa 'dise lus yongs su btang nas/ lus gzhan ji ltar len par 'gyur/ ji ltar na khams rnams yongs su btang zhing / skye mched rnams bor nas/ 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol
138a4(dkon brtsegs): tu mchi bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na lus tha dad pa dag len par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mi gum pa'i skye mched rnams rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'dir dge
138a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'jig rten pha rol tu ji ltar myong bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na phung po 'di dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags la/ phyis phung po gzhan dag gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ ji ltar
138a6(dkon brtsegs): na rnam par shes pa 'di lus kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na skye mched rnams lus kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis
138a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bzang skyong legs se legs so// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis nga la bskul ba bzhin no// bzang skyong de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i 'ong ba dang
138b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / 'pho ba dang / 'gag pa nyon cig/ bzang skyong dper na rlung gi khams gzugs can ma yin pa'ang bstan du yod cing / gzung du yod pa dag las gzugs su snang ngo // de la
138b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan du yod pa ni shing 'gul zhing g.yo ba dang / sgra skad 'ur 'ur po'i sgra 'byin pa dang / grang ba dang / dro ba'i reg pas tshor ba skyed pa yin yang / de la rkang lag dang / mig dang / gdong dmigs
138b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur te/ sngo bsangs dang dkar ba zhes la dog lhag par mi dmigs so// bzang skyong de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang gzugasasu mi dmigs shing / gzugs su snang
138b4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur te/ khyod kyis rgyu'i bye brag dag gis rnam par shes pa'i khams rtogs par bya'o// de la rgyu gang zhe na/ sems pa dang / tshor ba dang / chos kyi khams so// de la ji ltar na rnam
138b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams 'di lus yongs su btang nas/ tshor ba dang sems pa len zhe na/ dper na rlung gi khams kyis me tog gi ji bsdus nas 'phos te 'gro ba de las lha'i me tog gi dri
138b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dad ldang ngo zhes shes mod kyi/ rlung gi khams kyang me tog gi ji mi 'dzin la/ rlung gi khams med par yang me tog rnams kyi dri mi dmigs so// dri de'ang gzugs can ma yin la/
138b7(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams de'ang gzugs can ma yin/ sna'i dbang po de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// bzang skyong de bzhin du mi shi ba'i rnam par shes pa des tshor ba yong su blangs shing / sems pa kun tu blang
139a1(dkon brtsegs): te chos kyi khams yang dag par blangs nas/ 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ste/ bam phrad pa las rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa skyes na/ tshor ba/
139a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang sems pa rnams 'du bar 'gyur te/ dper na me tog gi dbang gis snas tshor la/ sna'i dbang gis dri dmigs par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan yang lus kyi dbang gis rlung gi rang bzhin gyis
139a3(dkon brtsegs): reg pa dmigs par 'gyur la/ rlung gi dbang gis me tog gi dri 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ tshor ba'i dbang gis sems pa 'byung bar
139a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / sems pa'i dbang gis gang gis dge ba 'am mi dge ba shes pa'i chos kyi khams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dper na ri mo mkhan rtsig pa dang shing leb shin tu byi dor byas pa la ci 'dod pa
139a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du las byed de/ las la blo sbyangs pas ci 'dod pa bzhin du gzugs rnams mngon par 'grub par byed kyang / de'i rnam par shes pa de'ang gzugs can ma yin la/ rnam par shes pa gzugs
139a6(dkon brtsegs): can ma yin pas kyang / gzugs sna tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'dis/ gzugs kyi lus drug mngon par 'grub par
139a7(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi rkyen gyis gzugs mthong la/ rnam par shes pa mig la rten pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// rna ba'i rkyen gyis sgra ste/ de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// sna'i
139b1(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis dri ste/ de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// lce'i rkyen gyis ro ste/ de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// lus kyi rkyen gyis reg bya ste/ de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// chos kyi skye mched kyang /
139b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin no// rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs can ma yin pa ste/ de bas na spyod yul rnams kyang gzugs can ma yin par blta bar bya'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes
139b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams 'di'ang gzugs can ma yin par blta bar bya'o/ / ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongs su btang nas/ 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro zhe na/ bzang skyong 'dir 'chi ba'i
139b4(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe las zad pas tshe 'gag pa na/ las kyi sgrib pas zin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di 'pho bar 'gyur te/ dper na dgra bcom pa 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnam par shes
139b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams de khog pa 'gags nas yongs su 'phyan pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang skye ba po shi ba'i lus yongs su btang zhing / khams rnams bor nas/ dran pa stobs dang
139b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar bdag ni mchod sbyin gyis byin zhes bya ba de nyid yin te/ lus kyi tshor ba dang / yid kyi tshor ba dang / tshor ba rnam pa gnyis kyis zin to snyam du rab tu shes te/
139b7(dkon brtsegs): de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe ni lus kyi tshor ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shi nas ni yid kyi tshor ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na/ sa bon gyis lus
140a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub par byed la/ sems pas shes badran pa thob par 'gyur te/ de bas na sa bon dang shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang
140a2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas shes pa de rtogs pas na/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang de dge ba dang mi dge ba rig pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i spyod yul shes
140a3(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// sa bon gyis myu gu bskyed pa bzhin du lus 'grub pas/ de'i phyir yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// bzang skyong gzhan yang ji ltar rnam par
140a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams kyis lus yongs su btang nas/ 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur zhes khyod kyis smras pa de ni/ dper na me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / 'ji ba la rgyas btab pa'i 'bur
140a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ / dper na nyi ma shar na rab rib dang mun pa med par 'gyur la/ nyi ma med par gyur na yang mun pa 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi/ mun pa de'i gnas ther zug pa 'am/ ther zug pa ma yin
140a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med la/ mun pa de la'ang gzugs dang tshor ba mi snang ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang lus skyes nas/ mun pa bzhin du lus la gnas par 'gyur te/ mis kyang
140a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa mi mthong la/ rnam par shes pa ri khams kyang lus 'di 'dzin par byed do// dben na bud med kyi mngal na bu gnas pa la ci bdag gi lto na 'dug pa 'di khye'u 'am/ bu mo
140b1(dkon brtsegs): 'am sngo bsangs sam/ dkar ram/ ser ram/ dbang po ma tshang ba 'am/ dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa 'am/ rkang lag mnyam pa yin par mi shes la/ lho'i mingal na gnas pa
140b2(dkon brtsegs): de'ang kha zas ha cang tsha bas 'gul zhing rig la tshor bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / brkyang ba dang / bskum pa dang / mig
140b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzums pa dang / 'byed pa dang / las thams cad yongs su spyod cing / dgod pa dang / gtam dang / bsam pa skyed pa'i rang bzhin can lus la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa la bdag
140b4(dkon brtsegs): gis lus la rnam par shes pa gnas pa 'di rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig snyam du sems can rnams kyis mi shes so/ / bzang skyong gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni shin tu yongs
140b5(dkon brtsegs): su sbyang ba byas pa dang / dngos po thams cad la chub pa yin la/ dngos po rnams kyis kyang gos pa med do// bzang skyong 'di na rnam par shes pa ni bsgos pa yin te/ dbang po drug po rnams
140b6(dkon brtsegs): dang dbang po drug gi spyod yul rnams dang / khams bzhi po rnams dang / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams dang / bzang skyong 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa la bsgo bar bya ba yin par
140b7(dkon brtsegs): blta'o/ / dper na shing gi 'khrul 'khor phur bu gcig gis gzugs byas pa de bya ba thams cad byed de/ rgyug pa dang // mchong pa dang / gar byed pa dang / khya ba rnam pa sna tshog dag la 'jug na/ bzang
141a1(dkon brtsegs): skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'khrul 'khor de gang gi dbang gis 'jug par 'gyur/ bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bka' rmas pa de'i rgyus ni
141a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ma 'tshal to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong 'khrul 'khor de ni las kyi dbang gis 'jug ste/ las de'ang gzugs can ma yin zhing / rnam par shes
141a3(dkon brtsegs): pa las mngon par 'grub pa'o/ / de bzhin du lus kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di'ang rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis 'byung ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus sna tshog la 'jug pa yin no//
141a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus skyod par byed pa'i phyir byed pa po'ang yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus kyi khams la rten pa'i phyir mi zad pa'ang yin no// rnam par shes pa'i
141a5(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di ni sngon gyi lus kyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i phyir blo phun sum tshogs pa'ang yin no/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni nyi ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste/ dper na nyi ma'i 'od
141a6(dkon brtsegs): zer ni dri nga ba dag dang / mi gtsang ba dag dang / ro dag la'ang 'bab ste/ 'on kyang de dag la dri nges gos par mi 'gyur la/ nyi ma'ang dri nga ba bor te'ang mi 'gro'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes
141a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams 'di'ang phyi sa dang snyag snyig za ba'i khyi dang phag gi skye gnas dag tu'ang skye ba yongs su 'dzin te/ / 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams la spyod pa ngan pa de dag gis gos pa med do//
141b1(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus yongs su btang nas/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rjes su 'jug ste/ de'ang ji lta zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa
141b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dis lus 'dir bor nas/ bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin to// dper na rlung gi khams brag gi phrag nas byung nas/ shing tsam pa ka dang phrad de spos shin tu dri zhim
141b3(dkon brtsegs): pa khyer nas yang dring ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / ro'i dri'ang khyer te 'gro la/ bzang skyong de las gang ches shas che ba de'i dri dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji ltar rlung gi khams de dri rnam pa gnyis khyer
141b4(dkon brtsegs): te 'gro'ang / rlung gi khams de'ang gzugs can ma yin la/ dri de gnyis kyang gzugs can ma yin pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang lus las 'phos te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba
141b5(dkon brtsegs): khyer nas 'pho ste/ de ltar na de'i 'pho ba dmigs so// dper na rmi lam na mis dngos po thams cad shes kyang / lus de mal na 'dug par mi shes pa de bzhin du/ bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i
141b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams rmi lam rmi ba bzhin du 'pho zhing 'gro'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang lkog ma'i mid pa rnams nas kyang mi 'byung / bu ga rnams nas kyang ma yin te/ de ni khung bu dang gseb
141b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi tshol lo/ / de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na bya gag gi
142a1(dkon brtsegs): sgo nga 'am/ ngang ba'i sgo ngam 'phrugs pa shun pa ma rdol bar sgo nga'i nang nas bye'u phrug rnams 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar na bu ga ma brtol bar rnam par shes pa
142a2(dkon brtsegs): 'pho bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dper na til 'bru tsam pa ka'i me tog gis bsgos nas/ legs par brdungs te btsir ba las til mar byung ba ni tsam pa ka'i til mar
142a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na dr-i des kyang ti le 'bru ma brtol bzhin du dri zhim pos bsgos te 'pho zhing 'gro'ang dri des snum gyi ro myong bar yang mi 'gyur la/ 'bru'i rkyen dang me tog dang phrad pas til
142a4(dkon brtsegs): mar dri dang 'dres pa'i dngos por 'gyur te/ 'on kyang til gyi 'bru de la me tog gi dri de gseb nas 'gro ba ni med la/ de'i rkyen gyis dri de 'pho zhing 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di
142a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ang me tog gi dri bzhin du sgo nga'i shun pa ma brdol bar 'pho zhing 'gro ste/ de'i 'pho ba'ang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// gzhan yang de'i 'pho ba ni nyi ma dang / me shel dang / bsreg bya dang 'dra bar yang blta
142a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o/ / gzhan yang sa bon 'pho ba dang 'dra ste/ sa phyogs gang du sa bon btab na/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams gcig pa kho na las sa bon des
142a7(dkon brtsegs): la rten cing sdong bu dang lo ma sngon por 'grub la/ me tog dkar po 'am/ sngon po 'am/ dmar por snang ba 'am/ kha dog sna tshogs sam/ smin pa'i ro tha dad par 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam
142b1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams chos kyi khams gcig pu 'di las srid par skye ba thams cad du lus sngo bsangs sam/ dkar ba 'am/ ser ba 'am/ khra bo 'am/ mnam po 'am/ rang bzhin gyis mnyen por
142b2(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur ro/ / bzang skyong gzhan yang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di lus yongs su btang nas/ sa bon du 'gyur te/ bdag nyid rkang lag dang ldan par shes so// 'on
142b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang de la yan lag dang nying lag ni med do/ / de'ang sa'i khams yongs su btang nas/ chos kyi khams yongs su 'dzin te/ chos kyi khams de'ang dran pa dang mtshungs par ldan no// dran
142b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de'ang spyod yul gyi stobs dang ldan no/ / chos kyi khams dran pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i len pa'i rgyu ni rnam par shes pa yin te/ rnam par shes pa ma gtogs par yang chos kyi khams mi
142b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs la/ chos kyi khams ma gtogs par yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen med do// rlung gi khams ni rnam par shes pa de'i rjes su 'jug go// gzhan yang lha'i khams 'di lta ste/ dran pa'i//
142b6(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / tshor ba'i khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa rnams kyang rjes su 'jug go// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di/
142b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par shes pa de gzugs can lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong 'di la nang gi gzugs dang phyi rol gyi gzugs yod de/
143a1(dkon brtsegs): de la nang gi gzugs gang zhe na/ zin pa'i mig gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so// rna ba gang yin
143a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugasaso/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so// sna gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzug
143a3(dkon brtsegs): so/ lce gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so// lus gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
143a4(dkon brtsegs): paba'i tshor ba gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so/ / bzang skyong 'di lta ste/ dper na mi dmus long zhig nub mo gnyis kyi dbang du gyur pa na/ lha'i gzugs rkang lag mnyam zhing mchog tu
143a5(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong ba dag mthong la/ des de dag mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba bskyed de/ gnyid log pa las sad pa dang gzugs de dag ma mthong la/ de nam nang nas 'di skad du khyod nyon cig/
143a6(dkon brtsegs): mdangs mtshan mo bdag gi rmi lam du bud med kyi gzugs mchog tu yid du 'ong ba dang skyed mos tshal mi stong gis gang ba mthong ste/ der bdag gis mi lus shin tu gzhon sha can/ lag
143a7(dkon brtsegs): pa glang po che mchog gi sna ltar ring ba/ thal gong yangs shing rgyas la/ brang yangs shing mkhregs pa dag mthong ngo zhes smra zhing / ma de dag gi lus kyi rgyan mdzes pa gang yin pa de dag
143b1(dkon brtsegs): bzlas la/ de nas dmus long des mi de dag nyid kyi gzugs rnams ma mthong na/ bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi dmus long des rmi lam du gzugs rnams ji ltar mthong / bzang /
143b2(dkon brtsegs): skyong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de bas na nang gi mig shes pa dang ldan pas
143b3(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam du gzugs rnams mthong gi/ sha'i mig gis ni ma yin no// ji ltar mi gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du yud tsam zhig dran pa 'byung ba bzhin du shi ba'i dran pa'ang de dang 'ang ste/
143b4(dkon brtsegs): nang gi gzugs de'ang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// bzang skyong gzhan yang mi shi ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams de sa bon gyi khams bzhin du 'pho zhing 'gro ba ngas bshad par bya ste// dper
143b5(dkon brtsegs): na sa bon gyi khams sa gzhi la btab na/ khams bzhi po dag sdud par byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang dran pa rab tu 'dzin cing // tshor ba yongs su 'dzin te//
143b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dang mi dge ba'ang rjes su bzung nas/ lus yongs su btang ste 'a'o zhing 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par shes pa de dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su 'dzin par
143b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ bzang skyong dper na nor bu rin po che pad+ma rA ga ni 'od nag po 'am/ dkar po 'dzin te/ 'od kyi rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du nor bu rin po che de la 'byung zhing / de'i rang bzhin nyid nor bu
144a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che de la snang bar 'gyur te/ gnas gang dang gang du 'phos pa de dang der kha dog dag snang ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'ang dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su bcu
144a2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'pho zhing 'gro'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nu lus 'di la rnam par shes pa rtogs 'gyur ba lags
144a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong rnam par shes pa 'di bsags pa 'am/ spungs par mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di skye zhing
144a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa'i phyir ro/ / bzang skyong dper na sa bon las myu gu 'byung mod kyi/ sa bon rul ba las kyang myu gu 'byung bar mi 'byur la/ sa bon ma nyams pa las kyang myu gu 'byung ba'i mi
144a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ myu gu'ang 'grub par 'gyur na/ bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ myu gu de'i sa bon sdong bu 'am/ lo ma 'am/ sbubs gang na gnas/ sa bon ni shing gi rtse mo na'ang mi gnas
144a6(dkon brtsegs): so/ / de bzhin du lus 'di la rnam par shes pa gang na'ang mi gnas te/ mig la'ang ma yin/ rna ba la'ang ma yin/ sna'i dbang po la'ang ma yin no// sa bon gyi myu gu skye ba gang yin pa de ni
144a7(dkon brtsegs): sems pa chung ba yin no/ / mngal du skye ba de ni tshor ba chung ba yin te/ dper na myu gu 'byung zhing dus tshig dang ldan pa na/ me tog rnams 'grub ste/ me tog grub na 'bras bu 'grub pa yod pa de bzhin du
144b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / lus grub pa na yan lag dang nying lag gang la'ang rnam par shes pa mi gan la/ rnam par shes pa med na'ang lus skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dper na shing /
144b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin pa las sa bon 'byung la/ yongs su ma smin pa las ma yin pa de bzhin du/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lus las rnam par shes pa 'di snang bar 'gyur te/ tshor ba dang mtshung par ldan pa/ sred
144b3(dkon brtsegs): pas bsdam pa/ dran pas yongs su bzung ba/ dge ba la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ mi dge ba la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ rlung gi khams kyis yongs su zin pa/ shes pas
144b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par brlan pa/ rkyen la mngon du phyogs pa'i rnam par shes pa pha ma dang phrad pa na skye bar 'gyur ro// dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu phyis pa la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan snang yang / bzhin med
144b5(dkon brtsegs): par yang gzugs brnyan mi 'byung la/ me long med par yang gzugs brnyan mi 'byung ste/ ji ltar bzhin dang me long zad pa las gzug brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / gzugs brnyan de'ang gzugs brnyan
144b6(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ de la tshor ba dang rab tu shes pa 'ang med de/ lus gang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang de nyid du gzugs brnyan 'pho zhing / ji lta bur lus smra ba dang / 'bod pa dang / 'gro ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang bar byed pa de
144b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ bzhin gyi gzug brnyan yang 'gyur bar snang ngo // bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gi dbang gis gzug brnyan de dmigs par 'gyur/ bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ mi'i dbang gis gzugs brnyan
145a1(dkon brtsegs): gda' ste/ de'ang me long gi rkyen gyis bzhin gzug brnyan gdang la/ bzhin gyi mdog ci 'dra ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / dbang po tshang ba de nyid kyi gzug brnyan 'byung lags so// babang skyong /
145a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar lus kyi dbang dang / me long gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rkyen gyis gzugs brnyan 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis lus 'di tshor ba myong zhing / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
145a3(dkon brtsegs): yi da la byed pa 'grub par byed do// de la e long gang yin pa de ni pha a phrad pa lta bur blta'o// ji ltar lus mi snang na gzugs brnyan mi snang ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la gzugs brnyan gyi rang
145a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yod pa spangs nas/ yang chu'i nang du gzugs brnyan 'byung bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang lus yongs su btang ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin 'phangs nas/ phung po gzhan
145a5(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro/ / dper na sa bo gyi khams chung ngu zin kyang / shing n+ya gro d+ha dang / u dum wa ra la sogs pa'i shing gi phung po chen po bskyed nas/ yang shing de yongs su btang ste/ shing gzhan
145a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la/ sa bon gyi khams yongs su btang ba na/ dus bzlog par 'gyur bas/ shing de'i khams kyi bcud med par 'gyur ro// khams kyi bcud rnams med par gyur pas/ shing de yongs su rnyig
145a7(dkon brtsegs): shing yongs su bskam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams pa shing mi gsal ba 'dis kyang lus rnam bskyed nas/ yang yongs su btang ste/ lus gzhan dag sgrub par byed do//
145b1(dkon brtsegs): dper na nas dang / til dang / gro dang / mon sran gre'u dang / mon sran sde'u la sog pa'i sa bon cung zad gang na yod pa der cung zad sems pa lta bur gnas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes
145b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams 'di'ang sems can gyi ris gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der sems pa yongs su bzung zhing / tshor ba chung ngu dang / bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa rjes su bzung nas/ 'jig
145b3(dkon brtsegs): rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho'o/ / dper na bung ba ro la sred pas yun ring du me tog la gnas te longs spyad nas/ me tog yotra su btang ste/ me tog gzhan du 'pho la/ bung ba de'ang me tog dri mi zhim
145b4(dkon brtsegs): ba la longs spyad nas/ dri zhim por 'gro bar byed de/ me tog gang dang gang la 'jar ba de dang de la chags shing / ro'ang myong bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lha rnams kyi nang du
145b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i lus blangs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu long spyad nas phyir yang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi nang du lus blangs te/ des mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su myong nas/ yang phung po lnga/
145b6(dkon brtsegs): po gzhan dag len to// de la rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ji ltar blta zhe na/ dper na gur kum gyi sa bon nam/ le brgan rtsi'i sa bon rnams rang bzhin gyis dkar la/ de dag gi khong na myu gu'ang mi snang /
145b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog kyang mi snang / kha dog kyang mi snang / yang sa bon de sa'i khams la btab na/ chu'i khams kyis yongs su brlan nas/ myu gu mngon par grub par byed de/ myu gu mngon par grub na me tog dmar po 'am/
146a1(dkon brtsegs): dkar po 'am/ sngon po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang kha dog de'ang sa bon gyi khong na mi gnas la/ sa bon med na'ang kha dog dang myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur de bzhin du/ rnam par
146a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i pham+ba 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang nas/ mi'i sha tshugs can yin la/ sha snag bu'i dbang po 'byung ba'i skye mched dang ldan pa ma yin te/ de lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang ldan zhing / smadang /
146a3(dkon brtsegs): dri dang / ro dang / chos kyi skye mched rab tu shes pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur la/ 'di snyam du gang bdag gis las byas pa de nyid ni 'di dag yin no snyam du'ang shes so// lus de'ang rnam par shes pa'i
146a4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis bsdus pa yin te/ dper na dar gyi srin bu rang gi lus las skud pa'i rgyu byung bas khyim byas la/ de nyid de'i nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang
146a5(dkon brtsegs): lus bskyed nas/ dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid yang lus yongs su btang nas med par 'gyur ro// dper na pad+ma chu'i nang nas skyes te/ lha'i dri dang kha dog mngon par 'grub kyang / pad+ma dkar po de
146a6(dkon brtsegs): la chu'i kham kyang mi dmigs la/ de'i nang du mi snang bar gyur nas/ gang du sa bon gnas pa der kha dog dang / dri dang / ro rnams gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang du
146a7(dkon brtsegs): 'pho zhing 'gro ba der dbang po dag gi spyod yul rnams 'pho bar 'gyur te/ tshor ba dang / sems pa dang / chos kyi khamra rnams kyang der 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin
146b1(dkon brtsegs): po che gang du 'gro ba der longs spyod thams cad 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / dper na nyi ma dang 'brel ba'i 'od zer rnams nyi ma gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du 'od zer rnams kyang rjes su 'gro/
146b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang de nyid du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / chos kyi khams rnams kyang 'pho zhing 'gro'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams
146b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dis lus yongasu btang nas/ dngos po thams cad kyi phrad pa yongs su bzung ste/ sha med pa dang rus pa med pa'i lus 'grub par byed do// de'i lus len pa'i rgyu ni gzugs yin no// dbang po'i dngos
146b4(dkon brtsegs): po rnams ni tshor bas myong ngo / / dran pa ni lha'i lta bas mthong ste/ dge ba dang maM dge ba'ang yongs su len to// dper na rgya shug dang / 'bra go dang / a mra dang / nyo ti dang / se'u dang / bal ba dang /
146b5(dkon brtsegs): ka pi di Tha la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnams ni ro du mar 'grub ste/ tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa'i ro dang / bska ba la sogs pa'i ro re rer rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ la la ni
146b6(dkon brtsegs): ro tsha bar 'gyur/ la la ni sgyur/ la la ni dngar ro// 'bras bu de dag med par gyur pa'i sa bon gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der ro'ang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams
146b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der tshor ba 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / dran pa'ang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams
147a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dis ni lus yongs su btang nas/ bdag gis lus 'di yongs su btang ngo snyam du rab tu shes te/ de bas na 'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o// dge ba'i/
147a2(dkon brtsegs): las kyang rab tu shes so// mi dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so// las 'di dag ni bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // bdag kyang 'di dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo snyam du de ltar rab tu shes te//
147a3(dkon brtsegs): de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang lus 'di'i bya ba thams cad rab tu shes te/ de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// dper na rlung gi khams grang bar yang 'gyur zhing / tsha bar
147a4(dkon brtsegs): yang 'gyur la/ dri zhim por yang ldang zhing / dring bar yang ldang ste/ spyod pa de dag thams cad ni rlung gi khams kyi rkyen las 'byung yang / rlung gi khams de'ang gzugs can ma yin la/
147a5(dkon brtsegs): len pa'i rgyus snang ste/ ji ltar rlung gi khams kyis shing g.yo ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i reg pa len pa'i rkyen byed pa las rlung gi khams shes par 'gyur ba bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i
147a6(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di'ang gzugs can ma yin te/ gzugs len pa'i rkyen dang / 'dod pa len pa'i rkyen dang / lta ba len pa'i rkyen dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa
147a7(dkon brtsegs): len pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis lus dang kha dog skye zhing 'grub par byed pas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gzhon nu rma
147b1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'byor bstan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzugs ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ len pa ni dza lta bu lags/
147b2(dkon brtsegs): las len pa ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ lta ba len pa ni ji lta bu lags/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
147b3(dkon brtsegs): skul ba/ zla ba 'byor pa lags so legs so// mkhas pas ni mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid de ltar shes so// zla ba 'byor pa 'di na kha dog bzang po 'am/ kha dog ngan pa'ang rung ste/ de ni
147b4(dkon brtsegs): sha kham tshad dang / rtsa dang / rgyus pa dang / mgo bo dang / klad pa dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / lto dang / glo ba dang /

147b6(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa sa g.yogs pa/ shin tu gyur pa/ mi sdug pa dang / mi gtsang ba mang po la rten pa'o// gzugs gang ci'ang rung
147b7(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / 'byung ba chen po bzhi rgyur byas pa las mngon par 'grub ste/ de'ang pha ma phrad pa'i rkyen gyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bas na
148a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs len pa'i rgyu zhes bshad do/ / thab 'byor pa lus kyis pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams so// gsher ba nyid gang yin pa de ni tshu khams so//
148a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams so// g.yo ba nyid dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams so// lus de'i rab tu shes pa dang /

148a4(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa 'dis gzugs kyi khams ji ltar yongs su gtong bar 'gyur/

148a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ zla ba 'byor pa 'dir lus 'di gnas par gyur nas/ dus log par gyur pas khams rnams yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ dper na 'o ma dang chu bsres te lhan cig tu bzhag pa me dang
148a7(dkon brtsegs): phrad na 'o ma'ang logs shig tu 'gyur zhing / chu'ang logs shig tu 'gyur te/ 'o ma'i snum gyi khams gang yin pa de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// zla ba 'byor pa de bzhin du mi shi ba'i khog pa'ang log
148b1(dkon brtsegs): shig tu 'gyur/ khams rnams kyang logs shig tu 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'ang logs shig tu 'gyur te/ rnam par shes pa de'ang khams kyi rten yongs su blangs nas/ chos kyi khams
