148b6(dkon brtsegs): 'pho bar 'gyur te/ mar gyi khams gang yin pa de ni lus lta bu'o// sman rnams phrad pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams phrad pa lta bu'o// sman rnams kyi kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang /
148b7(dkon brtsegs): reg bya gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa lta bu'o// 'pho ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'pho ba'i rnam par shes pa 'pho ba lta bur blta bar bya'o// mi'i kha dog rgyas pa dang / mdog bzang zhing bde bar
149a1(dkon brtsegs): smin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba lta bur bstan to/ / dge ba chen po'i sman mar des mdog ngan cing skya bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mi dge ba lta bur bstan to// dge ba chen
149a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i sman mar rin po che ji lta ba de bzhin du ni rnam par shes pa'i khams blta bar bya'o/ / ji ltar dge ba chen po'i sman mar gyis sman rnams kyi kha dog 'jug par byed cing / ro dang dri 'jug par byed
149a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang / mar de la rkang lag dang mig med pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang zhing khams rnams bor nas/ chos kyi khams yongs su len cing // tshor
149a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su len te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su len to// zla ba 'byor pa mi shi 'phos pa des kyang lha'i dran pa thob par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo //
149a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba bcu drug kyang mthong ngo // bdag nyid kyi lus rkang lag nyams pa'ang mthong ste/ de 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi khog pa yin no snyam du'ang shes so// de 'chi ba'i
149a6(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe'i dran pas lha'i ltas khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkra zhing / shing gel ba dang / 'khri shing dang / ldum bu sna tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ gser btsom gsar pa'i
149a7(dkon brtsegs): mdog ltar spa ba/ spras pa rnam par dbye ba byas pa dag mthong ngo // des ltas de mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ de dga' ba skyes pa des bde ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'chi ba'i dus kyi
149b1(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de'i rnam par shes pa de ni rta la zhon pa dang 'dra bar blta ste/ dper na g.yul ngor chas ban/ dmag mi'i nang na mi tsi la ma rag par chas pa ska las
149b2(dkon brtsegs): bzung sme myur ba myur bar zhon par byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang dge ba la dmigs pa dang / 'brel cing dbugs rgyu ba rgod pas/ chos kyi khams yongs su
149b3(dkon brtsegs): blangs shing / skye mched 'gags te/ lus bor nas/ lha'i gnas 'og min man chad tshangs pa'i bar du yongs su len par 'gyur ro// // bam po gnyis
149b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste tha ma'o/ / de nas sman chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'dra la 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam par shes pa lus las 'pho ba
149b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen da ltar khyod kyis nga la ji skad bskul ba de ni de bzhin te/ legs so legs so// dri ba 'di ni mchog
149b6(dkon brtsegs): tu zab bo/ / dri ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan par bya ba yin te/ rnam par shes pa de ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtog pa gzhan med do// de nas bcom
149b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen 'di ni zab mo'i zhub zhu ba la mkhas pa lagra te/ blo zhib cing mdzangs la mkhas pa
150a1(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de de bzhin te/ rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs la dge ba'irtsa
150a2(dkon brtsegs): ba bskyed pa yin no/ / bzang skyong rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du gzhan mu stegs can du gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du rtog ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ci yin//
150a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di su yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ji lta bu zhig yin no snyam mo// bzang skyong 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba khong du ma chud de/ ngas
150a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i the tsom bsal bar bya'o/ / de nas tshong dpon bzang skyong gis sman chen la 'di skad ces smras so// sman chen legs so legs so// khyod ni shes rab rgya che zhing yangs la
150a5(dkon brtsegs): chos zab mo zhu ba la mkhas so/ / sman chen bcom ldan 'das ye shes la 'jug pa blo dag pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa la skul cig/ zla ba 'byor pa 'di ni byis pa ste/ yul la sred pas/ bcom
150a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la lan 'ga' yang ma bskul bskul ba ma byas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' la/ dam pa'i chos dang phrad pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka/
150a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zab pa zab pa'i gnas rnams bcom ldan 'das la skul cig/ de nas sman chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ston ka'i dus kyi me tog pad+ma'i tshal
150b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar rgyas pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang sman chen dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'tshal ba lags na/ bde bar gshegs pas
150b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag la bstan du gsol/ bskal pa'i mthar ma thug par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gshegs pa zhig tu gyur na/ de'i slad na sems can 'di dag gis las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi
150b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa ma 'tshal to/ / 'khor ba na yongs su 'khyam par 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen ngas tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don gyi phyir yang
150b4(dkon brtsegs): brag gi rtse mo nas rang gi lus bor te dka' ba rnam pa brgya stong du ma nyams su myong ngo / / sman chen khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas khyod la lan gdab bo// de skad ces bka' stsal
150b5(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'di'i ring bzhin ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman
150b6(dkon brtsegs): chen sgyu ma mkhan gyi me'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / me'i grib ma chu'i nang du 'byung ba gsal ba ma yin zhing / mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mig dang nam mkha'i rang
150b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gang yin pa dang / sred pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa bzhin no// sman chen gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sred pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
151a1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ snying du sdug pa'i mi mthong ba na/ mig gi dbang po 'pho ba dang / ji ltar mis me long la rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mthong la/ me long gung du phyung na rang /
151a2(dkon brtsegs): gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mi mthong ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa khams 'di 'phos na/ rang gi bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa rnam par shes pa'i khams des ma mthong ngo // /
151a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na mi dmus long gis nyi ma 'char ba 'am/ nyi ma gung na 'dug pa'ang mi mthong la/ mtshan mo'ang zla ba 'char ba dang nub pa ma mthong ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang lus
151a4(dkon brtsegs): la mi snang ngo / / sman chen 'on kyang lus la sred pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yin te/ de'ang lus 'di'i khams
151a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / phung po rnams phrad par byed pa yin no// de la gzugs can gyi dngos po gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /
151a6(dkon brtsegs): ro dang / sgra rnams so// tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba dang / yid rnams na gzugs can ma yin pa'i dngos po ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no// sman chen ji ltar mi'i lce'i
151a7(dkon brtsegs): thor tos ro kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / sgyur ba dang / dngar ba dang / lan tshwa'i ro dang / bska ba tshor te/ de'i lce de'ang gzugs can yin la/ ro'i dngos po'ang gzugs can yan no// de
151b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du lus 'di la'ang rus pa dang / rkang dang / sha dang / khrag ni gzugs can yin la/ tshor ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs can ma yin te/ gang gis rnam par smin pa dang / bsod nam/
151b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsod nams ma yin pa myong ba de ni rnam par shes pa'o// de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// /
151b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang bsod nams ma lags pa myong ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ bzang skyong de'i phyir nyon cig/ bden pa ma mthong bas ni rnam
151b4(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa 'di mi mthong ste/ de ni lag mthol du skyu rur bzhag pa bzhin du mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de ni mig la'ang mi gnas te/ mig las kyang skye ba mthong bar yang mi 'gyur ro// bzang skyong
151b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin du/ ngas kyang gzugs can ma yin par thugs su chud de/ 'on kyang byas pa rnams kyis
151b6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di dpes bstan to// bzang skyong 'di na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa ji lta ba bzhin du rig ste//
151b7(dkon brtsegs): dper na mi la la skem byed dam/ brjed byed dam/ dri za'i gdon nam/ lha'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na/ bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci mo de'i khong na 'dug pa'i skem byed dam/ dri za 'am/
152a1(dkon brtsegs): b+ha de snang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// mi de'i nang ngam/ slad rol na'ang gdon mi gda' ste/ gdon de dag ni gzugs ma mchis pa
152a2(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bzang skyong dper na lha'i gdon chen pos me tog shin tu dri zhim pa dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog 'phreng byin pa len pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bsod
152a3(dkon brtsegs): nams dang ldan pas kyang lus blangs nas/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam/ tshong dpon nyid dam/ lha nyid byed du 'jug ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis ni bsod nams myong ba
152a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / ji ltar lha'i gdon de lha'i me tog 'phreng byin pas rangs par 'gyur zhing / mi de'i lus kyang tshim par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang rgyal srid kyi dbang
152a5(dkon brtsegs): phyag nyid la dga' bar 'gyur zhing / lus de'ang tshim par 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di ni bsod nams myong ba yin no// bzang skyong dper na srul po'i gdon mi sdig cing gzugs mi
152a6(dkon brtsegs): snang ba mi'i lus la gnas te/ mi gtsang ba dang / rul ba dang / ldan ljin dang / stor khung nas 'bab pa dang / gtor ma 'dod cing / de'ang gtor ma des dga' bar 'gyur la/ mi de'ang
152a7(dkon brtsegs): gdon gyi dbang gis dring zhing mi gtsang ba las byung ba'i kha zas btsog pa dag la chags shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar
152b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i las kyis skye gnas ngan par skyes te/ dbul po 'am/ yi dgas ngan pa 'am/ ldan ljin za ba dag la chags shing dga' bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni
152b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ma yin pa myong ba'ang yin no/ / dper na lha'i gdon chen po gzugs med pa de lha'i longs spyod len pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'di'ang bsod
152b3(dkon brtsegs): nams gzugs can ma yin pas yongs su bzung nas lha'i lus rnams skyed par byed do/ / dper na srul po'i gdon gzugs med pa maM la gnas shing phyi sa dang ldan ldan ljin za bar byed pa de bzhin du//
152b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i las rnams kyis skye gnas ngan par skye bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams ma yin par nye
152b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro bar yang blta'o/ / bzang skyong de bas na/ khyod kyis gdon gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams lta bur blta'o// gdon gyi longs spyod bzang po dang ngan pa
152b6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba lta bur blta'o/ / mi gang yin pa de ni lus lta bur blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
152b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das lus 'di len pa'i rgyu ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni phan tshun gyi rkyen gyis 'dod pa len par byed de/ dper na gtsub stan las kyang brten
153a1(dkon brtsegs): gtsub shing las kyang brten/ de skyed pa'i mo'i rtsol ba las kyang brten te me 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di len pa'i rgyu skyes pa dang bud med kyi rkyen gyis sgra dang /
153a2(dkon brtsegs): reg pa dang / ro dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// dper na me tog las 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'on kyang me tog de la'ang 'bras bu mi dmigs la// 'bras
153a3(dkon brtsegs): bur grub pa la'ang me tog mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ lus 'di las rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ 'on kyang lus de la'ang rnam par shes pa mi snang la/ rnam par shes pa ldog pas kyang
153a4(dkon brtsegs): lus kyis rus pa dang / rkang dang / mer mer po dang / mi gtsang ba rnams rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// dper na sa bon de me tog gi kha dog dang / ri dang / ro 'debs pa de bzhin du/
153a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang nas/ dge ba dang mi dge ba btab cing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa'ang btab nas 'jig rten pha rol tu
153a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'o/ / dper na skyes pa dang bud med gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis phrad nas dga' bas brlan te/ bud med la shin tu dam por 'khyud nas nyon mongs pa 'byin par byed de/ de gnyis kyi
153a7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa med par gyur na yang bral bar 'gyuraro/ / de gnyis la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ der nyon mongs pa byung nas 'dod chags med par 'gyur te/ yang gcig
153b1(dkon brtsegs): la gcig 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus dang phrad pa rnyed nas dga' ba bskyed de/ chags pa 'phel bar byed do// dper na lus kyi rkyen gyis
153b2(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi gzugs mthong na skyes pa'i 'dod chags skyed la/ yang phrad pa las bral na phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongs su blangs nas/ yang bor
153b3(dkon brtsegs): te gzhan du 'gyur ba med par 'gyur ro/ / 'di la pha ma phrad pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas pa dang / las la dmigs pa'i dngos po las rnam par shes pas lus 'grub par byed de/ las de dag
153b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang gzugs can ma yin la/ skyes pa dang bud med kyi rkyen gyi ngo bo de'ang gzugs can ma yin no// len pa'i rkyen las 'dod pa 'byung ste/ de bas na 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// gzugs kyis
153b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa len pas na/ de'i phyir yang 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// sman chen gzhan yang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa de gang zhe na/ 'di la tshul khrims ni srog
153b6(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang myos par byed pa bag med pa'i gnas spong ba'o// de'i mchog tu
153b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// de'i len pa ni srid pa ste/ lha dang mor skye zhing / skye ba yong su 'dzin pa skyed pa ste/ de ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
154a1(dkon brtsegs): zag pa med pa'i dge ba yongs su smin par byed do// phung po rnams kyi sa bon yang rlan par byed do// las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyang sdud par byed do// rnam par shes
154a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang sbyor bar byed do/ / nyon mongs pa blangs pa rnams kyang sreg par byed do// de bas na 'di ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka'
154a3(dkon brtsegs): sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'dis ji ltar lha'i nang du lus yongs su len pa lags/ sems can dmyal
154a4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams su ji ltar len pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de'i phyir nyon cig/ 'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis chos kyi khams yongs su blangs nas/
154a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i lta ba bskyed de/ de'i lta ba de'ang sha'i mig la rten pa ma yin no// de'i lta bas mthong ba gang yin pa de ni len pa zhes bya ste/ de bas na lta ba'i len pa zhes bya'o// de'i lha'i lta ba bsod
154a6(dkon brtsegs): nams la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i gnas mthong ste/ der lha rnams lha'i rtse ba dag gis rtse ba mthong nas/ de der chags pa skye'o//
154a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du'ang sems te/ bdag ni der 'gro'o snyam mo// des der chags su rung zhing dran pa dang ldan pa'i sred pa rab tu shes so// dur khrod na 'dug pa'i khog pa de'ang des mthong nas 'di
154b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ 'dis bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongs su len pa gang yin pa'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags so snyam mo// de
154b2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa khog pa de la chags na ci'i slad du mi gnas/ khog pa de nyid la
154b3(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du mi rten/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na mi la la'i sgra dang kha spu bregs te/ skra dang kha spu de mthong nas mi de 'di snyam du sems te/ skra 'di dag ni dri zhim zhi
154b4(dkon brtsegs): gnag pa yin gyi/ 'di dag ni phyir yang mgo la bskyed par bya'o snyam na/ sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci sgra de dag phyir skye bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
154b5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis khog pa bor nas phyir yang khog pa de nyid la gnas pa 'di ni gnas med do// de skad
154b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam par shes pa'i khams cha phra zhing mi mngon pa 'dis glang po che'i lus bong chen po ji ltar sgrub par
154b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid cing / rdo rje ltar sra ba'i khog pa'ang ji ltar rtol bar bgyid/ glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang ldan pa'i mi dang / glang po che'i rgyal po'ang ji ltar 'dzin par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
155a1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan du med pa ri'i phrag na gnas pa de'ang ri'i phrag de nas byung ste/ ri rab dang 'ang zhing mtshungs pa'i ri/
155a2(dkon brtsegs): rtse mo snyol bar byed cing / 'gyes par byed na/ sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ri de'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sman chen gyis gsol pa// rlung
155a3(dkon brtsegs): gi khams ni snyi zhing lus ma mchis par blta bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de de bzhin te/ ji ltar rlung gi khams skye zhing lus med pa de bzhin du/ rnam par
155a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'di'ang zhan cing lus med mod kyi/ lus chen po dag dang chung ngu dag kyang skyed par byed de/ sbrang bu'i yang rnam par shes pa de nyid yin te/ glang po che'i yang de nyid yin no// dper na
155a5(dkon brtsegs): mar me'i me lce chung yang ra ba 'am/ khang pa'i nang gi mun pa chen po sel bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus len pa'i rgyu des na gzugs chung ngu dang chen po rnams
155a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par byed do/ / de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci las de gzugs can zhig lags sam/ 'on te
155a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ma mchis pa lags/ rang bzhin ni ji lta bu lags/ rkyen ni ji lta bu dag las blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen 'di la las rnams kyi spyod yul ni
155b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bde ba dag dang / 'byor pa dag dang / lha'i kha zas 'thob pa yin te/ dper na mi dbul po gnyis shig 'brog tu 'khyam pa las/ der gcig gis ni chu bsil ba rnyed la/ gcig
155b2(dkon brtsegs): ni skom ste shi na/ chu de la la zhig gis snyim pas bcus te mi de la byin pa'ang med/ la la zhig gis mi cig shos de la bkag pa'ang med kyi/ bsod nams kyi mthu 'ba' zhig gis
155b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis ni chu rnyed la/ gcig gis ni ma rnyed pa de bzhin du/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos de dag blta bar bya'o// zla ba yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo ji lta ba bzhin du/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'ang de bzhin
155b4(dkon brtsegs): du blta bar bya'o/ / dper na shing thog rlon pa yongs su smin pa na/ kha dog gzhan du 'gyur te/ kha dog de dang yongs su smin pa'ang me'i kham kyi dbang gis 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lus 'di'ang
155b5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi dbang gis tshong dpon gyi khyim nor dang gser 'byor pa dag tu rgyan nye bar ston to/ / lha'i gnas dag tu lha'i rgyan dag nye bar ston te/ dbang phyug gi rgyan gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi
155b6(dkon brtsegs): dper bstan to/ / dper na sa bon sa la btab na/ shing gi rtse mor snang bar 'gyur la/ sa bon de'ang sdong bu nas sdong bu'i rtse mor 'pho ba med cing / shing gi nang na'ang sa bon de mi dmigs la/
155b7(dkon brtsegs): mi la la zhig gis lag pa gnyis kyis sa bon de blangs te/ shing gi rtse mor bzhag pa'ang med cing / sa bon rtsa ba nas 'pho ba'ang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du las dge ba dang mi dge ba lus la gnas
156a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyang lus la mi snang ngo / / dper na sa bon las me tog 'grub pa na/ sa bon gyi nang na'ang me tog mi snang zhing / me tog gi na na'ang 'bras bu mi dmigs
156a2(dkon brtsegs): la/ sa bon dang me tog kyang gnyis su dbyer med pa de bzhin du/ lus las kyang las 'byung / las las kyang lus 'byung mod kyi/ lus kyi nang na'ang las mi snang / las kyi nang na'ang
156a3(dkon brtsegs): lus mi snang ngo / / dper na me tog yongs su smin pa na 'bras bu dmigs pa de bzhin du/ lus smin na las rnams dmigs so// dper na gang na sa bon gnas pa der me tog 'byung bar
156a4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba 'byung bar snang ste/ las de'ang gzugs can ma yin la/ rnam par smin pa'ang
156a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin no/ / dper na mi'i lus las grib ma mi gsal zhing gzugs can ma yin pa 'byung la/ mi de nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ grib ma de'ang mi de'i lus dang 'brel ba ma
156a6(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ lus med par yang grib ma 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di la dge ba dang mi dge ba 'brel bar 'dug ste/ lus gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der las rnams 'brang
156a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ lus kyi dbang gis las rnams 'brang ba'ang ma yin la/ lus med na'ang las rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dper na sman tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bskab la sog pa'i bye brag
156b1(dkon brtsegs): gis lus la bkru sman btang na nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing / lha'i mdog rgyas pa'ang lus la snang bar 'gyur ba de ji ltar sman tsha ba dang kha ba rnams kyis lus kyi mdog gzhon/
156b2(dkon brtsegs): shar 'dug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sgrub par byed cing / 'di snyam du mi 'dis ni sman zos gor ma chag go snyam du shes par 'gyur mod kyi/ sman de dag gi ro dang smin pa de'ang gzugs can ma yin
156b3(dkon brtsegs): la ro dang smin pa gzugs can ma yin pa'ang mi'i mdog rgyas pa las snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dge ba'i las 'di'ang gzugs can ma yin te/ de las lus grub nas/ kha zas dang
156b4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod dang / gos kyi bye brag gi dbang gis rkang lag mnyam zhing mchog tu bde ba dang ldan te/ nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul 'byor par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni
156b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no/ / rigs dang longs spyod rgyas shing 'byor pa las nyams pa dang / nye bar spyad pa dang bral zhing gzhan la re ba dang / kha zas ngan pa za zhing mal stan ngan pa
156b6(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs ngan cing mi sdug pa'i lus can gang yin pa de dag ni mi dge ba'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no/ / dper na me long gi dbang gis bzhin gyi mdog sdug pa 'am/ mdog mi sdug
156b7(dkon brtsegs): pa snang la/ me long gi gzugs brnyan de'ang gzugs can ma yin pa de bzhin du/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis rnam par shes pa 'di lnga rnams dang / mi rnams dang /
157a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sman chen las rnams ni de ltar blta bar bya'o// de ltar na las 'di dag ni
157a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo / / gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'dis dbang po rnams ji ltar 'bebs/ lus chen po'ang ji ltar yongs su 'dzin par bgyid/
157a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen 'di lta ste/ dper na rngon pa nags thibs po'i nang du song nas// gzhu shin tu bkang ste/ dug mdas spos kyi glang po che bong tshod che ba la
157a4(dkon brtsegs): bsnun la/ dug de'ang khrag dang phrad na yan lag dang nying lag rnams su 'pho zhing 'gro ste/ dbang po'i spyod yul thams cad 'dor la/ gnad rnams su bsnun cing khrag gi kha dog bsgyur te/
157a5(dkon brtsegs): yan lag dang nying lag thams cad du 'pho zhing 'gro la/ phyir yang lus bor nas/ dug de lus las phyir byung na/ sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ dug de dang glang po che'i khog pa de'i
157a6(dkon brtsegs): tshad ji tsam/ gsol pa/ ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dug de ji ltar 'pho ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di'ang lus yongs su spong /
157a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing dbang po rnams kyang 'dor la/ khams rnams kyang yongs su gtong ngo // de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di dbang po rnams 'dor bar byed do// sman chen gzhan yang khyod kyis
157b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'di ji ltar lus chen po yongs su 'dzin par bgyid ces zer ba ni/ ji ltar kho lag che zhing rags pa'i lus 'di la mi sems pa bzhin te/ dper na ri'i rgyal
157b2(dkon brtsegs): po ri rab kyi 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la/ de'ang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis sum khris su yongs su dkris te/ klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kyi dbug phyi nang /
157b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu bas rgya mtsho btung du mi rung bar 'gyur zhing / de gnyis kyi dbugs kyis ri rab kyang g.yo bar byed de/ de gnyis ji ltar dug che la spro ba che zhing yangs pa bzhin du/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang 'jog po gnyis
157b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dang 'dra'o/ / sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ de dag gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ sbrang bu'i yang gzhan no snyam nas/ de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/ sman chen 'di ltar rnam par shes
157b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de nyid sbrang bu'i yang yin la/ de nyid de dag go'ang yin no// dper na dug bad sa nA pa dang / ha la ha la'i thigs pa chung ngu'ang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa de dag
157b6(dkon brtsegs): gis zos na/ de dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa'i dug gang yin pa dang / bad sa nA bA dang / ha la ha la'i dug gi thigs
157b7(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de'i nang na ches mang ba gang yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyi dug ches mang bar blta bar bgyi ste/ bad sa nA bA dang / ha la ha la'i dug ni de lha ma
158a1(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de bzhin du lus chen po glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang
158a2(dkon brtsegs): chung zhing mi gsal la/ gzugs can ma yin par blta bar bya'o// rnam par shes pa de'ang las kyi rkyen gyis lus chen po mngon par 'grub par byed de/ dper na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i sa bon chung ngu las/
158a3(dkon brtsegs): shing gi rgyal po mtho zhing rgya che la/ yal ga dang / yal ga phre'u brgya stong gis rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ sa bon de'i tshad ni ji tsam/ shing de'i tshad ni ji tsam/
158a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yungs 'bru'i nang dang bar snang bzhin te/ khyad che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de bzhin du sa bon de'i nang na'ang shing mi snang
158a5(dkon brtsegs): la sa bon med na'ang shing skye ba mi dmigs te/ ji ltar sa bon phra mo las shing chen po skye ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa phra ba las gzugs chen po 'grub par 'gyur te/ lus
158a6(dkon brtsegs): la'ang rnam par shes pa mi dmigs la/ rnam par shes pa med na'ang lus skye ba mi dmigs so// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol
158a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i snying po lta bu'i rnam par shes pa des lus nyam chung ba rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na mi
158b1(dkon brtsegs): dbul po la la zhig gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed na/ des yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de blangs nas/ lha'i gnas dang / skyed mos tshal dang / skyed tshal dang / zhing dang
158b2(dkon brtsegs): ra ba dang / sgo khang dang / shing gel ba dang / 'khri shing sna tshogs kyis 'khor ba dang / khang pa me tog gis gtor ba dang / rdzas dang yo byad dag sprul na/ sman chen de dag thams cad ni mi
158b3(dkon brtsegs): brtan zhing nyam chung la myur du 'gyes shing 'jig pa'i chos can yin te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de mi de'i laganas stor na/ de'i bde ba'i longs spyod de dag kyang med par 'gyur ro//
158b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de rdo rje stong gis kyang mi phyed la/ de'i yo byad de dag 'jig pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rdo rje'i snying po'i rang bzhin
158b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu yin la/ lus gang yin pa de ni snying po med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams zhan pa des ji ltar gzugs mkhrang zhing sra ba phye ste 'pho zhing 'chi
158b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen dper na chu'i rgyun shin tu 'jam pa ri'i gseb na 'dug pas ri de nyid brtol te 'byung na/ sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems// de'i nang na
158b7(dkon brtsegs): ches sra ba gang yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ri ni rang bzhin gyis mkhrang la/ rdo rje ltar brtan zhing sra ba lags la/ chab ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing reg na bde ba lags so/
159a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis zhan pas/ lus chen po dag phye ste 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom
159a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ji ltar sems can gyi ris nas sems can shi 'phos te/ lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba len pa lags/ ji ltar sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongasu len pa lags/ bcom ldan
159a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sman chen de'i phyir nyon cig/ sems can de shi 'phos nas bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed kyis yongs su zin na/ lus yongs su btang nas/
159a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa des mi'i lta ba yongs su spangs te/ lha'i lta ba thob par 'gyur ro// de lha'i lta ba des 'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo // sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad
159a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang mthong ngo / / lus de'ang 'dar bar mthong ngo // lha rdzas kyi lha'i gnas dang / dga' tshal dang / 'dres tshal dang / me tog gi rna rgyan dang / shing ku she sha ya dang / ko ka na dang /
159a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang dang / tshal stug po dang / lha'i bu mo rtse bas bskor ba'ang mthong ngo // rtag tu me tog rgyas shing rnam par bkra bar byas pa'i lha'i longs spyod sdug gus mdzes par byas pa dang /
159a7(dkon brtsegs): se mo do dang / gdub zlum dang / gdub leb dang / dpung rgyan spa zhing spras pas brgyan pa de dag kyang des mthong ngo // lha gzhon nu dang / lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug cing yid rab tu dga' ba'ang
159b1(dkon brtsegs): des mthong ngo / / des de dag mthong nas kun tu chags pa skyed de/ de der kun tu chags pas dga' ba thob par 'gyur ro// dga' ba thob pas yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// de snying dga'
159b2(dkon brtsegs): bas de'i tshe lus kyi kha dog rgyas par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar bzhin gyi mdog pad+ma lta bur snang bar 'gyur zhing / lta ba phyin ci ma log par 'gyur ro// sna'ang yo bar mi 'gyur// de'i kha'ang mnam par
159b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du de'i mig ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra bar snang bar 'gyur/ de'i gnad rnams kyang chad par mi 'gyur/ de'i khrag kyang zag par mi 'gyur/ phyi sa'ang 'byung bar
159b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ de spu zing zhes byed par mi 'gyur/ de'i sen mo rnams kyang nag por mi 'gyur/ lag pa'ang ser por snang bar mi 'gyur/ rkang lag kyang g.yob par mi byed de/ rkang lag 'khum
159b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro/ / sman chen de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di ltar khang pa brtsegs pa ka ba brgya stong gis brgyan pa mthong
159b6(dkon brtsegs): ste lha'i dril bu ga yer ka'i dra ba sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang / lha'i me tog sna tshogs spel ba'i 'phreng ba shin tu dri zhim pa dag mthong ngo // lha gzhon nu rgyan dang / gser
159b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi mchog dang / se mo do dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan gyis mdzes par byas shing / lus brgyan pa dag kyang mthong ngo // des lha gzhon nu de dag mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba skye'o//
160a1(dkon brtsegs): de yid dga' bas khog pa la ltas gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ so me tog kun dadang ku mud ltar dkar bar snang ngo // mig ha cang yang mi 'dzums ha cang yang
160a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byed do/ / sgra snyan pa dag kyang 'byung ngo // de'i bzhin yang pad+ma lta bur snang bar 'gyur ro// shi ba'i khog pa'ang ha cang tsha bar yang mi 'gyur/ ha cang grang bar yang mi 'gyur ro//
160a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i gnyen sdug pa rnams kyang smre sngags chen po 'don par mi byed do// de nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// phyogs kyang mun par snang bar mi 'gyur ro// /
160a4(dkon brtsegs): de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs shin tu dri zhim zhing / shin tu yongs su dag pa tshor bar 'gyur ro// de'i mig kyang ser bar mi 'gyur/ de'i lta ba'ang phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin
160a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong na yid ches shing dad pa skye bar 'gyur/ gnyen sdug pa dag mthong na/ gzhig nas phyir 'ongs pa 'am/ ring mo zhig tu gud na 'dug 'dug pa bzhin du mgul
160a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'khyud cing yid rab tu dga' ste/ 'di skad du srid par skyes pa thams cad kyi tshul na 'di yin gyi/ dang dang bral ba'i phyir gdung ba ma byed par thong zhig ces/ des gnyen de dag yang
160a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do/ / sman chen gal te sems can bsod nams su nye bar 'gro bas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sbyin pa la sred cing yud tsam re re la tshigs bcad dang / tshigs su
160b1(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dang / gtam sna tshogs dang / gtam tshigs sna tshogs rjod cing smra la/ de'i tshe gnyid la'ang srid par mi 'gyur zhing / gnyid kyi dbang du'ang mi 'gro na/ bde ba thams cad dang
160b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ / de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha dang lha mo lhan cig tu khri gcig gi ste du 'dug la/ lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug pa de'i lag pa lha'i lag pa'i steng du gzhag cing /
160b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i lag pa gnyis las me tog dag kyang byung ste/ lha mo des me tog byung ba dag mthong nas/ lha de la 'di skad du/ lha gzhon nu skye ba'i dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis dgyes par mdzod cig ces zer ro//
160b4(dkon brtsegs): des kyang me tog rnams lag par mnye zhing phur bar byed do// des me tog de dag mnyes pas sems can de 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i rnam par shes pa des kyang dbang po rnam por zhing
160b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i spyod yul rnams btang ste/ / khams rnams yongs su btang nas/ khams kyi don yongs su blangs te/ mi gsal zhing gzugs can ma yin la/ rta zhon pa lta bu dang / nyi ma dang / me shel
160b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsreg bya lta bu dang / chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sbubs kyi nang gi rlung ltar dge ba la dmigs pa bsdus nas byung ste 'pho zhing 'gro'o// de yang de'i tshe me tog la brten nas/ pha ma
160b7(dkon brtsegs): khri gcig la 'dug cing phrad pas rnam par shes pa me tog de dag gi nang du 'dres par 'gyur ro/ / yang der bdud rtsi 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/ rlung des rnam par shes pa de zhag bdun lon pa dang
161a1(dkon brtsegs): lha gzhon nu rna cha ga dub kor dri ma med cing 'gul ba dang ldan pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol
161a2(dkon brtsegs): to/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis gzugs rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyid/ rkyen rnams la'ang ji ltar gda' bar 'gyur
161a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sman chen dper na rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan du med pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis lha'i gnas dang / ri dang / nags tshal la sogs pa 'jig rten
161a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams rnams 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par she ba 'di'i'ang rkyen gyi dbang gis gzugs rnams 'grub par byed do// sman chen gzhan yang shing 'dzings pa gnyis phan tshun phrad de
161a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig la gcig drul cing gtsubs pa las me 'grub par 'gyur te/ me de'ang shing gi nang na mi snang la/ shing med na'ang me 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ me de'ang rkyen gyi dbang gis shing las 'grub
161a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur gyi/ rkyen med par mi 'byung ngo // gzugs kyi dbang gis kyang shing gi nang na me mi snang la/ shing ma gtogs par yang me mi dmigs so// sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa de'ang pha
161a7(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dbang gis 'jug ste/ rnam par shes pa'ang lus kyi nang na mi dmigs la/ lus med par yang rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ngo // sman chen dper na me ma byung bar gzugs dang / dro ba dang kha
161b1(dkon brtsegs): dog gsal bar mi gnang ngo / / sman chen de bzhin du lus ma grub par rnam par shes pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams mi snang ngo // sman chen dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
161b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po gsal bar snang zhing gzi brjid kyis lam mer 'dug kyang / byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis nyi ma'i gzugs gnag gam/ gser ram/ dkar ram/ dmar ser du mi mthong ngo // sman
161b3(dkon brtsegs): chen de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / snom pa dang / ro myang ba dang / reg pa'i rnam pa dag gis rtogs par 'gyur gyi/ lus la rnam par shes pa gnag pa 'am/ dkar
161b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/ gzugs su snang bar mis mi mthong ngo // dper na nyi ma tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / 'gro ba dang / phyir yang 'char ba dag gi rtags las snang ba de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'ang rtags dag
161b5(dkon brtsegs): gis blta bar bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i rtags ji ltar blta bar bgyi/
161b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'du byed kyi rtags dang / tshor ba'i rtags dang // 'du shes kyi rtags dang / sems pa dang / mya ngan dang / gdung ba dang / yid mi bde ba ni rnam par shes pa'i
161b7(dkon brtsegs): rtags su blta'o/ / gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i bag chags 'di ltar dge bar nye bar 'gro ba'i sems dang / mi dge bar nye bar 'gro ba'i sem las blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
162a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar rnam par shes pa lus las byung ste myur du skye ba longasu len pa lags/ rnam par
162a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa lus las byung nas ma skyes shing yongs su ma bzung ba des ji lngar lus gzhan la gnas par bgyid/ rnam par shes pa 'di ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
162a3(dkon brtsegs): sman chen dper na mi la la lag pa ring zhing thur du brkyang la/ g.yul gyi go cha gyon te/ lha'i rta rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa la zhon nas g.yul du 'gro ste// de g.yul ngo der song nas/ mdung
162a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ral gri dang / mda' dag gis snying myos te/ g.yul ngor rta'i mchog de las sa la lhung la/ de'ang lus kyis 'phong rtsal yongs su sbyangs pa zhig ste myur ba myur bar sa las rta'i rgyab tu 'gong
162a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed na/ ji ltar mi de sdung nas rta la zhon pa dang / 'gong che bas ji ltar rta nye bar gnas pa la rta la 'gong ba dang / rta 'gro bzhin du 'gong ba chen po 'gong bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam par
162a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la'ang blta bar bya'o/ / ji ltar mi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs shing skrag nas rta zhon te 'bros pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa 'di thog ma shi 'phos nas lha'i dmigs pas
162a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zin cing / lha dang lha mo khri'i steng na 'jug pa mthong nas/ shin tu myur bar skye ba yongs su len to// sman chen gzhan yang dang po shi 'phos nas dadung ma skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam
162b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ji ltar blta bar bya zhes gang khyod kyis smras pa de ni/ dper na mi'i grib ma chu'i steng du bab pa gzugs su'ang snang mod kyi/ de gzugs su gtogs par yang blta bar mi bya'o// sman chen
162b2(dkon brtsegs): dper na rkang lag mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs chu'i steng du bab pa de la ni dro ba 'am/ grang ba 'am/ lus ngal bar 'gyur ba med cing / lus de la ni shi'i dum bu lta bu'ang med do// grib ma de la ni
162b3(dkon brtsegs): khams kyis klags pa'ang med do/ / mi'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du byung ba de las ni sdug bsngal ba'i sgra 'am/ bde ba'i sgra 'byung ba'ang med do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'phos nas//
162b4(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi khog pa bor te/ gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur ro// sman chen de ltar na rnam par shes pa bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongs su len par 'gyur ro// de skad/
162b5(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa sems can dmyal ba rnams su ji ltar skye ba yongs su len pa lags/
162b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen bsod nams ma yin pa nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can ji ltar sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongasu len pa de nyon cig/ sman chen 'di la sems
162b7(dkon brtsegs): can las mi dge bas yongs su zin pa de ni sems can gyi ras nas 'chi 'phos ste/ shi 'phos pa de 'di snyam du mi de ni nga nyid yin te/ sems can dmyal ba 'di nas shi 'phos so// 'di gnyis ni bdag gi pha
163a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no snyam du dran pa skye'o/ / shi 'phos pa de'i lus de ni thamal pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ spyan la su skyes pa rnams kyad de nga
163a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ja ba nyid du snang ngo / / dang po shi 'bos pa de mya ngan gyis g.yengs nas sems can dmyal pa sna tshogs snang ba mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa dang po ga 'phos pa dor las sems pa nad myal
163a3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'brel bar 'gyur te/ phyogs kha cig na ni sems can dmyal ba'i sa gzhi khrag gis gtor ba mthong nas/ dri der chags pa skyed par 'gyur ro// de chags par gyur nas sem can dmya' ba pa'i lus
163a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur te/ de'i rnam par shes pa de las rkyen gyi dbang gis chu'i rjen shul shin tu rul zhing mchog tu dri mi zhim pa mnam pa'i nang du lus skye ba yongs su len te/ dper na mi gtsang ba dang ldan sbyin
163a5(dkon brtsegs): mnam pa'i rkyen gyis srin du skye ba dang / dper na zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / chang mnam por gyur pa'i phyir srog chags skye bar 'gyur ro// sman chen de bzhin du sems can rnams sems can dmyal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
163a6(dkon brtsegs): deskad ces bka' stsal nas/ bzang skyong gis thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams
163a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi kha dog gi rnam pa ji lta bu lags/ lus kyi rnam pa ni ji lta bur 'grub par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong der khrag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni khrag gi
163b1(dkon brtsegs): mdog 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / chu klung rgal du med pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni sprin sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'gyur ro// ba tsha can gyi chu klung gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni sha gzi
163b2(dkon brtsegs): gur 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag gi lus ni rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu bde dgur rim gro byas pa ltar gzhon sha can du 'gyur ro// bzang skyong de na de dag lus bong che bar 'gyur te/ mgo bo gtogs
163b3(dkon brtsegs): par khru brgyad par 'gyur ro/ / sen mo ring zhing kha spu yod la spun por 'gyur zhing / rkang lag mi sdug par 'gyur te/ gal te 'dzam bu gling ba'i mi sems can dmyal ba pa'i mi la ltar 'gro na
163b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ma thag tu 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / bzang skyong gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kha zas za mod kyi/ de dag la bde bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med do//
163b5(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag kha zas ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
163b6(dkon brtsegs): sman chen sems can dmyal ba den de dag yongs su 'khyams la/ shin tu rgyang ring ba nas zangs dang ra gan dmar por snang ba mthong bar 'gyur te/ de dag mthong nas kha zas kyi tshig rjod par byed
163b7(dkon brtsegs): kha zas 'dod pa khyed tshur shog ces zer ro/ / de dag kun nas 'bungs te/ snyim pa bzed nas zangs dngar gan bskol ba ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas snyim pa bzed cing
164a1(dkon brtsegs): zangs dang ra gan bskol ba'i kha zas de dag 'dod pas kha bdangs te zangs dngar gan nga bar byed do/ / de dag zangs rang ra gan rab tu 'bar ba des su ru rung rab tu 'bar zhing
164a2(dkon brtsegs): khog pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / sman chen de dag kha zas 'dra bas bslus nas sdug bsngal shin tu che ba myong bar 'gyur ro// sman chen sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag gi rnam par shes pa de
164a3(dkon brtsegs): rus pa'i lus dag la gnas par 'gyur zhing / rus pa'i tshogs dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag rnam par shes pa dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi

164a5(dkon brtsegs): sa phyogs dag kyang yod par mthong ngo / / de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag mthong nas/ yid rab tu dga' ste/ 'di skad du grogs po dag skyed mos tshal 'di na reg na bde ba'i ser bu ldang ba yod kyis
164a6(dkon brtsegs): tshur shog ces zer te/ de dag 'dus nas myur ba myur bar skyed mos tshal de'i nang du 'gro'o// de dag de'i nang du song nas yud tsam zhig bde ba'i 'du shes skyed do// de dag gi shing de dag las byung ba'i me
164a7(dkon brtsegs): tog de dag dang lo ma de dag ral grir 'gyur te/ ral gri de dag gis de dag gi yan lag gcod cing gshog par byed de/ de dag ral gris bcad nas nyam thag pa'i sgra chen po 'byin par byed cing
164b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs phyogs su 'byer ro/ / de dag 'byer na yang rang gi las las byung ba'i gshin rje'i mi lag na sog ke dang tho ba thogs shing so dang bzhin bsgyur ba/ skra 'bar zhing lus 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas yoH/
164b2(dkon brtsegs): la mtshon cha gzas pa dag phyi bzhin du sgra 'byin cing 'di skad du khyed cag sdod cig da gar 'bros/ khyed rang gi las kyis bsgrub pa'i tshel 'di nyams su myong bar gyis shig ces zer te/ sman chen de lta na
164b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ / sman chen gzhan yang zhag bdun lon nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyis las nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ bung
164b4(dkon brtsegs): ba me tog la 'pho ba bzhin du dngos po sna tshogs kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis rnam par shes pa sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len to/ / de'ang dang po shi 'phos nas dbang med par khrid de/ sdug bsngal zhing
164b5(dkon brtsegs): yi de mi bde bar gyur nas/ mun pa mun nag chen por zhugs te/ mi rgod kyis khrid pa bzhin du 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi hud da ni bdag 'dzam bu gling rnam par bkra ba bor te/ gnyen sdug pa yongs su
164b6(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas sems can dmyal ba dag tu mngon du gnas par gyur cing 'dug cig gu/ da ni mtho ris kyi lam mi mthong ngo snyam mo// de yang dar gyi srin bu rgyud gcig gis dkris pa bzhin du shin tu myur bar skye ba
164b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su len te/ de yang bdag nyid kyi mgul nas zhags pas btags par shes so// bzang skyong de ltar na sems can dmyal bar sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur zhing / de ltar na de dag la rgyu'i bye
165a1(dkon brtsegs): thag dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bzang skyong sla bing zhes byed nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ngo // rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen gyis
165a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'di skad du/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pa 'dis na bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe log par ltung ba'i chos can du ma gyur cig/ bdag sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len par ma
165a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan 'das la bdag tu bzhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis

165a5(dkon brtsegs): ni gang lags/ 'pho ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong 'di la khams phrad pa'i phyir/ khams bzhi po dag gis lus 'grub par byed de/ shes rab
165a6(dkon brtsegs): dang lta ba dang / yid dang / ma rig pa dang / khams dang / spyod yul dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni bsags pa zhes bya'o// de la spungs pa ni khams drug po nyid dang / skye mched kyi spyod
165a7(dkon brtsegs): yul drug dang / khams kyi rang bzhin gsum dang / skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis dang / sgra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa

165b3(dkon brtsegs): khams drug po de dag gang zhe na/ de la sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya'o//
165b4(dkon brtsegs): skye mched drug gang zhe na/ 'di la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ces bya'o// skye mched kyi spyod yul drug gang zhe na/ 'di la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang /
165b5(dkon brtsegs): ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi skye mched ces bya ba ste/ de dag ni spyod yul drug yin no// de la khams kyi rang bzhin gsum gang zhe na/ 'di la 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces
165b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'o/ / de la de dag nyid kyi kun nas ldang ba gsum gang zhe na/ rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan rnams so// de la skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di la tshul khrims
165b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dad pa dang / gtong ba dang / nor dang / brtson 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba zhes bya'o// de la phung po zhes bya ba'i don gang zhe na/ 'di la tshor ba
166a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po rnams so// de la tshor ba ni
166a2(dkon brtsegs): myong ba'o/ / 'du shes ni shes pa'o// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'du byed rnams so// lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / snom pa dang / ro myang ba dang / reg bya rnams rig pa ni rnam par
166a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ste/ dngos po thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pas nA/ lus la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang / len pa dang 'thun pa yin no// de la 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims shin tu yong
166a4(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / lus dang ngag gi las kyi 'bras bu thob pa 'chi ba'i dus byed pa gang yin pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa des phung po rnams yongs su btang nas/ yang srid par mi skye zhing
166a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pas na/ shin tu bde bar 'pho zhing 'gro ste/ 'phos pa de'i phyir yang 'pho ba can ma yin pa de lta bu ni de'i 'pho bar 'gyur bar yin no// de nas bzang skyong dang sman
166a6(dkon brtsegs): chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ sems can rnams tshim par bgyid pa
166a7(dkon brtsegs): gang lags pa'i chos kyi tshogs 'di legs par gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di ni bcos ma ma yin te/ 'di'i rang
166b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas/ rig pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi snang ba 'di ni dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong du mas bsgrubs pa ste/ 'di ni ngas ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin no//
166b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi nyi ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid snang bar byed pa/ yon tan gyi grags pa rgyas par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i mdzod/ sems can rnams kyi rgyud 'dul bar
166b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ 'dul ba ston pa 'di yul gang na gnas sam/ de ston par 'gyur ba der ni mi ma yin pa rnams srung bar byed de/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams phyag bya ba'i phyir
166b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de la ni
166b5(dkon brtsegs): tshon gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ me'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chu dang / chom rkun gyi 'dzegs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur
166b6(dkon brtsegs): ro/ dge slong dag khyed kyis deng phan chad ma dad pa rnams la bshad par mi bya'o// klan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/ gcer bu pa rnams la ma yin/ gcer bu ba'i nyan thos
166b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ma yin/ gnas gzhan la zhugs pa la bshad par mi bya'o// mchis par yang bshad par mi bya'o// de bas na gal te la la 'khrul par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la

167b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen dang / tshong dpon bzang skyong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten

167b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po gnyis pa// bod skad du/ bu mo rnam dag dang bas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i

167b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad stong dang

168a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis brnyes pa'i chos rnams rab tu thob pa ga sdug la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin dang
