168b1(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa chen po'i mdzod ces bya ba seng ge'i gdan la 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor nas bzhugs pas/ nyi zla lta bu'i 'od zer gyis ni kun tu snang bar mdzad/ brgya
168b2(dkon brtsegs): byin dang tshangs pa'i rgyal po ltar gzi byin gyis khyad par du 'phags/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab lta bur shin tu mtho zhing / phal las ni mngon par 'phags par gyur/ sgron ma chen po lta bur
168b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer dag ni rab tu 'bar/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar phan tshun du ni gzigs par mdzad/ seng ge sgra sgrog pa ltar bsnyengs pa ma minga' bar ni chos ston par mdzad/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po
168b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra gcan zin ltar 'khor mang po rnams ni zil gyis mnan/ / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dag gis ni sku rab tu brgyan/ gzi byin dang mthu stobs dag ni rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/
168b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad ni nges pa'i don mchog la dgod cing khong du chud par mdzad pa'i phyir/ tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu bsgrags nas/
168b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor mang po'i dbus na chos ston par mdzad do// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo rnam dag dang ba zhes bya ba gzhon nu ma byang bzhin sdug cing mdzes pas/ sems can
168b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mthong bar mos pa/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa// theg pa chen po bsgoms pa zhig yod pa de bu mo gzhon nu ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ so so nas gser gyi 'phreng ba thogs
169a1(dkon brtsegs): nas grong khyer mnyan yod nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/ phyag byas ras lan gsum
169a2(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ yun ring bsod nams rnam dag 'phrin las bsags/ yon
169a3(dkon brtsegs): tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas yongs rdzogs shing / / mang po dang mos dga' bar mdzad pas na/ de slang thub mchog khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// gzi byin lham me ya mtshan rab ston cing //
169a4(dkon brtsegs): rin chen 'byung nas chos sgo ston par mdzad// sku yi 'od zer 'dom gang rtag gsal bas// blo chen bsil ba'i rdzi de la bdag phyag 'tshal// yon tan rdzogs shing bsod nams bas
169a5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal/ / mi mchog khyod la 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags// smon lam chen po tshul khrims yongs rdzogs pas// de slad mchod 'os gtso la bdag phyag 'tshal// chos mchog
169a6(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas rtag par zhi zhing dben/ / 'jig rten kun la thugs snyoms bu gcig bzhin// mkhyen pa dag gis spyod rnams rab mkhyen pas// 'dren mkhan bzhin du mnyam pa'i shul
169a7(dkon brtsegs): yang ston/ / rab brtan brtson 'grus ldan par mchis 'gyur na// byams dang thugs rjes sems can sman mdzad pas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang lags pa/
169b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas ni bshad du gsol// ji ltar rab brtan stobs ni thob gyur nas// 'khor bar gnas kyang bdud dpung bam 'gyid lags// ji ltar mnyam pa'i chos ni
169b2(dkon brtsegs): thob 'gyur zhing / / ji ltar sems can yongs su smin bgyid lags// ji ltar bgyis na sa gzhi nam mkha' dang // rlung dang chu me ji lta bzhin du 'gyur// ji ltar yid ches thob
169b3(dkon brtsegs): nas chos gnas shing / / ri rab seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du 'gyur// ji ltar byams sdang sems ni yongs spangs nas// sems gtsang drang la g.yo sgyu ma mchis 'gyur// ji ltar
169b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / / brtson 'grus bsam gtan rnam grol skye 'gyur zhing // shes rab nyon mongs mun pa rab bcom zhing // rtag par thabs chen la ni gnas pa dang //
169b5(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin gzungs la thogs pa ma mchis shing // tshad med bzhi dang mngon shes lnga la gnas// ji ltar sangs rgyas spyan sngar gnas gyur nas// rtag par rdzus te skye zhing tshe rabs
169b6(dkon brtsegs): dran sbyangs pas brtsod pa ma mchis dgon gnas nas/ / sems ni rab btul nyon mongs zhi bgyid dang // tshul khrims ldan zhing byang chub lam sgom dang // bdud rtsi 'gag thob bdud dpung
169b7(dkon brtsegs): 'joms pa dang / / bde stsol chos kyi 'khor lo skor 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i yang dag lam ni bkas bshad gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'ad kyis bu mo rnam dag dang ba la bka'
170a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na/ 'khor ba na gnas kyang rab tu brtan pa'i dpa' bor 'gyur zhing / yongasu ngal ba med
170a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / brgyad gang zhe na/ dang po ni sems kyi 'dun pa'i stobs te/ g.yo sgyu med pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni mos pa'i stobs te/ sdig pa rnams spong bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsum
170a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sbyor ba'i stobs te/ rtag tu dge ba sgrub pa'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni mngon par yid ches pa'i stobs te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa dag la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa'i phyir ro//
170a4(dkon brtsegs): lnga pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs te/ theg pa dma' ba rnams yongs su mi tshol ba'i phyir ro// drug pa ni byams pa chen po'i stobs te/ sems can la gnod pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro//
170a5(dkon brtsegs): bdun pa ni snying rje chen po'i stobs te/ gnod par byas pa rnams dang du len pa'i phyir ro// brgyad pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi stobs te/ dus dus su sad par byed pa'i phyir ro// bu mo 'di
170a6(dkon brtsegs): ni stobs rnam pa brgyad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ rab tu brtan pa'i dpa' bor 'gyur bas/ 'khor ba na gnas kyang mngon par zhen
170a7(dkon brtsegs): cing chags pa med par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can 'dun pa gang yin pa// g.yo sgyu dag ni spong byed cing /
170b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag par drang por spyod pas na// yang dag byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// mos pa'i stobs ni gang yin pa// nyes pa mang po spong byed cing // dge ba 'ba' zhig spyod pas na// yang dag brtson
170b2(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par 'gyur/ / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs gyur pa// rtag tu legs par rab brten nas// brtson 'grus brtan par gyur pas na// sems can rnams ni bde bar byed// mngon par
170b3(dkon brtsegs): yid ches stobs dbang gis/ / las kyi rnam smin rig pas na// sangs rgyas ye shes yid ches shing // 'jig rten yongs su sdud par 'gyur// byang chub sems stobs gang yin des//
170b4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa dma' ba spong byed cing // sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod pas// chos nyid la ni gnas par 'gyur// byams chen stobs kyi dbang gis ni// sems can snyoms par lta byed cing //
170b5(dkon brtsegs): byams sdang dag ni med pas na// zhe sdang gnod pa skyed mi 'gyur// snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis ni// sems can dang du len byed cing // 'khor ba dag la zhen med cing // yongs su skyo zhing
170b6(dkon brtsegs): ngal ba med/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen stobs kyis ni// rtag par phan tshun bde byed cing // sems ni bying bar mi 'gyur bas// byang chub la ni gnas par 'gyur// dpa' bo gang yin de dag
170b7(dkon brtsegs): gis stobs brgyad 'di dag thob gyur nas/ / byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni// bdud dpung mang po bcom par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos
171a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na/ mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ dang po ni sems can thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste// rang
171a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis bdag med pa'i phyir ro/ / gnyis pa ni chos thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ chos thams cad rab tu dben pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni zhing thams cad mnyam par gyur pa
171a3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ stong pa nyid kyi khams su 'jug pa'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni shes pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ stong pa nyid du ston pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa ni spyod pa thams cad mnyam par gyur
171a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro// drug pa ni theg pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ 'dus ma byas su mtshungs pa'i phyir ro// bdun pa ni sems mnyam par gyur pa
171a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ sems sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro// brgyad pa ni bdud rnams mnyam par gyur pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i thibs po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 'di ni chos rnam pa brgyad kyis
171a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can rang bzhin bdag med pas/ skad cig
171a7(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang dmigs mi 'gyur/ / mnyam pa nyid la gang gnas pa// de lta bur ni bstan par bya// chos rnams thams cad mnyam pas na// rang bzhin rtag par stong zhing dben/
171b1(dkon brtsegs): ges tha dad phye bar zad// chos rnams rang bzhin bye brag med// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kun// mu mtha' dag ni mi dmigs pas// de yi rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra/
171b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing ni rtag tu mnyam// dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa kun// chos dbyings gnas par mnyam pas na// ye shes mtha' yas rnam par grol// sangs
171b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kun kyang de bzhin ni/ / sems can rang bzhin rgyu rkyen rnams// thams cad kun kyang mnyam pa dang // de yi spyod par rab shes pas// ci rigs par ni go bar byed//
171b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can ji snyed tha dad pa// sgyu 'phrul lta bur rab tu rtogs// phyi nang gnyis ka len med pas// rab bzhin rtag tu rnam par dag/ theg pa sna tshogs rab bshad kyang // 'dus ma
171b5(dkon brtsegs): byas su rab tu mnyam/ / 'dzin pas thabs ni rab mkhyen pas// rnam par phye ste theg gsum bshad// nyon mongs bdud la rab gnas kyang // nyon mongs dngos po ci yang
171b6(dkon brtsegs): med lha dang phung po 'chi bdag bdud/ / spyod yul thams cad stong pa yin// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byams sdang rnams yongs su
171b7(dkon brtsegs): spong bar byed do/ / brgyad gang zhe na/ byams pa dang ldan pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / rtag par phan 'dogs par byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos la ma chags pa dang / rang gi
172a1(dkon brtsegs): lus la chags pa med pa dang / rtag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sems sgom pa dang / lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba dang / nyon mongs pa rnams la so sor rtog pa ste/
172a2(dkon brtsegs): chos brgyad po 'di dag mngon par sgrub par nus na/ byams sdang yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang chibs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byam
172a3(dkon brtsegs): sems go cha rab 'gos nas/ / thams cad kun la snying brtse zhing // mnyam pa'i sems la gang gnas pa// byams sdang sems ni skye mi 'gyur// blo ldan phan 'dogs spyod pa na// rtag par
172a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la bde ba gtong / / rnyed pa thob kyang rang mi mthong // brnyas shing smad kyang kho na 'dzin med// rlung brgyad kyis ni mi bskyed pas// byams sdang dag ni mi skye zhing // bdag gam gal
172a5(dkon brtsegs): te gzhan yang rung / / byams sdang 'du shes yongs mi skye// 'du shes dag ni rab spangs nas// spyod yul dag la zhen pa med// rtag par rang gi lus rtogs pas// lus srog dag la
172a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs pa med/ / mkhas rnams sdug bsngal bde ba yis// g.yos par mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin// nyon mongs legs par rtogs byed na// bdag dang bdag gi gnyis ka spong //
172a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod 'dzin rtag par sa 'dra bas// byams sdang dag ni yongs mi skye// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ 'khor bas yongs su ngal bar mi 'gyur ro//
172b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs shing rgya che ba'i phyir dang / sems can la so sor rtog par byed pa'i phyir dang / rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong zhing mchod pa byed pa'i phyir
172b2(dkon brtsegs): dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams mthong ba'i phyir dang / rtag par sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir dang / 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dang
172b3(dkon brtsegs): chos khyad par can dag la zhum pa med pa'i phyir dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
172b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor lam ni gang sgom pa// dge sbyong skyon 'phan dri ma med// bar snang rnam dag zla ba bzhin// sdug bsngal sems can sgrol bar byed//
172b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// 'khor bar yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// sems can rang bzhin rtog med cing // rab brtan brtson 'grus spyod par byed// sangs rgyas zhing ni tshad med dang //
172b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams ni gus mchod pas// de phyir stobs bcu gang ldan pa// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// 'jig rten tshad med dpag tu med// bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // /
172b7(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum gdung mi gcod pas// chos rgyal nyid du mngon 'tshang rgya// tshul khrims dam por gang srung ba// 'khor bas ngal bar mi 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gang
173a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ / rmi lam sprin dang glog ltar shes// chos las gang zhig rnam grol ba// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// byang chub la ni rab gnas shing // dga'
173a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems kyis rtag tu bde/ / thabs kyi pha rol gang yin pa// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// rtag par dam chos sgrub pa yang // bar snang zla bzhin 'phel bar 'gyur/
173a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yon tan gang mos pas// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// 'khor ba mu mtha' med gyur kyang // rtag par yang dag mtha' la gnas// yud tsam shes rab rjes
173a4(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa/ / 'khor ba dag gis ngal mi 'gyur// gzhan yang bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan na// sems kyi khams mnyam par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na// sems
173a5(dkon brtsegs): sa dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems chu dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems me dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems rlung dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang /
173a6(dkon brtsegs): sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems rnam par grol ba dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang
173a7(dkon brtsegs): sems mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni sems kyi khams mnyam pa nyid rnam pa brgyad ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs
173b1(dkon brtsegs): su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems ni sa dang mtshungs pas na// thams cad khur du khyer bar byed// dge ba dang ni sdig pa'ang rung // 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa'ang med// sems
173b2(dkon brtsegs): ni chu dang mtshungs pas na/ / dri ma mi gtsang 'khru byed cing // 'jig rten rnams ni gso ba dang // nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar byed// sems ni me dang mtshungs pas na// nyon mongs dag
173b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sreg byed cing / / sgron ma chen po snang ba yis// gsal bar mi byed gang yang med// sems ni rlung dang mtshungs pas na// gnas pa med cing rten med par// tshul khrims thos pa'i dri/
173b4(dkon brtsegs): yis ni// dus gsum kun tu khyab par byed// sems ni mkha' dang mtshungs pas na// lta ba spong zhing rnam par dag/ thams cad kun tu 'jug byed cing // bdud kyi rjes su 'brang mi byed
173b5(dkon brtsegs): sems ni chos dbyings mtshungs pas na/ / bde ba nyid du rab gnas shing // 'phel ba med cing 'grib med par// rtag par mnyam pa nyid la 'jug/ nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal gyi// rnam
173b6(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba thob gyur kyang / / 'ching ba dag kyang yod min la// grol ba dag kyang yod pa min// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// 'ong ba med cing 'gro med ces// rab dben nyer zhi gnas nas
173b7(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum kun tu 'gro bar byed/ gzhan yang bu mo chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub kyi 'byung gnas su 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/
174a1(dkon brtsegs): dang po ni sbyin pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ ci bdog pa rnams yongs su gtong ba'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni tshul khrims 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ nyams
174a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsum pa ni bzod pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te// zhe sdang med pa'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni brtson 'grus 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ le lo med cing nur ba med pa'i
174a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ / lnga pa ni bsam gtan 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// drug pa ni shes rab 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ tshul khrims srung zhing mang du thos pa dang
174a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i phyir ro/ / bdun pa ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ rnam par grol bas nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir ro// brgyad pa ni mngon par shes pa 'byung gnas
174a5(dkon brtsegs): su gyur pa yin te/ / rtag par mnyam par bzhag pa la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtag par sbyin
174a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gtong ba/ / 'dod chags gdung ba spong bas na// 'bras bu rnam smin mi re bar// sangs rgyas byang chub sngo bar byed// khrims ldan theg pa chen po'i phyir// bcad cing gtungs
174a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang khong khro med/ / rtse gcig bde chen gnyer byed cing // bag chags spangs nas 'gog mngon byed// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus can// bskal mang sems can ched du ni//
174b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bzod cing 'jig rten rgya// brtson 'grus stobs ni 'phel bar byed// bsam gtan dag ni gang sgom pa// spros pa rnams ni spong byed cing // bsam gtan pha rol phyin
174b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang / / bsam gtan rjes su yongs mi skye// shes rab chen po mtshungs med pas// mthar lha rnams ni spong byed cing // 'jig rten stong dben rig pas na// gti mug
174b3(dkon brtsegs): mun pa ma lus sel/ / nyer zhi tshangs gnas gang sgom pa// ngan song rnams ni spangs pas na// rtag par brgya byin tshangs par 'gyur// don gyis phan pa nan tan bsgoms//
174b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon shes sangs rgyas zhing rgyu ba// sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur chos kyang nyan// rang bzhin mos pa rab shes pas// chos bshad sems can zlos par byed// gzhan
174b5(dkon brtsegs): yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ gzungs dang thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ chos la bla mar byed pa'i phyir dang /
174b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po dang / slob dpon la rim gro byed pa'i phyir dang / chos yongs su gnyer ba la skyo ba med pa'i phyir dang / ji skad thos pa bzhin du yang dag par ston par byed pa'i phyir dang / chos la
174b7(dkon brtsegs): ser sna mi byed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa sgrogs par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / chos smra ba dag la mkhan po bzhin du gus pas sri zhu byed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi mthong zhing nyes pa spang bar
175a1(dkon brtsegs): skul bar byed pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na// gzungs dang thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba
175a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// rtse gcig rtag tu chos gnyer ba// mkhan po dge bshes rim gro byed// sdig pa'i grogs po spong
175a3(dkon brtsegs): bas na/ / mi zad gter 'dzin thob par 'gyur// mang thos yongs su skyo med pa// rab brtson chos ni gnyer bar byed// ji skad thos bzhin ston byed pas// rnyed pa dag la re tshol med// spobs
175a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam dag gang thob pa/ / 'khor mang dga' bar byed pas na// chos sbyin pa la rab mos shing // ser sna phrag dog spong bar byed// chos spyod mngon par zhen med cing // gzugs ni gang
175a5(dkon brtsegs): zhog thob gyur pa/ / khrims srung rang lus lta bas na// gzhan gyi nyes skyon yongs mi tshol// byams dang snying rje gnas gyur cing // dus min tshig ni mi smra bas// thogs med
175a6(dkon brtsegs): spongs pa thob gyur nas/ / spro tshig pha rol phyin pa ston// chos ni legs par smra ba la// mkhan po bzhin du gus par byed// skyon 'chab nyes pa spong bskul bas// mi zad kun
175a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin rgya mtsho 'thob/ / gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro//
175b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ srog la bab par gyur na'ang gzhan gyi nyes pa mi rjod pa dang / sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar skul ba dang / thams cad byang chub sem la 'god
175b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gos pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag byas nas pad+mo'i gdan la 'jog pa dang / sems can mya ngan byed pa dag gi mya ngan sel bar
175b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / khengs shing nga rgyal byed pa dag gi mdun du rtag par bdag nyid dman par byed pa dang / gzhan la 'tshe bar mi byed pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
175b4(dkon brtsegs): yang tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gal te sdug bsngal gzir gyur kyang // nam yang gzhan gyi skyon mi smra// rtag par dkon mchog gang bsngags pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar
175b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzus te skye/ byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyer bskul nas// rtag tu tshangs par gang spyod pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye// gser gyis
175b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gzugs brgyan te/ / rin chen pad+ma'i gdan la bzhag/ sems can mya ngan gang sel ba// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye// nga rgyal byed pa de dag la// slob ma
175b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bdag dman zhing / / gzhan la gang zhig mi 'tshe ba// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdzus te skye// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan par gyur na
176a1(dkon brtsegs): spungs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing / rtag par dgon pa na gnas par mos par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / cho ga shes
176a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / dge bas bdag nyid gso bar byed pa dang / rtag par 'phags pa'i rigs yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes
176a3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs mthong bas sems la rtag par skyo ba dang / rtag par mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par lta ba dang / dad pa shin tu brtan zhing gzhan
176a4(dkon brtsegs): dring la mi 'jog pa gang yin pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pas// chos dga' dge mang
176a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid gso/ / rtag par 'phags rigs sgrub la mos// 'khor ba'i skyon mthong sems la skrag/ spangs pa dag la rtag mos pas// bse ru gcig ltar grogs kyang med// 'dus
176a6(dkon brtsegs): byas sdug bsngal bdag med ces/ / blo yis rab dang brtson 'grus gnas// chos mthong gzhan byi rjes mi 'brang // rtag par dben gnas sangs rgyas bsngags// sbyangs pas thag bsrings
176a7(dkon brtsegs): gdung ba med/ / rtsod smras nyes dmigs mang po med// nye bshes yongs spangs bsngags pa rjod// des na dgon par gnas la mos// gzhan yang bu mo byang chub
176b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ bdud kyi dpung rab tu pham par byed de// brgyad gang zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la zhugs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la mngon par
176b2(dkon brtsegs): yid ches pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par yid ches pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par rab tu shes pa dang / de la the tshom dang som nyi med pa dang / skye ba med par rab tu bzod
176b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ngo bo nyid med par rab tu rtogs pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas chos thams cad la so sor rtog cing / de bzhin nyid 'jig par mi byed pa gang yin pa'o// de nas
176b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ / stong dang mtshan ma med dang smon med pa// rnam thar gsum thob bdud dpung rab tu 'joms// 'dus byas 'dus min mtshan nyid
176b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med/ / skye med thob pas rnam par grol bar 'gyur// chos rnams skye med de ltar gang bzod pa// de dag bdud dpung rab tu pham par byed// skye ba med dang 'gag med 'di dag dang /
176b6(dkon brtsegs): phung po khams la bdag med sgyu ma 'dra// chos la ngo bo nyid med nges rtogs shing // de bzhin nyid ni mi 'jigs thabs mkhas pas// chos rnams bdud kyi las zhes gang byed pa// rnam
176b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog spangs nas bdud ni pham par byed/ / thabs dang shes rab gnyis ka rab spyod cing // yod dang stong la gnas pa med par ni// de ltar chos mchog gang zhig sgom byed pa// thabs mkhas
177a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs lus mdzes pa thob par 'gyur/ / gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ byang chub dang nam yang
177a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta bas log par lta ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pas log par sems pa'i sems can la
177a3(dkon brtsegs): snying brtse bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag gis log par smra ba rnams la snying brtse bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mthas log pa'i las can rnams yongs su sdud pa dang
177a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i rtsol bas log par rtsol ba yongs su zlog pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho bas log pas 'tsho ba'i sems can rnams spong bar mi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pas log par
177a5(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa spong bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis log pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dag bslang nas/ gong du rtsol du gzhug pa gang yin pa'o// de
177a6(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ yang dag lha dang gang ldan pa// log lha de dag smin par byed// rtag par yang dag dran sgom pa// log sems dag la
177a7(dkon brtsegs): brtse bar byed/ / rnam dag yang dag ngag gis ni// log smra rnams la brtse bar byed// yang dag las mtha' gnas pa yis// log pa'i las can sdud par byed// rtag par yang dag rtsol
177b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms nas/ / log brtson dag ni sprod mi byed// yang dag 'tsho bas rjes mthun pas// log 'tsho gang yin sdud par byed// blo ldan yang dag rtog pa yis// log par yid byed
177b2(dkon brtsegs): brtse bar sems/ / yang dag ting 'dzin rtag gnas nas// log pa'i ting 'dzin sdud par byed// bla med yang dag lam brgyad kyis// chu bo dag las bde bar sgrol// rgyun
177b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs ded pa zlog byed pas/ / de ni byang chub lam chen yin// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams// rtswa yi gzings bzhin bdag nyid zlos// byang chub sems dpa' kun zlos pas//
177b4(dkon brtsegs): dper na gru chen 'dren mkhan 'dra/ gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ bdud rtsi'i lam mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// brgyad
177b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ rtsod pa med pa'i chos la gnas pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i sems legs par rab tu srung bar byed pa dang / rtag par de kho na nyid kyi don la lta bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi
177b6(dkon brtsegs): sems la rab tu gnas nas rjes su dran pa drug sgom par byed pa dang / nan tan brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sgom par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags nas sems can yongs su smin
177b7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang / snying rje chen po la gnas nas yang dag pa'i chos yongs su sdud par byed pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas pa gang yin pa'o//
178a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtag par rtsod med spyod bsgrubs nas// dge sbyong chen po chos la gnas// zhe sdang nyes pa yongs
178a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par byed// yang dag don ni rab lta bas// mi zad spobs rnams thob par byed// byang chub sems la rab gnas nas// rtag par dran byed rjes su dras
178a3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol phyin pa thams cad kun/ / rab brtson bsgrubs pas log pa med// thabs mkhas stobs rnams thob pa nas// des ni sems can sgrol bar byed// chos kyi mnga' bdag nor gyis ni//
178a4(dkon brtsegs): brtse sems thams cad kun sbyin pas// myur du mi skye bzod thob nas// byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur// gal te de ltar spyod nus na// sangs rgyas chos ni thob mi dka'// ring por mi
178a5(dkon brtsegs): thogs bdud btul nas/ / byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// de nas bu mo des chos de lta bu thos nas dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
178a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos rnam pa du dang ldan par gyur na/ bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan par
178a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ phrag dog mi byed pa dang / ser sna mi byed pa dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang / khong khro ba med pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / ngag
178b1(dkon brtsegs): rtsub po mi smra ba dang / 'dod chags spangs pa dang / log par lta ba rnams spangs pa gang yin pa ste/ bu mo chos brgyad po de dag mngon par bsgrubs na/ myur du bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par
178b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang phrag dog mi byed cing // ser sna spangs nas chos mos pa// g.yo sgyu dag ni
178b3(dkon brtsegs): mi spyod cing / / bud med lus la skyo ba dang // byams sems zhe sdang rab spangs nas// rtag par bden tshig smra ba dang // 'dod bsal ngag rtsub spangs nas ni// yang dag lta la gnas par
178b4(dkon brtsegs): bya/ gang gis bud med lus skyo nas// 'di 'dra'i chos ni sgrub byed na// myur du bud med dngos spangs nas// skyes pa'i lus bzang len par 'gyur// gzhan yang
178b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan par gyur na/ bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la bla mar byed cing chos la shin tu mos pa dang / tshul khrims dang /
178b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang / mang du thos pa dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed pa dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khyim gyi dngos po dag la mngon par zhen cing
178b7(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med pa dang / bslab pa'i dngos po yang dag par blangs pa rnams 'jig par mi byed pa dang / srog chags thams cad la log pa'i bsam pa mi skyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas
179a1(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi dngos po la yongs su skyo bar gyur pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyis skyes bu chen pa'i chos la gnas pa dang // 'jig rten pa'i khyim gyi so chos rnams la sgyu ma
179a2(dkon brtsegs): dang rmi lam lta bur lta ba gang yin pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas rab gus chos la mos// tshul khrims mang thos bla
179a3(dkon brtsegs): mar byed/ / 'dod chags sred sems mi skyed na// bud med dngos po myur du spong // khrims srung ngo tsha khrel yod ldan// gzhan la mi bden bsam mi byed// byang chub sems la rab gnas
179a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / theg pa gzhan la mos byed na// des ni myur ba kho nar yang // mi gtsang bud med dngos po spong // bsam pa mchog gis sems skyo nas// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /
179a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams rang bzhin g.yo med dang // rgyu rkyen rang bzhin stong dben zhes// nan tan yang dag chos bsgoms na// myur du skyes pa'i lus thob 'gyur// de nas bu mo rnamangs
179a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bas gser gyi 'breng ba thogs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la gtor ba dang / steng gi bar snang la gser gyi gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dag tu gyur nas/ gzhal med khang de dag
179a7(dkon brtsegs): ginang na sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi gdan la bzhugs pa sha stag byung bar gyur to/ / de nas bu mo lnga bcu po de dag gis kyang so so nas rgyan rnams bkrol nas/ bcom
179b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ba dang / steng gi bar snang la gser gyi gzhal med khang dang / rin po che'i gur dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur to//
179b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong ba dang / skad mthun par tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bcom ldan mi mchog khyad par 'phags pas na// thugs rjes
179b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la sman par mdzad/ / bdag cag deng ni byang chub sems bskyed nas// mos pa rjes mthun rab tu 'dul la gnas// bcom ldan 'dren pa de bar rab stsal nas// bdag
179b4(dkon brtsegs): cag mi mchog la ni mchod par bgyi/ / chos thos dbang gis rdul rnams rab spangs pas// bdag cag the tshom nem nur yongs ma mchis// des na bud med nyon mongs mang spangs nas//
179b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs gtan bcom bdud ni pham par bgyis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba tshad med rnams// bdag cag dga' bas rtag tu mchod par 'tshal// sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson
179b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus rab gnas nas/ / bzod dang bsam gtan sems ni rab tu bgyi// thabs dang shes rab sems can yongs bsdus nas// byang chub mchog lam gang lags mngon du bgyi//
179b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khor ni tshad med sman bdags nas// thams cad theg chen sems ni bskyed par skul// bdag cag seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs par 'gyur// bdag cag lha mi'i ston pa bgyid par mchi//
180a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ni nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa na/ 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang
180a2(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / dngul dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med dpag
180a3(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug tu thim par
180a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di
180a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu bstan par mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo rnam dag dang ba 'di mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ mthong lags so// bcom
180a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo bu mo rnam dag dang ba la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po 'di dag ni 'di nas tshe zad pa dang / bud med kyi lus spangs nas/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su
180a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa dang / bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bkur sti dang / rim gro dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur bas/ bu mo rnam dag
180b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ba bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi 'od ces bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
180b2(dkon brtsegs): zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa'i ming ni rtag tu snang ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ni dga' ldan gyi lha bzhin du tshe lo stong phrag bcu gnyis thub par
180b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi 'khor tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gis 'khor byed par 'gyur ro// bu mo lnga brgya po 'di dag
180b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'khor de dag gi nang na gtso bo mchog byed par 'gyur te/ ji ltar da ltar nga'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa drug cu po 'di dag gtso bor gyur pa bzhin no// kun dga' bo bud
180b5(dkon brtsegs): med gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas yongs su 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed/ kha ton du 'don par byed na/ bud med kyi lus 'di gtugs nas/ phyis yang len par
180b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
180b7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo rnam dag dang ba la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu
181a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' nas mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ rnam dag dngabs zhus pa'i le'u
181a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa bzhi bcu pa rdzogs so/ / // lo tsa ba 'gos chos grub kyis rgya nag gi dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// /
181a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai tre ya pri ts+tsha ba ri brta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po
181a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul brge na/ chu srin byis pa gsod
181a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i ri la 'jigs su rung ba'i nags ri dgas kyi gnas na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa/ gnas brtan nyan thos chen po sha stag la
181a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan dang / tshe dang
181a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dri ma med pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba grang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas mgo dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa
181b1(dkon brtsegs): chu klung 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa byin pa 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang
181b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa blo gros bzang dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ri rgyal dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa
181b3(dkon brtsegs): nye dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// byams pa
181b4(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa khri dang yang thabs cig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang / byang chub
181b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' blo gros bzang dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan dang / blo gros yangs pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob
181b6(dkon brtsegs): dang me tog dpal dang / 'jam dpal dang / mngon par shes pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa dang / dmigs pa med pa yid la byed pa dang / dad ldan dang / rin po che tog dang
181b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i lha dang / chu lha dang / sgra dbyangs snyan dang / zhing rnam par sbyong dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang po'i dpal dang / sa 'dzin
182a1(dkon brtsegs): dang sems can dmyal bsnyems dang / ngan song spong dang // rin chen ze ba can dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig ste/ de nas
182a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par
182a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur te 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
182a4(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus
182a5(dkon brtsegs): nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga'
182a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig zhu'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa dri ba lung bstan
182a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes// byams pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas
182b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong
182b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung bar mi 'gyur la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa lags/ de skad ces
182b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod ni 'di ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par
182b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ tshe rabs dran pa/ spobs pa thob pa/ yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa ste/ byams pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang //
182b5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg
182b6(dkon brtsegs): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo da ltar gyi deng ma 'ongs pa rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs nas/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs
182b7(dkon brtsegs): so/ byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes
183a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig dang ldan na
183a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ chos gcig gang zhe
183a3(dkon brtsegs): na'adi lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig po de dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig
183a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems
183a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos gnyis dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
183a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas yongs su tshol ba dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad
183a7(dkon brtsegs): spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang
183b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos gsum dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
183b2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po thob pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi chos nges par sems pa dang / des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste
183b3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
183b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs
183b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims la gnas pa yin/ chos
183b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la som nyi med pa yin/ dge ba'i chos la mngon par dga' ba yin/ yang dag par zhugs shing / yang dag par blangs pa las mi g.yo ba yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems
183b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing // sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
184a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya'o/ / byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chog lnga dang ldan na/ dran song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro
184a2(dkon brtsegs): la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya / lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / gzhan dag gi 'khrul pa'i
184a3(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba dang / bdag la rtog pa dang / chos la mngon par dka' ba dang / gzhan la phan 'dogs par zhugs pa yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/

184a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos drug dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ byur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
184a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brkas pa med pa yin/ sdang ba med pa yin/ rmongs pa med pa yin/ dris ma thag tu yang dag pa
184a7(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin du lan ldon pa yin/ bsnyen par dka' ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid spyod yul ba yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos drug po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams
184b1(dkon brtsegs): chang thong zhing sdig pa'i thogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan/
184b2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bdun dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
184b3(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa la mkhas pa yin/ chos la mkhas pa yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ dga' ba
184b4(dkon brtsegs): thob pa yin/ shin tu sbyangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa yin/ shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bdun
184b5(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

184b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba can yin/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa can yin/ yang
185a1(dkon brtsegs): @#dag pa'i ngag can yin/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' can yin/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba can yin/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba can yin/ yang dag pa'i rlan pa can yin//
185a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin can yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams can thong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'grol/ sbyar/
185a3(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos dgu dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong
185a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams
185a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i
185a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so// rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang rab tu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa
185a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so// dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang
185b1(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa de/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan
185b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ / bde ba'ang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas/ bde ba'ang ma yin// sdug bsngal
185b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te
185b4(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs de gnas
185b5(dkon brtsegs): so/ rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs
185b6(dkon brtsegs): te gnas so/ / rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so//
185b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad du ci'i nga med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes
186a1(dkon brtsegs): med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos dgu/
186a2(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
186a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya'o/ / byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa
186a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la
186a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ rlabs kyis 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ rnam par snang byed kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ kun nas snang ba'i
186a6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ kun tu gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin// rin chen zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ zla ba blon ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i
186a7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin te// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing
186b1(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro ya/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
186b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pa tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
186b3(dkon brtsegs): lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// sngon
186b4(dkon brtsegs): chad sbyin pa sbyin mdzad pa/ / sdug pa'i bu dang zas skom dang // mgo dang mig kyang btang mdzad de// sangs rgyas sbyin kun pha rol phyin// g.yag rnga bzhin du yun ring nas// khyod
186b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshul khrims ma nyams bsrungs/ / khrims kyis khyod 'dra ma mchis te// sangs rgyas khrims legs pha rol phyin// bzod pa'i stobs ni bskyed mdzad nas// byis pas nongs pa
186b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa bzod/ / bzod pa'i stobs rnams kun dang ldan// sangs rgyas bzod legs pha rol phyin// brtson 'grus stobs ni bskyed mdzad nas// zhi bde bla na med pa brnyes//
186b7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus stobs kyi stobs dang ldan// sangs rgyas brtson legs pha rol phyin// sdig pa thams cad bsreg mdzad nas// 'dren pa skyes chen bsam gtan dgyes/ bsam
187a1(dkon brtsegs): gtan stobs kyis stobs dang ldan/ / sangs rgyas bsam legs pha rol phyin// chos rnams de dag rang bzhin stong // ngo bo nyid kyis gang mi skye// shes rab
187a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni pha rol gshegs/ / sangs rgyas shes legs pha rol phyin// mkhyen chen byang chub shing drung du// sder bcas bdud ni khyod kyis gtul// don gyi mchog kyang brnyes par
187a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ / sangs rgyas bdud kyi tshogs ngan 'joms// skyes chen wA rA NA sir ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// mu stegs tshogs ngan skrag par mdzad// sangs rgyas mu stekra
187a4(dkon brtsegs): can tshogs 'joms/ / shes rab chen po bla na med// kun nas zla dpe yongs ma mchis// dkon mchog chos de ston par mdzad// 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od mdzad lags// sbyin pa
187a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ni khrims stobs dang / / bzod brtson khyod dang 'dra ma mchis// kun gyi pha rol phyin par gyur// sangs rgyas yon tan mang pos 'phags// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem
187a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan
187a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di/ 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs
187b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'di ltar shin tu rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang / 'di ltar tshig dang yi ge mtshungs pa'i chos ston pa dang / 'di ltar zab mo'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang / 'di ltar
187b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par 'brel ba'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang / dran pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// dza
187b3(dkon brtsegs): skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa
187b4(dkon brtsegs): nas rjes su dran pa'i tshig gi bar gyis chos ston pa ni ngo mtshar to/ / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni da ltar nga la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par
187b5(dkon brtsegs): bstod par yang ma zad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa bcur tshang bar gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
187b6(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa
187b7(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya ba gzugs
188a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/ grong bar du phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshes
188a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa mdzes pa/ dad par bya ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas

188a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis sku legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po de dag gis sku legs par spras pa/ shing sa la'i rgyal po me tog shin tu rgyas pa 'dra ba/
188a5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ zhal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar zhi ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ba/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng ga
188a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'od 'bar ba'i skus dpal chen po 'bar ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur to// de sems dang nas 'di snyam du sems te/ a la la de
188a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di rnam par spras shing / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / mtshan rnams kyis 'bar zhing lham me/ lhan ne/ lgang nge ba ngo mtshar to snyam mo//

188b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par she ba des/ bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ga la ba der gshegs te/ bram
188b6(dkon brtsegs): ze'i khye'u bzang dag la zhabs kyis reg par mdzad do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des/ bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag la zhabs kyis
188b7(dkon brtsegs): reg par mdzad ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa sa
189a1(dkon brtsegs): snam logs su zigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed gang gis kyang bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag de'i lus la rkang pas pa rdzi zhig/ de ci'i/
189a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas de nyid kyi tshe bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gis lha'i mig dang
189a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa thob bo// rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so// des de bzhin
189a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyan sngar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis kyang mngon par bstod do/ / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su
189a5(dkon brtsegs): bskor te btsal gyis kyang / / 'jig rten dag na mi dbang khyod 'dra yongs ma mchis// 'gro ba kun nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags// rnam par 'dren pa rang byung
189a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ / dper na bar snang la ni nyi ma lhan ne ltar// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi 'jig rten khams rnams na// 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad
189a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyis lham mer 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas yon tan gzi mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// ji ltar seng ge nags khrod dag na sgra sgrogs pa// wa tshogs phal cher thams cad
189b1(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnon par bgyid/ / de ltar mi yi dam pa mthu chen mnga' ba yang // mu stegs can mang 'dus pa thams cad zil gyis gnon// bde bar gshegs pa srin mtshams par
189b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi mdzod spu dkar/ / dngul dang kha ba'i tshogs bzhin mtha' yas gzi brjid can// des ni 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad snang bar bgyis// 'jig rten kun na sangs rgyas khyod ni mi
189b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam mnyam/ / skyes bu khyu mchog zhabs la lha yi 'khor lo mnga'// gsal zhing mdzes la rtsibs stong tshang zhing mu khyud 'khor// de dag gis ni ri dang nags bcas sa 'di rnams//
189b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yo bgyid thub pa gang zag mtshungs med pa// nyon mongs shas chen dor bar bgyi ba thams cad bor// 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam ni rab tu brnyes// nor rnams
189b5(dkon brtsegs): kun dang ldan zhing yon tan rnams kyis phyug/ bsam pa bzhin du 'phags pa'i nor rnams bkod pa mdzad// sa dang mtshungs shing sbyin pa'i gnas gyur mtshungs ma mchis// yon
189b6(dkon brtsegs): tan kun la mngab brnyes tshul khrims rnam dag pa/ / ji ltar nam mkha' lag pa mi thogs mi chags ltar// 'jig rten dag na khyod la rjes chags khro mi mnga'// bzod pa zad kyis
189b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs pa don dang chos rnams kun/ / snying po ma mchis pa dang gsol dang gsog tu mkhyen// srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad dag na gang rnams la// rlom sems 'gyur ba'i sems
190a1(dkon brtsegs): can thog dang dngos ma brnyes/ / khams dang spyod pa dag dang sbyor dang bsam pa mkhyen// rmad du byung dang rnam par 'byed mdzad smon par gyur// chu bo chen por dang /
190a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'gro ba gzigs gyur nas// sngon chad brtson 'grus stobs brtan mthu ni bsnyen pa mdzad// skye ba spangs shing nyon mongs zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan// thugs rgya chen po skye dang na
190a3(dkon brtsegs): shi mtha' mar 'byin/ / nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs par chags pa mi mnga' rgyu// 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos 'jig rten gsum na rgyu// bdag nyid chen po shes rab kyis ni snang
190a4(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad/ / mun pa mun nag gyur pa thams cad rnam par sel// 'dod chags rdul zhi mdzad cing zhe sdang gti mug gi/ dri ma sna tshogs mun bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun dga'
190a5(dkon brtsegs): bo de tshun chad zam ze'i khye'u bzang dag de'i rdzu 'phrul rnams sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su nyams par ma gyur to// kun dka' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na zam ze'i khye'u bzang
190a6(dkon brtsegs): dag ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis sam/ re tshom za na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
190a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i
190b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par stod do/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bos 'di
190b2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di gal te yun ring po de srid nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags na/
190b3(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs pa rgyas de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
190b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bkod pa dang / yongs su gzung ba ni gnyis po 'di dag ste
190b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/ sems can bkod pa dang / sems can yongs su gzung ba dang / zhing bkod pa dang / zhing yongs su gzung ba dang gnyis po 'di dag yin na/ byang chub
190b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ zhing bkod pa rnam par sbyangs shing / zhing yongs su gzung ba yongs su bzung ngo //
190b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ngas ni sems can bkod pa rnam par sbyangs/ sems can yongs su gzung ba yongs su bzung / zhing bkod pa'ang rnam
191a1(dkon brtsegs): par sbyangs/ zhing yongs su gzung ba'ang yongs su bzung ngo // kun dga' bo ngas mngon par shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
191a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs nas/ bskal pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i 'og tu ngas gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ kun dga' bo bskal pa bzang
191a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'di 'das nas/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa bzhin bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rigs pa las/ kun dga' bo ngas brtson 'grus 'bar
191a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byas nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun dga' bo ngas brtson 'grus rlabs po ches myur du bla na med pa yang dag
191a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / kun dga' bo chos bcu po 'di dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
191a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdog pa 'phangs pa thams cad yongs su btang ba dang / chung ma 'phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / bu 'phangs pa yongs su btang
191a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mgo 'phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / mig 'phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / rgyal srid 'phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / longs spyod 'phangs pa yongs su
191b1(dkon brtsegs): btang ba dang / khrag 'phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / rus pa dang rkang 'phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / yan lag 'phangs pa thams cad yongs su btang bas/ nga myur du
191b2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun dga' bo chos bcu po de dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
191b3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / kun dga' bo gzhan yang ngas chos bcus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/
191b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/ kun dga' bo nga tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi chos la gnas te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun
191b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo nga bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo nga brtson 'grus 'bar ba
191b6(dkon brtsegs): brtsams pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo nga bsam gtan gyi yon tan la gnas de/ myur du bla na med
191b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / kun dga' bo nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
192a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / kun dga' bo ngas sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang bas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
192a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / kun dga' bo nga thabs la mkhas pa la gnas te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
192a3(dkon brtsegs): so/ / kun dga' bo nga sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo ngas
192a4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyi chos rtogs pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo ngas mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i chos
192a5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun dga' bo chos bcu po de dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
192a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / kun dga' bo ngas tshor ba sdug bsngal ba/ drag pa rtsub pa ji lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
192a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de gal te khyod kyis shes su zin na/ kun dga' bo khyod spobs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo
192b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan
192b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/ grong bar du phyin pa dang / gnod pas nyen cing sdug bsngal la/
192b3(dkon brtsegs): nad tshabs chen pos btab pa'i mi zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de snying rje bar gyur te/ de mi de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// kye mi khyod ci sdug bsngal
192b4(dkon brtsegs): lam des smras pa/ lha bdag ni nad kyis btab bo// des smras pa/ kye mi khyod kyi nad cis zhi bar 'gyur/ khyod la ci zhig sbyin/ des 'di skad ces smras so//
192b5(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag gis lha khyod kyi lus las ji tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba'i khrag cig btung du thob pa lta na bdag gi nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gzhon nu nor thams cad
192b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa des mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang gi lus phug nas khrag gzags te/ mi de la btung bar byin no// kun dga' bo des de 'thungs ma thag tu mi de'i nad sos par gyur to//
192b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo rgyal po gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pas rang gi lus phug ste khrag thams cad gzugs kyang 'gyod pa'i sems gcig kyang med do// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon
193a1(dkon brtsegs): nu nor thams cad phyin par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis pa 'am/ the tshom za na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe
193a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ / kun dga' bo rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu'i phung po ni tshad gzung du yod kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
193a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub 'di yongs su tshol zhing ngas sngon sems can rnams la khrag byin pa ni tshad med do/ / kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog ces bya ba
193a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de
193a5(dkon brtsegs): skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro ste/ grong bar du phyin pa dang / s+ya thab kyi nad kyis btab pa'i mi gnod pas nyen pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs chen po zhig mthong ngo // des de mthong nas
193a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang snying rje bar gyur te/ de pi de ka la ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so// kye ci zhig gis mi khyod kyi nad 'di zhi bar 'gyur/ khyod la ci zhig sbyin/ des 'di skad ces smras so// /
193a7(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag gis lha khyod kyi lus las ji tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba'i rkang zhig thob pa lta na bdag gi nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/
193b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' nas bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ rang gis lus brdungs nas rkang brus te mi de'i lus la bskus so// kun dga' bo ngas bskus ma thag tu mi de'i nad sos par gyur ro//
193b2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog des rang gi lus brdungs te rkang gzags kyang sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog ces bya

195a6(dkon brtsegs): bshags par bgyi/ / bdag las rnam pa gsum gang gis// bsod nams tshogs ni skyes pa de// bdag gi kun mkhyen pa bon te// bdag gi byang chub mi zad shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi zhing

195b5(dkon brtsegs): la/ sangs rgyas rnams ni smod mi mdzad// sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan// srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang

195b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas/ / bla med byang chub reg gyur cig/ ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang // rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis// rnam rig ma mchis dngos
196a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ mchis// stong pa'i chos ni rtogs par shog/ sangs rgyas drang srong chen po lngar// sems can ma mchis grog sa mchis// gang zag sa mchis gsom mchis/
196a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog/ bdag 'dzin bdag kir 'dzin pa yi// dngos po kun la mi gnas par// sems can kun la bde skad du// ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong

196a5(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing // bzod pa khro ba ma mchis par// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// brtan spro

197a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo ngas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad du spyod pa na/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa'i tshe/ sems can 'dod chags kyi shas
197a3(dkon brtsegs): che ba dang / zhe sdang gi shas che ba dang / gti mug gi shas che ba dang / 'dod chags bdo ba dang / zhe sdang bdo ba dang / gti mug bdo ba dang / chos ma yin pa la chags zhen pa

197a6(dkon brtsegs): can dang / ming dbu rgod dang / mi cang shes ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ci ma rung zhes de ltar
197a7(dkon brtsegs): blon lam yongs su sbyangs te/ dus yang ba 'di lta bu la gnas nas/ kun dga' bo ngas snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas ngad ltar grong dang /
197b1(dkon brtsegs): khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su zhugs te/ chos ston pa nang la la ngan zer zhing gshe n+ya ste/ tshogs par mi dbyung
197b2(dkon brtsegs): ba rtsub pa brlang pos smra bar byed do/ / kun dga' bo nga la chad par smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro// rtag par smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro// 'khor 'dod pa mang ngo zhes kyang glang
197b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo/ 'dod pa che'o zhes kyang gleng ngo // khyim gyi nang du zhugs na'ang nga la sas kyang 'thor ro// dug dang bsres pa'i kha zas kyang byin no// me'i phung po'ang nye bar bsgrubs
197b4(dkon brtsegs): so/ / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas su gyur kyang mdzes ldan pa dang zhes bya ba lta bu 'khrig pa'i chos dang ldan pas nga la skur pa'ang btab bo// kun dga' bo nga ni snying rje chen po mdun
197b5(dkon brtsegs): du byas te snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/ da ltar sems can de lta bu de dag la chos ston to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol
197b6(dkon brtsegs): to/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can de lta bu de dag la chos ston pa mdzad pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul ba 'dul ba/ khur chen po bsnga
197b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dka' ba mdzad pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de de bzhin no//
198a1(dkon brtsegs): @ngi gang smras pa bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul pa 'dul ba/ zur chen po bsdams pa
198a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa gang dag sems can de 'dra ba dag la chos ston pa ni dka' ba mdzad pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro//
198a3(dkon brtsegs): deskad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing

198a5(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon gyi smon lam yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ de bzhin
198a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ byang chub kyi dgongs pa 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/
198a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / dge slong lnga brgya po de dag dang / thams cad dang
198b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / ji zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
198b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag bcu pa las/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so//
198b3(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban lce ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gzhan la phab pa'o// bam po gcig pa

198b5(dkon brtsegs): pas zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan

198b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes
199a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
199a2(dkon brtsegs): ka bar nas/ phub mo g.yas pa'i wang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su bral mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te
199a3(dkon brtsegs): zhub nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs
199a4(dkon brtsegs): bga' zhig zhu lags so/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa

199a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing // mi nyams la/ yongs
199b1(dkon brtsegs): su mi nyams te/ khyad par thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phud ba spyod pa na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du
199b2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang / yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang / gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

199b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ / byams pa legs so// byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa khyod yang legs so// byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la

200a1(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod pa na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par

200a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin/ byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin/ thabs la mkhas pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par byung ba
200a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
200a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa

201a1(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang ci'ang rung ste/ de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs/
201a2(dkon brtsegs): su sngo bar byed de/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin no// byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa

201a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/ byams pa de ltar na byang chub sems
201a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ / byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang

201b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / byams pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par drung ba yin zhen/

201b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye
201b5(dkon brtsegs): mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i
201b6(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po
201b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di lta ste/ sa rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag
202a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag
202a2(dkon brtsegs): skye mched drug 'gag pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags
202a3(dkon brtsegs): pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug

202a5(dkon brtsegs): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par byung ba yin no/ / byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

202a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan pas kyang /

202b2(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
202b3(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi
202b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ byams pas zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// // sh+lau ka brgyad cu rtsa
202b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum mchis/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo rtsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab
202b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / / rgya gare skad du/ Ar+ya ka sh+ya ba pa ri brta nA ma ma hA sA na sU t+tha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'od srungs kyi le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen
202b7(dkon brtsegs): po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
