203a1(dkon brtsegs): @rgyal po'i khaban bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sem pa dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus
203a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'i drug stong thams cad kyang 'di ltaste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha thAg dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od
203a3(dkon brtsegs): srungs chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs chos bani
203a4(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos dang chos smra ba la mi gus pa yin/ chos la ser sna byed
203a5(dkon brtsegs): cing / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa yin/ chos 'dod pa'i gang zag rnams la chos kyi bar chad byed cing / 'dun pa zlog par byed/ rnam par 'khrug par byed de/ mi ston
203a6(dkon brtsegs): cing rab tu 'chab pa yin/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis bdag la bstod cing / gzhan la spyod pa yin te/ 'od srungs chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab yongs su nyams par
203a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos smra ba la gus pa med pa yin// chos la ser sna byed par gyur pa dang // chos la slob dpon dab mkhyung byed pa yin// chos
203b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod rnams la bgegs ni byed gyur cing / / 'dun pa zlog la de bzhin rnam 'khrug byed// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni yongs mi ston// le lo can te bdag bstod rtag tu brtson//
203b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la smod par byed la mngon par dga'// chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi// shes rab nyams par 'gyur bar rgyal bas gsungs// chos bzhi 'di dag rab tu spangs
203b3(dkon brtsegs): byas la/ / rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos bzhi gzhan bsgom mo// 'od srungs chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na
203b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ chos dang chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mi re bar/ ji ltar thos pa dang
203b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa yin/ mang du thos pa las shes rab 'byung bar rig nas/ mgo 'am/ gos la me 'bar
203b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du thos pa yongs su tshol zhing / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa yin// nan tan snying por byed kyi/ sgrub dang brjod pa'i chog lhur len pa ma yin te/ 'o
203b7(dkon brtsegs): srungs chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos smra ba la gus dang bcas pa yin// zang zing med
204a1(dkon brtsegs): cing rnyed dang bkur stil/ / re ba med cing tshigs bcad mi sems par// ji skar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la ston// thos las shes rab 'byung bar des rig nas/
204a2(dkon brtsegs): mgo la 'bar bzhin rtag tu thos pa tshol// de ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin// chos bzung sa ni nan tan bya phyir gnas// mkhas de nan tan snying por byed pa yin//
204a3(dkon brtsegs): tshig lhur mi len smra ba lhur mi len// mkhas pas chos bzhi 'di dag bsten byas na// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur// 'od srungs byang chub
204a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / sbyin gnas la slu ba dang / gzhan
204a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod pa med pa dag la 'gyod pa nye bar sgrub pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / brjod pa ma
204a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa dang / sgyu dang g.yos gzhan la nye bar spyod kyi/ lhag pa'i bsam pas ma yin pa ste/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po na
204a7(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sbyin gnas tha mas bsgo bzhin mi byed dang // / gzhan dag la yang the tsom nyer sgrub dang /
204b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa// de la bsngags min mi snyan smra ba dang // sgyu dang g.yo dang rgyan la dor byed pas// gzhan la brten gyi bsam pas ma yin pa// chos bzhi
204b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag kun tu bsten byas na/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems mchog nyams par 'gyur// de lta bas na chos 'di sten byed na// byang chub mchog las de ni ring bar 'gyur// de las
204b3(dkon brtsegs): bzlog pa sten par byed na ni/ / byang chub mchog rang bsngags pa reg par 'gyur// 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag
204b4(dkon brtsegs): tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor brjed par mi 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog
204b5(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir ram/ za na bzhad gad kyi phyir yang brdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang / sgyu dang g.yo med par sems can thams cad kyi drung na lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang / byang chub sems
204b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed cing / de dag gi yang dag pa'i bsngags pa phyogs bzhir brjod pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i theg pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir sems can gang rnams yongs
204b7(dkon brtsegs): su smin par byed pa de dag thams cad kyang tha na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ 'od srungs chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
205a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar mdor brjed par mi 'gyur ro//
205a2(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ srog gi phyir yang brdzun tshig mi smra zhing // rtag tu don dang ldan pa'i tshig rnams smra// sku dang g.yo ni rtag tu rnam spangs te// lhag pa'i 'asam pas rtag tu sems
205a3(dkon brtsegs): can lta/ / sems can dag pa byang chub gang zhugs pa// byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par sems// ston pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag nas kyang // de dag bsngags pa phyogs bzhir rjod
205a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ / sems can gang dag yongs su smin byed pa// tha med ye shes yang dag 'dzin du 'jug/ chos de dag la rab tu gnas pa rnams// byang chub sems ni nams kyang brjed
205a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ / 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis rgyas
205a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'jig rten rgyang 'phan pa'i gsang tshig tshol ba dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par zhen pas khyim la lta
205a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par sdang zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang / ma thos pa dang ma zin pa'i mdo sde rnams spong ba ste/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bani
205b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
205b2(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal gyis ni 'jig rten rgyang 'phen tshol// rnyed kyi phyir ni khyim la sbyor bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas sras la sdang // de dag bsngags min kun tu smra bar byed//
205b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni ma thos pa dang ma zin mdo// bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa spong bar byed// chos 'di dag dang ldan par gyur pa ni// dge ba'i chos kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro//
205b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yin// chos bzhi 'di dag rgyang bsring rnam par spang // 'di dag bsten na byang chub rab ring ste// gnam sa ring bas shin tu ring bar 'gyur//
205b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'di
205b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod tshol ba la brtsams nas/ legs par thos pa tshol gyi/ nyes par thos pa mi tshol te/ sems can thams cad
205b7(dkon brtsegs): la nga rgyal med pa'i phyir sems khyi dang 'dra ba yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin te/ log pas 'tshe ba thams cad yongs su spangs shing 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin
206a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ / gzhan dag gi ltung ba byung ba dang ma byung ba mi gleng zhing / gzhan dag gi 'khrul pa gzhan dang gzhan mi tshol ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
206a2(dkon brtsegs): zab mo gang dag de'i blos mi rtogs pa de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni mtha' yas shing sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos bstan pa 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen gyi/
206a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ni mi shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon sum mo zhes byas nas mi spong ba ste// 'od srungs byang chub sems
206a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de ni rtag tu pha rol phyin
206a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / / thabs la mkhas dang byang chub sde snod brtson// nga rgyal med pas khyi 'dra'i sems kyis su// sems can kun la nga rgyal bcag pa yin// chos dang
206a6(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'i rnyed pas chog sems shing / / 'tsho ba yongs dag 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas// gzhan gyi 'khrul pa tshol bar mi byed cing // gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi
206a7(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ / gang la de yi thos ni mi rtogs pa// de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum ste// bde gshegs bshad pa'i byang chub mtha' yas pa// rgyal bas mkhyen gyi bdag gis mi shes
206b1(dkon brtsegs): so/ / chos bzhi 'di dag rig par gyur pa ni// ye shes khyad par 'phags mchog nyams mi 'gyur// chos 'di dag la rab tu gnas pa ni// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i byang chub rnyed
206b2(dkon brtsegs): mi dka'/ 'od srungs chos bzhi po 'di dag ni gya gyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na
206b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la som nyi dang / yid gnyis dang / the tsom za ba dang / sems rnams la nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba dang / gnon
206b4(dkon brtsegs): par sems pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa rnams la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgra
206b5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'byin paste/ 'od srungs bani po de dag ni ma su can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar / de la 'di ka
206b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ chos rnams la ni so ma'i yid gnyis byed// sems can rnams la nga rgyal rgyags khro sten// gzhan gyi rnyed la ser sna phrag dog byed// rgyal ba la ni rnams kyang dang mi byed/
206b7(dkon brtsegs): ma khas rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' la// bsngags pa min dang brjod min mi snyan rjod// ma rgya can gyi sems bzhi rnam par spang // byang chub sems dpas rtag tu sems can
207a1(dkon brtsegs): bsten/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ltung babyung
207a2(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams mi 'chab cing brjod de rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'chags pas kun nas ldang ba med pa yin/ de'i bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyal srid stor ba 'am/ nor yal ba 'am/ srog
207a3(dkon brtsegs): gi bar chad du 'gyur yang bden pa'i tshig mi 'khyud cing / gzhan nas gzhan du sgyur ba'i tshig mi smra ba yin/ gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba skur ba dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / smod pa dang
207a4(dkon brtsegs): gsung ba dang / sdigs pa dang / rdeg pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'ching ba byed pa'i nyes pa thams cad la bdag gis nyes par sems shing / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pas gzhan
207a5(dkon brtsegs): dag la mi 'khrug cing khon du 'dzin pa med pa yin/ de dad pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir thams cad dad par mi 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
207a6(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dad pa ste/ bod srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i drang po drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ltung ba byung ba 'a
207a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed kyi/ / rjod cing rnam par 'byed de nyes pa 'dor// nor dang rgyal srid phyir dang srog phyir yang // 'du shes bsgyur te brdzun pa'i tshig mi smra// skur dang smod dang
207b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhung dang gsod pa dang / / 'ching bar byed dang po ra btsun pa la// bdag gis nyes sems gzhan la 'khrug mi byed// las ni bdag gir bya bas khon mi 'dzin// de ni ba
207b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rnams kyi byang chub dang / / dad la gnas shing bsam pa dag ldan pa// 'di dug drang ba'i mtshan du sangs rgyas gsungs// sems cad mchog gis rtag tu bsten
207b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ / 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas
207b4(dkon brtsegs): shing / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub pa la nan tan du mi byed pa yin/ rjes su bstan pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing / slob dpon dang mkhan po
207b5(dkon brtsegs): la sri zhu mi byed pa yin/ dam bcas pa las nyams kyang dad pas byin pa kun spyod de/ dad pas byin pa log par ltung bar byed pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes rnams
207b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong na mi gus shing nga rgyal 'dzin pa yin te/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pas rgod par
207b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas par byed pa yin/ / rjes su bstan pa'i chos nyid rtogs mi 'gyur// de ni chos kun gces pa 'dor ba ste// 'phags pa rnams la nam yang sri zhu med// dam bcas
208a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'am nyams kyang dad pas byin pa yin/ / kha zas rnams la de ni rtag tu za// byang chub sems dpa' cang shes thob pa dag/ mthong bar gyur na gus par
208a2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed cing / / dmu rgod de ni nga rgyal 'phel bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gcag mi sten// 'di dag dmu rgod bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// de dag rgyal sras rnams kyis yongs su
208a3(dkon brtsegs): swA / 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni thang rlung sems dpa' cang shes paste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ legs par zos par nyam cing de la nan tan du byed de/ don
208a4(dkon brtsegs): la rton gyi/ tshig 'bru la mi rton pa yin/ gdams pa rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin cing / bka' blo 'de ba legs par byed pa'i las byed cing tha ma la sri zhu bya ba tshar phyin pa yin//
208a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin las ma nyams te cang shes pas zas za ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes rnams mthong na gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par de la gzhol/
208a6(dkon brtsegs): de la 'bab/ de la bab cing / de'i yon tan 'dod pa yin te/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
208a7(dkon brtsegs): gang mnyan de ni legs par thos par byed// chos don snying por byed cing nan tan gnas// rjes su bstan pa mthun par 'dzin byed cing // chos 'dod bka' tho bde bar tha ma rten/
208b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin la rtag gnas shing // tshul khrims bsdams nas de ni bza' ba za// gus dang bcas shing zhes bcas pa yin// de la gzhol zhing der 'bab yon tan
208b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod/ / rgyal sras gang dag cang shes thob 'gyur ba// de dag la ni rtag tu dga' bas lta// bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di bzhi ni// bde gshegs sras po cang
208b3(dkon brtsegs): shes thob pa yin/ / 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par
208b4(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa rnams la yid rton pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / sems can snod du ma gyur pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang /
208b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa dman pa ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / sems can yang dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i
208b6(dkon brtsegs): chos can rnams la brnyas shing tshul khrims 'chal ba sdig pa'i chos can kun tu sdud bzang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul
208b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ yongs smin ma byas rnams la yid mi rton// snod min rnams la rgya chen chos mi bshad// rgya chen sems can rnams la
209a1(dkon brtsegs): bag pa dman/ / byang chub sems dpa'i mchog gis pashan miH// yang dag gan sa gling rgyal khrims yon tan dzAm/ dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas miH/
209a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs mi bsdu// sdig pa'i chos rnams yongs su spang bar bya// 'khrul pa'i chos bzhi 'di dag shes gyur nas// byang chub sems dpas kyang
209a3(dkon brtsegs): bsring rnam par spang / / 'di dag bsten na byang chub 'tshang miH// de lta bas na mkhas pas chos 'di spang // 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
209a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i lam ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pa dang / sems can
209a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad la yang dag par sbyor ba ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam
209a6(dkon brtsegs): mo/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can rnams la rtag tu sems snyoms bya// sangs rgyas theg mchog yang dag 'dzin du 'jug/ rgyal bas bsngags pa'i
209a7(dkon brtsegs): chos ni stan par bya/ / sems can kun la dang ba'i sems su tha// yang dag sbyor zhing nan tan byed par gnas// sems can kun la mtshungs par spyad par za// chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal
209b1(dkon brtsegs): bas rab bsngags te/ / rgyal sras rnams kyis de dag rtag tu bsten// 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa grogs ngan pa ste//
209b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
209b3(dkon brtsegs): don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig sna tshogs kyi spobs pa can dang / gang la brten pas 'jig rten gyi zang zing kun sdud par 'gyur gyi/ chos kun
209b4(dkon brtsegs): mi sdud pa ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa grogs po ngan pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la 'di skad
209b5(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ nyan thos gang dag bdag phan brtson pa dang // gang dag rab tu byung nas rnal 'byor spyod// rang sangs rgyas pa gang dag byed nyung zhing // bdag gi don du 'du 'dzi rnam par spong // byis bgang
209b6(dkon brtsegs): dag 'jig rten rgyang 'phen gro/ / ji ltar bstan bzhin gang dag 'dir rtsod byed// gang la brten na zang zing kun sdud kyi// chos 'di nam yang sdud par mi byed pa// chos bzhi byang chub sems dpas rab
209b7(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhi la brten par bya// 'di dag 'a shes gnyen ngan dang thogs ngan du// rgyal bas gsungs te thag bsring yongs su spang / 'od srungs
210a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi lam ston pa'i phyir spong ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i
210a2(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen dang / thos pa'i shes rab ston pa'i phyir chos smra ba byang chub sem pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ston pa'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug
210a3(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ 'od
210a4(dkon brtsegs): srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub yongs su ston phyir len pa po// sbyin byed rnams ni dge ba'i 'ashes gnyen yin/
210a5(dkon brtsegs): chos don smra ba thos dang shes rab byed// dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par bde gshegs gsungs// gang dag rab 'byung yang dag 'dzin 'jug pa// de dag dge rtsa yin pas bshes gnyen gsungs
210a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi lam ni ston pa'i phyir/ / sangs rgyas rnams ni bde gshegs sras kyi bshes// rgyal bas bsngags pa bzhi po 'di dag ni// bde gshegs sras kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
210a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'di dag sten cing rtag tu 'ag yod na// bde gshegs bstan pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa
210b1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du gnyer gyi/ chos don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa don du gnyer gyi/ yon tan don
210b2(dkon brtsegs): du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / bdag bde la don du gnyer gyi/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / 'khor gyi tshogs don du gnyer gyi dben pa don du
210b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyer ba ma yin pa ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyed pa don du gnyer gyi chos 'dod min// brjod pa don
210b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyer yon tan don gnyer min/ / bdag bde rtag tu don du gnyer byed cing // sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba don mi gnyer// 'khor tshogs don du gnyer gyi dben mi 'dod//
210b5(dkon brtsegs): la chags kyi yon tan ma chags pa// bzhi po de dag bcos par gsungs pa ste// de dag byang chub sems dpas yong su spang // 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
210b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la'ang mos la/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang yid ches pa
210b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bdag med par yang bzod la/ sems can thams cad la'ang snying rje che ba dang / de'i bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang gnas la/ sbyor ba 'khor ba na'ang gnas pa dang
211a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa gtong yang sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa la'ang mi re ba ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
211a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan no/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams stong pa nyid du rtag mos kyang // las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang yid ches so// bdag med bzod pas
211a3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid gnas kyang / / sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed// de'i bsam rtag tu mya ngan 'das la gnas// de yi sbyor ba 'khor bar gnas pa yi// yongs smin bya phyir sbyin pa
211a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin byed kyang / / las kyi rnam par smin la re ba med// 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' gter chen po rnyed pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
211a5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyan pa dang / chos smra ba la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis lta ba dang / bag yod par dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba ste// 'od
211a6(dkon brtsegs): srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter chen po rnyed pa'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshe rabs kun tu sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// pha rol phyin pa drug po rnams kyang nyan// chos smra ba
211a7(dkon brtsegs): la sems ni rab tu dang / / mthong na rtag tu gus bskyed par byed// rtag tu bag yod gyur nas dgon par gnas// de ni de nyid la yang rtag tu dga'// bzhi po 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi//
211b1(dkon brtsegs): gter chen yin zhes bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe
211b2(dkon brtsegs): na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi brnyas
211b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ 'od grangs pan po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyilam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems ni yongs su gtong mi byed//
211b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la khong khro rtag tu spong // lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dor bar byed// sems can tshogs la brnyas par yong mi byed// bde bar gshegs pas bzhi po 'di dag ni//
211b5(dkon brtsegs): bdud las bda' bar 'gyur ba'i chos su gsungs// 'di dag bsten na rgyal ba rnam 'dren pa// gser 'dra'i sku mnga' mtshungs pa med par 'gyur// 'od srungs chos
211b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul 'chos pa med par dgon pa na gnas pa dang / lan
211b7(dkon brtsegs): du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag dang / sems can thams cad la lus dang srog gtong zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang / thos pa dang don gyis ngoms mi myong
212a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i brtson 'grus te/ 'od srungs chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud
212a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dgon par gnas shing tshul 'chos rnam par spong // rgyal gsungs bsdu ba sems can rnams la byed// dam chos yongs su btsal ba btsam
212a3(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ / lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed// dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mi nyung ba// yang dag bsgrub phyir rtag tu ngoms mi myong // dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir// /
212a4(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa ste/ bzhi
212a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la cher snying rje ba dang / sems can thams cad la byang chub kyi sems ston pa
212a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyam chung ba rnams la bzod pas sten pa ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dag
212a7(dkon brtsegs): cing zang zing med pa'i sems kyis su/ / chos kyi sbyin byed rgyal bas rab tu bsngags// tshul khrims mi ldan pa la snying rje che// gzhan dag byang chub phyir ni sems skyed 'jug/ nyam chung
212b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bzod pas dang du len/ / 'di ni dge chos sdud par gsungs pa ste// de dag bsten na rgyal bar 'gyur bas na// byang chub sems dpas de dag rtag tu bsten//
212b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag
212b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sgron ma sbyin pa dang / za na 'dris pa rnams la'ang sbyin pa ste/ 'od srungs chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig
212b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshul khrims sdom pa yang dag 'dzin byed dang // dam chos 'dzin dang sgron ma sbyin pa dang //
212b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin tha na 'dris la sbyin byed cing // mkhas pa ma rigs las rnam par 'byed// 'od srungs chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob
212b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / gzhan dag la mi brnyas pa ste/ 'od srungs
212b7(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang dag byang chub la ni sgrib byed pa// sdig pa'i bzhi pa bcu po rnam
213a1(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ / mkhas pas de bzhin bcu gnyis gzhan sten na// 'chi med reg nas byang chub thob par 'gyur// sems can dam pa gang dag chos tshul 'di// 'dzin
213a2(dkon brtsegs): tam klog gam rab tu ston byed pa/ / de dag bsod nams mtha' yas rgyal bas gsungs// de yi tshad ni rgyal ba rnams rjod do// gang gis zhing ni gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// rin chen bkang ste rgyal/
213a3(dkon brtsegs): la phul ba bas// gang gis 'di las tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad klog/ bsod rnams 'di yi grangasu mi phod do// 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' ni ming tsam gyis byang chub
213a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' zhes mi bya'i 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos spyod pa dang / snyoms par spyod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa dang / chos la gnas pa dang ldan pa la byang chub sems dpa'
213a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / 'od srungs yang byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
213a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa dang / bdag ci ri zhes yongs su 'jal zhing gzhan gyi shes pa la mi
213a7(dkon brtsegs): smod pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang / bcos ma ma yin par thams pa dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i
213b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i bar du gtan du mdza' ba dang / tshig ran cing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gsong por smra ba dang / khur blangs pa rnams la sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po
213b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma gcad pa dang / yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba'i phyir thos pa dang don gyis ngoms mi myong ba dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa rnams la skyon du lta zhing
213b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams la mi gshe bar bsgo ba dang / spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'i gtong ba dang / srid par 'gro ba'i skye
213b4(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang // gzugs/
213b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i khams rnam par bsal ba'i bsam gtan dang / thabs mkhas pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / rab tu ldan pa'i thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
213b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la gnyis su med pa'i byams pa dang / gus par byas te chos nyan pa dang / gus par byas te dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang / 'jig
213b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi sna tshogs rnams la mi dga' zhing / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mngon par dga' ba dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod cing / theg pa chen po la phan yon
214a1(dkon brtsegs): du lta ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi sgrub pa dang / mngon par shes
214a2(dkon brtsegs): pa lngas rnam par rtsen pa dang / ye shes la rton pa dang / sgrub pa dang / log par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams mi gtong ba dang / gcig tu chad par smra ba dang / bden pa gces
214a3(dkon brtsegs): su byed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de la 'di
214a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ sems can kun la phan dang bde bya ba'i// lhag pa'i bsam la mos par byed pa yin// kun mkhyen ye shes la ni sems sgrol zhing // ri 'am mi ri snyam du bdag la dpog
214a5(dkon brtsegs): smod pa med cing lhag pa'i nga rgyal med/ / bsam pa brtan zhing bcos pa med par byams// mdza' dang mi mdza' rnams la sems kyang snyoms// mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' la thug bar du//
214a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la gtan du rab tu mdza'// 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis 'jam por smra bar byed// khur blangs pa la sgyid lug zhum pa med// sems can dag la snying rje yongs ma gcad/
214a7(dkon brtsegs): dam chos yongs su tshol la skyo ba med// thos pas mi ngoms bdag gi 'khrul skyon lta// gzhan la gshe bas gdung bar byed pa med// spyod lam rnams su sems ni rab tu sbyong // gtong
214b1(dkon brtsegs): ba rnam par smin la re ba med/ / tshul khrims srid pa'i 'gro bar gnas ma yin// sems can rnams la bzod cing khong khro spangs// dge ba yang dag sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
214b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med khams spangs pa yi bsam gtan dang // thabs kyis yang dag zin pa'i shes rab dang // bsdu ba rnam bzhis yang dag zin thabs dang // khrims ldan khrims med gnyis
214b3(dkon brtsegs): med byams pa dang / / gus par byas te dus su chos nyan dang // gus par byas te dgon zhir gnas pa dang // 'jig rten sna tshogs dga' bar mi byed dang // theg pa dman la dga' bar mi byed
214b4(dkon brtsegs): cing theg pa che la 'dod pa skyed pa dang / / sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spong byed cing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu bsten pa dang // tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi la sgom pa dang // mngon shes
214b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam lngas rtag tu rtse na pa dang / / ye shes rjes su rtag tu 'brang ba dang // sgrub dang ldan pa gtong bar mi byed dang // sgrub dang mi ldan gzhan yang mi gtong dang // gcig tu chad par rtag tu smra
214b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / / bden la rtag tu gus dang bcas pa dang // byang chub sems ni sngon du btang nas su// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni sgom par byed// bde gshegs gsungs pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis
214b7(dkon brtsegs): chos/ / 'di dag bde gshegs sras kyis bsten par bya// byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dag ni// chos 'di ldan zhes bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// 'od srungs
215a1(dkon brtsegs): dpe nye bar dgod pa bstan pa gang dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab tu shes par byed pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa khyod la bstan par
215a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste/ 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs pa la re ba med do// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang
215a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpab sems dang po bskyed pa'ang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/ 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med do// de la 'di skad ces
215a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ dper na sa 'di skye bo kun gyi 'tsho// lan la mi re 'gyur ba med pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems gnas pa// rgyal mchog tha na med pa'i sangs rgyas su// ma gyur bar du skye bo
215a5(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi 'tsho/ / lan la re ba med cing 'gyur ba med// bu dang dgra la yid kyis mtshungs par sems// byang chub mchog rab rtag par yongs su tshol/ 'od srungs 'di lta
215a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na chu'i khams ni rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad skyed par byed do// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa sems can thams
215a7(dkon brtsegs): cad la thams pas khyab par byas te gnas pa'ang sems can thams cad la dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed do/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na chu ni rtswa dang gel ba dang // nags tshal
215b1(dkon brtsegs): spyan dang 'bru ni rnam par skyed/ / de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bsam dag pa// sems can mtha' yas byams pas khyab par byed// sna tshogs chos la khyab byas rin gyis su// dkar
215b2(dkon brtsegs): po'i chos kyis rnam par rgyas 'gyur zhing / / dpung bcas sde dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas// rim gyis rgyal ba'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/
215b3(dkon brtsegs): dper na me'i khams ni lo tog thams cad yongs su smin par byed do// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyang sems can thams cad kyi dkar po'i chos thams cad
215b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par byed do/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na ma ni rtswa dang sman rnams dang // lo tog thams cad yongs su smin par byed// de bzhin bde gshegs sras kyi shes/
215b5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyang // skye bo rnams kyi dge ba'i chos smin byed// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung gi khams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par sgrub bo// 'od srungs de
215b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'ang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub bo/ / de 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rlung ni sangs rgyas dgongs pa
215b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ / rnam pa sna tshogs zhing rnams rnam par sgrub// de bzhin rgyal sras rnams kyi thabs mkhas kyang // bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos mchog rnam par sgrub/ 'od srungs
216a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na bdud sdig can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis zil gyis gnan pa 'am/ yongs su zad par bya bar mi nus
216a2(dkon brtsegs): so/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa'ang bdud thams cad kyis zil gyis gnan pa 'am/ yongs su zad par bya bar mi nus so// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper
216a3(dkon brtsegs): na zla ba yar gyi ngo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skye zhing gang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam bdag pa'ang dkar po'i chos thams cad kyis rdzogs shing rgyas par 'gyur ro//
216a4(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar ngo la// skye zhing yongs su gang 'gyur 'bri mi 'gyur// de bzhin bsam dag byang chub sems dpa' yang // dkar po'i chos
216a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis rtag tu rgyas par 'gyur/ / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las lan cig byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis sems can thams cad la snang bar byed do//
216a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lan cig phyung ba'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad la shes pa'i snang ba byed do// de la 'di skad ces
216a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ dper na nyi las lan cig byung ba yi// 'od zer rnams kyis sems can snang bar byed// de bzhin rgyal sras ye shes 'od zer gyis// sems can rnams la shes rab snang ba byed//
216b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ni ga las gar 'gro ba thams cad du mi 'jigs mi skrag pa nyid du 'gro'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems
216b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes la gnas pa'ang ga las gar 'gro ba thams
216b3(dkon brtsegs): cad du mi 'jigs mi skrag pa nyid du 'gro'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ri dgas rgyal po seng ge ral pa can// 'jigs pa med par gang du 'dod par 'gro// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' tshul
216b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / / thos dang ye shes gnas pa dga' dgur 'gro// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na bal glang glang po che shin tu dul ba ni khal thams cad khyer bas yongs su skyo ba med do//
216b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba'ang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phung po lnga'i khur khyer bas yongs su skyo ba med do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rab
216b6(dkon brtsegs): dul stobs ldan glang po che/ / khal rnams khyer yang yongs su skyo ba med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sems rang dul// sems can khur gyis spro bar 'gyur ba med// 'od srungs 'di
216b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni chu las skyes kyang chus mi gos so// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten du skyes kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos so// de la 'di skad ces
217a1(dkon brtsegs): dper na ngadra chu las skyes gyur kyang / / chu 'am rdzab kyis de la gos pa med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten skyes// 'jig rten chos kyis nam yang gos pa
217a2(dkon brtsegs): med/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na shing ljon pa yal ka bcad pa ni rtsa ba ma snang na slar yang sa las skye'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas
217a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'ongs mongs pa'i yal ga bcad pa'ang snying rje chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba la kun tu sbyor ba ma nyams na slar yang khams gsum du skye'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na shing ljon yal ga
217a4(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa ni/ / rtsa ba brtan pa ma snang slar yang skye// de bzhin rtsa ba kun sbyor ma spangs na// thabs kyis bsal kyang slar yang skye bar 'gyur// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper
217a5(dkon brtsegs): na phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tha dad pa nas klung chen po chu'i phung po rgya mtsho chen por bab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub
217a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo tha dad pa nas bsags pa byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa thams cad kyang / 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro//
217a7(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na tha dad phyogs kyi chu klung rnams// rgya mtsho cher bab ro gcig 'gyur ba bzhin// tha dad sgo nas dge ba bsags byas pa// byang chub bsngos pa rnams kyang
217b1(dkon brtsegs): ro gcig 'gyur/ / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni ri rab la gnas so// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub/
217b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams dang // sum cu rtsa
217b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum lha tshogs ri rab gnas/ / de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dgar gnas te// thams cad mkhyen nyid thob nas chos rnams ston// 'od srungs 'di lta ste
217b4(dkon brtsegs): dper na blon pos yongs su zin pa'i rgyal po rnams ni rgyal po'i bya ba thams cad byed do/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i shes
217b5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed do/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na thon por ldan pa'i rgyal po rnams// bya ba thams cad rtag tu byed pa
217b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar/ / thabs ldan byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyang // sangs rgyas don rnams rtag tu byed pa yin// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na sprin med cing nam thang
217b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nam mkha' la ni char 'bab pa'i rgyu med do/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos pa nyung ba la'ang dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bab pa'i rgyu med do// de la 'di skad ces
218a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ dper na sprin med nam thang nam mkha' la// char 'bab rgyu ni rnams kyang mi dmigs so// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' zos nyung la// chos ston nam
218a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na sprin chen po las byung ba'i char gyi rgyun ni lo tog thams cad la mngon par 'bab bo// 'od srungs
218a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang / mang du thos pa'i chos kyi sprin las byung ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi char yang sems can thams cad la mngon par 'bab bo// de la 'di skad
218a4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ dper na sprin chen glog dang bcas pa las// char pa 'bab pas lo tog ngoms par byed// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dam chos kyi// sprin byung chos rgyun sems
218a5(dkon brtsegs): can tshim par byed/ / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang du byung ba der rin po che sna bdun yang 'byung ngo // 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems
218a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang du byung ba der byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag kyang 'byung ngo / / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gar byung ba// der ni de yi rin chen sna bdun
218a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung / / byang chub sems dpa' gang du thung gyur ba// der de'i byang chub yan lag bdun po 'byung / 'od srungs 'di ste ste/ dper na gang na nor bu rin po che be nun
218b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i sgo yod pa de na/ kar shra pa Na brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgo yod do// 'od srungs de bzhin du gang na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sgo yod pa de na/ nyan thos dang rang
218b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po 'byung ba'i sgo yod do/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na gang du nor bu rin chen 'byung // der ni kar sha pa Na mang 'byung ltar// gang du rdzogs pa'i
218b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems 'byung ba/ / der ni nyan thos mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dres pa'i tshal du zhugs pa
218b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa rnams ni mtshungs par gnas so/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa'i sbyor ba'ang sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams
218b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na 'dres pa'i tshal gnas lha rnams kyi// longs spyod rnams ni mtshungs par gnas pa yin// de bzhin bsam dag byang chub
218b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' yang / / sems can rnams la rtag tu legs par sbyor// 'od srungs 'di lta ste// dpe na sngags dang sman gyis yongs su zin pa'i dug gis ni 'chi bar byed mi nus so// 'od srungs de
218b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ye shes dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa'i dug gis kyang log par ltung bar byed mi nus so/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sngags
219a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zin pa'i 'dug/ skye bo rnams la nyes pa byed mi nus// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' ye shes can// nyon mongs rnams kyis log ltung byed mi nus//
219a2(dkon brtsegs): / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na zong khyer chen po rnams kyi lung gang yin pa de ni bu ram shing gi zhing dag dang / rgun gyi zhing dag la phan par 'gyur ba yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub
219a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i lung gang yin pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par 'gyur ba yin no/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dper na grong khyer rnams kyi mi gtsang lud// de ni bu 'am
219a4(dkon brtsegs): shing gi zhing la phan/ / de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs lud// de ni rgyal ba'i chos la phan pa byed// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'phong rtsal ma bslabs pa las mtshon thabs
219a5(dkon brtsegs): slob pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' thos pa nyung ba las dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / dpyod pa dang / don 'dzin pa'i shes par blta'o// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper
219a6(dkon brtsegs): na so ma btang ba'i snod rnams la ni rdza mkhan gyis me chen po gtang dgos so/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du shes rab ma smin pa'i sems can rnams la'ang byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi me chen po gtang dgro
219a7(dkon brtsegs): par blta'o/ / 'od srungs de lta bas na// byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob par 'dod pas tshul bzhin du chos la rab tu sbyor bar bya'o// 'od srungs de la byang chub
219b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshul bzhin du chos la rab tu sbyor ba gang zhe na/ / 'di lta ste/ dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa'o// 'od srungs dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so
219b2(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog pa gang zhe na/ 'od srungs gang la bdag med par so sor rtog pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / skyes bu med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang /
219b3(dkon brtsegs): shed las skyes med pa dang / shed bu med par so sor rtog pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos
219b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni/ gang gzugs la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa dang / 'od srungs de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / bdu
219b5(dkon brtsegs): byed rnam par shes pa la gang rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par so sor mi rtog pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs
219b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni/ gang sa'i khams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa dang / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i
219b7(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams
220a1(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba'o/ / 'od srungs gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so so rtog pa ni/ gang mig gis skye mched la rtag par yang so sa
220a2(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye mched rnams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog/ mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste/ 'od
220a3(dkon brtsegs): srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o/ / 'od srungs rtag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// mi rtag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// mtha' de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa
220a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srung
220a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go/ / bdag med ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// mtha' de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni/ dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/
220a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs sems yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// sems yang dag pa ma yin pa
220a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so/ / 'od srungs gang na sems med pa dang / sems pa med pa dang / yid med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa 'di ni/ 'od srungs dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par/
220b1(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// dge ba dang / mi dge ba rnams dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams dang / zad pa dang bcas pa dang /
220b2(dkon brtsegs): bag pa med pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no// 'od srungs kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go// rnam par blang ba zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis
220b3(dkon brtsegs): so/ / mtha' de gnyis khas mi len cing / mi rjod mi smra ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ 'od srungs dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs yod ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go/
220b4(dkon brtsegs): med ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni/ dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od
220b5(dkon brtsegs): srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes pa'o/ / 'od srungs 'khor ba zhes bya ba de ni mthA gcig go// mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so// de gnyis
220b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang
220b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o/ / 'od srungs gang yang ngas khyed rnams la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par she ba'i rkyen gyi ming dang gzugs/
221a1(dkon brtsegs): ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i
221a2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug
221a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang
221a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred
221a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gags pas len pa bgag/ len pa bgags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
221a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag pa 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa de la/ 'od srungs rig pa dang ma rig pa de dag
221a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ma yin zhing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med de/ 'od srungs 'di la shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang
221b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'gag pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs 'gag pa dang / skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug 'gag pa dang / reg pa dang //
221b2(dkon brtsegs): reg pa 'gag pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba bgag pa dang / sred pa dang / sred pa 'gag pa dang / len pa dang / len pa 'gag pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa 'gag pa dang / skye ba dang / skye ba
221b3(dkon brtsegs): bgag pa dang / rga shi dang / rga shi 'gag pa de dag gnyis ma yin zhing / rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med de/ 'od srungs 'di la shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so
221b4(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog pa zhes bya'o/ / 'od srungs gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni/ gang stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid stong pa dang /
221b5(dkon brtsegs): gang mtshan ma med pas chos rnams mtshan ma med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid mtshan ma med pa dang / gang smon pa med pas chos rnams smon pa med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid smon pa med pa
221b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang mngon par 'du byed pa med pas/ chos rnams mngon par 'du byed pa med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / gang ma skyes pas chos rnams ma skyes par mi byed de
221b7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams nyid ma skyes pa dang / gang mazung bas chos rnams mthung bar mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid mthung ba dang / gang ngo bo nyid med pas chos rnams ngo bo nyid med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid ngo bo nyid med
222a1(dkon brtsegs): par gang dag de ltar so sor rtog pa de ni/ 'od srungs dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o// yang 'od srungs gang zag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong
222a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa'o// 'od srungs sngon gyi mtha' stong pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa/ da ltar byung ba stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid la rton par bya'i/ gang zag la ma yin no// 'od srungs gang dag stong pa nyid
222a3(dkon brtsegs): du dmigs pas/ stong pa nyid la rton pa de dag ni/ ngas gsung rab 'di las nyams rab tu nyams rab tu nyams shes bshad do// 'od srungs gang zag tu lta ba ri rab tsam la gnas pa bla'i/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal can
222a4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid du lta ba ni de lta ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs lta bar gyur pa thams cad las byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na/ 'od srungs gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do//
222a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi nad pa zhig yod la/ sman pas de la sman btang mas/ sman des de'i nad thams cad bskyod de/ sman lton 'dug pa de nyid mi 'byung na/ 'od srungs 'di ji
222a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems/ mi de nad de las thar bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags te/ gang sman des nad thams cad bskyod nas/ sman ltor mchis pa nyid ma byung na/ mi de'i tho nad shin tu
222a7(dkon brtsegs): tshabs che bar 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad las 'byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na/ 'od srungs gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung
222b1(dkon brtsegs): ngo zhes ngas bshad do/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sman pas nad ni bsal ba'i phyir// mi zhig la ni 'akru sman btang ba las// nad rnams bskyod nas 'khrus par ma gyur na// de yi gzhi las nad
222b2(dkon brtsegs): ni sos mi 'gyur/ / de bzhin lta ba thibs por gnas pa las// 'byung ba'i mchog ni stong pa nyid yin na// gang zhig stong pa kho nar ltar gyur pa// de ni gsor mi rung zhes rgyal bas gsungs//
222b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta / dper na mis la zhig nas mkhas 'jigs smrag nas zang rdung zhing duste// nam mkha' 'di gos nam mkha' 'di grol ces de skad ces zer na/ 'od grangs 'das
222b4(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems/ nam mkha' de bsal bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de rngo mi thogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong dang bram ze gang
222b5(dkon brtsegs): dag stong pa nyid kyis skrag/ rab tu sdug na/ de dag ni sems 'khrugs pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes ngas bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs de dag ni stong pa nyid la spyod la/ de nyid kyis skrag pa'i
222b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na nam mkhas 'jigs pas nyen pa'i mi// thun po nam mkha' 'di ni sol zhes zer// nam mkha' bsal bar nus pa ma yin yang // rmongs pas byis pa dgu ni
222b7(dkon brtsegs): de skad smra/ / de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze gang dag cig// slong pa nyid kyis skrag cing sems 'khrugs pa// byis pa de dag stong pa nyid spyod pa// stong pa nyid ni gang du'ang ga ni mi nus/ 'od srungs 'di /
223a1(dkon brtsegs): @dper na ri mo mkham shig bdag nyid kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs 'jigs 'jigs lta zhig bris nas/ des 'jigs skrag ste khas bub tu 'gyel nas brgyal bar rgyur pa de bzhin du/ 'od
223a2(dkon brtsegs): srungs byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyis 'khor ba na 'khor yang chos de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes so// de
223a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na ri mo mkhan zhig gis/ gnod sbyin 'jigs pa'i gzugs byas nas/ de yis 'jigs te khas bub tu// 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur pa ltar// byis pa so so'i skye bo
223a4(dkon brtsegs): kun/ / bdag nyid kyis ni byas pa yi// gzugs sgra la sogs rmongs gyur nas// 'gro ba drug tu 'khyams par 'gyur// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi sgyu ma mkhan zhig gis sgyu
223a5(dkon brtsegs): ma sprul nas/ sprul pa nges sgyu ma mkhan de nyid zos pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'ang gang dang gang yid la byed pa de thams cad de la gsog tu snang ngo // gsob dang / stong pa dang /
223a6(dkon brtsegs): snying po med pa nyid du snang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis mngon sprul pa// sgyu ma byas pa de yis de zos ltar// rnal 'byor pas ni yid la gang byed pa// de ni de la gsob dang
223a7(dkon brtsegs): gsog tu snang / / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na shing gnyis rlung gis drul pa de las me byung ste/ byung nas shing de gnyis sreg pa de bzhin du// 'od srungs yang dag par so sor rtog pa
223b1(dkon brtsegs): yod na 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po skye ste/ de skyes pas yang dag par so sor rtog pa de nyid sreg par byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na shing gnyis rlung gis drul ba las e byung nas ni/
223b2(dkon brtsegs): de nyid sreg par byed// de bzhin shes rab dbang po skyes nas kyang // so sor rtog pa de nyid sreg par byed// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mar me bus na mun pa mun nag tham cad med par
223b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur yang / mun pa mun nag de gang nas kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su 'ang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do// yang bod srungs mar me de 'di snyam du bdag gis
223b4(dkon brtsegs): mun pa mun nag bsal lo snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang mar me la brten nas/ mun pa mun nag med par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de la mar me gang yin pa dang / mun pa mun nag gang yin pa de
223b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ka stong pa ste/ gzung du med cing byed pa med do// 'od srungs de bzhin du ye shes skyes na mi shes pa med par 'gyur yang / mi shes pa de gang nas kyang 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ shar phyogs
223b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su'ang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do// yang 'od srungs ye shes kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis mi shes pa bsal lo snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang ye shes la
223b7(dkon brtsegs): brten nas mi shes pa med par 'gyur ro/ / 'od srungs de la ye shes gang yin pa dang / mi shes pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka stong pa ste/ gzung du med cing byed pa med do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper
224a1(dkon brtsegs): na sgron mas mun pa mun nag kun/ / med par gyur kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med// de bzhin shes byung mi shes med gyur kyang // de ni gang nas 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med// sgron mas
224a2(dkon brtsegs): mun pa bsal snyam mi sems kyang / / snang ba byung nas mun pa med par 'gyur// stong pa gzung med nam mkha'i me tog 'dra// de bzhin ye shes mi shes gnyis ka stong // 'od srungs
224a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na khyim mam/ khang pa 'am/ khang phran lo 'bum 'das par sus kyang lan 'ga' yang mar me ma bus pa der mi la la zhig gis mar me bus na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/ mun
224a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mun nag de 'di snyam du bdag ni lo 'bum du bsags pa yin te/ bdag 'di nas mi 'gro'o snyam du sems sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi sems lags te/ mar me bus na mun pa mun
224a5(dkon brtsegs): nag la mi 'chi ba'i mthu ma mchis kyi/ gdon mi 'tshal bar ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de bzhin du las dang nyon mongs pa bskal pa 'bum du bsags
224a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i so sor rtog pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/ / 'od srungs mar me zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dgas so// 'od srungs mun pa mun nag
224a7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba de ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na khyim du mi 'ga' la la yis// ring zhig lon nas mar me bus byas na// de la mun pa
224b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gnas ring lon gyis/ / 'di nas mi 'gro snyam du sems pa med// mar me phyung nas mun pa mun nag la// med par mi 'gyur ba yi nus med de// mar me brten nas mun pa med par 'gyur// gnyis ka stong pa
224b2(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems ci yang med/ / de bzhin zag med 'phags pa'i ye shes brten// mi shes nyon mongs bsags pa med par 'gyur// ye shes dang ni nyon mongs rtag par yang // de dag lan 'ga' tsam
224b3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'grogs pa med/ / ye shes mi shes meng bya mi sems kyang // ye shes brten nas mi shes med par 'gyur// gnyis ka gzung med nam mkha'i me tog bzhin// de bzhin ye shes mi shes
224b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ka stong / / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la ni sa bon rnams mi skye'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du gang 'dus ma byas las byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas
224b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams skye ba ni ma byung / mi 'byung ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mkha' las sa bon skye ba ni// 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar med// de bzhin 'dus ma byas las sangs rgyas chos// skye
224b6(dkon brtsegs): ba gang du'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na lud kyis gang ba'i sa la ni sa bon thams cad skye'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i lung kyis gang ba
224b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gnas pa la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam skye'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lung bcas mtshan dang bcas pa la// sa bon skye yi dgon dung rnam na min// de bzhin nyon
225a1(dkon brtsegs): mongs log ldan skye bo la/ / rgyal sras rnam kyi rgyal ba'i chos rnams skye/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'brog dgon pa dgon dung rnamAn ni pad+ma mi bya'o//
225a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de bzhin du gang 'dus ma byas la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba ni ma byung mi 'byung ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na pad+ma chu rdzing rnams na skye// dgon dung dag na nam
225a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang skye mi 'gyur/ / de bzhin 'dus ma byas la sangs rgyas rmos// skye ba gang du'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na lud yod pa'i 'dam rdzab nas pad+ma
225a4(dkon brtsegs): skye'o/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i lung yod pa'i 'dam rdzab log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
225a5(dkon brtsegs): dper na lud bcas pa dam rdzab chu las ni// pad+ma skye yi thang las nam yang min// de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye bo la// rgyal sras rnams kyi rgyal ba'i chos la skye// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen
225a6(dkon brtsegs): po bzhi mar gsar gyis yongs su gang bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa la blta bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgya mtsho bzhi po mar
225a7(dkon brtsegs): gsar gyis/ / yongs gang gtsang zhing kun nas yid du 'ong // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras// dge ba'i klung gis rtag tu gang bar blta// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la
225b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis sgra tshal pa brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu thigs pa gcig blangs pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs nyan thos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa blta bar bya'o// de la
225b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bya ste/ dper na chu yi phung po de las ni// sgra tshal brgya yi rtse mos thigs blangs pa// de bzhin nyan thos rnams kyis dge byas pa'i// dge ba dag dang ldan par blta bar bya// 'od srungs 'di lta
225b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa'i nang gi nam mkha' bzhin du nyan thos kyi 'dus ma byas shes pa blta bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa yi// nang gi nam
225b4(dkon brtsegs): mkha' de ni chung ba yin/ / nyan thos 'dus ma byas pa shes pa yang // de bzhin chud zhing shin tu chung bar blta/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams
225b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus ma byas shes pa blta bar bya'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na// nam mkha'i khams ni sgrib pa med par 'dug/ byang chub
225b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i ye shes 'dus ma byas/ / 'gro ba kun gyi mchog kyang de ltar blta/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i btsun mo dam pa skyes pa dbul
225b7(dkon brtsegs): po dang nyal nas/ phyis de las bu byung bar gyur na/ bod srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/ de rgyal po'i bu zhes bya ba 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
226a1(dkon brtsegs): / bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos rnams chos kyi dbyings las skyes mod kyi/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras dbang bskur ba'i 'os shes mi bya'o// de la
226a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal po'i btsun mo yid 'ong ma// skyes pa dbul po dang ni nyal gyur te// de phyir de la bu byung gang yin pa// de ni rgyal po'i bu min dbang bskur min// de bzhin nyan thos 'dod
226a3(dkon brtsegs): chags bral gyur pa/ / de dag dbu dbang bskur 'os ma yin// 'di ltar de dag bdag la phan phyir brtson// bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don byed sangs rgyas sras// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/
226a4(dkon brtsegs): dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba bran mo ngan pa dang nyal ba de las de'i bu byung na/ 'od srungs de bran mo ngan pa las byung du zin kyang / de la rgyal po'i sras zhes bya'o// 'od srungs da
226a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa 'khor ba na 'khor zhing sems can rnams 'dul ba'i mthu ma thob tu zin kyang / de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras zhes bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
226a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na 'khor los sgyur ba bran mo dang // nyal bar gyur pa de las bu byung ba// bran mo las ni byung bar gyur kyang de// rgyal po'i sras shes 'jig rten zer ba ltar// byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa//
226a7(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gsum na 'khor zhing mthu rlung ste// sbyin dang thabs kyis sems can mi 'dul yang // sems can dag pa rgyal ba'i sras shes bya// / bam po gnyis pa ste za ma'o//
226b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bu gzhon nu stobs che zhing mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ mthu rnyed pa stong yod par gyur la/ de dag gang yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang /
226b2(dkon brtsegs): mi ldan na/ de dag la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sras su 'du shes mi skyed pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring ba nyan thos bye ba brgya stong de dag gang yang byang chub sems dpar ma
226b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'du shes mi bskyed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi bdag rgyal po'i sras stong po// 'ga' yang bu yi mtshan dang mi ldan na// de phyir de dag gces byed
226b4(dkon brtsegs): mi nus pas/ / de la mi mchog bu yi 'du shes med// de bzhin sangs rgyas zham 'bring bye ba mang // 'ga' yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin na// de na byang chub sems dpa' 'gab med phyir// de la bde gshe
226b5(dkon brtsegs): sras su dgongs mi mdzad/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa chags nas zhag
226b6(dkon brtsegs): bdun lon te/ 'byung ba chen po mer mer por 'dug kyang shin tu stobs dang ldan pas/ de la lha rnams re ba skyed kyi/ gzhon nu stobs che la mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan zhing mthu rnyed pa de dag la ni ma yin na
226b7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dbang po yongs su ma smin pa/ nyon
227a1(dkon brtsegs): @mongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po mer mer por gyur pa/ 'khor ba na 'khor zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub pa'ang shin tu stobs dang ldan pas/ de la sngon sangs/
227a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams re bskyed kyi/ dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa de dag la ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sangs rgyas kyi gdung mo 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro// de la
227a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo mchog/ de mngal bsod nams mtshan ldan sems can chags// stobs dang ldan pas lha rnams re bskyed// gzhon nu mthu thob rnams la ma yin/
227a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar// byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig sems gnas shing // 'khor bar gnas te byang chub tshol byed pa// de la lha dang klu rnams re ba skyed// rnam thar brgyad po bsam gtan byed la min//
227a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che bai DUn gcig gis mching bu'i nor bu'i phung po ri rab tsam zil gyis gnon to// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed
227a6(dkon brtsegs): pas kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na 'od gsal rin chen bai DUrmas// mching bu'i nor bu mang po zil gyis gnon// byang
227a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pas/ / nyan thos stong yang de ltar zil gyis gnon/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na bya ka la bing ka'i phrug gu sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa
227b1(dkon brtsegs): mig ma bye ba'ang 'di lta ste/ zab cing snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na/
227b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis mig khebs pa'ang 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba'i sbyor ba'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
227b3(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnon to/ / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa las gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa btsas ma thag tu/ tshong dpon dang / grong rdal
227b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi thams cad dang / rgyal phran thams cad phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa la'ang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag 'tsha
227b5(dkon brtsegs): lo/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sa bdag chen po rgyal po la// mtshan gyis lus spras bu zhig yod gyur na// gzhon nu de ni btsas par mthong ma thag/ grong khyer mi dang rgyal phran thams cad 'dud// de bzhin
227b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ni bskyed ma thag/ mtshan ldan rgyal ba'i sras po de la ni// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag 'tshal zhing // ba'i sems kyis shin tu gces par 'dzin// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po
227b7(dkon brtsegs): gangs ri la sman gang dag skye ba de dag thams cad ni nga yir bya ba med/ ris su bcad pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med de/ nad gang la btang yang nang de rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub
228a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ye shes kyi sman gang yang dag par sgrub pa de thams cad rnam par mi rtog par sgrub cing / sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis gso bar rab tu sbyor ro//
228a2(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na ri rgyal gangs kyi ri bo la// sman skyes de dag mi rtog ngar 'dzin med// gang la btang ba de kun zhi bar byed// kha cig nad dang rga ba'ang sel bar byed// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po
228a3(dkon brtsegs): shes sman/ / yang dag sgrub pa'ang rnam par rtog spangs nas// sems can phan phyir thams cad yang dag sgrub// snyoms pa'i sems kyis sems can gso bar byed// 'od srungs 'di
228a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na zla ba tshes pa la phyag 'tshal ba ltar/ nyal ba la ni ma yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du gang dag nga la rab tu dad pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bya'i// de bzhin
228a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams la ni de lta ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas tham cad byung ngo //
228a6(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zla ba tshes la thams cad phyag 'tshal gyi// zla ba nya la de ltar phyag mi 'tshal// de bzhin gang dag nga dang de dag gis// rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' phyag tshol cig/
228a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na yi ge'i phyi mo rnams ni bstan chos thams cad 'dzin pa shes pa'i sngon du 'gro'o// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'ang sangs rgyas
228b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / byin gyis brlabs thams cad badzin pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i sngon du 'gre'/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor btang ste/ sus kyang skar ma'i
228b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs la nem yang sngon phyag ma byas so/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa nga'i bslab pa la zhugs pa
228b3(dkon brtsegs): btang ste/ nyan thos la nam yang phyag mi 'tshal lo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sus kyang zla ba rnam par spangs nas su// skar ma'i tshogs la nam yang phyag ma byas// de bzhin bslab la zhugs pa nam du yang
228b4(dkon brtsegs): ngasras btang ste nyan thos phyag mi 'tshal/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mching bu'i nor bu byi ngor byas kyang / mching bu'i nor bu nam yang nor bu rin po che
228b5(dkon brtsegs): baiDUrmar mi 'gyur ro/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du nyan thos tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang ldan yang byang chub kyi snying po la
228b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis// mtshang bu'i nor
228b7(dkon brtsegs): bu byi dor byas kyang ni/ / mching bu dag ste bai DUR+Yar mi 'gyur// 'di 'dra de nyid de yi rang bzhin yin// de bzhin nyan thos khrims dang thos pa dang // bsam gtan ldan zhing sbyangs pa kun ldan yang // byang
229a1(dkon brtsegs): nub snying por 'dug ste bdud btul nas/ byang chub reg ste bde gshegs 'gyur ba med/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che bai n+dan gyi dor byas na/
229a2(dkon brtsegs): dekar sha pa Na brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi byi dor byas na/ de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor
229a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rin chen bai DUR+Ya ni sbyangs byas na/ kar sha pa Na mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas sras kyi sbyangs byas na// nyan thos mang po 'byung ba'i
229a4(dkon brtsegs): sgor 'gyur ro/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs yul gang du srin bu rnga mo dud ka zhes bya ba mgo nag gan rgyal
229a5(dkon brtsegs): du nyal ba byung na/ yul de 'jigs pa dang bcas/ 'tshe ba dang bcas/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas/ 'khrugs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs gal te yul der byang chub sems dpa' byung na/
229a6(dkon brtsegs): yul de 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don la brtson par
229a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ de dge ba'i rtsab thams cad yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ sems can thams cad la gtang bar bya'o// ye shes kyi sman gang tshol ba des
229b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bzhir song ste/ sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i gso ba bya'o// yang dag pa'i gso ba'i sems can rnams gso bar bya'o// 'od srungs de la yang dag pa'i gso ba gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste/
229b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang la byams pa dang / gti mug la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad la stong pa nyid dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan
229b3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dmigs pa yid la byed pa thams cad la mtshan ma med pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad la gnas pa spang ba'i phyir/ smon pa med pa
229b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / phyin ci log thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ phyin ci ma log pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du
229b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa la bdug tu 'du shes pa la chos thams cad la bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa la mya ngan las 'das pa
229b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi bas gso ba dang / lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la gnas pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/ de la lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang / lus kyi rjes
229b7(dkon brtsegs): su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang / tshor ba'i rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba can du
230a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang / sems kyi rdzas su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang / chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang / chos kyi rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung bas gso
230a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhis ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis ni lus dang sems la rol por 'dzin
230a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dor bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lngas ni ma dad pa dang / le lo dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes bzhin med pa rnams gso ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis ni chos
230a4(dkon brtsegs): la shin tu rmongs shing mi shes pa gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ni 'tshal ba'i shes rab dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams gso ba ste/ 'od srungs 'di
230a5(dkon brtsegs): ni yang dag pa'i gso ba zhes bya'o/ / 'od srungs byang chub sems dpas gso ba 'di la bslab par brtson par bya'o// 'od srungs 'dzam bu'i gling na sman pa dang / sman pa'i slob ma ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'tshe
230a6(dkon brtsegs): byed ni mchog ces bya'o/ / 'od srungs gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sman pa'i rgyal po 'tshe byed dang 'dra bar gyur kyang / de dag la la la zhig
230a7(dkon brtsegs): gis lta ba dang 'gyod pa la gnas pa gso ba'i sman gang yin zhes dris na/ de dag gis shes pa 'am/ bstan pa 'am/ bsgo bar mi nus so// 'od srungs de la byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bdag ni 'jig rten gyi
230b1(dkon brtsegs): sman gyis chog par mi bya'i/ bdag gis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman yongs su btsal bar bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang legs par yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o//
230b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar brtags nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang tshol ba des phyogs bzhir song la/ sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i gso ba bya ste/ yang dag pa'i gsobs sems can rnam gso bar bya'o//
