230b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od spangs de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes kyi sman gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgya rkyen la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bdag med pa dang / sems rkyen med pa dang / srog med pa dang // gso ba med pa dang / gang zag ma
230b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnams la mos pa'i shes pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la mi sdang ba dang / sems yongs su tshol ba'i brtson 'grus so// de 'di ltar yongs su tshol te/ 'dod chags par 'gyur/
230b5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gti mug par 'gyur ba'i sems de gang yin/ ci 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhig yin nam/ de la sems 'das pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'o//
230b6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni ma phyin pa'o// da ltar byung ba ni gnas pa med do snyam mo// 'od srungs sems ni nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// 'od srung
230b7(dkon brtsegs): sems ni dpyad du med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rten ma yin pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gnas med pa'o// 'od srungs sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs
231a1(dkon brtsegs): mi gzigs/ gzigs par mi 'gyur ro// log par zhugs pa'i 'du shes las chos rnams 'byung ba ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs
231a2(dkon brtsegs): mi gzigs/ gzigs par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu ba ci 'dra bar blta zhe na/ 'od srungs sems ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs te/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pas skye ba rnam pa mang po yongs su
231a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin to/ / 'od srungs sems ni babab chu'i rgyun dang mtshungs te/ mi gnas pa skyes nas 'jig cing 'ju ba'o// 'od srungs sems ni rlung dang mtshungs te/ ring du 'gro zhing gzung du med par rgyu ba'o//
231a4(dkon brtsegs): bod srungs sems ni mar me'i 'od 'phro ba dang mtshungs te/ rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung ba'o// 'od srungs sems ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa glo bur ba rnams kyis nye bar nyon mongs
231a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / 'od srungs sems ni glog dang mtshungs te/ skad cig tu 'jig cing mi gnas pa'o// 'od srungs sems ni sgye'u dang mtshungs te/ yul thams cad 'dod pa'o// 'od srungs sems ni las
231a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir/ ri mo mkhan dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni nyon mongs pa tha dad pa 'byung ba'i phyir/ mi gnas pa'o// 'od srungs sems ni gnyis pa mtshams
231a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba med pa'i phyir/ gcig pu rgyu ste gnyis su med pa'o// 'od srungs sems ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir/ rgyal po dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni sdug bsngal thams cad
231b1(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa'i phyir/ mi mdza' pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i phyir/ bye ma'i khang pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni mi rtag pa la rtag par
231b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa'i phyir/ zil pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyir/ nya'i mchil pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni bdag med pa la
231b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyir/ rmi lam dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa'i phyir/ sbrang ma sngon po dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni gnod pa
231b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa mang po byed pas/ phyir rgol ba dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni rtag tu klan ka tshol ba'i phyir/ gnod sbyin mdangs 'phrog pa dang mtshungs so// bod srungs sems ni rtag tu glags lta bas/
231b5(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang ldan pas/ rtag par mthon dman can no// 'od srungs sems ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rku bas/ chom rkun dang mtshungs so// 'od
231b6(dkon brtsegs): srungs sems ni gzugs la dga' bas/ phyi byi zho la'i mig dang mtshung so// 'od srungs sems ni sgra la dga' bas/ g.yul gyi rnga dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sems ni phag mi gtsang ba'i dri la dga' ba bzhin du
231b7(dkon brtsegs): dri la dga' 'o/ / 'od srungs sems ni ro la dga' bas/ zas kyi lhag ma za ba'i bran mo dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs sem+ba ni reg pa la dga' bas/ sbrang ma 'bru mar gyi snod la chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'od srungs
232a1(dkon brtsegs): sems ni kun tu btsal na mi rnyed do/ / gang mi rnyed pa de ni mi dmigs pa'o// gang mi dmigs pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//
232a2(dkon brtsegs): gang 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa de ni dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'o// gang dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa de ni yod pa'ang ma
232a3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ med pa'ang ma yin no// gang yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa de ni ma skyes pa'o// gang ma skyes pa de la ngo bo nyid med do// gang ngo bo nyid med pa de la 'byung ba med do// gang 'byung ba med
232a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de la 'gag pa med do/ / gang 'gag pa med de la 'bral ba med do// gang 'bral ba med pa de la 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ 'chi 'pho'ang med/ skye ba'ang med do// gang la 'ong ba'ang med//
232a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'ang med/ 'chi 'pho'ang med/ skye ba'ang med pa de la 'du byed gang yang med do// gang la 'du byed gang yang med pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// gang 'dus ma byas pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi/
232a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs so// 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la bslab pa'ang med/ bslab pa las 'das pa'ang med do// gang la bslab pa'ang med/ bslab pa las 'das pa'ang med pa de la rgyu ba'ang med/ mi rgyu
232a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang med/ rab tu rgyu ba'ang med do// gang la rgyu ba'ang med/ mi rgyu ba'ang med/ rab tu rgyu ba'ang med pa de sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med do// gang la sems kyang med/ sems las
232b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med pa de la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med do// gang la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med pa de la bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med do// gang
232b2(dkon brtsegs): la bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa de ni// 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la ni/ las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med do// gang la las kyang
232b3(dkon brtsegs): med/ las mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med pa'i rigs de la ni/ lus kyi las byed pa'ang med do// ngag gis ma yin/ yid kyis ma yin no// rigs de las mtha' ma dang / 'bring dang / mchog tu rnam par gzhag pa'ang med do//
232b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o// rigs de ni chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir khyad par med pa'o// rigs de ni lus dang sems dben pa'i phyir dben pa'o// rigs
232b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mthun pa'o/ / rigs de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'o// rigs de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pas nga'i ba med pa'o// rigs de ni//
232b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa mnyam pa las byung ba ste/ mi mnyam pa med pa'o// rigs de ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin pas bden pa'o// rigs de ni gtan du mi skye ba'i phyir mi zad pa'o// rigs de ni//
232b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyir rtag pa'o// rigs de ni mya ngan las 'das pa mchog gi phyir bde ba'o// rigs de ni rnam pa thams cad du dri ma med pa'i phyir dge ba'o// rigs de ni bdag yongs su brtsal
233a1(dkon brtsegs): te ma rnyed pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o/ / rigs de ni rab tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o// 'od srungs nang du yongs su tshol la phyi rol du ma rgyu gcig/ 'od srungs ma 'ongs pa'i
233a2(dkon brtsegs): dus na/ dge slong khyi rdo la snyeg pa dang mtshungs pa dag 'byung ngo // 'od srungs ji ltar na dge slong khyi rdo la snyeg pa dang mtshungs pa ngag yin zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper ni khyin rdos 'jigs la/ rdo de nyid kyi phyir
233a3(dkon brtsegs): snyeg gi rdo de sus 'phangs pa de la ni mi snyeg go/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du 'di la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg byas 'jigs shing skrag nas/ dgon pa'i gnas rnams na
233a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing / de dag de na gcig pu gnyis su med par lus rab tu dben par 'jug ste/ chags par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams snang bar gyur na/ de dag de la btang snyoms su
233a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jog cing / bsod nyams su sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas kyi/ nang du so sor rtog pa la mngon par mi brtson te/ de dag gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams las cis 'byung ba mi shes shing khong
233a6(dkon brtsegs): du mi chud do/ / de dag gis de ma shes shing khong du ma chud pas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu song na'ang / gzugs dang /
233a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyis gnod par 'gyur ro// gal te de dag dgon pa la gnas pa las 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ 'jig rten pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa de dag mtho ris kyi
233b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ der yang de dag lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gos gnod par 'gyur ro// de dag de nas sho 'phos nas ngan song bzhi las yongs su ma grol bar 'gyur te/
233b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin no// 'od srungs de ltar na dge slong khyi rdol snyeg pa dang mtshungs pa dag yin
233b3(dkon brtsegs): no/ / 'od srungs ji ltar na khyi rdo la snyeg pa dang mi 'dra ba yin zhe na/ 'od srungs gang gshe'ang slar mi gshe/ khros kyang slar mi khro// mtshang brus kyang slar mtshang mi 'dru/ brdegs kyang slar mi rdeg/
233b4(dkon brtsegs): bsdogs kyang slar mi sdig/ smad kyang slar mi smod cing / nang du sems la so sor rtog ste/ 'di la gshe ba 'am/ khros pa 'am/ brdegs pa 'am/ bsdigs pa 'am/ smad pa 'am// ma tshang brus pa de dag
233b5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin snyam du so sor rtog pa'o/ / 'od srungs de ltar na dge slong khyi rdo la snyeg pa dang mi 'dra ba yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na khyi ni rdo bas skrag gyur kyang / sus 'phangs mi
233b6(dkon brtsegs): snyeg rdo la snyeg par byed/ de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze la la dag/ gzugs la sogs pas skrag nas dgon par gnas// de dag dgon pa de la gnas gyur kyang // gzugs la sogs pa sdug pa mthong
233b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ / btang snyoms 'jog cing nang gi tshul mi shes// de yi nyes las byung ba gang yin pa// mi shes pas na slar yang grong du gnas// gzugs la sogs pas der yang gnod par 'gyur/
234a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dir yang rgya yo longs stod byung gyur te// lha dang mi las bcig shi phos nas// de dag ngan song sar ni ltung bar 'gyur// blun po de dag shi'i phos sdug bsngal 'gyur
234a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sdug bsngal brgya ldan de dag ni/ / khyi rdo sgeg pa 'dra zhes bde gshegs gsungs// spyos kyang mig she brdeg kyang mi rdeg dang / su zhig smad kyang smod par mi byed dang // de bzhin mtshang brus mtshang
234a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dru mo byed dang / / zos kyang nges pa khro bar mi byed cing // nang gi sems kyi gnyen por gyur pa dag / tshil zhing ying gi dran dang ldan gyur pa// de 'dra'i tshul khrims brtul zhugs ldan pa ni// rdo steg gyo ma
234a4(dkon brtsegs): nis rgyal bas gsungs/ / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rta'i 'dul sbyong la mkhas pas rta gang dang gang du g.yo byed cing ma byung ba de dang de rab tu stong ngo // 'od srungs de bzhin du dag
234a5(dkon brtsegs): slo rnal 'byor spyod pa'ang gang dang gang du sem+bu 'gyur bar mthong ba de dang der rab tu sbyong ba la 'jug ste/ de ci nas phyis 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sem+ba rab tu 'chos so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na
234a6(dkon brtsegs): te yo dul sbyod mi khra pa zhig byung shing gis ming tshul du rab tu 'dul/ / zhal 'byor pa yang sems ni 'gyur mthong nas// ji ltar phyis pa brug mi 'gyur de ltar 'chos 'od srung ba
234a7(dkon brtsegs): dper na sgog nad lha gong gyis ni srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed de/ / ded srungs de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa tham cad kyi nang na bdag tu 'dzin pa ni chos kyi srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed pa'o// de la 'ad skad cesaH
234b1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na lha gor srog gi dbang po la// gnod cing de la bde ba sbyin pa min// de bzhin ltar gyur nang na bdag lta ba// de ni chos srog rnam par 'jig par byed/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi ni
234b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dang gang du bcings pa de dang de nyid las dgrol bar bya ba yin no/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems gang dang gang la chag pa de dang de las dgrol bar bya ba yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
234b3(dkon brtsegs): dper na mi ni gang du bcings gyur pa// de dang de las dgrol bar bya ba yin// de bzhin sem rmongs gang dang gang chags pa// rnal 'byor pas ni de dang de las dgrol// 'od srung 'di gnyis ni/
234b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba'i nam mkha' la yongs su chags pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig yongs su tshol ba dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos lhag par 'chang ba ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces
234b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen goms byed brtson pa dang // lhung bzed chos gos lhag par 'chang byed pa// 'di gnyis nam mkha' la ni chags pa ste// de dag byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya//
234b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i 'ching ba dam po ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ lta bar gyur pa'i 'ching ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshogs su bcad pa'i 'ching ba ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad
234b7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ lta gyur 'ching dang rnyed dang bkur sti dang // grag pa'i 'ching ba rab tu byung ba yi// 'ching ba dam zhes 'phags pa rnams kyis gsungs// de dag rtag tu rab tu byung bas spang // 'od srungs 'di
235a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i bar du gcod pa'i chos te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ khyim pa'i phyogs la rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i phyogs la gnod par sems pa ste/ 'di gcis
235a2(dkon brtsegs): so/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ khyim pa'i phyogs la rten par byed pa dang // 'phags pa'i phyogs la rnam par spong byed pa// 'di gnyis rab byung bar chad bgegs byed yin// byang chub sems dpas de
235a3(dkon brtsegs): dag rnam par spang / 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i dri ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa la mi mdzad pa dang / mdza' bo'i khyim dang zas ster ba'i khyim yong su 'dzin pa
235a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rab tu byung ba nyon mongs mi mjed dang // mdza' bo'i khyim dang zas ster khyim rten pa// de gnyis dri mar rgyal ba'i dbang pos gsungs// byang chub sem pas
235a5(dkon brtsegs): dag rnam par spang / 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i ser ba 'bab pa ste// gnyis gang zhe na/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / tshul khrims las nyams kyang dad pas byin pa yongs su
235a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dam pa'i chos ni spong ba dang // tshul khrims nyams kyang spyod pa ste// ser ba 'bab pa 'di gnyis ni// rgyal sras rnams kyis spang bar bya/
235a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i rma yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ pha rol gyi nyes pa la so sor rtog pa dang / bdag gonyes pa 'chab pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la'adi skad ces bya ste/
235b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi skyon ni 'chab byed dang // pha rol nyes la rtog byed pa// 'di gnyis dug gi me dang 'dra// rtogs pa rnams kyis rma 'di spang // 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i yongs
235b2(dkon brtsegs): su gdung ba ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ rnyog pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ngur smrig 'chang ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan ldan pa las bsnyen bkur dang rim gro bya ba bdag gir byed pa ste/ 'di
235b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis so/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyog dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ngur smrig 'chung ba dang // bsnyen 'akur rim gro byed dang gus par smra ba dag/ tshul khrims ldan pa rnams las sten par byed pa ste/
235b4(dkon brtsegs): chos gnyis 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ba yin/ 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i zug rngu ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bslab pa'i gzhi las g.yo ba dang / snying po ma blangs par 'a
235b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus byed pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga 'gal bar gyur pa dang // snying po ma blangs par ni dus byed pa// 'di gnyis rab tu byung ba'i zug rngu zhes// lha mi'i ston pa
235b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ 'od srungs 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i nad gsor mi rung ba ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sems nges pa sems pa dang / theg pa chen
235b7(dkon brtsegs): po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams kyi 'dun pa zlog pa ste/ 'di gnyis so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal sems la nges sems dang // sangs rgyas theg pa las ni
236a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa zlog/ 'di gnyis rab tu byung ba'i nang yin zhes// gang zag mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal bas gsungs/ 'od srungs dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ji
236a2(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis na ngage slong dge sbyong zhe bya zhe na/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyong dang / cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong dang / brjod pa'i sgra
236a3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong dang / yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong ngo // 'od srungs de la kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong kha cig kha dog dang
236a4(dkon brtsegs): rtags kyi dbyibs dang ldan par gyur te/ chos gos snam sbyar gyon cing mgo bregs te/ lag na lhung bzed thogs mod kyi/ de lus kyi las yongs su ma dag par spyod/ ngag gi las yongs su ma dag par spyod / yid kyi las
236a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma dag par spyod cing / ma dul ba/ ma zhi ba/ ma bsrungs pa/ ma byang ba/ 'tsho ba yongs su ma ngag pa/ brkam pa/ le lo can/ tshul khrims 'chal po/ sdig pa'i chos can yin te/ 'od srungs de ni kha dog dang /
236a6(dkon brtsegs): rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong kha cig cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / spyod pa phun sum
236a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs shing spyod lam bzhir shes bzhin du spyod la/ zas dang skom ngan pa za 'thung // 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag gis rlog par 'dzin/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams
236b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mi 'dre la tshig nyung zhing smra ba nyung mod kyi/ de'i spyod lam de dag kyang tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gis yongs su brtags pa yin te/ sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin//
236b2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi/ dmigs par lta ba yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas shing / stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la g.yang sa ra 'du shes pa yin/ stong pa nyid smra/
236b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dge slong rnam la'ang dgrar 'du shes pa yin te/ 'od srungs de ni cho ga srungs zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong
236b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong kha cig ji ltar bdag tshul khrims dang ldan par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas tshul khrims srungs// ji ltar mang du thos par gzhan gyi sa bar 'gyur snyam
236b5(dkon brtsegs): du so sor brtags nas thos pa 'dzin/ ji ltar bdag dgon pa par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas/ dgon pa la gnas shing so sor brtags nas/ 'dod pa nyung la chog shes pa
236b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rab tu dben par gyur te/ 'di ltar gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir yin gyi/ skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'gog par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin//
236b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ dge sbyong gi phyir ma yin/ tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin te/ 'od srungs de ni brjod pa'i sgra tshogs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong
237a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / 'od srungs de la yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srungs gang lus dang srog la'ang mi lta ba yinan/ rnyed pa dang / bkur d+hi/
237a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshigs su bcad pa la lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams thos na dga' zhing de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang 'dod pa med par
237a3(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod na khams gsum pa la mngon par dga' ba lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid du lta ba'ang mi 'dod pa yin na/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang /
237a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zag tu lta ba lta ci smos/ don la rton gyi/ tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam par thar pa nang du tshel gyi/ phyi rol du rgyug pa ma yin/ chos thams cad shin tu yongs su dag cing
237a5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med par mthong bas/ bdag nyid skyabs yin te/ gzhan skyabs ma yin// de de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyid du'ang mi lta na/ gzugs kyi skur lta ci smos/ chos
237a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod chags dang bral bar yang mi lta na/ smra ba'i tshig gi lam nas brjod par lta ci smos/ 'phags pa 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun la'ang rnam par mi rtog na/ mang po 'dus par lta ci smos/ chos
237a7(dkon brtsegs): gang spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'khor bar yang mi skye/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mngon par dga' ba ma yin/ thar pa'ang
237b1(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs/ bcings pa'ang ma yin la/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig nas/ kun tu mi 'khor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yin te/ 'od srungs de ni yang
237b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ / 'od srungs yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur bar brtson par bya'i/ ming gis gnod par ni mi bya ste/ 'od srungs dge sbyong ni bzhi po 'di dag go// de la 'di
237b3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig lus dang ngag dang sems ma dag/ ma dul ma bsrungs ma byang 'dod chen can// mgo bregs chos gos lhung bzed lag na thogs// de ni dbyibs rtags dge sbyong yin zhes bstan// cho ga
237b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa la sogs ldan gyur cing / / kha zas ngan za tshul 'chos la sogs sten// 'du 'dzi rgyang ring yongs su spong byed cing // spyod lam pa phags pa'i rigs dang ldan gyur kyang // de yi de kun dul bar bya phyir mi ma//
237b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi phyir ma yin skyo bar bya phyir min// stong pa mtshan med g.yang sar 'du shes pa// cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos gnyis pa yin// tshul khrims ting 'dzin sbyangs pa'i yon tan thos// gzhan dag ngo mtshar
237b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du gzhug phyir byed/ / zhi phyir ma yin skyo bar bya phyir min// brjod dang grags 'dod dge sbyong gsum pa yin// gang zhig lus srog don du mi gnyer zhing // rnyed dang bkur sti la ni rgyab kyis phyogs//
237b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa bskyed pa'i sgo thos nas// srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad don mi gnyer// chos rnams shin tu stong par yongs brtags nas// mya ngan 'das dang ma 'das mthong mi 'gyur// chos la
238a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags bral bar rtag tu tog/ ma byas chos rtogs mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi dbul po zhig la mdzod 'byor pa nas
238a2(dkon brtsegs): ming btags na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi dbul po de dang ming de mthun pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung
238a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag dge sbyong dang bram ze'i yon tan dang mi ldan pa de dag ni gsung rab 'di las mi dbul po zhes ngas bshad do/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na
238a4(dkon brtsegs): dbul por gyur pa'i mi zhig la/ / mdzod ldan ming btag de la mdzes ma yin// dge sbyong nyams la dge sbyong ming mi mdzes// dbul la phyug ces btags pa'i dpe dang mtshungs// 'ong
238a5(dkon brtsegs): srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig rgya mtsho'i chu chen pos khyer la/ chus skom bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig chos mang po blangs te kun
238a6(dkon brtsegs): chub par byas kyang / 'dod chags la sred pa mi sel/ zhes sdang la sred pa mi sel/ gti mug la sred pa mi sel ba de dag chos kyi rgya mtshos khyer la/ nyon mongs pa'i skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byed
238a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chus khyer la// de ni skom zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur// de bzhin chos mang sred pas bag med pa// chos kyi
238b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtshor gnas kyang ngan song 'gro/ / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa sman sgra thogs te phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rgyu ba de nad cig gis btab nas/ nang de gso mi nus na/ de'i
238b2(dkon brtsegs): sman de ni don med pa yin no/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang du blta ste/ gang mang du zos pa des bdag nyon mongs pa'i nad las gso mi nus na/ de'i mang du thos pa de ni don med
238b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sman pa'i smad sgor bathug pa'i sman// 'jig rten kun tu yongs su rgyu byed kyang // nad kyis btab pa zlog par mi nus na// de yi sman de don med gyur pa yin// de
238b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dge sbyong tshul khrims yon tan ldan/ / thos dang ldan yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i// nyon mongs byung ba'i nad ni mi sel na// de yi thos la brtson pa don med yin// 'od srungs
238b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na mi nad pa zhig la rgyal po la 'os pa'o sman btang la/ cho ga bzhin ma byas pas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs gang mi sdom pa des 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'ang mang du thos
238b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang du blta'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal por 'os pa'i sman btang na// chog ma byas mi de shi bar gyur// de bzhin gang mi sdom pas 'dir shi ba// de ni mang du zos pa'i nyon mo
238b7(dkon brtsegs): nad/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che mi gtsang ba'i nang du lhung na smad par 'gyur zhing / 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du mang du thos pa dang rnyid pa dang bkur gyi
239a1(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang ba'i nang du lhung bar blta ste/ cibang med pa la ni lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi gtsang rin chen byung ba spyad// ji ltar ro//
239a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ni phyis ma yin// dge sbyong mang du thos par gyur pa yang // bkur sti'i mi gtsang lhung ba de 'drar bshad// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na mi ro'i mgo la gser gyi ba phreng ba
239a3(dkon brtsegs): btags pa de bzhin du/ tshul khrims 'chal pa ngur smrig gyon par blta'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi ro'i mgo la gser 'phreng ngam// yang na me tog 'phreng ba gdags byas pa// de bzhin khrims
239a4(dkon brtsegs): med ngur smrig gyon pa yang / / mthong nas de la yid ni dad mi 'gyur// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig legs par khrus byas te/ legs par rnam par byugs la/ sgra dang
239a5(dkon brtsegs): srin mo bregs nas/ gos dkar po bgos te/ tsan dan mchog gis bskus pa'i mgo la tsam pa ka'i me tog gi 'phreng ba thogs pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs tshul khrims dang ldan zhing mang du zos pa ngur smrig gyon par
239a6(dkon brtsegs): blta'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ legs bkrus legs par byugs pa yi// tshong dpon bu yi mgo bo la// tsam pa ka yi me tog 'phreng // dri zhim yid 'ong btags pa mdzes// de bzhin tshul khrims ldan gyur
239a7(dkon brtsegs): ci / mang thos tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// rgyal ba'i sras po yon tan ldan// de la ngur smrig de bzhin mdzes/ 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims
239b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di la dge slong kha cig tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams shing gnas/ cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum
239b2(dkon brtsegs): tshigs/ kha na ma tho ba phra rab rnams la'ang 'jigs par lta/ yang dag par blangs te bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la slob cing / lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yong su dag pa
239b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gnas pas/ 'tsho ba yongs su dag kyang de bdag tu smra ba yin te/ 'od srungs de ni tshul khrim 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa dang po'o// 'od srungs gzhan yang 'di la dge slong
239b4(dkon brtsegs): kha cig 'dul ba 'dzin cing / / 'dul ba la zhugs te/ 'dul ba'i tshul la gnas pa yin yang // 'jig tshe ga la lta ba las ma bskyod pa yin te/ 'od srung nge ni tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrim+ba dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa
239b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa'o/ / 'od srungs gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig byams pa la gnas pa yin te/ sems can la dmigs pa'i byam pa dang ldan pa yin yang / 'du byed thams cad la skye ba med pa thos na skrag ste kun tu dngang bar
239b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing kun tu rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ba de ni/ 'od srungs tshul khrimra 'chal pa tshul khrim dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa gsum pa'o// 'od srungs gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig spang pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag
239b7(dkon brtsegs): par blad kyang / dmigs par lta ba yin te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa de ni/ 'od srungs tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa bzhi pa ste/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag
240a1(dkon brtsegs): ni tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa yin no/ / 'od srungs tshul khrims tshul khrims shes bya ba ni gang la bdag med pa dang / bdag gib med pa dang
240a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba med pa dang / mi bya ba'ang med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / byed pa med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / rgyu ba ma yin pa dang / mi rgyu ba'ang ma yin pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa'ang ma yin pa
240a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / ming med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / rab tu zhi ba ma yin pa dang / rab tu ma zhi ba'ang ma yin pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'dor ba med pa dang
240a4(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can du 'dogs pa med pa dang / tshig med pa dang / tshig tu 'dogs pa med pa dang / sems med pa dang / sems su 'dogs
240a5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang / 'jig rten med pa dang / 'jig rten med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / rten med pa dang / rten med pa'ang ma yin pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan gyi tshul khrims la mi
240a6(dkon brtsegs): smod pa dang / tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa dang // tshul khrims la mi rtog pa yin te/ de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi tshul khrims zag pa med pa/ rtog pa ma yin pa/ khams gsum pa dang bral ba/
240a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad med pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// tshul khrims ldan la dri ma med cing ci sang med/ tshul khrims ldan la rgyags pa med de rten pa med// rtsu
240b1(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldan la mun pa med cing 'ching ba med/ / tshul khrims ldan la rdul rnams med de nyes pa med// zhi ba rab tu zhi nye bar zhi ba'i yid// rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral zhing nyon mongs med// g.yo ba
240b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ni rlom sems kun dang rnam bral ba/ / de ni 'od srungs sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// lus la mi lta srog la 'phangs par 'dzin mi byed// srid pa rnams su skye ba kun la 'dod pa med// yang
240b3(dkon brtsegs): dag zhugs shing de nyid tshul la rab gnas pa/ / de ni 'od srung sadra rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// 'jig rten mgos 'jig rten dag la gnas pa med// snang ba thob cing bdag gi med de ci yang med// bdag tu 'du shes
240b4(dkon brtsegs): med cing gzhan du 'du shes med/ / 'du shes yongs su shes pas tshul khrims rnam par dag/ gang la tshu rol med cing ba rol dbus kyang med// pha rol tshu rol dag la nams kyang mi chags shing // bcings
240b5(dkon brtsegs): dang chags med tshul 'chos med cing zag pa med/ / de ni 'od srungs sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan// ming dang gzugs rnams la ni chags pa med pa'i yid// de ni mnyam par gzhag cing shin tu dul
240b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems/ / gang la bdag med bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa ni// de tsam gyis ni tshul khrims gnas shes brjod pa yin// so sor thar pa slob pas rlom sems byed pa med// des ni 'di na de la chags par ni
240b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ / de yi gong du 'phags pa'i lam rnams tshol byed pa// de ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan ma'o// tshul khrims gtso bor ma yin ting 'dzin der chags med// de yi gong du shes
241a1(dkon brtsegs): rab bsgom pa yongs su tshol/ / dmigs pa med pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs yin te// tshul khrims de ni bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bsngags// 'jigs pa'i tshogs la lha las rnam
241a2(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba'i yid/ / de 'dir nga dang nga yi snyam du 'gyur ba med// sangs rgyas spyod yul stong pa nyid la lhag par mos// de yi tshul khrims de ni mnyam pa med pa'o// tshul khrims la ni gnas nas ting nge 'dzin kyang thob//
241a3(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin rnams thob nas shes rab shin tu smom// shes rab kyis rnaM ma shes rnam par dag pa 'thob/ ye shes rnam par dag pas rdul khrims thun sum tshogs// rigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrus
241a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di gsungs pa'i tshe/ / dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa
241a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag go/ dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgya ni chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos pas stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
241a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgya po 'di dag chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs ma mos pas stan las langs te mchi so//
241a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs 'di ltar dge slong mngon pa'i nga rgyal can 'di dag ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa zag pa med pa 'di la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtogs mi mos shing skrag ste/ kun tu dngangs/
241b1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu dngangs so// 'od srungs tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa zab pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub zab ste/ de la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs
241b2(dkon brtsegs): su zin pa dang / mos pa mi mang ba dag gis mos par mi nus so// 'od srungs dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la mu stegs can gyi nyan thos su gyur te/ de dag de bzhin /
241b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'od srungs la brgal ba'i bsam pas chos bstan pa gcig thos so// thos nas dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed de/ ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
241b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od srungs 'jam zhing snyan par gsung ba ngo mtshar to snyam mo/ / de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed pa des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// de dag de nas shi 'phos
241b5(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dir skyes te/ rgyu de nyid kyis nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ste/ 'od srungs dge slong lnga brgya po lta bar bying ba 'di dag ni chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtoglo mo mos shing skrag ste/ kun tu dngangs/
241b6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu dngangs so// yang 'di dag ni chos bstan pa 'dis yongs su sbyang ba byas te/ phyis ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing / phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// de nas
241b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod song la dge slong de dag kun shes par byos shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis
242a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag la bshad na'ang mthun par mi bgyid na/ bdag la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag lam gang nas 'dong ba'i lam der dge slong gnyis
242a2(dkon brtsegs): shig sprul pa sprul to/ / de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de gnyis lam gang nas 'dong ba'i lam der dong ste/ phyin pa dang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'dong //
242a3(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas par bya bar 'dong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa gang
242a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i chos bstan pa de la mi 'jug ste/ mi rtogs mi mos shing skrag ste/ kun tu dang ngas/ kun tu rab tu dngangs par gyur nas/ kho bo cag dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg
242a5(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o/ / dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad pa la mi 'jug ste/ ma rtogs
242a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mos shing skrag ste/ kun tu dngangs/ kun tu rab tu dngangs par gyur to// de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o//
242a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de'i phyir bdag cag yang dag par 'gro bar bya'o// rtsod par mi bya'o// rtsod pa med pa lhur len pa ni dge sbyong gi chos so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gang 'di yongs su
242b1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos de gang lus 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ skyes bu'am/ gang zag gam/
242b2(dkon brtsegs): shed lnga skyes sam/ shed bu 'am/ gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ gang zad pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'dod chags zad/ zhe sdang zad/ gti mug zad pas
242b3(dkon brtsegs): yong+ga su mya ngan las 'da'o/ / sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod chags dang / zhe dang dang / gti mug yod pa yin nam/ ci na de zad par bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ de dag ni nang na'ang med/ phyi rol
242b4(dkon brtsegs): na'ang med/ gnyis ka med pa la'ang mi dmigs te/ de dag ni yongs su ma brtags pa las kyang mi skye'o// sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta bas na ma rtog rnam par ma rtog cig/ tshe dang
242b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag nam mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de na chags par yang mi 'gyur/ chags pa dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur ro// chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba'ang med pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes

249b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang ldan pa dang / rnam par grol ba snying po lhur len pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la som nyi med cing / the tsom mi za ba dang / 'phags pa'i spyod yul la gnas
249b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa bsgoms pa dang / dad pa'i dbang
249b3(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / chos la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
249b4(dkon brtsegs): la shes nas dang pa dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / srid pa bcom pa dang /
249b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs pa dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin la mkhas pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa dang / shes rab kyis lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / stobs lnga dang ldan pa
249b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsam gtan pa dang / chos rnams kyi brten pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lam shes pa
249b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / lam la mkhas pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong bsgom pa la mkhas pa dang / so so yang dag par
250a1(dkon brtsegs): y-i d+han phywa gan gyi byu pa 'dzag sa dang byA nga / don ma na ca gyu sodog padang / ma ba sa na pa sa pasna/
250a2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'das pa dang / phung po yongs su shes bsrung ba dang / non mongs pa bsal ba dang / ba ma'i lus 'dzin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi sam las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
250a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang dag par yongs su shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba la zhugs pa dang / lam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi
250a4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su zhug pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mthong ba dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / ston pa'i bstan pa la bya ba byas pa dang / byed pa byas pa dang / zag pa
250a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba dang / sngon tu sprod pa dang bsam pa phun sum tshogs
250a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa dang / spungs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa dang / blo gya gru med pa dang / rab tu
250b1(dkon brtsegs): byung nas khyim gyi gnas dang mi 'dre ba dang / bse ru ltar gcig pu rgyu ba dang / 'du 'jis 'jigs skrag pa dang / khams gsum las rnam par grol ba dang / rtag tu 'jigs pa'i
250b2(dkon brtsegs): yid dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi tshul la gnas pa dang / thams cad la 'dod pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa
250b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma grags pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs
250b4(dkon brtsegs): te gnas pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba dang / 'khrul pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems
250b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la de'i sems mi chags mi 'ching ste/ dper na nam mkha' la lag mthil bzhin du mi chags mi 'ching ba yin te/
250b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs dge sbyong gi chos rnam pa de lta bu de dag dang ldan na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad
250b7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi yon tan 'di dag yang
251a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par yang
251a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par bsgrubs pa nub par bgyid pa/ dge sbyong ma lags la dge sbyong du mchid kyis 'che zhing / tshangs par spyod pa ma lags par tshangs par spyod par mchid kyis 'che ba'i dge slong
251a3(dkon brtsegs): la la dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs nga dang / khyod dang / nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing

251a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa/ byis pa/ dman pa/ glen pa/ rmongs pa/ rab tu
251a6(dkon brtsegs): ma zhi ba/ ma dul ba kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi g.yo dang / sgyu dang / mi drang ba dang / gya gyu dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dge sbyong gi skyon rnams brjod par
251a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / 'od srungs de la dge sbyong gi dri ma rnams gang zhe na/ 'od srungs sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ de dag spangs nas dge sbyong
251b1(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ / sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnam par
251b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag la bstod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gzhan la brnyas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mi mthun pa'i rnyed pa kun tu tshol
251b3(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dad pas byin pa chud gzon pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / ltung ba 'chab pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /

251b5(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi rnyed pas chog par mi 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / pha rol bsod nams kyis rnyed pa la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa dge sbyong gi dri ma
251b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / pha rol gyi rnyed pa la 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yongs su tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma
251b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / so sor thar pa dang 'dul ba mi srung ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / kha ltar mu cor smra ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / ma gus pa dang / rgod pa dang / khengs
252a1(dkon brtsegs): bdage slong ka dri ma dang / wA bas kun nas dkris pa dge slong gi drim dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'gal pa dge slong ba rnaMm dang / mthar sgrub la gnas
252a2(dkon brtsegs): don stong gi dri ma dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dge slong gi dris dang / mu d+ham las 'das pa la mngon par mi dga' bdag slong gad+ha ma dang / 'dzi rten kyang 'bar ba'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa sa
252a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyong ba dri ma dang / sgrib pas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba dge slong kyi dri ma dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skrag pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / chos zab mo spong ba
252a4(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa dge slong gi dri ma dang / dkon mchog gsum la mi gus pa dge slong gi dri ma ste/ 'od srungs sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni dge slong gi dri ma ste/ de dag spangs na dge sbyong dge
252a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyong zhes bya'o/ / 'od srungs brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi sgrib pa ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tha ma rnams la mi gus pa dang / chos rnams la rim po med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma
252a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yid la byed pa dang / ma thos pa'i mdo sde spong ba dang / bdag med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa'i chos kyis skrag pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos bstan pa la mi 'jug gi/ 'dus byas

252b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi sgrib pa ste rab tu byung bas de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ / 'od srungs dge sbyong ni kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyis dge sbyong zhes nga mi 'chad kyi
252b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi chos la nan tan byed pa'i dge sbyong ni dge sbyong ngo zhes ngas bshad do/ / 'od srungs dge sbyong gis ni rnyog pa med pa'i sems kyis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir
252b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'od srungs rnyog pa med pa la ngas ngur smrig gnang gi/ 'od srungs gang rnyog pa dang bcas pas lus la ngur smrig dag 'chang ba de dag thams cad ni ngur smrig tshig pa'o zhes bshad de/ ngas ma
252b4(dkon brtsegs): pas mos pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin pa'i phyir te/ skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral bar spyod pa rnams kyi gos 'di dag ni nye bar zhi ba'i rjes su
252b5(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa byams pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o/ / 'od srungs de la 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan gang zhe na/ 'od srungs bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/ bcu
252b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'od srungs tshul khrims 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ting nge 'dzin 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / shes rab 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol

253a1(dkon brtsegs): cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bsam gtan bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / tshad med pa bzhi 'phags pa rnam/
253a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal mtshan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / skyon med pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / zag pa zad pa 'phags pa rnams
253a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal mtshan te/ 'od srungs bcu gnyis po de dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan no// 'od srungs gang la la rgyal mtshan 'di dag dang mi ldan par 'phags pa'i rigs gos ngur smrig dag 'chang ba
253a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni nor pa'i chos la zhugs pa'o zhes ngas bshad do/ / chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa zhes bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las ring du gnas pa zhes bshad do// mya ngan

253a6(dkon brtsegs): snying po ma blangs pa zhes bshad do// chos las nyams pa zhes bshad do// nyam nga ba'i lam la gnas pa zhes bshad do// 'od srungs de lta bas na dge sbyong gis lus la ngur

253b5(dkon brtsegs): su gyur bzhin du gos 'bar ba dag dang / mgo 'bar ba dag dang / lhung bzed 'bar ba dag dang / stan 'bar ba dag dang / mal cha 'bar ba dag gnod pa byed de/ de dag gi longs spyod dang /

253b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa

255a1(dkon brtsegs): mi thun po tshul khrims 'tshal pas tha na skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i cha tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad na'ang / sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag de yongs su

255a3(dkon brtsegs): pas dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad par bya'o zhes khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong nyis brgyas bstan pa 'di thos nas//

255a6(dkon brtsegs): tu kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba rnam pa 'di lta bu dag gis gsung rab 'di mdzes so/ / 'od srungs ngas dge slong gnyis la dad pas byin pa gnang ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ ldan pa dang
255a7(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'o/ / yang gnyis te/ gang 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag par lta ba dang / gang yang sems rnam par grol ba byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'o// dge slong dag de la dge slong
255b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnal 'byor spyod pa nga'i bstan pa la zhugs pa gang zhig sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag las chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad
