255b3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar rtogs pas ni ri rab tsam gyi kham dag gis dad pas byin pa yongs su smad kyang / de'i yon shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag
255b4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag las dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa de las de dag gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 'byor pa chen po dang phan yon chen por 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag rdzas
255b5(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnams pas/ gang byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa de mchog yin pa'i phyir ro// dge slong dag dge slong gang zhig sbyin pa po dang /
255b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin bdag gi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / yo byad rnams yongs su spyad nas/ sems rnam par grol ba tshad med pa la snyoms par 'jug na sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de'i
255b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'ang tshad med par shes par bya'o/ / 'od srungs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i rgya mtsho chen po rnams ni yongs su zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/
256a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i bsod rnams kyi rgyu maldan pan 'das tha zad par dag yang mi 'an no// 'od srung ba gang zhig sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag ga dang pas byin pa sa stsas/
256a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis log par ltung bar byed na/ mi gti mug pa de gnod pa ji tsam gyi phyir zhugs pa la ltos/ 'od srungs de lta bas na dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dge sbyong gi skyon
256a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge sbyong gi ma drang ba dang / dge sbyong gi g.yo dang / dge sbyong gi sgyu dang / dge sbyong gi gya gyu dang / rnam pa de lta bu de dag ni dge sbyong bsam pa dag pas yongs su spang bar bya'o// /
256a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ni gang mig nas mi zag cing / rna ba nas ma yin/ sna nas ma yin/ lce nas ma yin/ lus nas ma yin la/ yid nas kyang mi zag ste/ de'i
256a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ / skye mched drug rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rjes su dran pa drug dang ldan pa dang / dam pa rnams la gus par gnas pa dang /
256a6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu 'gro ba'i chos drug la gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o// dge sbyong gi le'u ste dang pa'o// // 'od srungs dge slong dge slong zhes bya ba
256a7(dkon brtsegs): ni nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir dge slong zhes bya'o/ / bdag tu 'du shes pa bcom pa dang / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gso bar 'du shes pa dang //
256b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang / skyes par 'du shes pa dang / bud med du 'du shes pa dang / khye'ur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa bcom pa ste/ de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes
256b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / lus bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims bsgoms pa dang / sems bsgoms pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa dang / 'jigs skrag pa med pa dang / srid pa'i chu bo las rgal ba dang /
256b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa la lta ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i lam la gnas pa skye/ de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o// 'od srung
256b4(dkon brtsegs): gang la la zhig chos 'di dag dang mi ldan la/ bdag ni dge slong dge slong ngo snyam du khas 'chen bsam pas mos pa ma gtogs par/ nga'ang de'i ston pa ma yin la/ de'ang nga'i nyan
256b5(dkon brtsegs): thos ma yin no/ / 'od srungs sdig pa can gyi dge slong dag phal cher nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed par 'gyur te/ 'od srungs ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa lnga dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams kyis
256b6(dkon brtsegs): ni nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed mi nus so/ / gzhan du na nga'i bstan pa 'di las mi gti mug pa nges par mi sems pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis nga'i bstan pa nub par byed par
256b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge shi ba'i sha la gcan gzan nam/ bya gang gis kyang za bar mi nus kyi/ seng ge'i ro de nyid las srin bu gang dag
257a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba de dag ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sha la za'o/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du nga'i bstan pa 'di nyid las mi blun po brkam pa/ chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/
257a2(dkon brtsegs): chos ma yi pa la lta ba/ nges par mi sems pa/ lhod pa/ brdzun du smra ba gang dag 'byung ba de dag nga'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs chos bzhi dang
257a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan na sdig pa can gyi dge slong du rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gita mug dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang
257a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khengs pa dang / mu cor smra ba dang / bya khwa lta bu dang / tshig 'chal pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgod pa dang /
257a5(dkon brtsegs): phopo theg can dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / rlos ma yin pa 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ g.yon can dang / sgyu can dang / mi mthun pas
257a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba dang / mi gtsigs par smra ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang ba ni ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa la spyod pa dang / sngon byas pa mi dran
257a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mdza' bo la 'khu ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pas byin pa log par ltung bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims mi srung ba dang /
257b1(dkon brtsegs): so sor thar pa khyad du gsod pa dang / 'dul ba mi srung ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag tu smra ba yin/ sems can du smra ba yin/ srog tu/
257b2(dkon brtsegs): smra ba yin/ gang zag tu smra ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la mi gus pa yin/ chos la mi gus pa yin/ dge 'dun la mi
257b3(dkon brtsegs): gus pa yin/ bslab pa rnams la mi gus pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge 'dun mthun pa la mi dga' ba yin/ gtsug lag khang
257b4(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin/ 'du 'dzi la mngon par dga' ba yin/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig brjod pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
257b5(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa 'dod pa yin/ grags pa 'dod pa yin/ gnyen bshes 'dod pa yin/ chos la mchog tu dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
257b6(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyis zin pa yin/ bdud kyis non pa yin/ rmugs pa dang gnyid mang ba yin/ 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la mi gnas pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste//
257b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ lus rul cing brgyan pa dang / nyon mongs pas snad pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis bltas pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa med pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan
258a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdungs pas yongs su gdungs pa dang / gti mug gi yongs
258a2(dkon brtsegs): su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
258a3(dkon brtsegs): lam ngan pa la gnas te 'byung ba mi mthong ba yin/ ser sna can du gyur te kun mi 'gyed pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ thams cad yongs su 'dzin par 'dod cing chog mi shes pa yin//
258a4(dkon brtsegs): ngoms mi myong zhing thos pa'i nan tan dang bral ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mun par gzhol bas mun par gyur pa yin/ rmongs pa la gzhol
258a5(dkon brtsegs): bas rmongs par gyur pa yin/ log pa'i chos kyis dkris pas chos ma yin pa mthong ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo bcad pas 'khor ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag
258a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang ba'i ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus kyi tshul 'chos pa yin/ ngag gi tshul 'chos pa yin/ sems kyi tshul 'chos pa yin/ spyod lam gyi tshul 'chos pa
258a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ bzhi po de dag go// de la lus kyi tshul 'chos pa ni dal gyis 'gro bar tshul 'chos pa yin/ mgo smad par tshul 'chos pa yin/ gnya' shing gang tsam du lta bar
258b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos pa yin/ gos tshags legs par gyon par tshul 'chos pa yin/ dgon pa la gnas pa'i yon tan mi 'tshol bar dgon pa la gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ gong
258b2(dkon brtsegs): bur 'du shes pa mi sel bar bsod snyoms len pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i rjes su mi 'jug par phyag dar khrod 'chang ba ltar tshul 'chos pa yin//
258b3(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi 'jug par ri drung dang shing drung du gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ chos bdud rtsi'i sman mi tshol bar bkus te bor ba'i sman tshol ba ltar tshul 'chos
258b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ 'di ni lus kyi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o// de la ngag gi tshul 'chos pa gang zhe na/ che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo shes shing / che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo mgron du bos te/
258b5(dkon brtsegs): kho bos 'dod pa rnyed cing bsti stang du byas nas rnyed/ kho bos bzang po med/ kho bos lan mang du rnyed/ kho bos mang du thos/ kho bo tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can yin//
258b6(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni bod par 'os pa yin/ kho bo ni slar lan gdab pa'i 'os yin/ kho bo ni nus pa dang ldan zhing skal ba yod la mthu yod pa yin/ kho bo ni don rnam par nges pa bstan pa 'a mkhas pa
258b7(dkon brtsegs): yin/ gang che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo la 'di skad ces smras te/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras nas tshar bcad de spobs pa med par byas/ kho bos 'khor mgu bar byas/ kho bos
259a1(dkon brtsegs): legs so zhes bya ba thob/ kho bos de las bgo ba thob/ yang 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir kho bo mgron du gnyer ces bya ba ste/ 'od srungs nges par mi sems pa'i
259a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dang ldan pa las/ tshig 'chal pa de lta bu gang ci 'byung ba de thams cad ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa ste/ mi rigs pa rnams kyi yon gyi/ rigs pa rnams kyi ma yin te/ 'di ni
259a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o/ / 'od srungs de la sems kyi tshul 'chos gang zhe na/ gang sems kyis chos gos dang bsod snyoms rnyed kyang rung bar yongs su rtog la/ tshig
259a4(dkon brtsegs): gis bdag la ci'ang mi dgos so zhes zer ba dang / gang sems kyis rnyed par 'dod la/ 'dod pa nyung ba skad du smra ba 'di ni sems kyi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o// de la 'di skad ces
259a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ sems kyis rnyed kyang ci ma rung snyam sems// tshig tu bdag la ci yang dgos med smra// med pa'i ngo bo yid kyis de smras te// nam yang bde ba rnyed par 'gyur
259a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ / sems kyi tshul 'chos bsam pas lha rnams dang / klu dang lha mig can rnams slu bar byed// smras pa'i sems kyis nams kyang dag mi 'gyur// de bzhin
259a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa kun gyis de mkhyen to/ / 'od srungs de ltar na dge slong chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa// sdig pa can rnams kyi cho ga ma yin pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa 'di lta bu
259b1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rjes 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'o// dge slong gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
259b2(dkon brtsegs): / 'od srungs de la dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na gdol pa ni rtag tu dur khrod spyod yul ba yin te/ shi ba la re ba dang / byams pa
259b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i mig gis 'gro ba la lta ba dang / shi ba la dga' ba yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'ang rtag tu mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang spong ba ster ba'i khyim
259b4(dkon brtsegs): la gdu ba yin te/ de nas rnyed pa dang bkur stis nye bar 'tsho zhing khyim pa de dag chos sam/ 'dul ba yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa dang / de rnyed pa'i ched du 'dris par byed kyi//
259b5(dkon brtsegs): don gyi ched du ma yin pa dang / mdza' ba'i sems med cing rtag tu rnyed pa la re ba yin te/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes bya'o// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na
259b6(dkon brtsegs): gdol pa ni tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / khams kyi rgyal po dag dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis rtag
259b7(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/ gdol par rig nas thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo // 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'ang dge slong
260a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/
260a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gdol pa lta bu sdig pI chos kun tu sdod cing tshul khrims 'chal par rig nas/ thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo // 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na gdol
260a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i kha phyis sam/ gos sam/ yongs su smad pa de dag thams cad la ni skye bo ya rabs rnams mi reg cing yongs su mi spongad do// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta
260a4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ yongs su spyad pa de thams cad ni mi mthun pa'i 'tsho bas yongs su btsal ba/ lus dang sems smras pas yongs su btsal ba yin pas//
260a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa dag de la mi reg cing mi spyod do// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na gdol pa ni kha phyis thogs te/ zhum zhum bor byas nas gzhan gyi
260a6(dkon brtsegs): khyim du 'gro'o/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'ang zhum zhum por byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo// zhum zhum por byas
260a7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'khor gyi nang du 'gro'o/ / zhum zhum por byas nas gtsug lag khang dang / gnas khang dang / gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o// zhum zhum por byas nas 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang
260b1(dkon brtsegs): nyal bar byed do/ / 'od srungs de ltar na zhum zhum por byas pa sdig pa 'chab pa de'i spyod lam gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni rung ba ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa'o//
260b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na gdol pa'i sems ni bde 'gro'i skye ba la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de rang gi las kyi nyes pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du
260b3(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i sems kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mi gnas shing / de'i 'jig rten pha rol rnam par zhigs la/ de ngan 'gro sum du gnas par rig par sgrib pa med de/
260b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bur zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge sbyong rul ba gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po la 'os pa'i btung ba ro mchog
260b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa las/ gang snying khu mchog bcus pa de'i lhag ma ni rul zhing mi gtsang bar gyur pa ste/ myang bar bya ba ma yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong rul ba'ang chos kyi mchog gi
260b6(dkon brtsegs): snying khu'i ro bro ba dang bral ba yin te dring ba dang / yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/ nyon mongs pa dang / g.yo sgyu 'dzin pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa dang ldan
260b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing tshul khrims kyi dri dang bral ba yin/ nyon mongs pa'i dris bsgos pa yin te/ de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du'ang bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs kyi/ gzhan la phan pa'i phyir
261a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong rul ba zhes bya'o// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rul pa zhes bya ba ni gang zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang
261a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chos pa gzags pa de ni rul zhing dring ba yin te/ skye bo ya rabs thams cad kyis yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong rul ba'ang gzags pa
261a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs te/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi kun tu spyod pa yongs su ma dag pas 'phags pa'i skye bos yongs su spang bar bya ba yin te/ 'di ni dge sbyong rul pa zhes
261a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na sa bon rul ba gang yin pa de ni sa chen pa las skyer mi rung ngo // 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la mi skye zhing
261a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i sa bon nus pa ma yin la/ 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong rul ba zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge
261a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod za ma tog lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na za ma tog gi phyi rol shin tu byi dor byas la nang mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba zhig yod pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs dge
261a7(dkon brtsegs): spyong za ma tog lta bu'ang dge sbyong ltar bcos shing phyi rol gtsang sbra spyod par gyur la/ nang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gang ba yin te/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge
261b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod za ma tog lta bu zhes bya'o/ / 'od srungs de la dge sbyong ku ran dka lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na ku ran da zhes bya ba'i me tog ni kha dog blta na sdug
261b2(dkon brtsegs): la reg nA rtsub pa/ lci ba'i sbrang ma'i dri mnam zhing / shi la bar ka'i rtsa ba'i dri mnam ste/ mkhas pa mdzangs pa rnams ni me tog de lta bu la mi reg mi len mi snyom gyi/ gang dag bris pa'i
261b3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin can du gyur pa de'i skyon mi shes pa de dag ni me tog de lta bu len cing snom mo/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong ku ran da ka lta bu'ang dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par
261b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang mi nges pa yin/ tshig brlang ba yin/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa yin/ spod pa nyams pa yin/ lta ba nyams pa yin te/ mdzangs
261b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhas pa rnams ni ku ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta bu la snyan pa 'am/ snyen pa 'am/ bsnyen bkur mi byed kyi/ de'i tshul rig pas thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spang ngo //
261b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa de dag ni ku ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta bu la sten cing snyen la bsnyen bkur byed de/ ku ran da ka'i me tog byis pa'i lag na 'dug pa bzhin du de dang
261b7(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'od srungs 'di ni ku ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na
262a1(dkon brtsegs): mi g.yon can gyi rang bzhin can rtag tu brkam pa/ chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ bdag gi snyed pas chog par mi 'dzin pa/ gzhan gyi nor la re ba/ drag shul can
262a2(dkon brtsegs): dbyug pa dang / mtshon cha dang / dgra cha thogs pa/ ngo tsha med pa/ snying rje med pa/ rtag tu gdug cing rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni/ de gang gi tshe grong bar ram/ grong khyer ram/
262a3(dkon brtsegs): grong rdal lam/ yul du 'jug pa de'i tshe de 'di snyam du/ gzhan dag gi nor gyi phung po gang yin pa de bdag gir gyur na re stes snyam du sems shing / de zin du 'ong zhes mkhyen du mkhyun bur rgyu ba
262a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong yang rtag tu brkam pa/ chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ bdag gis rnyed pas chog mi shes pa/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la re ba yin/
262a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ de gang gi tshe grong bar ram/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul du 'jug pa de'i tshe/ de rnyed pa'i phyir 'jug gi/ chos kyi phyir ma yin te/ spyod lam thams cad kyang
262a6(dkon brtsegs): chom rkun lta bur ston pa yin/ 'arlab cing sbed pa yin te/ bdag dge slong gzhan gyis tshul khrims 'chal par shes na mi rung ste/ shes par gyur na so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las
262a7(dkon brtsegs): bskrad par 'gyur ro snyam nas rtag tu skrag cing / rtag tu 'jigs te/ spyod lam thams cad kyang g.yos spyod pas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dag gis chom rkun 'ong
262b1(dkon brtsegs): / chom rkun 'gro'o// chom rkun 'greng ngo // chom rkun 'chag go// chom rkun 'dug go// zhal lo// chos gos len to// chom rkun grong du 'gro'o// zong nas 'byung ngo // nom rkun
262b2(dkon brtsegs): za'o/ / chom rkun 'thung ngo // chom rkun sgra 'dreg go zhes rig par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de ltar na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis de'i spyod lam gang yin pa de
262b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rung ba ma yin la/ yongs su brtags pa ma yin par rig par 'gyur te/ rig nas kyang de la snying rje chen po skyed cing / kye ma 'di mtshar cig sdig pa can gyi dge slong 'di lta bu
262b4(dkon brtsegs): dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro zhes 'phya zhing mi snyan par zer ro// tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la ni/ lha dang /
262b5(dkon brtsegs): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyang 'di dag ni bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o zhes gus pa cher skyed do// 'od srungs chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba ni
262b6(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems gcig kyang mi skyed na/ 'bras bu 'thob pa lta ci smos kyi/ de ni gnas med do// 'od srungs 'di ni chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o//
262b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de la dge sbyong shin te ma gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na 'bru'i nang na gang dag ma smin pa dang / mi grung ba dang / 'ongs med cing 'bru 'dra ba de dag ni
263a1(dkon brtsegs): shin te ma zhes bya'o/ / 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong shin te ma'ang yang zhing mthu chung la/ bdud kyis zin pa/ bdud kyis non pa/ nyon mongs pa thams
263a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis 'phrog pa/ rlung gis g.yengs pa lta bu ste/ 'od srungs dge sbyong shin te ma zhes bya ba de ni dge sbyong tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa can rnams kyi tshig bla dgas te/ de dag ni ngas dge
263a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyong shin te ma zhes btags so/ / 'od srungs de la dge sbyong sun par byed pa gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na nas kyi ljang bu phun sum tshogs pa'i nang na/ nas la gnod pa zhig
263a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas/ de ljang bu'i kha dog 'dra zhing rtags dang dbyibs kyang 'dra bas/ de la nas kyi bdag po de dag 'di snyam du 'di dag thams cad ni nas yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes skyed skyed pa
263a5(dkon brtsegs): las/ gang gi tshe nas kyi ljang bu las snye ma byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ nas la gnod pa de la nas kyi 'du shes mi 'byung ngo // 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong sun par byed pa'i dge slong
263a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa'ang tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams dang / kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs 'dra bas/ de la
263a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa po dang / spyani bdag de dag dge sbyong ngo snyam pa'i 'du shes skyed cing / sbyin gnas su 'du shes skyed pa las/ de nas gal te mi gti mug pa dge sbyong ma yin la/ dge sbyong du khas
263b1(dkon brtsegs): 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la/ tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba/ nang rul zhing zag pa de 'khor gyi nang nas byung ste/ shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ sems can dmyal
263b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyis de sems can dmyal bar skyes par mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang mi gti mug pa 'di ni
263b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs kyis sdig pa'i las byas pas/ de sems can dmyal ba chen por skas te/ nas la gnod pa la nas kyi yon tan med pa ltar/ 'di la'ang dge spong
263b4(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan gyi 'bras bu med do zhes snying rje chen po skyed de/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong sun par byed pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge sbyong ltar bcos pa gang zhe na/ 'od
263b5(dkon brtsegs): srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na ra gan chen po zhes bya ba'i lcags shig yod de/ shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas shing / shin tu yongs su dag par byas na gser 'dra bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang gser
263b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi rin thang dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / bdar 'phro dang / srang la gzhal ba'i ljid 'dra ba ni ma yin no// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge sbyong ltar bcos pa'i dge sbyong yang lus shin tu bkrus
263b7(dkon brtsegs): shing gos bzang po mdzes pa gyon la/ dge sbyong gi phyi rol gyi spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag ste/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / mdun du lta ba dang / g.ya' g.yor lta ba dang / bskum
264a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / brkyang ba dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'dzin pa shes bzhin du spyod kyang / de 'dod chags kyis bcom pa dang / zhe sdang
264a2(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom pa dang / gti mug gis bcom pa dang / nyon mongs pas bcom pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur stis bcom pa dang / nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal
264a3(dkon brtsegs): dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang / nyon mongs pas 'khol ba dang / bsnyen bkur lhur len gyi/ chos lhur
264a4(dkon brtsegs): mi len pa dang / lus tsha bar sbyor ba la brtson gyi/ tshul khrims kyis tsha bar sbyor ba la mi brtson pa dang / zas dang gos lhur len gyi/ 'phags pa'i chos lhur mi len pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma
264a5(dkon brtsegs): tho bas 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / tshe 'di lhur len gyi/ tshe phyi ma lhur mi len pa dang / lus gso ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa la rten gyi/ chos la rim gror bya ba la mi rten pa dang
264a6(dkon brtsegs): spaskras pa sna tshogs kyis sbags pa dang / sdig pas bsgos pa dang / khyim gyi las kyis mtha' la mngon par brtson pa dang / khyim pa dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ bde ba dag gis kyang bde
264a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing / sdug bsngal dag gis kyang sdug bsngal ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang khong khro bas bcom pa yin te/ de'i dge sbyong gi chos dang / spyod lam thams cad dang / sems dang sems las byung ba'i
264b1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du gzhol ba yin zhing / de dge sbyong gi rin thang dang / ri ba dang / dge sbyong gi srang kha dang mi mnyam pa
264b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa zhes bya'o// 'od srungs de la ji ltar na dge sbyong gzi phrogs pa yin zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes pa 'am/ bud med/
264b3(dkon brtsegs): dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la zhig mi ma yin pas gzi phrogs par gyur na/ de dbang chung bar grags shing / mdog ngan la mi sdug par 'gyur te/ de ltar mdangs phrogs pa rnams la ni sman tam/
264b4(dkon brtsegs): gsang sngags sam/ rig sngags rnams kyis mi smon te/ de 'chi bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par tha mar gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de bzhin du dge slong gang la la tshul khrims kyi gzi med pa dang / ting nge
264b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi gzi med pa dang / shes rab kyi gzi med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzi med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i gzi med pa dang / byams pa'i gzi med pa dang / snying rje'i gzi med pa dang /
264b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i gzi med pa dang / btang snyoms kyi gzi med pa dang / sbyin pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa'i gzi med pa dang / dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi gzi med pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa'i gzi
264b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gzi med pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa'i gzi med pa 'di ni/ 'od srungs dge slong gzi phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'od srungs
265a1(dkon brtsegs): gzi phrogs pa de lta bu rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba'i sman gyis mi tshugs te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags la mi sdug pa'i sman dang / zhe sdang la byams pa dang / gti mug la rten
265a2(dkon brtsegs): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa rnams la tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / 'du 'dzi la dben par dga' ba dang / 'dzin pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir dgon par gnas pa dang / gsum bsdams pa'i
265a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'i sman de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba 'di lta bu 'di dag gis de la mi tshugs te/
265a4(dkon brtsegs): de shi nas sems can dmyal ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/ de'i tha ma gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// gang dag yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sman 'di lta ste/ phung po shes pa dang / khams shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa dang /
265a5(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sman 'di lta bu 'di dag gis kyang de la mi tshugs te/ de shi nas
265a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/ de'i tha ma gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa lnga brgyas bdag cag tshul khrims yongs su ma dag bzhin du dad pas byin
265a7(dkon brtsegs): pa spyad par gyur na mi rung zhes nyams par byas te slar khyim du dong ngo / / de la dge slong gzhan dag cig 'di skad du/ dge slong che ba'i bdag nyid can rnal 'byor spyod pa 'di dag bstan pa las nyams pa ni
265b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu ma legs so zhes 'phya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag khyed 'di skad du dge slong che ba'i bdag nyid can 'di dag 'di ltar bstan pa las
265b2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu nyams pa 'di ni shin tu ma legs so zhes ma smra zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag mngon par mi dga' nas khyim na gnas pa 'di ni dad pa can rnams kyi chos yin te/ dge slong dad pa dang mo /
265b3(dkon brtsegs): pa mang ba 'gyod pa dang ldan pa 'di dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas bdag cag tshul khrims yongs su ma dag bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad na mi rung ngo zhes nyams pa gyur to// 'od srungs nga lung ston
265b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ dge slong 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa'i grangs su chud par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i
265b5(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / / bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong
265b6(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bus zhal ta bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs ngas zhal ta bya bar gnang ba'i dge slong gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dge slong yongs su dag pa 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho bas
265b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs par lta ba/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa/ 'dzem pa dang ldan zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang / gang yang zag pa zad pa dgra bcom par gyur pa ste/ 'od srungs dge slong ma nyams pa
266a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnyis zhal ta byed par ngas gnang ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rigs sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba/ sems
266a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ spong ba'i phyir rnal 'byor sna tshogs la gnas pa/ kha cig ni dgon pa bzhi ba'i mal stan la mngon par dga' ba/ kha cig ni bsod snyoms pa/ kha cig ni grong 'dab na gnas
266a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ kha cig ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa/ kha cig ni mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa/ kha cig ni chos smra ba/ kha cig ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ kha cig ni ma mo 'dzin pa/ kha cig ni grong dang / grong khyer dang /
266a4(dkon brtsegs): grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas chos ston pa ste/ sems can gzhan dag gi sems kyi spyod pa rnams bsrungs dka' ba'i phyir ro// 'od srungs de la dge slong
266a5(dkon brtsegs): zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi sems mgu bar bya'o/ / 'od srungs de la dge slong dgon pa pa bas mtha'i mal snyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong zhal ta byed pas yod
266a6(dkon brtsegs): las su bsko bar mi bya'o/ / zhal ta byed pas dge slong dgon pa pa de dag bsrung bar bya ste/ dus ma yin par gsol bar mi bya/ dus ma yin par gtang bar mi bya'o// 'od srungs gal te dge slong dgon
266a7(dkon brtsegs): kha la dge 'dun gyi bya bar gtogs pa slob pa'i las res bab na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa des las de bdag nyid kyis bya'o// yang na dge slong gzhan zhig bskos la las de byed du gzhug ste/ dge slong
266b1(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa pa la gnod par mi bya'o/ / 'od srungs de la dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa gang yin pa de la/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa des kha zas bsod pa bgo bshar bu'o// 'od srungs de la dge slong
266b2(dkon brtsegs): rnal 'byor spyod pa gang yin pa de dag la dge slong zhal ta byed pas mthun pa'i tshogs chas dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams sbyin par bya'o// dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa des phyogs ga la gnas
266b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa phyog der dge slong zhal ta byed pa des sgra chen po dang skad drag po mi dbyung zhing byed durang mi gzhug go/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa de bsrung zhing mal cha'ang sbyar bar bya'o// kha thA
266b4(dkon brtsegs): bsod pa dang / yi gar 'ong ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang mthun pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams sbyin par bya'o// dge slong de la dge slong 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ston pa'i phyir gnas pa
266b5(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de la bdag gis rjes su mthun pa'i yo byad thams cad mang du sbyar bar bya'o snyam du shin tu 'phangs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge slong mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson
266b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de dag la dge slong zhal ta byed pas lung nos shig/ lhogs shig/ kha ton gyis shig/ kho bo ni khyod kyi rim gro byed pa yin gyis/ khyod ji lta ji lta bur mang du thos par gyur pa de lta de lta bur
266b7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun mdzes par 'gyur bar gyis shig/ 'dug la brjod pas mdzes par gyis shig/ bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyang mchog tu 'gyur bar gyis shig ces spro ba bskyed par bya'o// 'od srungs
267a1(dkon brtsegs): de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas de dag dus ma yin par gtang bar mi bya/ las su bsgo bar mi bya'o// dge slong zhal ta byed pa des dge slong mang du thos pa de dag bsrung bar bya'o//
267a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de la chos smra ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas las su mi bsko bar bya'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang // yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i phro brang 'khor dag tu 'jug
267a3(dkon brtsegs): tu bcug la/ chos 'chad du gzhug go/ chos nyan pa dag bsko bar bya'o// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par bya'o// 'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam gyi phyir dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o// chos smra ba'i dge slong
267a4(dkon brtsegs): la dge slong gang dag gnod pa byed pa'i dge slong de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas bzlog par bya'o/ / dge slong zhal ta byed pas chos smra ba'i dge slong la rtag tu bsu bar bya'o// legs so zhes bya ba mang du bya'o//
267a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de la dge slong gang dag 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin par gyur pa de dag gi gan du dge slong zhal ta byed pa de song la/ ji ltar na bdag rma med cing ma nyams pa dang / ji ltar na bdag ltung ba med pa'i
267a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis zhal ta bya zhes yongs su dri bar bya'o/ / de nas 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag gis dge slong zhal ta byed pa de'i bsam pa rig nas/ de'i bya ba dang / 'byung ba gang yin pa dang // byed
267a7(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa de bstan par bya'o/ / dge slong zhal ta byed pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag la 'phangs par bya ba dang / dad pa dang / gus pa dang // zhes rab tu bskyed par bya'o// dge 'dun
267b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de dge slong zhal ta byed pas dus dus su dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'i/ / dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bsags shing sba bar mi bya ste/ ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du sbyin par bya/ ma bskul bar
267b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par bya/ gnod pa med par sbyin par bya'o// des 'dun pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pas 'gro bar mi bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun la rton par bya'o/ khyim
267b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyogs la rton par mi bya'o/ / dge 'dun gyi bya ba la rton par bya'i/ bdag dgar bya ba la rton par mi bya'o// dngos po gang la'ang dbang bya ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'i/ bya ba
267b4(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du chung ba'ang dge 'dun gyi gros bzhin bya zhing / rang dgar mi bya'o// dge 'dun gyi'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi'am/ mchod rten gyi yo byad gang ci'ang rung ste/ ji lta ba bzhin
267b5(dkon brtsegs): du gzhag par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'ang dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs
267b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa mchod rten gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o/ / mchod rten gyi rnyed pa'ang dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o// gal te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la brel 'phongs
267b7(dkon brtsegs): su gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa che bar gyur na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdus la gros mthun par bgyis te/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa de las phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshugs par
268a1(dkon brtsegs): @bya'o/ / dgal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig ral du gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa che bar gyur na/ dge slong nal 'byed pas dge slong gi
268a2(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun thams cad bsdus pa zos mthun par bgyis te/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'di ni zhig ral du gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa ni che bar gyur na/
268a3(dkon brtsegs): gal te tshe dang ldan pa rnams gnod pa med cing dad pa dang ldan la/ bzod cing gnang na/ bdag gis dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'di las dngos po cung zad cig khyer te// de bzhin gshegs
268a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mchod rten 'di bcos par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ / gal te dge 'dun gyis gnang na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa des de bzhin du bya'o// ji ste dge 'dun gyis ma gnang na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa des sbyin pa po
268a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sbyin bdag rnams la gsol ba thob la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gso bar bya'o// 'od srungs gal te mchod rten gyi rnyed pa ji ltar mang du gyur tu zin kyang / dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge 'dun
268a6(dkon brtsegs): dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshugs mi bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dad cing dang ba mang po dag gis mchod rten la phul ba ni/ tha na ras kyi kha tshar gcig tsam gang yin pa de'ang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
268a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi mchod rten yin na/ rin po che 'am/ rin po cher smos pa dag lha smos kyang ci dgos// mchod rten la gos phul ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de nyid du rlung dang / nyi ma dang /
268b1(dkon brtsegs): char pas dengs kyang za'i/ mchod rten la phul ba'i gos dbyig gas/ dbyig gi rin du bsgyur bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod rten gyi rin thang cung zad kyang med la/ mchod rten ni rtsis kyang brel
268b2(dkon brtsegs): bamed pa'i phyir ro/ / 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pas de ltar yongs su dag par bya ste/ des dkon mchog gsum gyi dang ma sbags par bya'o// bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes par bya'o// dkon mchog
268b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dngos po rnams la bdag gir 'du shes mi bya'o/ / 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la zhig gis tshul khrims dang ldan
268b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin gnas rnams la sems khros sam/ dbang byed cing bsgo blag byed na/ de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi'i 'jig rten du 'ongs
268b5(dkon brtsegs): na'ang bran dang / / gzhan gyi las byed par 'gyur pa dang / khu tshur dang // thal lcug dang / lag cha snyems pas rdeg pa dang phrad par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs gzhan yang dge slong zhal ta byed pa dge
268b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi bya ba las 'das te/ rang dgar dge slong rnams la dbang byed cing sgo ba dang / chad pas gcod pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa dang / sdigs pa dang / dus ma yin par mngag pa dang
268b7(dkon brtsegs): dus ma yin par sgo bar byed na/ de mi dge ba'i las des nyi tshe'i sems can dmyal ba phur pa mang po zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur te/ der skyes nas lus la lcags phur brgya stong zug cing / de dag 'bar
269a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar bar 'gyur ro// des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin gnas rnams la bsdigs shing / ngag gi las gdug
269a2(dkon brtsegs): basbas par gyur pa gang yin pa des de der skyes nas/ lce'i dbang po'i khyon dpag tshad brgya par 'gyur zhing // de'i lce'i dbang po de la lcags phur brgya stong rab tu 'bab cing // de dag kyang 'bar/ rab tu
269a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te mer 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des bsdigs shing ngag gi las gdug pa smras par gyur pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs dge
269a4(dkon brtsegs): slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'dus shing 'dus pa bzhag ste/ dus dus su mi sbyin zhing mtho btsams la gtses nas sbyin pa dang / kha cig byin/ kha cig ma byin/ kha cig la byin
269a5(dkon brtsegs): kha cig la ma byin na/ de mi dge ba'i las des yi dgas kyi skye gnas rgyag 'jim byin pa nub ces bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro// de der skyes nas yi dgas gzhan gyis kha zas blangs te/ de la bstar na
269a6(dkon brtsegs): de bstan pa'i tshe mig gnyis ka mi 'dzums par zas de la lta zhing bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi/ lo brgya stong du'ang kha zas de thob par mi 'gyur ro// ji ste brgya la brgya
269a7(dkon brtsegs): las na zas de thob kyang ngan sbugs dang rnag khrag tu 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin gnas rnams mgu bar ma byas shing /
269b1(dkon brtsegs): rang gi rnyed pas chog mi shes par gyur pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi 'am/ mchod rten gyi rlol bar byas na
269b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i rnam par smin pa ni ngas bskal par bgrangs pas kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo / / 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las nyes dmigs kyi gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas/ khro 'am
269b3(dkon brtsegs): gshe 'am/ gnod par sems sam/ khong khro ba skyed na/ de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do// 'od srungs de lta bas na dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos nas dge slong zhal ta byed pas lus
269b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ngag dang / yid yongs su dag par bya'o// bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar bya'o// 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa rang gi sha la za'ang bla/ dkon mchog gsum gyis byin gyis
269b5(dkon brtsegs): brlabs pa'i lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms sam/ na ba'i gsos sman nam/ yo byad yongs su spyad pa ni mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa
269b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis lhod pa rnams kyi lhod pa'i chos dang / 'dzem dog mchis pa rnams kyi 'dzem dog gi chos rnams bka' stsal to// zhal
269b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / / bcom ldan 'das dge slong dgon pa pa gang dag bdag dgon pa pa zhes mchid kyis 'chen/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na dge slong
270a1(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa pa lags/ ji tsam gyis na dge slong bsod snyoms pa lags/ ji tsam gyis na dge slong phyag dar khrod pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
270a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs 'di la dge slong dgon pa pas dgon pa dang // nags tshal gyi gnas dang / bas mthar gnas mal bca'
270a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o/ / chom rkun dang / gnag rdzi dang / phyugs rdzi med pa/ sdig sbrul med pa/ ri dgas dang bya mang po med pa/ sbrang bu dang sha sbrang nyung ba/ sgra nyung ba/ ca co nyung ba de lta bu'i dgon pa bas
270a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag tu gnas par bya'o/ / de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ yid la byed pa brgyad bskyed par bya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ lus la mi blta bar bya ba dang / srog la mi blta bar bya ba dang // rnyed pa dang
270a5(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti la mi blta bar bya ba dang / / 'du 'dzi thams cad la mi blta bar bya ba dang / dgon pa dag tu ri dgas 'chi ba ltar khas blang bar bya ba dang / dgon par dgon pa'i
270a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho'i log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho ba ma yin par bya ba dang / zang zing dang / nyon mongs pa med
270a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar bya ba ste/ yid la bya ba brgyad po de dag bskyed nas/ dgon pa'i gnas su gnas par bya'o// dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ sems can thams
270b1(dkon brtsegs): cad la byams pa'i rnam pa brgyad bskyed par bya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ phan pa'i byams pa dang / bde ba'i byams pa dang / gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang / yang dag pa'i
270b2(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang / tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang / zhi gnas kyi byams pa dang / chos la nges par sems pa'i byams pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i byams pa ste
270b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byams pa brgyad po de dag bskyed par bya'o/ / de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ 'di ltar bdag ni lam ring po nas
270b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dir 'ongs la gcig pu gnyis su med pa ste/ legs par byas pa 'am/ nyes par byas pa skul ba'i grogs ni gang yang med kyi/ lga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri
270b5(dkon brtsegs): za dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra gang dag bdag gi sems kyi bsam pa shes pa dag ni yod de/ bdag dgon pa'i gnas na gnas la/ mi dge ba'i sems kyi dbang du song na/ de dag
270b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bdag lam ring po nas 'ongs shing gcig pu gnyis su med de sten pa med/ bdag gi med/ yongs su 'dzin pa med la/ gal te 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pas
270b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog/ 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog/ mi dge ba gzhan la rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par gyur na
271a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'du 'dzin dang / 'du ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams dang bye zag med par 'gyur te/ bdag gis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
271a2(dkon brtsegs): dang dri za rnams la bzlas par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mi mnyes par byas par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas kyang bdag la lha rnams 'phya bar mi 'gyur ba
271a3(dkon brtsegs): dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dgyes par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ / de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas
271a4(dkon brtsegs): bsdam par bya/ tshul khrims kyi phung po shin tu kun bsrung bar bya/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang
271a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sems mngon du bya ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la rten pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang rab tu ldan pa dang / yid byung ba dang /
271a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba dang / 'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa dang / phung po ni gshed ma ste/ phyir rgol bar rig pa dang /
271a7(dkon brtsegs): khams bzhi la myur du gdug pa'i dug tu 'du shes pa dang / skye mched drug la grong stong ltar mos pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug par mkhas pa dang / rtag pa dang
271b1(dkon brtsegs): chad par lta ba yongs su spangs pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med par rnam par spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos
271b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ba dang / smon pa med pa'i sems spel ba dang / khams gsum la rtag tu 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu mgo dang gos
271b3(dkon brtsegs): la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / lus kyi skyon la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / sems kyi skye ba dang 'jig
271b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la lta ba dang / sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / kun 'byung ba la thams cad kyi sred pa spangs pa dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba la zhugs
271b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / byams pa'i spyod yul dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i
271b6(dkon brtsegs): chos la mngon du phyogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba la shin tu gnas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mngon du gyur pa dang / dbang po lnga dang ldan pa dang / stobs lnga'i shugs
271b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsam gtan pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / zhi gnas la gnas pa dang / lhag
272a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong gis blta bar bya ste/ 'od srungs de lta bu'i go cha 'di dag bgos nas nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha skad la mi nyal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang
272a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu khyad par du 'gro bar dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas par bya'o/ / de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na lus brgyan par sbyor ba la brtson par mi bya'o// mal cha brgyan pa la brtson par mi bya'o// chos gos
272a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis btsun pa la brtson par mi bya'o/ / des rtswa rnying pa bskasra pa blangs la 'chags dang 'dug sar legs par bting ste/ bdag 'dug pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang ma
272a4(dkon brtsegs): sbags pa dang / bdag gi gos kyis chog shes par dgon pa'i gnas der gnas par bya'o// 'od srungs dge slong dgon pa pa gang gi tshe lus gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam nye
272a5(dkon brtsegs): bar brtan pa'i phyir/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug pa na/ des sems 'di lta bus dgon pa'i gnas de nas 'gro bar bya ste/ ma rnyed kyang
272a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su yi 'chad par mi bya/ rnyed kyang dga' ba bskyed par mi bya/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yid la bya/ bsod nams nye bar brtan par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa yid la bya
272a7(dkon brtsegs): ba bsam zhing / des grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du bsod nams kyi phyir 'jug par bya'o// de grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du bsod snyoms spyod pa na
272b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi go cha bgos la bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o/ / de la chos kyi go cha gang zhe na/ mig gis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams mthong na rjes su chags par mi bya'o// yid du mi 'ong /
272b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzugs rnams mthong na'ang khong khro bar mi bya'o// de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba rnams la rjes su chags pa dang
272b3(dkon brtsegs): khong khro bar mi bya'o/ / dbang po shin tu ba rnams pa dang / mig mi g.yeng ba dang / gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / dul ba dang / cang shes kyi sems dang / sngon
272b4(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa'i chos mi 'dor ba dang / zang zing gis ma sngags pa'i rgyud kyis bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o// mthar chags su bsod snyoms blang bar bya'o// gang nas bsod
272b5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms rnyed pa der rjes su chags par mi bya'o/ / gang nas ma rnyed pa der yang khong khro bar mi bya'o// khyim bcur bslangs pa las/ khyim bcu gcig pa las bsod snyoms ma
272b6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed na'ang yongs su yi chad par mi bya'o/ / de 'di snyam du bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di dag ni bya ba mang ba dag yin pas/ de dag gis bdag la sbyin par nges pa med de/ de dag bdag
272b7(dkon brtsegs): la sems pa'ang ngo mtshar chen/ bsod snyoms sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ des de ltar yongs su yi chad pa med par bsod snyoms kyang
273a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ / sems can gang dag de'i mig lam du snang bar gyur pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / tha na dud 'gro'i skye banas
273a2(dkon brtsegs): su song ba de dag la'ang byams pa dang snying rje'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ / ci nas kyang sems can gang dag bdag gi mig lam du snang bar gyur pa 'am/ bsod snyoms sbyin pa de dag mtho ris
273a3(dkon brtsegs): su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/ / de ltar brtson par bya'o// des bsod snyoms ngan nam/ bzang yang rung blangs te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal 'di na bdag gi
273a4(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms 'di las bgo bsha' bya dgos pa'i sems can dbul po su yod snyam du phyogs bzhir kun tu blta bar bya'o/ / gal te sems can dbul po zhig mthong na/ des bsod snyoms de
273a5(dkon brtsegs): las bgo bsha' bya'o/ / gal te sems can dbul po ma mthong na/ des 'di ltar gang dag gi mig lam du snang bar ma gyur te/ mi snang ba'i sems can de dag la bsod snyoms kyi thob
273a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i cha skal sbyin gyi/ byin nas len pa dag yongs su spyod cig snyam du sems bskyed la/ des bsod snyoms de khyer te/ dgon pa'i gnas der song la/ lhung bzed dang lag pa bkrus te
273a7(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi spyod pa dang / cho ga dang ldan pa'i spyod pa bzang pos byin gyis brlabs la/ des skyil mo krung bcas te bsod snyoms de bza' bar bya'o// ma chags pa dang / gnod sems med
273b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi brkam pa dang / mi min pas zas thos nas/ 'di gam du lus 'di la srin bu'i rigs pargyad chu yod pa dag 'di'i mthus bde bar gnas par gyur cig/ da ni 'di dag zang ring
273b2(dkon brtsegs): gis bkru bar bya'o/ / byang chub thob nas ni chos kyis bsdu bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te yang de'i bsod snyoms ngan par gyur na/ des 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya
273b3(dkon brtsegs): ste kha zas ngan pas ni bdag gi lus yang bar 'gyur/ spong ba bzod par 'gyur/ bdag gi bshang gci 'byung ba nyung bar 'gyur/ bdag la dad pas byin pa chung bar 'gyur
273b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi lus yang ba dang sems yang bar 'gyur/ bdag rmugs pa dang gnyid chung bar 'gyur/ bdag la 'dod chags kyi sems kyis kun nas dkris par mi 'gyur ro snyam du yid la bya ba
273b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu 'di dag bskyed par bya'o/ / gal te des bsod snyoms mang zhig rnyed na/ de la'ang ran par bza' bar bya'o// dor ba'i chos nyid du'ang bya ste/ bsod snyoms de las rdo
273b6(dkon brtsegs): leb gang yang rung ba'i steng du gtor la/ 'di snyam du gcan gzan dang bya'i tshogs gang la la zang zing gi zas 'dod pa byin nas/ len pa de dag 'di la zo zhig snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/
273b7(dkon brtsegs): des zas zos nas lhung bzed dang lag pa bkrus te dgon pa la brten nas gnas par bya'o// sngon yid la byed pa'i chos de nyid kyang mi 'dor bar bya'o// 'od srungs gal te dge slong dge
274a1(dkon brtsegs): pa pa 'bras bu ma thob pa so so'i skye bo'i drung du sbrul dang gcan gzan gtum po dag 'ongs na/ des de la 'jigs pa dang skrag par mi bya'i/ des 'di snyam du
274a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag thog pa nyid nas lus dang srog bor te dgon pa'i gnas su 'ongs kyi/ 'di la bdag gis 'jigs par mi bya/ skrag par mi bya'i/ byams pa'i sems bskyed par bya
274a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang rnam par spang bar bya/ / 'jigs pa spang bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te de ltar byas nas sbrul dang gcan gzan de dag gis srog gcod cing za na'ang
274a4(dkon brtsegs): des 'di snyam du gcan gzan 'di dag la bdag gis zang zing tsam gyis tshim par byed mi nus kyi/ de dag gis bdag gi sha zos nas bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur la/
274a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis kyang snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// da ni 'di dag zang zing gis bsdu bar bya'o// byang chub thob nas ni chos
274a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsdu bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ 'od srungs dgon pa la gnas pa'i dge slong gis de ltar lus dang srog la mi lta bar dgon pa la gnas par bya'o// gal te de
274a7(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pan mi ma yin pa 'ongs na/ mdog sdug kyang rung / mdog mi sdug kyang rung / de la chags par mi bya/ khong khro bar mi bya'o// gal te
274b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha dag dge slong dgon pa pa'i gan du 'ongs te dri ba yongs su 'drin/ de la dge slong dgon pa pa des ji ltar thos pa bzhin du lnga de dag la chos bshad par
274b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / ji ste lha de dag zab mo'i dri ba yongs su 'dri ste/ dge slong dkon pa pa des lan mi thebs pa ltan/ res nga rgyal med par byas la/ 'di skad ces ma bslabs pa la
274b3(dkon brtsegs): brnyas par mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la lung mnos nas 'bad de khong du ma chud pa'i chos rnams khong du chud par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i dus na dris pa thams cad kyi lan gdab par
274b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / bdag ni chos nyan pa yin gyi/ khyed spobs par gyis shig ces brjod par bya ste/ 'od srungs dge slong dgon pa pas de ltar lha de dag la go bar bya'o// 'od srungs gzhan
274b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dge slong dgon pa pa dgon pa la gnas pas/ dgon pa'i 'du shes shin tu bsgom par bya ste/ des lus 'di ni rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / bong ba dang /
274b6(dkon brtsegs): mig por lta bu ste/ bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// lus 'di la ni bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag med kyi
274b7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung zhing // byed rgyu tshogs pa las byung ba ste/ ci nas kyang bdag gi lta bar gyur pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur
275a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ltar bdag gis tshul bzhin so sor brtag par bya'o/ / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos kyang rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya'o/
275a2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du de ltar bslab par bya'o// dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa des rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal de dag ji ltar 'byung ba dang / ji ltar 'jig par
275a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po 'di dag bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de ltar g.yo ba med cing byed pa po med de/ stong bzhin du skye zhing
275a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig la/ su'ang de dag skye ba mi byed/ 'gog par mi byed pa'i mtshan ma bzung la/ de bzhin du lus 'di'ang rtswa dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / mig
275a5(dkon brtsegs): yor lta bu ste/ bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las 'byung gi/ rgyu dang
275a6(dkon brtsegs): rkyen ma tshang na mi 'byung ba ste/ 'di la don dam par skye ba dang 'gag pa'i chos gang yang med do snyam du mtshan ma gzung bar bya'o// 'od srungs de ltar dge sbyong dgon pa pas chos kyi mi
275a7(dkon brtsegs): dam gyi spyod pa 'di lta bus dgon pa la gnas par bya'o/ / de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa de nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i
275b1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa pa zhig tu myur du khyad par du 'gyur ro/ / gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa par gyur na ni/ de myur du 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// ji ste las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs te 'bras bu thob
275b2(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur na'ang de zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol gyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis sam gsum las mi 'da' 'o// gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur na ni/
275b3(dkon brtsegs): de myur ba nyid du rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa par gyur na ni// de tshe 'di nyid la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ de sgrib pa

282b3(dkon brtsegs): yang med do/ / 'od srungs khyim pa rnams khyad par 'gyur ba ni/ dge sbyong ma yin la/ dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la/ tshangs par spyod par khas
282b4(dkon brtsegs): 'che ba/ gos ngur smrig bgos shing bya ba mang ba/ skrag pa sna tshogs kyis sbags pa/ zas dang gos lhur len pa de dag khyim pa dag gis gos ngur smrig gyon par rig nas/ zhe sa dang
282b5(dkon brtsegs): gus pa bskyed pa dang / chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyis sdud par byed pa dang / gus par smra zhing phyag 'tshal la ldang bar byed pa ste/ 'od srungs 'di ni khyim pa de dag gi khyad par du
282b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba yin gyi/ de dag rab tu byung ba de dag la ni med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni yongs su len pa la brtson pa ma yin zhing / ci'ang mi sogs pa'i phyir ro//
282b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de'i dus na dge slong phal cher lhung bzed dang chos kos mang zhing / snod spyad mang ba dang / rnyed pa mang bar 'gyur te/ de dag la bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun
283a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed par 'gyur/ ri mo byed cing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de sbyin pa dang / phyir sbyin pa dus dus su byed cing
283a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/ / dge slong gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos can zag pa rnams zad par byed pa la mngon par brtson pa/ yid byung ba
283a3(dkon brtsegs): mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson pa/ don nyung ba/ byed pa nyung ba/ rang gi don la brtson pa/ 'dris par byed pa yongs su spangs pa dag 'byung ba de dag gan du ni
283a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na su'ang mi 'gro/ mi sten cing bsnyen bkur mi byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar khyim pa dag ni chags pa'i rang bzhin can tshe 'di lhur len gyi
283a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs phyi ma lhur len pa ma yin pas/ de dag 'di snyam du dge slong de dag la ni bdag cag gi 'tsho ba med na/ bdag cag gis ci'i phyir bsten/ ci'i phyir phyag bya/ ci'i phyir
283a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod/ ci'i phyir banyen bkur bya snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro// gzhan du na gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung zhing tshul khrims
283a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can de lta bu de dag la sten par byed/ snyen par byed cing bsnyen bkur byed pa ni ma gtogs te nyung ngo // 'od srungs chos 'di lta bu tshul dang mthun//
283b1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di lta bu 'di dag ni gang zag gnyis kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bden pa mthong zhing 'khor ba la 'jigs par lta ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa la brtson
283b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa/ chos don du gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa'o// 'od srungs mngon par mi brtson pa chos ma yin pa la lta
283b3(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba/ 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par mi lta ba/ tshe 'di lhur len pa/ tshe rabs phyi me lUr mi len pa thams cad kyi sgo
283b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas bshad par bya'o/ / 'od srungs gang dag za na thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig tsam yang mi skyed pa'i mi gti mug pa de dag la ni/ ngas 'di lta bu'i chos 'dir skabs mi 'byed
283b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi steng du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag thos na/ bdag sgrub pa las nyams par rig nas smad par bya bar sems te/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi/ 'di dag ni rang
283b6(dkon brtsegs): bzor sbyar ba 'am/ bdud kyis mtho ba tsams nas byas pa'o zhes smra zhing / de dag 'di ltar skye bo mang po dag log par 'dzin du 'jug par 'gyur ro// de dag ni bdag kyang phung la/
283b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag kyang phung bar byed par 'gyur/ bdag kyang nyon mongs pa can du gyur la/ gzhan dag kyang nyon mongs pa can du gyur te/ de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag ni bdag la phan pa
284a1(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung sa chen pos 'di gad ces gsod no//
284a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir nan tan snying por bgyid pa'i
284a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zag chos kyi dbang phyug rnam la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thugs rje chen po gang lags pa de rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems
284a4(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos shing / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
284a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de de bzhin no/ / de de bzhin te/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos shing / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung
284a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i rtsa ba
284a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa/ zhi ba 'dod pa/ grol bar 'dod pa de dag gi ched du chos kyi le'u 'di zung zhig/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba de dag kyang chos 'di la bslabs nas/ phung po thams
284b1(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
284b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyibacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos thams cad yang dag
284b3(dkon brtsegs): par bsdus pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ 'phags pa'i rigs sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi gnas dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa sra 'gong ba dang
284b4(dkon brtsegs): rin po che brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i phung po dang / rin po che bsags pa dang / rin po che'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das
284b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bo dang / lga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
284b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ rin
284b7(dkon brtsegs): po che'i phung po'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// / bam po gnyis so// sh+lo ka drug brgya bdun cu/ rgya bar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ha
285a1(dkon brtsegs): bo d+hi dang / bu chen gyilo rgyob ban de ye shes rjes 'gyur cing zhus te gtan la pha / @chug gang /
285a2(dkon brtsegs): Ar+ya a kA ya ma ti pa ri brits+tshan ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
285a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi
285a4(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi shog
285a5(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha'
285a6(dkon brtsegs): yas tog dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang /
285a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad thabs cig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros
285b1(dkon brtsegs): mi zad pa'ang byang chub se sla rapa bye ba phrag drug cus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
285b2(dkon brtsegs): bo blo gros mi zad pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud
285b3(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das la rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi gdugs dang / me tog gi phur mas mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
285b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems byang chub kyi sems shes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems gang lags
285b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub la ni sems sam sems dpa' ma dmigs/ mi dmigs/ dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub las gud na'ang byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs te/ byang chub ni brjod
285b6(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis/ sems ni gzugs ma mchis/ bstan du ma mchis/ thogs pa ma mchis/ rnam par rig pa ma mchis shing / sems dpa' yang mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
285b7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di dag gi don rtog par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub ni brda'am/ gdags pa 'am/ tha snyad du mi dmigs
286a1(dkon brtsegs): shing byang chub las gung na byang chub kyi sems kyang mi dmigs la/ byang chub ni brjod du med/ sems ni gzugs med/ bstan du med
286a2(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med/ rnam par rig pa med de/ sems ni sems dpag yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni brjod du med pa ste/ byang chub ji lta bar sems
286a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin no/ / sems ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub dang sems ji lta bar sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin no// sems dpa' rnams ji lta bar 'das pa

286a6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang de bzhin no// sems dpa' yang de bzhin no// chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'di la ci'ang rnyed pa med de/ byang chub kyang med/ byang chub
286a7(dkon brtsegs): tu gdags pa'ang med/ sems can yang med/ sems can du gdags pa'ang med/ nyan thos kyang med// nyan thos su gdags pa'ang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med
286b1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa'ang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub sems dpa' gdags pa'ang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med/ sangs rgyas su gdags
286b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med/ 'dus byas kyang med/ 'dus byas su gdags pa'ang med/ 'dus ma byas kyang med/ 'dus ma byas su gdags pa'ang ma dmigs/ mi dmigs
286b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu 'on kyang dper ri rab kyi tshul du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i sems dang po skye ste/ de la rgyu ni sbyin pa'i pha
286b4(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni chos thams cad kyi bya ba'i gnas kyi tshul gyis sa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed
286b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum pa ni 'jigs pa med pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa dang / skrag pa med pa'i tshul gyis ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi rtsal lta bur lta ste/ de la rgyu ni bzod pa'i
286b6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyi sred med kyi bu'i mthu dang / stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba lta bur
286b7(dkon brtsegs): blta ste/ de la rgyu ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni bsod nams kyis chog mi shes pa'i tshul gyi dge ba sna tshogs kyi yang dag par 'phags pa lta bur
287a1(dkon brtsegs): blta ste/ de la rgyu ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni mun pa spun nag chen po sel ba'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i dkyis 'khor 'od
287a2(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba lnga bur blta ste/ / de la rgyu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni ded dpon mdzod chen pos phyag pa lngar 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las sgrol ba'i
287a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ legs par brgyan par blta ste/ de la rgyu ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa brgyad
287a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni zla ba nye ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i dpe'i tshul gyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par blta ste/ / de la rgyu ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
287a5(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par blta ste/ de la
287a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni yon tan dang / ye shes dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bar dbang bskur ba thob pas/ 'khor
287a7(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i mtshan gyi dpe'i tshul gyis nam mkha' dang mtshungs par blta ste/ de la rgyu ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed
287b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// don dam par na 'di la byang chub kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med
287b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems kyang med do/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
287b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang
287b4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rjes chen po sngon du gro ba dang / sems can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas

287b6(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste
287b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ngag gis las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / yid kyis las yongs/
288a1(dkon brtsegs): @su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam par mi tshe ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba/
288a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las bzla ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa
288a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa 'di bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha
288a4(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rjes su chags pa spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / khong khro ba spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / lus la mi lta ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
288a5(dkon brtsegs): srog la yid mi rton pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa'i stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang / zab mos chos la bzod pa

288a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ samra/
288b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid mngon par sgrub pa la rjes su yi rang ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / zhum pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyir
288b2(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog pa'i sa bsdu ba thob par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dgra gdul ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
