288b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
288b5(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la gnas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba dang / snyoms par 'jug
288b6(dkon brtsegs): pasngon du 'gro ba 'dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin
288b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung
289a1(dkon brtsegs): ba sngon du 'tho ba ste/ rigs kyi du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la/
289a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / khams la mkhas
289a3(dkon brtsegs): pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / skye mched la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bden pa la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad
289a4(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / shes rab kyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
289a5(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi
289a6(dkon brtsegs): bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon
289a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi skye ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
289b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa sngon du 'tho ba dang / khyad par gyi ye shes mthong ba khong du chud pa sngon du 'tho ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su byang bar bya ba yongs su smin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su
289b2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems kyi stobs nye bar sgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su thob par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas
289b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa
289b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thibs pa nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thibs pa nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro
289b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'pho ba dang / sems can
289b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dang khams gsum thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon
289b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa
290a1(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'pho ba dang / dbang po mi skyo ba'i sems can yongs
290a2(dkon brtsegs): su smin par bya ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi
290a3(dkon brtsegs): bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gzod ma nas 'byung ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
290a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad gzod ma nas mtshan nyid med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas skye ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas yod pa ma yin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
290a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad gzod ma nas chags pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad 'jug pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ldog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad dngos po med/
290a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngo bo nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma mnyam pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa
290a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'pho ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
290b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rnam par dbye ba la shin tu rnam par brtags pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
290b2(dkon brtsegs): dkar po'i chos shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa dpag tu med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su gzung ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
290b3(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po yangs pa khong du chud par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi khams dang nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa
290b4(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug cing rjes su 'gro ba shes pa yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
290b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la lhag par dmigs shing kun shes par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang sgyur ba'i sa 'thob pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs
290b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ / de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/ spyod pa'i khyad par yongs su rdzogs
290b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / ye shes zab cing rgya che ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la chag pa med pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin
291a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don no/ / 'khor ba'i nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// skye bo mi mkhas pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//
291a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mdzod zad mi shes pa yang dag par ston pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sems can gyi khams
291a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni
291a4(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / bzod pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu
291a5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i don no/ / bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i
291a6(dkon brtsegs): don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin
291a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don no/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang dag par thob par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sems can thams
291b1(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / byang chub kyi snying po la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bdud thams cad 'dul
291b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med par ston cing sgrol ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba'i don ni
291b3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su
291b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
291b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su skor ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'
291b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po'i sde ltas ni/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub
291b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa'i snga ltas ni/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil lta bur gyur pa la rin po che bye ba khrag khrig
292a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong dums legs par brgyan par mthong ngo / / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'i snga lta ni/
292a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid dpa' zhing lag cha dang go chas ba zlogs nas pas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul bar mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa
292a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'i snga ltas ni/ phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la me tog sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'thor bar mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la
292a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'i snga ltas ni rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bud med kyis mgo la me tog tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba 'dogs par mthong ngo / /
292a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'i spu ltas ni/ rdzing them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ gser gyi bye ma brdal ba/ rnyog pa med cing dang la yan
292a6(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ me tog ut+pal dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar pos brgyan pa'i chu mthong ste/ de la bdag nyid rtse dga' yongs su spyod par mthong ngo // rigs kyi
292a7(dkon brtsegs): bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i snga ltas ni/ phyogs g.yas g.yon gnyis na sems can dmyal ba'i g.yangs mthong ste/ de nas bdag nyid
292b1(dkon brtsegs): ma smas ma nyams par slar ldog par mthong ngo / / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa'i snga ltas ni/ phrag pa gnyis na ri dgas kyi
292b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po seng ge ral pa can cod pan thogs pa gcan gzan phra mo thams cad skrag par byed cing 'dug par mthong ngo / / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub
292b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i snga ltas ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong ste// skye bo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas la mgo bo'i steng na rin po che sna
292b4(dkon brtsegs): tshetshogs kyis smras pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa mthong ngo / / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa'i snga ltas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
292b5(dkon brtsegs): sku mthong ste/ kha dog gser lta bu 'od 'dom gang ba tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang
292b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa'i snga ltas yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
292b7(dkon brtsegs): ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa la ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa gsum pa la ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa bzhi pa
293a1(dkon brtsegs): @la ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ / sa lnga pa la ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa drug pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon te/
293a2(dkon brtsegs): sa bdun pa la ni thebs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa brgyad pa la ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa dgu pa la ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa bcu pa la ni
293a3(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa dang po ni rin po che yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs
293a4(dkon brtsegs): su bzung ste skye'o/ / sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni gnas pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yong su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed po gsum pa ni rab tu mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o//
293a5(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni rin po che'i tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa la
293a6(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ / sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni don thams cad grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed
293a7(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad pa ni de ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ / sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o//
293b1(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung nas skye ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bcu pa'o//
293b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la khyad par gyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa gnyis pa la gzhan gyis
293b3(dkon brtsegs): mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o/ / sa gsum pa la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa bzhi pa la gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa lnga pa la
293b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o/ / sa drug pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa bdun pa la khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
293b5(dkon brtsegs): skye'o/ / sa brgyad pa la rnyog pa med pa'i rtog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa dgu pa la sgo mtha' yas pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa bcu pa la zad mi shes pa'i za ma
293b6(dkon brtsegs): tog ces bya ba'i gzungs skye'o/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu seng ge'i tog gi 'od zer snang ba thogs pa med pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to//
293b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kye ma 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du thams cad rdzogs shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad sgrub par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
294a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ lha'i bu de ni ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/ lha'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
294a2(dkon brtsegs): las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo phyir mi ldog pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs
294a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos pa yin te/ chos kyi rnam grang 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyis/ rigs kyis bu 'am/
294a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyis bu mo dag lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag cing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang
294a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur// sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa dang / sgra la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral
294a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ nyi ma'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang mi 'azal bar 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par gnon pa sgrud pa'i gzungs
294a7(dkon brtsegs): dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ rdo rje ltar mra zhing brtan pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs dang mi'i bral bar 'gyur/ brjod du med pa'i don bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar
294b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ tshig dang / spyod pa dang / sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam mkha'i dkyil dri ma med pa sgrub pa phyag rgyas btab pa'i gzung dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/
294b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa sgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gzungs 'di dag thob pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs
294b3(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par sprul nas chos ston te/ chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ 'gro ba'ang med/ 'ong ba'ang med do// sems can rnams yongs su
294b4(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed kyang / sems can du dmigs pa'ang med do// chos ston kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid lnga g.yo ba med do// 'chi 'pho dang skye ba ston kyang 'pho ba'ang med/ skye ba'ang med do//
294b5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed rnams gang du 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur/ gang nas 'ong bar yang mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub
294b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sum stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ sems can tshad med pa rnams kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//
294b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang
295a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu seng ge'i tog gi 'od zer snang ba thogs pa med pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten mi rengs te/ bcom
295a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/
295a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa bzhi bcuH sngang rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+hi ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la bab pa/ sh+lo ka nyis brgya/ zhuchen
295a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi lo tsa ba d+harma tA shI las skad gsar bcad kyis kyang zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sa pa ta sha ta kan na ma pra dz+nyA pA ra mai tA
295a5(dkon brtsegs): ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem
295a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong
295a7(dkon brtsegs): tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pas ya~M thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
295b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byams pa dang / spobs pa thogs med dang / brtson pa mi 'dor dang / de dag la sogs pa bya /
295b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sa ya dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir skya rengs
295b3(dkon brtsegs): shar ba'i dus kyi tshe rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / pho brang gi sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
295b4(dkon brtsegs): yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams/
295b5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / de dag thams cad
295b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rnams rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan
295b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis nyan thos chen po rnams 'ongs shing lhags te 'dus par mkhyen nas/ bdag gi pho brang nas byung ste/ pho brang gi phyi rol phyogs gcig tu gdan bting ba la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas
296a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ci'i phyir zhog pas 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
296a2(dkon brtsegs): pho brang gi sgo na 'dug/ de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du 'jam
296a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi che bsgor mchis so/ / bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la lta bar 'tshal ba'i slad du srad kyis mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
296a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba phyir thams cad kyi thog ma nyid
296a5(dkon brtsegs): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgor 'dug pa bden nam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
296a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de de lta lags/ bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ thams cad kyi thog ma
296a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rang gis gnas nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der mchis nas phyogs gcig tu mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la
296b1(dkon brtsegs): blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi bram ngoms pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur
296b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba'i slad du mchis pa de'ang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi na/ ji ltar
296b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mthong ba dang / ji ltar bdag phyag bgyid pa dang / ji ltar bdag bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de ltar blta bar bgyi'o// de ltar phyag bgyi'o// de ltar bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa
296b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba nas/ bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba lags so//
296b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar blta/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par
296b6(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog pa'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la mi skye ba'i rnam par blta ba nas/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rnam pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar
296b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ / de bzhin nyid la kun nas 'byung ba ma mchis te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid ni 'byung ba'ang ma lags/ 'jig pa'ang ma lags te/ de ltar de
297a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ / de bzhin nyid ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o//
297a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid ni 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid ni gnyis kyi rab
297a3(dkon brtsegs): tu phye ba ma lags/ gnyis su ma mchis pas rab tu phye ba'ang ma lags te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ma lags
297a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma lags te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag pa ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// de lta na
297a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / phyag bgyis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad

297b1(dkon brtsegs): so/ / 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar mthong ba dang / de ltar bsnyen bkur byas pa gang yin pa dang / khyod kyis byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad la nye bar
297b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang / khyod la sems can du dmigs pa dang / sems can du mngon par zhen pa ci'ang med cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir zhugs kyang / khyod la sem/
297b3(dkon brtsegs): can du mngon par zhen pa gang yang mi 'byung ba dang / khyod mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i tshul dang / sgyid lhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha bgro pa
297b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni khyod dka' ba byed pa'o/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad smras pa de de
297b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin te/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir go cha 'di'ang bkres te/ bdag la sems can du dmigs pa 'am/ sems can la mngon par zhen pa gang yang med do// btsun
297b6(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bre go cha de ni ji ltar bdag gis sems can gyi khams bri ba'am/ gang bar bya zhes de ltar mi bgos so// btsun pa shU ra dwa ti'i bu yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/ kalA
297b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ning re re na kad+h+r-i'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bcugs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas nyin ma chen du chos ston te/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye mi snyed kyi brgas
298a1(dkon brtsegs): par bzhugs par gyur la/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa re res sems can ji snyed btul ba de snyed kyi sems can/ de bzhin
298a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa re res chos bstan pa re res btul bar gyur tu zin kyang / sems can gyi khams la bri ba'am/ gang bar mngon pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dben pa dang / sems can sems

298a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe chos thams cad shin tu/
298b1(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ ci sems can du'ang 'dogs sam/ yang gal te 'jam dpal khyod la gang zhig sems can ji snyed yod ces de skad 'dri na/ de la khyod kyis ji skad bya/ 'jam dpal gyis/

298b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'di skad du sems can gyi khams gang du gtogs shes 'drin/ de la khyod kyis ji skad bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du skye ba med

298b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams kyang gnas so zhes bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skem pa de'i tshe ci la gnas te shes rab

300a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la'ang mi smon cing / nyi tshe ba la'ang mi smon gyi/ bcom ldan ldan 'das gang la smon pa dang / gang gis smon pa de nyid kyang ma mchis pa de shes rab

301a3(dkon brtsegs): chos so/ / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di de ga ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes chos gang la'ang rnam par rtog pas nye bar gnas pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/

301a5(dkon brtsegs): shes brjod pa 'am/ mi slob pa'i chos shes brjod pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos shes brjod pa 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos shes brjod pa'ang mtha' las 'das pa'i chos nyid
