326a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gyi dong bas pa ma nor ba rin po che na mang med de/ des sto ga nor du rin po ched kyi bang byas pa de lta de bur nor burin po ri de'i yon tan song bar gyur ba ba'i po
326b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gang dang gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo de ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par 'jog pa dang 'jug pa de dang de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di/
326b2(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer dag gis sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' gang yang ma khyab pa med do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob cing zhugs
326b3(dkon brtsegs): nas rnyed pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ma yin pa'i chos gang yang mi ston to/ / gang la las 'di bzhin du shes na/ des skye ba med pa dang 'gal ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo // 'jam
326b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i phyogs bzhi nas skyes bu zhig chu 'chu na/ de thams cad 'di lta ste/ lanA tshwa'i ror ro gcig pa nyid 'chu zhing len to// 'jam dpal de bzhin du
326b5(dkon brtsegs): ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba med pa'i ro dang / dngos po med pa'i ro dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ro dang / rnam par grol ba'i ro dang / 'gog pa'i ror ro/
326b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa'o// 'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pa de chos gang dang gang ston kyang de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ skye ba med pa'i ro dang
326b7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa'i ro dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ro dang / rnam par grol ba'i ro dang / 'gog pa'i ror ro gcig par ston par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas rigs
327a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de 'dod na ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de 'chad pa dang / rnam par ston pa dang / nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de ltar na
327a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas gang ci ston kyang de dag thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul du ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / dngos po med par ston par 'gyur
327a3(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / 'jam dpal gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs nas/ myur ba nyid du bla na med/
327a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi tshe bdag gi dbyings nas//
327a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings kyi bar du skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / gcig kho na dang / tha dad pa kho nar yang mi mthong na/ 'jam dpal de lta bu'i bzod pa can gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
327a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po myur du tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / rigs kyi bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi sems
327a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa de'i bzod pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ba'o// gang yang sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir byang chub tu
327b1(dkon brtsegs): mi smon pa de lta bu'i bzod pa 'di'i nga rigs kyi bu de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur bar 'gyur bar bshad do/ / chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes su de
327b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar mos shing zhum par mi 'gyur ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ngas bshad de/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ma bral bar brjod par
327b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mi
327b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar brjod par bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzos
327b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub rgyu las nges par 'gyur pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rgyu ma yin zhing / rgyu las
327b6(dkon brtsegs): nges par byung ba'ang ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa ni rgyu 'ang ma yin la/ rgyu las nges par byung ba'ang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ma skyes/
327b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas no rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas nung bar mi 'gyur ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi
328a1(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog par dra bshad do/ / 'jam dpal de lta bas na dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
328a2(dkon brtsegs): zab mo 'di la zhum par mi 'gyur ba nas/ nur ba'i bar du mi 'gyur ba de dag ni nga la skyabs su dong ba'o// de dag ni de'i rjes su rab tu byung ba'o// de dag gi ston pa ni de yin no// 'jam dpa'
328a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mi slob pa de byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la mi slob pa'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na
328a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni sa chen po la brten nas skye'o// 'jam dpal de
328a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i chos gang ci'ing rung ba de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin na 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur te/
328a6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu slu bar mi byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad
328a7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol te/ / bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa bstan pa bshad pa gang lags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong ngam/
328b1(dkon brtsegs): zong khyer ram/ yul lam ljongs dag tu gang la la dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba nas/ ston pa'i bar du 'gyur ba mchis sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon
328b2(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / 'jam dpal gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di de ltar gyi tshe la thos nas/ bdag tshe 'di brdzes nas kyang shes rab kyi pha
328b3(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di mnyan to zhes smon lam btab pa de dag ni nyan pa nas/ rgya cher mi bsgom pa'i tshul gyi sgo bar byed pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa
328b4(dkon brtsegs): zab mo 'di thos te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba yangs pa thob pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung bar nga mi 'chad do// 'jam dpal gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di la nyan
328b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod par gyur na/ de la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod de mnyan pas ci zhig bya/ thos nas ma dad cing phyir nur ta re/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la chos gang yang yos su 'grub par ma bstan te/ so so'i skye bo'i
328b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams skye ba 'am/ 'jig par yang ma bstan/ slob pa'i chos rnams dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba 'am/
328b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa 'am/ 'thob par ma bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
329a1(dkon brtsegs): cos ldan 'das yod / dge slong / na // de na mal gas 'did da na du ga g+hu
329a2(dkon brtsegs): dregang ban rnamam tshan/ chom na 'das dgang 'ji dus bad/ gis 'di myu du sa thams pa dung mi 'gal ba'i gtam po nas brjod par byagyu'o// rje'i drang dun na/ ma ldan
329a3(dkon brtsegs): skye ma mchis pa dang 'gal ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis te/ bka' mnyid dani sems can kyang gis kyang 'tshal bar smrab ma lags so// de ci'i sring du zhen/ 'dilta sem pa na d
329a4(dkon brtsegs): migs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis de la 'di skad du mi smye ba zhes bya ba'i chos de bstan par gyur to zhes brjod par brtsi'o// de ci'i rmad du rnam
329a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni skyibs mchis par mnyam pa'i mdu du'o/ / bka' mchod der ni ji ltar dam bcom pa'i chos rnams kyis so so'i skye bo'i chos de dag rnam par
329a6(dkon brtsegs): bshig pa sa lags pa dag bcom pa rnams kyi gong ma rtogs pa ma bstan to/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de la bdag gis 'di skad du chos bstan pa de la sems can kyang mang rgya
329a7(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med de zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ma ma ca shin du'o
329b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad du 'drin bdag gis de skad ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'tshal
329b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ deng khyod bcom ldan 'das dang gtam ci zhig byas shes 'dri na/ de la bdag gis 'di skad du gal te khyod de nyan par 'dod na/ de mnyan to snyam du yid ma gtod cig/ mnyan to snyam du
329b3(dkon brtsegs): sems ma skyed cig/ kye skyes bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i shes rab ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes rab skyed cig dang / de lta bus chos bstan pa'i di shes par nus so// kye skyes bu gal te khyod kyis chos bstan
329b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di mnyan par 'dod na/ de'i phyir 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya'i rjes lta bur gnas par gyis shig dang / de lta bus chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par nus so// kye skyes bu gal te
329b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par 'dod nas/ de'i phyir gnyis la ma dmigs shig/ mi gnyis pa la'ang ma dmigs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la gnyis su brjod par bya ba yong su brjod
329b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ mi gnyis par brjod par bya ba gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// gal te chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par 'dod na bdag tu 'du shes pa rnams kyang ma gzhi ga cig/ lta bar gyur pa rnams las
329b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma 'das zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'ang lhag par ma dmigs shig/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma skyod cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang
330a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig bdag las nyan par 'tshal te 'dri na/ de la bdag gis de skad brjod par bgyi'o// de skad rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de ltar 'di la gzhag par bgyi'o//
330a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te 'dri ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ltar gnas shing / de ltar zhugs na spobs pa'i phyag rgya 'di la gnas pa de la slad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa dang /
330a3(dkon brtsegs): dngos po ma mchis pa dang / ma byung ba'i bar 'di bstan pa bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
330a4(dkon brtsegs): to/ / 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la'ang phyis 'di skad gyis shig/ de
330a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pa'i
330a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa'o zhes smra par
330a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
330b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// ting /
330b2(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin thams cad la mkhas pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// ting nge
330b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de ci'i
330b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de dag byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am//
330b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad
330b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du byas pa ma yin pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste/ gang nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de
330b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med do zhes de ltar shes par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyi bslab par bya'o// chos tham cad ni nges par
331a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byung ba ste/ gang nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos de gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro// chos de dag ni ji ltar brjod pa
331a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar yod pa ma yin te/ brjod du med pa ni yod pa'ang ma yin zhing dmigs su med do zhes de ltar shes par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
331a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ste/ gang byang chub kyi phyir mi spyod pa'i sems can de gang yang med do zhe na yang
331a4(dkon brtsegs): de la zhum pa med par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
331a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni byang chub dang mnyam pa'o/ / ji ltar chos thams cad byang chub dang mnyam pa dang / byang chub ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin no// sems can thams cad ci 'dra bar
331a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa de'ang de bzhin no/ / med pa'i phyir spyod pa thams cad ni spyod pa med pa'o// derang byang chu ste/ byang chub gang yin pa skye ba med pa'ang de yin/ 'byung ba med pa'ang de yin te/ de lta bu'i chos 'di la zhum
331a7(dkon brtsegs): po med par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o zhes
331b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa'i bar de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las
331b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bstan du med pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi ston pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
331b3(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen ma gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa tsam yang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa nas
331b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par nga 'chad na/ gang dag de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub tu nges
331b5(dkon brtsegs): par rig par bya'o/ / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i bar 'di thos nas mi sgeg/ mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba/
331b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas pa'o// gong du'ang mos par byed na/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nges par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal ngas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/
331b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par mkhyen pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mnos pa'i rgya 'di gzhag par bya ste/ rgya 'di ni mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa rnams la gzhan
332a1(dkon brtsegs): go/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang chags pa med pa yongs su ston pa'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am//
332a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo rgyu 'dis btab pa ni ngan song du 'gro ba'i skal ba can ma yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gro ba 'am/ 'jug pa'i skal ba can ma yin no// de nas de'i tshe lha'i
332a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man da ra dang / man da ra chen po dang / lha'i spos dang /
332a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'ang mchod cing / bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal
332a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang gtor/ mngon par gtor nas/ 'di skad ces dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang dag phyag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i chos rin po che 'di mchod pa dang /
332a6(dkon brtsegs): phyi phyir zhing thos par gyur cig ces smras so// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa'i bar gyi shes
332a7(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de 'dra ba de dag gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba nas/ de dag nyid
332b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du brtson par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig
332b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo dag gi rna lam du tshegs chung ngus grag la/ thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
332b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bdag cag gi 'di ni lces bsgrubs pa'o zhes the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya
332b4(dkon brtsegs): byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kau shi ka de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub par blta'o// de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i
332b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu'ang nges par shes par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rig kyi bu mo
332b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis rlab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas byin gyis rlab tu gsol/ tshig 'di smras ma thag tu de'i tshe skad cig de nyid la sangs
332b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu kyi mthus sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ / sa chen po g.yo ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag/
333a1(dkon brtsegs): tu do nas de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang
333a2(dkon brtsegs): ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi
333a3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i sde ltas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// 'jam dpal 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha
333a4(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i snga ltas rnams te/ ltas 'di dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o// 'jam dpal gang dag
333a5(dkon brtsegs): chos gang yang mi spong zhing mi zlog la/ bsngags par yang mi byed pa de dag ni phyag rgya 'dis btab par shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal dmigs pa yod na spong bar byed pa dang /
333a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na gang dag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag gi ched du ngas rgya 'di bzhag ste/ 'di ltar de dag gis thos nas kyang chos gang
333a7(dkon brtsegs): la'ang ston pa 'am/ rnam par rtog pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad don dam par ma skyes pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
333b1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces dkar stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mI dang / lA ma yin dang / dri bar bcas
333b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten mi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs spyod phrag brgya ba
333b3(dkon brtsegs): las/ 'jam dpal gyis nus pa'i le'u shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa bdun bsdu bya zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu drug pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po si ran+d+ha
333b4(dkon brtsegs): bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ sh+lo ka bdun brgya/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rat+na tsu
333b5(dkon brtsegs): ri br-its+tshi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang /
333b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya nod
333b7(dkon brtsegs): phung po'i r-i le/ dge slong bzhi khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa
334a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas/
334a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang
334a3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs cig ste/ thams
334a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ dbang bskur ba thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ pad+ma bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ pad+ma bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa
334a5(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu rtogs pa/ yon tan 'byung gnas
334a6(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la shin tu gtan 'phebs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub kyi snying por rab tu gzhol ba/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las shin tu 'das pa
334a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa/ mi zad pa bstan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tshim par byed pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob pa/ mi
334b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa seng ge'i stabs kyis 'khor thams cad gnon pa la mkhas pa/ tshig bstan pa la phyad pas don yod par bskal pa'i bar du lung ston pa/ gzugs kyi mtshan bzang pos legs par/
334b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa/ 'dus pa ngan pa'i tshogs pha rol rgol ba yang dag par rab tu 'jom pa/ grags pa dang / brjod pa'i sgra mthon po phyogs bcur grags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod
334b3(dkon brtsegs): cing bsngags te/ rab tu bkur ba/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dpag tu med pa las byung ba/

334b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bsdu ba dang / kun rig pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i tshul la
334b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa/ rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba/ sems dpa' zhing brtan la/ rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa/ dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi stobs

340b6(dkon brtsegs): su dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su mi sngo/ / nyan thos kyi theg par ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par ma yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
340b7(dkon brtsegs): las gzhan du mi sngo ba 'di ni sngo ba tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na sbyin pa sbyin pa na bsam pa tha dad du mi byed ce na/ bsam pa mnyam pa/ sbyor ba mnyam pa/ rnam par
341a1(dkon brtsegs): smin pa la mi re ba/ pha rol la byas pa'i lan re ba med pa/ g.yo med pa dang / sgyu med pas sems thag pa nas shin tu yongs su btang ba'i blo/ sems 'gyod pa med pa
341a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas gsum du dad pa thob ste sbyin no snyam pa dang / sbyin par byed pa dang / sbyin nas dad pa rab tu thob pa 'di ni bsam pa tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems
341a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na tha dad pa 'di bzhi mi byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su dag pa'i rkang pa dang po'o// de lta ba brgyad yongs su dag par
341a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ brgyad po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu lta ba yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta
341a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/ lta ba brgyad po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de bag la
341a6(dkon brtsegs): nyal bzhi yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi bag la nyal dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi bag la nyal dang / rlung sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bag la
341a7(dkon brtsegs): nyal dang / bag chags kyi mtshoms sbyor ba'i bag la nyal te/ bag la nyal bzhi po de dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de 'du shes bzhi yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin
341b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa ste/ 'du shes bzhi po de dag yongs su spangs nas
341b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ / de rnam pa bzhi po yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag
341b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa ste/ rnam pa bzhi po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de chags pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/
341b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa la chags pa dang / 'gyod pa la chags pa dang / theg pa dman par sngo ba la chags pa ste/ gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin po sbyin par byed de/ de 'jigs pa gsum
341b5(dkon brtsegs): las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'jigs pa dang / rlom sems kyi 'jigs pa dang / bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs pa ste/ gsum po de dag
341b6(dkon brtsegs): las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ / de rgya bzhis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab
341b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa dang / byang chub stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ste/ rgya bzhi po de dag gis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de brtson 'grus rtsom pa
342a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin pa byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
342a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i brtson 'grus
342a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsom pa ste/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de dran pa bzhi dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems dran
342a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dran pa dang / byams pa chen po dran pa dang // sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba dran pa ste/ dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed
342a5(dkon brtsegs): de 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi 'khor yongs
342a6(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa ste/ 'khor gsum po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhis yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa shes
342a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sgyu ma'i chos su so sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / bsngo ba la so sor rtog pa shes
342b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa ste/ shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag gis yongs su drug par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i chos la zhugs pa de'i sbyin pa'i
342b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs
342b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs
342b4(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa ni rnam pa gcig ste/ rnam pa gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa med pa'i sems/ thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las mchog
342b5(dkon brtsegs): tu bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sems/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i sems/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams
342b6(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su zad par byed pa'i sems/ sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i sems/ yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sems de nyid mi 'dor zhing srung ba dang / sbed pa dang
342b7(dkon brtsegs): mi brjed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gcig go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i/
343a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs
343a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi bsam pa'i tshul khrims la 'dzud pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
343a3(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gsum te/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi gnod pa thams cad bsal bas lus yongs su dag pa dang / kha gsag dang //
343a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhog slongs dang / ngag gi skyon thams cad bsal bas ngag yongs su dag pa dang / 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa bsal bas sems yongs su
343a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gsum mo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bzhi ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa
343a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / bslab pa yang dag par bzung ba mnyams pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chol pa yongs su smin par byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ston pa bzhin
343a7(dkon brtsegs): du gus par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bzhi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga ste/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
343b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / ma bslabs pa la mi brnyas pa dang / nyan thos kyi sems la mi re ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'dod pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa lnga'o//
343b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa drug ste/ rnam pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa las mi 'da' bas sangs rgyas
343b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims la 'gyod pa med pas chos rjes su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la lta bas dge 'dun rjes dran pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spong bas
343b4(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas lha rjes su dran pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa
343b5(dkon brtsegs): drug go/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bdun te/ rnam pa bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
343b6(dkon brtsegs): cad la mngon par dad pa dang / bdag nyid dbang du byas te ngo tsha shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te khrel yod pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang / bdag dang
343b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la gdung ba med pas nges pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta bas rnam par 'tshe ba med pa dang / sems kyi yongs su gdung ba nye bar zhi bas khon du mi 'dzin pa ste/
344a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dum/ rdzun// rigs kyi byung chum skyem sa dpa'i tshul khrims kyi ro trU sbyin pa'i spyod pa song sgyu bA bAN+Da dang / ra phywa kru ne/ /
344a2(dkon brtsegs): bang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas khags ga med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis chog shes byas thob kyis 'jam bur mi byed pa /
344a3(dkon brtsegs): s+yA pa'i yon tan dang / go byung ba smras pas 'gags pa'i sa ya drug par 'dzin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dkon pa lhaganas pa rnams myi gtong bas sus la yin pa da/
344a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas srog la mi lbu ba dang / 'dra 'di song sa gcis bAn dka' bya dang / khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas co slo lal thob ba ste/
344a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgyad do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ma pa saste/ rnam pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun nas mnar sems kyi
344a6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po dgu po rnams 'dul ba dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu po rnams las shin tu 'da' ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po rnams kyi rtsa ba yongs su sbyong ba dang /
344a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdung ba med pas sems zhi ba dang / sems las su rung bas ni gnas kyi tshogs kun tu tshol ba dang / chog dang / tshul khrims dang / lta ba nyams pa las shin tu 'das pas mi stod
344b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad la mi slu ba dang / tshul khrims la skyon med pas shin tu mthar thug pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas sems phyed pa
344b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'di ni rnam pa dgu'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu ste/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi
344b3(dkon brtsegs): las rnam pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las rnam pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las rnam pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang bral te drang zhing tshul
344b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chos pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa thams cad dang mi 'gal ba dang / phan par sbyong ba'i dngos po'i sngon du 'gro bas rjes su ston pa dang / dul zhing cang shes kyi sa'i
344b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir sems dmu rgod ma yin pa dang / bdag nyid byed pas sems can thams cad kyi slob mar gyur pa dang / nga rgyal med pas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba dang //
344b6(dkon brtsegs): srog gi dbang por chos mdun du byed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing mdun du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha
344b7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma dang bcas shing 'bad pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims ni srog gi phyir yang mi
345a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dral ba dang / mtshan ma med pa dang lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul khrims ni chos thams cad la sgro mi 'dogs par slob pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so// rig kyi bu gzhan
345a2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang rnam par dag pas skye mched rnam par dag pa dang / phyi
345a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pas yul thams cad spangs pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/
345a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pas tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid do// gnyis po de dag go/ rigs kyi bu
345a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
345a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag yongs su dag pas 'di ltar gshe bang slar mi gshe'o// lus yongs su dag pas brdegs kyang slar mi
345a7(dkon brtsegs): rdog go/ sems yongs su dag pas khros kyang slar mi khro'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'tshig par byas kyang slar mi 'tshig go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni
345b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can la lta ba'i phyir gzhan gyis ngan du smras sam/ ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam thos kyang mi ga she'o// 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba'i phyir lag pa dang / bong ba dang / dbyig
345b2(dkon brtsegs): pas brdegs kyang slar khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kun tu srung ba'i phyir yan lag dang nying lag bcad kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
345b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni bsdu ba'i dngos po yongasasu 'dzin pa'i phyir/ slong pa la mi gshe'o// byang chub kyi lam gyis nye bar brtan pa'i phyir/ de dag la byams pa nye bar sgrub bo// smon lam yongs su
345b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de dag la snying rje bskyed do// bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ gang slong yang de la phan par sems shing snying rje dang ldan te/ byang chub
345b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag tu nges par sbyin par byed do/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing bzod do// stobs
345b6(dkon brtsegs): bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub rjes su dran zhing bzod do// dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ ye shes rjes su dran
345b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing bzod do/ / byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ phan par 'dod pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'bras bu yod
346a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par gnon pa rjes smra dran zhing bzod do/ / mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ seng ge bsgyings pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do// sems
346a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la 'dud pa'i phyir/ spyi gtsug ltar mi snang ba rjes su dran zhing bzod do// 'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rjes su
346a3(dkon brtsegs): dran zhing bzod do/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes myong ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dge
346a4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa ni stobs gnyis kyis yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so sor rtogs pa'i stobs dang / sgom pa'i stobs so// de la gang lus dang sems la gnas te
346a5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa ni so sor rtogs pa'i stobs so/ / gang chos thams cad la gnas te bzod pa ni sgom pa'i stobs so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
346a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni/ gang sems can thams cad la bdag med pas bzod cing / chos thams cad la dben par bzod de/ gang chos thams cad la mi bzod pa de ni bzod pa
346a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la don dam par gang bzod pa 'am/ mi bzod pa'i chos gang yang med do// gang chos thams cad khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa
346b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa ste/ chos khas len pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// gang chos thams cad la zhum pa med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ zhum pa la ni bzod
346b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do/ / gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ 'dzin pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// gang la bdag
346b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / chos med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ bdag dang / sems can dang / chos la gnas pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do//
346b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus rnam par 'phrul pa'i bzod pa yongs su
346b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ gnyis po de dag go// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong
346b6(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dgos
346b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dgos pa ma yin pa la zhum pa med pa/ brtson pas mi ngal ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa la mi zhen pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos thams cad yongs su tshol
347a1(dkon brtsegs): balnga brtson pa/ chos thams cad ston par btsun pa/ chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa la ldog/ mchod sbyin chen byo las smyos pa/ sems can rnams yongs su
347a2(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pa la yongs su mi skyo ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par sbyong ba/ theg pa dman pa las shin tu 'da' ba/ sngon dam bcos pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sbyin pa dang / rdus
347a3(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / thos pa'i tsho gas sogs pa/ sngon gyi bsod nams bsogs pa chung mi gson pa/ nga rgyal med pas sems can thams cad la rim gro bya'o cog byed pa ste/ dri ni brtson 'grus
347a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ / de'i yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la mig yor dang gzugs brnyan du shes pa/ tshig la brjod du med par shes pa/ sems la shin tu nye bar ni
347a5(dkon brtsegs): pabar shes pa/ zad pa shes pa/ rnam par rig pa/ zad pa shes pa rab tu shes pa/ mi skye ba shes pa/ nges par rtogs pa'o// de rtsom pa gsum las rnam par grol bar brtson 'grus rtsom
347a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ gnas pa'i rtsom pa dang / dmigs pa'i rtsom pa dang / yongs su rtogs pa'i rtsom pa ste/ gsum po de dag go/ de chags pa gsum la mi chags par brtson 'grus rtsom ste/
347a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa
347b1(dkon brtsegs): @la mi chags pa/ lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ lus dang / reg pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam
347b2(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa la mi chags pa'o/ / de 'dzin pa med cing dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa mi len/ ser sna mi 'dor/ tshul khrims mi len/ 'chal pa'i tshul
347b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims mi 'dor/ bzod pa mi len/ gnod sems mi 'dor/ brtson 'grus mi len/ le lo mi 'dor/ bsam gtan mi len/ g.yeng ba mi 'dor/ shes rab mi len//
347b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa'i shes rab mi 'dor/ dge ba mi len/ mi dge ba mi 'dor/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi len/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi 'dor/ de len pa med cing 'dor ba med pas/
347b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de la gnyis gang zhe na/ gang nang gi kun tu ldang ba las dmigs pa kun tu ldang ba dang / phyi rol tu rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'i
347b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba de ni gnyis zhes bya'o/ / de la gnyis yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang nang nye bar zhi bas phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / spros pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gnyis yongs su
347b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa zhes bya'o/ / gang rgyu ba med cing ma spros pa/ spros pa med pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su
348a1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang bsam
348a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi yan lag rnams yang dag par sgrub cing / yang dag par bsgrubs nas so sor rtog pa dang / so sor brtags nas kyang snyoms par 'jug pa yin te/ de bsam gtan byed kya
348a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan
348a4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ / de bsam gtan byed kyang mig la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang rna ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ sna la ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ lus la ma yin/
348a5(dkon brtsegs): yid la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ sgra la ma yin/ dri lam yin/ ro la ma yin/ reg bya la ma yin/
348a6(dkon brtsegs): chos la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang lus su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang sems su rnam par rtog pa la
348a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang sa la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bzhin du chu la ma yin/ me la ma yin/ rlung la ma yin/ nam mkha' la gnas te
348b1(dkon brtsegs): byas gtanam byed du/ / de bsam gtan bye kyang thabasam yin/ nyi ma lam yin/ brgya byin lam byin/ tshangs pa la mA min/ skye dgu'i bdag po la gnas te bsasu gtan mi byed
348b2(dkon brtsegs): do/ / 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ gzugs kyi khams la ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do//
348b3(dkon brtsegs): de bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ 'jig rten pha rol la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang mi mtho mi
348b4(dkon brtsegs): dma' bar gnas te/ mi g.yo bar gyur cing bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang bdag nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gta/
348b5(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang sems can la ma yin/ srog la ma yin/ gso ba la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ shed las skyes pa la ma yin/ shed bu nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan
348b6(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ / de bsam gtan byed kyang chad par lta ba la khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang rtag par lta ba la ma yin/ 'byung bar lta ba la ma yin//
348b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par lta ba la khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang zag pa shin tu zad par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang skyon med pa la 'jug pa
349a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir gsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang shin tu mngon par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir bsam gtAn mi byed do// de stong pa
349a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par
349a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan
349a4(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/ / de byams pa chen po'i go bgos/ snying rje chen po byin gyi rlabs la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad kyi
349a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan du byed do/ / de la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ sbyin pa ma tshang ba med pa
349a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ma tshang ba med pa/ bzod pa ma tshang ba med pa/ brtson 'grus ma tshang ba med pa/ bsam gtan ma tshang ba med pa/ shes rab ma tshang ba med pa/ thabs mi tshang ba med pa/ byams
349a7(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po ma tshang ba med pa/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms ma tshang ba med pa/ bden pa shes pa la 'jug pa ma tshang ba med pa/ byang chub kyi sems sems can la lta ba ma tshang ba
349b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam sbyor ba ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang / don mthun pa ma tshang ba med pa/ dran pa dang shes bzhin mtshang ba med pa/
349b2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
349b3(dkon brtsegs): ma tshang ba med pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa ma tshang ba med pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa ma tshang
349b4(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa/ mi dge ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bar yang dag par bsdus pa/ dge
349b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi tshul yongs su sdud pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la lta bas byin gyis brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su bsgrubs pas legs par brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyabyings yongs su
349b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bsngos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pas/ stobs bcu'i stobs kyis yang dag par
349b7(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bco brgyad dang rjes su mthun pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ma 'dres pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams
350a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang ma bral ba/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa/ rton pa ba'ini mthong ba/ 'jig rten dang
350a2(dkon brtsegs): rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas ma smad pa/ drang ba mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba/ nyon mongs pa
350a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sbyong ba/ chu bo las sgrol ba/ 'dzin pa thams cad gcod pa/ rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba/ las dang nyon mongs pa rnams nye bar zhi ba/ chos nyid kyis btang snyoms pa/ sangs rgyas
350a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lta ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bems po// byin gyis brlabs bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba med pa/ rang gi ngang gis lung du ma bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag
350a5(dkon brtsegs): tu brtson pa/ nye bar zhi bas bsil bar gyur pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bar ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya'o// rigs kyi
350a6(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ri mo mkhan bzo tha dad par bslabs pa/ yan la
350a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par phye ba tha dad du bslabs par gyur te/ de las la ni sa gcod pa la mkhas kyang 'dri ba la mo mkhas/ la la ni gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas kyang yan lag dang nying la ga la mi mkhas/ kha cig ni
350b1(dkon brtsegs): rkang lag 'dri ba la mkhas kyang mig dang / mgo dang / rna ba 'dri ba la mi mkhas pa dag cig yin la/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa tha dad du bslabs pa/ yan lag rnam par dbye ba la tha dad du bslabs pa/
350b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs tha dad du bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan de dag thams cad la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas ras shig byin te/ khyed rnams kyis ras 'di la nga'i gzug bris te 'on cig/ khyed
350b3(dkon brtsegs): cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di la ri mo bris shig/ de nas ri mo mkhan de dag tshogs nas ras de brgyangs pa las/ ri mo mkhan de dag gi nang nas ri mo mkhan gcig cig yul gzhan zhig tu song bar
350b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/ de nas ri mo mkhan phyi ma de dag gis de la rgyal po de'i gzugs bris na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ri mo mkhan gcig pu de'i lag tu ma blangs na/ ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang /
350b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na ji tsam du don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir 'di dper byas te/ 'di'i don cir bltan/
350b6(dkon brtsegs): ma rigs kyi bu ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig pu de med na/ ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa ji snyed dang / spyod pa ji snyed dang / brtson pa ji snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yo
350b7(dkon brtsegs): su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag las/ gal te rnam pa gcig ma bsnan na rang rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin no// nam sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par bsgrub
351a1(dkon brtsegs): shing lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa de'i spros pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams
351a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yin no/ / bstan pa 'di nges par bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i brgyad stong gis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la bzod pa rab
351a3(dkon brtsegs): tu thob bo/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes
351a4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa bcu
351a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye
351a6(dkon brtsegs): shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus
351a7(dkon brtsegs): byas la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med
351b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas thams cad la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten las/
351b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la'ang de'i shre rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa
351b3(dkon brtsegs): med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / bden pa shes pa la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / kun rdzob bstan pa la'ang de'i shes
351b4(dkon brtsegs): rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / don dam pa bstan pa la'ang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang
351b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir/ rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can thams cad la'ang de'i shes
351b6(dkon brtsegs): rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thog pa med par 'jug pa yin te/ de'i shes rab de'ang 'phags pa/ zag pa med pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa/ nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang
351b7(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ gting dpag dka' ste/ mthong bar dka' zhing / zab la khong du chud par dka' ba/ bye brag phyed cing nges par rtogs pa/
352a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang thal ba/ bag chags bsngal ba/ bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs pa/ thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ chos stong pa nyid kyi tshul shes
352a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ don la nges par rtogs pa/ shin tu lhags pa/ shin tu sbyangs pa/ ci'ang snang ba med pa/ 'gal ba med pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dus dang dus ma yin pa la rtog/
352a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dus las mi 'dra' ba/ skyon med pa/ legs par srung ba/ skyon med pa la dka' ba/ bden pa khong du chud pa/ 'gog pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs pa/ shin tu rgal ga
352a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa/ gcig pu spyod pa/ spyod pa med pa/ logs par spyad pa spyod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad
352a5(dkon brtsegs): las phyir log kyang / gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med pa/ yul thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang / sangs rgyas kyi yul las phyir ma log po/ rtsom pa thams cad las shin tu 'das
352a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa las phyir ma log pa/ spyod pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang / dge ba'i spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/ sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las
352a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'das kyang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/ nye bar len pa la spyod kyang / nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyi
352b1(dkon brtsegs): ma gos kyang / 'jig rten dang ma bral ba/ lus med kyang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o// de'i shes rab de'ang de'i ngang tshul la spyod pa myur du khong du chud pa/ dbang
352b2(dkon brtsegs): po smin par gyur pa/ yun ring por lta ba/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i chos la brtson pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba/ dge ba sbyin pa la spyod pa/ nye bar len
352b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
352b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba/ don thams cad rjes su rtogs pa/ chos thams cad ro mtshungs pa/ thabs thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba'o// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa'i
352b5(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu song ba dang / dpag tu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// mtshan ma thams cad dang / dmigs pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams
352b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi pha rol tu song bas/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i shes rab yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i mtshan
352b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid yongs su dag pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so// gzhan yang yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis
353a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so// de'i shes rab de'ang thams cad kyi rjes su
353a2(dkon brtsegs): song ba/ sems can gyi rjes su song ba/ chos kyi rjes su song ba'o// de'i shes rab de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis phyir mtshams sbyor ba'ang med la/ skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi mtshams kyang
353a3(dkon brtsegs): spor ro/ / de'i shes rab de gnas pa'ang med la/ yul thams cad dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la'ang gnas so// de'i shes rab de ni mtha' dang yang bral la/ dbus
353a4(dkon brtsegs): la'ang mi gnas pa'o/ / de'i shes rab de ni phyogs bcur rnam par lta bas sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul lo// 'byung ba shin tu mthong ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'ang rnyed pa'o// de'i shes
353a5(dkon brtsegs): rab de ni chos thams cad shes shing mngon par rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ / de'i shes rab de ni chos kyi don thams cad dang ldan yang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin
353a6(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'ang ma yin te/ sbyor ba'am/ mi sbyor ba 'am/ chos gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi 'byung gnas
353a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no/ / bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas yin no// thos pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// yon tan gyi 'byung gnas yin no// chos kyi 'byung
353b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas yin no/ / gzungs dang spobs pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// yon tan dang ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
353b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa
353b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa 'di bstan pa na/ 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa'i brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la
353b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ / dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha'i bu khri ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma
353b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnam par dag nas/ de dag tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos
353b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba lags na/ gang dag thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
353b7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes smras so// // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
354a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa
354a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas te/ lus la rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan
354a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dran pa nye bar 'jog go/ / rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa dang / sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog
354a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa'o/ / de la mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/ bcog pas yongs su gang ba yun thung zhing byis pa
354a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dred pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni/ mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o// de la sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang lus mi gtsang ba
354a6(dkon brtsegs): grogs med pa 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ bsod nams kyi sku/ ye shes kyi sku/ rdo rje'i sku/ mi shigs pa'i sku/ zag pa med pa'i sku/ 'jig rten gsuM
354a7(dkon brtsegs): las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ gzugs mthong na sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba'i sku thob par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni/ sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/
354b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi
354b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni/ chos gnyis yongs su spong ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / rtag pa'i rnam pa'o// de la mi rtag
354b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ste/ ring por mi gnas pa/ tha mar 'chi ba yin par shes nas/ lus kyi phyir mi mthun pa'i 'tshe ba mi spyod cing
354b4(dkon brtsegs): snying po nyid len to/ / de snying po gsum len te/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyi snying po dang / longs spyod kyi snying po dang / 'tsho ba'i snying po'o// de la lus mi rtag go snyam nas/ sems
354b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi bran dang slob mar khas blangs te ci bya'o cog la 'bad pa yin/ lus mi rtag go snyam nas/ lus kyi nyes pa yon po dang / g.yo dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad
354b6(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ / lus mi rtag go snyam nas/ srog la bag mi ston par 'gyur te/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa mi byed do// lus mi rtag go snyam nas longs spyod la sred cing chags par mi
354b7(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa'i rnam pas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de la yon
355a1(dkon brtsegs): tan gyi phan yon rab tu 'thob bo/ / de la rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dang ldan pa'i sem
355a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa'i ye shes skyes shing byung ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / sems can gyi khams
355a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad la btang ba/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa 'di ni
355a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ / gang mi zad pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ 'dus ma byas ni mi zad pa zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas ni rtag pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
355a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dge ba'i rtse ba rtsom pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'dus ma byas nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
355a6(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang / mtshan ma med pa nges par brtags pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rgyu mthun pas brtson
355a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtsam pa thams cad rtsom pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ / nam mkha' ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam
355b1(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtog pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye
355b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gzhag pa sgom pa/ bdag gi lus de la sems can thams cad kyi lus nye bar 'dogs shing / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gnas la gan par bya'o//
355b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zag pa med pa ltar rang gi lus kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin du rtog go/ de zag pa med pa'i chos la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi
355b4(dkon brtsegs): lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so/ / de zag pa med pa'i lus kyis zag pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sogs so// de zag pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa
355b5(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag zag pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par yongs su sngo'o/ / de zag pa med pa'i chos thob pas zag pa las 'byung bar mi byed do// zag pa rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i zag
355b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa'o// de la 'dod pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsamra bzhin
355b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'dod pa'i khams su skye'o/ / srid pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir bsams bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin to// ma rig pa'i zag pa dang
356a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i zag pa de gnyis rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor 'jug par bya'o// lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
356a2(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa de lus la sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang ma byung bar so sor rtog go/ lus la phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi 'pho bar so sor rtog go// lus la da ltar byung ba na rang bzhin gyis dben par yang so
356a3(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog go/ de de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas lus dang ldan pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba mi skyed do// 'jigs tshogs la lta ba dang bral bas bdag gir mi byed
356a4(dkon brtsegs): do/ / bdag gir byed pa med pas yongs su 'dzin pa la yongs su mi 'dzin to// yongs su 'dzin pa med pas rtsod pa med pa rab tu 'thob bo// rtsod pa spangs pas gnod sems med do// gnod
356a5(dkon brtsegs): sems med pas bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / bzod pa rab tu thob pas phyir khengs par yang mi 'gyur/ 'dud par yang mi 'gyur ro// khengs par yang mi 'gyur/ 'dud par yang mi 'gyur
356a6(dkon brtsegs): bas chos nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro/ / chos nyid la gnas pas phyir yang chos ma yin pa spyod par mi 'gyur ro// chos spyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs su song ngo // chos kyi grogs su
356a7(dkon brtsegs): song bas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs po rab tu rnyed do/ / chos dang ldan pa'i grogs pos yongs su bzung bas chos dang ldan po'i mnyan pa thos pas 'gyur ro// chos thos pa dang ldan pas phyir
356b1(dkon brtsegs): yang yul rnam la zag par mi 'gyur ro/ / de yul la bsrungs pas ting nge 'dzin sgrub bo// mnyam par bzhag phra yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/
356b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes pas phyir yang rtog par mi byed do// rnam par rtog par mi byed do// rnam par mi rtog pas mi 'gyur ro// mi 'gyur bas phyir yang mi byed do// rnam par mi byed do// nam
356b3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa rnam par mi byed pa de ni chos mnyan pa nyid kyis chos ji lta ba bzhin du thob nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i lus la
356b4(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba'i rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag
356b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni/ tshor ba la bde bar gnas pa'i sems
356b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la snying rje chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / de 'di ltar gang la tshor ba med pa de ni bde ba yin no zhes slob ste/ de sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spong ba'i phyir/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i
356b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo/ / de sems can rnams kyi tshor ba 'gog pa'i phyir go cha bgos kyang bdag gi tshor ba 'gog par yang mi byed do// des tshor ba gang ci
357a1(dkon brtsegs): myong yang tshor ba de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung zhing myong bar byed de/ de nas bde ba'i tshor ba myong bden 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la
357a2(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo // nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de na zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag
357a3(dkon brtsegs): gi zhe sdang gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo / / nam bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong ba de na gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed
357a4(dkon brtsegs): de/ bdag gti mug gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo // de bde ba'i tsher ba la rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ rjes su chags pa legs par 'dzem par yang byed do// sdug bsngal gyi
357a5(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur te/ khong khro ba legs par 'jom par yang byed do// sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ma rig pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur te/ ma
357a6(dkon brtsegs): rig pa legs par 'jom par yang byed do/ / des tshor ba gang ci myong ba de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag par shes shing myong bar byed do// sdug bsngal du shes shing myong bar byed do// bdag med
357a7(dkon brtsegs): par shes shing myong bar byed do/ / de bde ba'i tshor ba la ni mi rtag par shes par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la ni zug rngur shes par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba'ang
357b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ni zhi bar shes par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar na gang bde ba de ni mi rtag pa'o// gang sdug bsngal ba de ni sdug bsngal ba nyid do// gang bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal bar
357b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa de ni bdag med pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad skyes pa dang / zhig pa dang / zhu ba dang
357b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med par shes so/ / chos thams cad la skye ba dang 'jig par yang so sor rtog go/ so sor rtog pa na chos la skye ba de dag gang nas 'ong / 'gag pa rnams gang du sogs
357b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur snyam du chos rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / / des chos rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro bar shes nas/ tshor
357b5(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad rgyun chad par smra ba bo/ / bsgrubs nas kyang nan tan du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba 'gag par byed kyi/ bdag 'ba'
357b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig gi tshor ba 'gag par byed pa ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thabs mkhas pa dang
357b7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'o/ / gang tshor ba 'gag pa'ang rab tu shes la/ tshor ba 'gag pa mngon sum du'ang mi byed de/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i
358a1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa la gnas pa de tshor ba rnams dben pa dang / rnam par dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di la ni myong ba gang
358a2(dkon brtsegs): yang med do/ / 'di la ni tshor bar byed pa gang yang med do// chos de dag thams cad ni stong pa ste/ bdag dang ngag gi dang bral ba'o// byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang mi ldan pa'o//
358a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa'o// bdag med pa'o// nga'i ba med pa'o// yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// des yang dag par na rgyu dang rkyen de dag gi dngos po mi dmigs so//
358a4(dkon brtsegs): des ma dmigs nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar rkyen stong pa yin pa de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang stong pa'o snyam nas/ de stong pa nyid kyi don rig pas/ lus
358a5(dkon brtsegs): dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang / don shes pa dang / chos rnams shes pa dang / ye shes rig pas tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa
358a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la
358a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pas
358b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa byang chub kyi sems nye bar gzhag pa shin tu nye bar gzhag ste/ sems dran pa'i ye shes kyis sems kun tu tshol lo// de sems kun tu tshol ba na/ sems nang na'ang yang dag
358b2(dkon brtsegs): par rjes su mi mthong / sems phyi rol na'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sems phyi dang nang na'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong // phung po rnams la'ang sems yang dag par rjes su
358b3(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong / khams rnams la'ang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / skye mched rnams la'ang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des sems yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
358b4(dkon brtsegs): bas/ sems ga las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun tu tshol zhing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ dmigs pa yod pa las sems 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/
358b5(dkon brtsegs): ci dmigs pa de'ang gzhan la/ sems de'ang gzhan nam/ 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin/ gal te dmigs pa'ang gzhan la/ sems kyang gzhan na ni sems de gnyis
358b6(dkon brtsegs): su 'gyur ro/ / 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin na ni// sems kyis sems de ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te/ sems kyis sems mthong bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper
358b7(dkon brtsegs): na ral gri'i so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so de nyid gcad par mi nus pa dang / sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid la reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ se m+ba de nyid kyis kyang sems
359a1(dkon brtsegs): de nyid mthong bar mi nus so snyam nas/ / de 'di ltar tshul bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba la gang sems mi gnas pa/ chad pa ma yin pa/ rtag pa ma yin pa/ ther zug tu mi gnas pa/
359a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu med pa ma yin pa// rkyen dang mi 'gal ba de las kyang ma yin/ gzhan las kyang ma yin/ de nyid kyang ma yin/ gzhan yang ma yin// sems kyi rgyud// sems kyi 'khri shing sems
359a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos nyid/ sems kyi mi gnas pa dang / sen gyi rgyu ba med pa dag sems kyi snang ba med pa dang / sems kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'khrug par mi byed pa de ltar shes so// de ltar mthong ngo //
359a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sems de dag dben pa nyid rab tu shes pa/ de bzhin du mthong ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag/
359a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems la cung zad tsam yang mi mthong / rnam par mi mthong / mi rtog go/ rnam par mi rtog/ g.yo ba med/ rlom sems med/ spros pa
359a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar sems gzugs med pa de bzhin du sems kyis mngon
359a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang gzugs med pa'o/ / ji ltar sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems
359b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngos pa'ang gzugs med pa'o/ / ji ltar byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngos pa gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub de'ang gzugs med de/ de'i phyir sems ji lta bar spyod
359b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang de bzhin no/ / spyod pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub ji lta bar yongs su bsngo ba'ang de bzhin no zhes bya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni
359b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad de/ gang 'di ltar sems rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan/
359b4(dkon brtsegs): yang gang mgyogs pa rab tu mgyogs par mi gnas par rgyu ba/ spre'u dang rlung 'dra ba/ 'bab chu'i rgyun drang 'bru mar gyi mar me dang 'dra ba/ rgyang ring por 'gro ba/ lus med pa/ yul la
359b5(dkon brtsegs): brkam pa/ skye mched drug la spyod yul ba/ gzhan dang gzhan gyi shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems gnas pa rtse gcig pa/ mi 'phro ba/ rnam par mi 'phro ba/ zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa/ g.yeng
359b6(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ gang sems la rnam par 'byed par shes pa dang / sems la chos kyi dbyings
359b7(dkon brtsegs): su gnas par shes pa dang / sems la sems kyi gnas par shes pa dang / sems la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar shes pa dang / sems la ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang /
360a1(dkon brtsegs): sems la mngon sum gyis shes rab tu shes pa dang / sems la sgyu ma'i chos su shes pa dang / sems la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / sems la de kho nar shes pa
360a2(dkon brtsegs): dang sems la g.yo ba med cing gzung ba med par shes pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/ / de rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi
360a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rang bzhin yod de yin par rab tu shes so/ / sems kyi rang bzhin de yongs su shes nas de bzhin du chos ston to// rang gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems
360a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so/ / sems kyi ngo bo nyid shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gang yin la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i mtshan
360a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so/ / sems kyi mtshan nyid de shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// ji ltar rang gi sems stong pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang stong par rab tu
