360a6(dkon brtsegs): shes so/ / sems de dag stong pa nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// de rang gi sems yang dag par 'du ba gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems yang dag par 'du ba'ang de yin
360a7(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu shes so/ / sems yang dag par 'du ba de dag shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// de rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du rab tu
360b1(dkon brtsegs): shes so/ / sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes shing
360b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis 'gyur bar mi byed de/ rnam par mi 'gyur ro// sems gnas pas chos kyi dbyings gnas pa rjes su shes kyang / sems gnas pa'i chos nyid de las kyang mi g.yo ste/ rigs
360b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi
360b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa/
360b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems te/ chos kho na skye ba rnams skye/ chos kho na 'gag pa rnams 'gag sde/ 'di la bdag ga ma/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am/
360b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gam/ shed las skyes pa 'am/ shed bu'am/ gang skye ba'am/ rga ba 'am/ 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do// 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// de dag
360b7(dkon brtsegs): gal te bsgrubs na ni 'grub/ gal te ma bsgrubs na ni mi 'grub ste/ dge ba'ang rung / mi dge ba'ang rung / mi g.yo ba'ang rung / ji lta bur bsgrubs pa de lta bur 'grub mod kyi/ chos rnams la sgrub
361a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'ang med la/ chos rnams la rgyu ba med par yang gang yang mi skye'o snyam du nye bar brtags na/ 'di ltar chos dran pa'i ye shes skye ste/ gang bsod nams dang / bsod
361a2(dkon brtsegs): nams ma yin pa dang / mi g.yo ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang gsum mo// de la bdag gis ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa la brtson par bya'o// de ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na
361a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa mchog dam pa rab khyad par du 'phags pa bcu'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ / bcu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yongs su dag pas mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / spyi gtsug lngar mi mthong
361a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / pha rol gyis gnod par bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa rnam pa drug tu shin tu
361a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dang nge 'dzin mi 'khrugs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
361a6(dkon brtsegs): su dag pas don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa mi zad pa dang / byams pa chen po yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la rab tu dgod
361a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su dag pas bskal pa dpag tu med par 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang
361b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs pas bar du gcod pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos ma yin pa rab tu rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su
361b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus gsum la mi chags pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas rang byung gi ye
361b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab tu rtogs pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dam pa bzang po mchog rab bye brag tu 'phags pa bcu po de dag gi rgyur 'gyur ro// des don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas bsod nams kyi
361b4(dkon brtsegs): tshog sogs pa la chog mi shes par 'gyur ro/ / de bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams mngon par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir/ ji ltar bdag la mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du bag
361b5(dkon brtsegs): chags su'ang mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas brtson par byed do/ / de mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed rnams rab tu shes nas/ mi g.yo ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa skyed kyang / ting nge 'dzin de la snying por 'du shes
361b6(dkon brtsegs): par yang mi 'gyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i khams
361b7(dkon brtsegs): su'ang skye'o/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas shing / byang chub tu sgrub pa'i chos gang yin
362a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag sgom la/ byang chub kyi mi mthun para'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de dag spong yang / dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du byed pas rtag par lta bar yang mi ltung / mi dge ba'i chos rjong
362a2(dkon brtsegs): yang chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ste/ gang la chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su spangs pa'i dbu ma'i lam mo// de dang gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/
362a3(dkon brtsegs): gang tshul bzhin ma yid pa yid la byed pa dang ma rig pa de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing / gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu
362a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i lam zhes bya'o/ / de bzhin du ma rig pa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed med pa rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / ming
362a5(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs med pa dang / skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug med pa dang / reg pa dang / reg pa med pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba med pa dang / sred pa dang / sred pa med pa dang / len pa dang
362a6(dkon brtsegs): len pa med pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa med pa dang / skye ba dang / skye ba med pa dang / rga shi dang / rga shi med pa dang / mya ngan dang / sme sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
362a7(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing / gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes
362b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam de ni 'di 'dra ba de 'dra'o zhes bstan par mi rung ste/ dbu ma'i lam ni btags pa med pa/ gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ gnas med
362b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa/ zhi ba/ rab tu zhi ba/ nye bar zhi ba'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mda' gang nas 'phangs pa dang / gang du phog pa de gnyis ka'ang mtha' snga/
362b3(dkon brtsegs): gang phigs pa dang phog pa de'i dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing / gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ blta ba'am reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu dmigs pa gang gis rnam par
362b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa skye ba dang / gang du so sor rnam par rig pa gnas pa de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma bstan par mi nus pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu brda tsam du dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// /
362b5(dkon brtsegs): don dam par ni ma yin no// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med de/ de la ni nyung ngu'ang med/ mang po'ang med do// gang la nyung ngu'ang med/ mang po'ang med pa de ni dbu ma'i lam mo// rigs
362b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang bdag dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ bdag dang bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// srog dang gang zag ces bya ba de gnyis ka'ang
362b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ste/ srog dang gang zag gi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// mtshan sa dang mtshan ma med pa zhe bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ mtshan ma med par rtog pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/
363a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ rtog pa dang 'jig pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// brdzun pa dang bden pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha/
363a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ brjod du med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// tshu rol dang pha rol zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ 'jig tshogs 'gag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas shes bya ba de
363a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ spyod pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka'ang mtha' ste/ rnam par rig pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lamo// rigs kyi
363a4(dkon brtsegs): bu de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / dran pa nye rab gzhag pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir dran pa la gnas te/ de chos thams//
363a5(dkon brtsegs): cad chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar rab tu shes so// chos kyi dbyinges gang yin pa de nyid sems can gyi khams so// de chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pas sems can gyi khams dbyer med
363a6(dkon brtsegs): par khong du chud do/ / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang sems can gyi khams gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs par rab tu shes so// des chos thams cad
363a7(dkon brtsegs): dbyings gcig tu shes nas/ chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang / chos la mngon par chags shing lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de nam mi mthong ba den chos rnams
363b1(dkon brtsegs): latha dad du mi byed do/ / des chos rnams mthong yang sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/ lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin// shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// dacer
363b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ de'i mig mtshan mar 'du shes pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de'i sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// de'i mig mngon par 'du byed par lhung ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir
363b3(dkon brtsegs): g+ha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin no/ / de'i mig spros pa la smon pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta
363b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong nas/ chos gang la'ang mi gnas so// des chos thams cad mi gnas par shes nas/ chos rjes su dran pa des
363b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi smon lam mi gtong ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'o/ / gang cung zad chos zab mo la so sor rdog kyang // thams
363b6(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa de'ang mi 'dor ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i
363b7(dkon brtsegs): smod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po de dag la gnas pa de phyin ci log bzhi rab tu spong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta/
364a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing gnas pas mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo // tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pas sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes
364a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo / / sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo // chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing
364a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo / / de phyin ci log med pas yang dag pa nyid sgrub bo// yang dag pa nyid la zhugs nas/ byang chub
364a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa de yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa'i yongs su dag par ba
364a5(dkon brtsegs): tu 'thob ste/ yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na// gang byang chub sems dpa' de 'bad pa med cing lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba la sems
364a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug gi/ mi dge ba la ni ma yin no// de phyir zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sdig pa mi dge bo'i chos ma skyes pa
364a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyeb pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /
364b1(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyir gang 'byung ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de sngon gyi las yongs su
364b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rang gi ngang nyid kyis dge ba'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur te/ 'bad pa med cing lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams ni skye'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams ni
364b3(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa de yang dag par spong ba bzhi po 'di dag sems kyis dbang sgyur bar 'gyur gyi/
364b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis dbang sgyur bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no// de dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba'i
364b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba la 'jug ste/ yang dag pa la zhugs pa de ni yang dag par spong ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o//
364b6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i spong ba mnyam pa yin gyi/ mi mnyam pa ma yin no// de'i sbyor ba mnyam pa yin gyi/ mi mnyam pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba zhes bya ba ni mnyam
364b7(dkon brtsegs): panyid kyis mnyam par sbyor ba dang / mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par sgrub pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o// de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa de'i rdzu
365a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul rgya
365a2(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
365a3(dkon brtsegs): dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// de la byang chub kyi sems lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dun pa yang bar 'gyur ro// mi dge ba'i chos
365a4(dkon brtsegs): spong bas brtson 'grus yang bar 'gyur ro/ / snying rje chen po rab tu thob pas sems yang bar 'gyur ro// thabs mkhas pa rab tu thob pas dpyod pa yang bar 'gyur ro// rigs
365a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gis byang chub kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrubs pas dbang bzhi rab tu 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
365a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe la dbang ba 'thob bo// tshe la dbang ba de sa 'dod na sems can tshe thung ngu rnams kyi nang du tshe ring po yongs su 'dzin cing sam+ba/ sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed
365a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can tshe ring po chos bstan na yongs su skyo ba rnams la chos bstan phra yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir tshe thung ngu yongs su 'dzin pa dang / lha 'am mi gang dang gang du skyes
365b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad du tshe'i tshad la dbang sgyur ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang dang po 'di thob bo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la dbang 'thob ste/
365b2(dkon brtsegs): lus la dbang ba des yid kyi lus rab tu thob nas/ lus ci 'dra ba dang / gzugs ci 'dra ba dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam ci 'dra bas sems
365b3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de lus dang // gzugs dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam
365b4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu ston te/ de 'dod na sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin te/ rigs
365b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang gnyis pa 'di 'thob bo/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i chos la dbang 'thob ste/ chos la dbang ba des 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
365b6(dkon brtsegs): chos la rton par 'gyur gyi/ 'jig rten gyi chos la rton par mi 'gyur ba dang / de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la rton kyang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad du snang la/ 'jig rten
365b7(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i ye shes de las kyang mi g.yo ba dang / gang 'di shes rab dang / ye shes chags pa med pa dang // rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i ye shes kyi bdag nying dang
366a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnam par bsgrubs pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos par byed cing / gang gis sems can tshad med pa rnams bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin
366a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi gtim byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub semasad pas dbang gsum pa 'di 'thob bo// rigs kyi bu gsan yang byang chub sems
366a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byin gyis brlabs kyi dbang 'thob ste/ byin gyis brlabs la dbang ba des gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad rgya mtsho
366a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang 'dres pa'ang med la/ spyod pa de'ang kun tu ston pa dang / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyal po ri rab de dag thams cad
366a5(dkon brtsegs): ri gcig tu byin gyis brlabs kyang / / rgyal chen bzhi'i ri sau kyi bya'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams phan tshun 'phos par yang mi shes la/ spyod pa de'ang ku
366a6(dkon brtsegs): tu ston pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ji ltar rin po che'i sa gzhi 'am/ tsan dan gyi sa gzhi 'am/ spos kyi sa gzhi 'am/ me tog gi sa gzi
366a7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ nam mkha' gyur pa 'am/ chus yongs su gang ba 'am/ mes yongs su gang ba 'am/ rin po che thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur cig ces de ltar byin gyis brlabs
366b1(dkon brtsegs): na'ang de 'dra bar gnas pa dang / de bzhin du byiran gyis brlabs thams cad kyis gang ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa de'i de de ltar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems bskyed ma thag tu byin gyis
366b2(dkon brtsegs): brlabs thams cad de bzhin du kun tu gnas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang bzhi pa 'di 'thob bo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
366b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas shing 'dug sde gtam zer ro// de bzhin du tshangs pa thams
366b4(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / brgya byin thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
366b5(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu gnas shing 'dug sde gtam zer ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
366b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag shin tu yongs su srung ba byas pa'i phyir ro/ / de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yongs su spyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yang bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma dang sprin gnas rnams la
366b7(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba dang / rim gro byed pa dang / gus par smra ba dang // phyag 'tshal ba dang // thal mo sbyor zhing mthun par byed pa dang / ngag yang bar bya ba'i phyir bka' blo bde zhing mthun
367a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'an te/ jig smram pa de bzhin du byang ba dang / sems sa par bya bar byor med pa dang / de 'bras pa ma pa dang / thams rim da cing nus pa '
367a2(dkon brtsegs): dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / sems las sa rlung ba dang / sems la yongs su gdung bamed d+ha dang / spong ba rnams la brtson pa mi gtong ba dang / bden pa'i brtul zhugs rdzos
367a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / mi lhod par brtson pa dang / dgos pa grub par byed pa dang / snyom las mi byed pa dang / sems mi zhum pa dang / 'dod chags rnam par sil 'dang
367a4(dkon brtsegs): zhesdang nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa sel ba dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / brag dog dang ser sna dang bral ba dang / bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba dang
367a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi dgos pa sgrub cing khur khyer ba dang / nyam chung ba rnams kyi khur sgrol ba dang / 'dam dzad la stegs 'dogs pa dang / klung la zam pas sgrol ba dang / chu bo la tra
367a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dga' ba'i tshig thos par byed pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng ba dang / nyes pa byung ba rnams gso bar byed pa dang /
367a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod pa rnams sel ba dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams rnam par sel ba dang / khams gang gis 'byung ba khong du chud pa dang / 'phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /
367b1(dkon brtsegs): byin nas kyang 'gyod pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad la lta ba'i phyir byang chub tu sngo ba dang / dang pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / gzhan dag dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / bdag ba
367b2(dkon brtsegs): pab la mi chags pa dang / bde ba gzhan la stobs pa dang / bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang / gzhan
367b3(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang rab tu 'byung ba la mos par byed pa dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / mdza' ba brtan pa dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang / rta dang / glang po che dang /
367b4(dkon brtsegs): shing rta dang / dpung bu chung sbyin pa dang / ngal ba rnams yang yang dag par spro bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / bslabs pa rnams la ston pa tsam du
367b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs par 'dzin pa dang / ma bslabs pa rnams la mi brnyas pa dang / dbul po rnams la longs spyod 'gyed pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi g.yog byed pa dang / sman sbyin pa dang /
367b6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa rnams la mi smod pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang bsti stang mi byed pa rnams la btang snyoms pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos
367b7(dkon brtsegs): las shin tu 'da' ba dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa dang / yon tan thams cad sdud pa dang / byang chub tu/
368a1(dkon brtsegs): sems sngon du 'gro ba dang / dran pa mi nyams pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa yongs su sbyang ba'o// de ltar rdzu 'phrul
368a2(dkon brtsegs): gyirkang pa rnams yongs su sbyangs na/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du nyams par mi 'gyur/ yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu drul gyi rkang pa'i
368a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'phrogs pa dang pa'i dbang po
368a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dran pa'i dbang po dang / snying rje chen po mi gtong ba ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang // chos thams
368a5(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su 'dzin par brtson pa shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mos shing dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o// sangs
368a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pas yongs su mi skyo ba ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi brjed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o//
368a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par sgrub pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par yongs su bsngos pa ni shes rab kyi dbang
368b1(dkon brtsegs): po'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dang bsam pa mi byed par gyur pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngang pa'i dbang po'o// lhag pa'i bsam
368b2(dkon brtsegs): pa khyad par du 'gro ba ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ / yongs su sngo ba la mkhas pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// sems can thams cad la 'od zer mnyam par gtong ba ni ting nge
368b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su shes pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems can thams cad chags pa las shin tu 'da' bar
368b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o/ / sems can thams cad chags pa las shin tu thar par byed pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// gang la'ang mi chags pa ni
368b5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i dbang po'o/ / sems can thams cad kyi chags pa mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// gang chags pa dang mi chags pa thams cad du shes pa 'di ni
368b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang rnyog pa med par 'gyur ba 'di ni dad pa'i dbang po'o// sems rnyog pa can dang bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi
368b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'o/ / gang rnyog pa med pa'i chos nyid kyi dran pa mi 'dor ba 'di ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// gang sems rnyog pa med par ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan
369a1(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ / gang rnyog pa med pa'i chos thob pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa rnams rnyog pa med pa'i chos nyid la rab tu
369a2(dkon brtsegs): dgod pa 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par
369a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ / dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgrubs pa dang ma bsgrubs pa rnams mi brjed pa 'di ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// gang ting nge 'dzin gyi dag
369a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bde ba mi 'dod cing / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// gang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams
369a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du so so rang gis shes pa 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pas ni 'dor ro// brtson 'grus kyis ni yang dag
369a6(dkon brtsegs): par sgrub do/ / dran pas ni rlud mi gson to// ting nge 'dzin gyis ni srung ngo // shes rab kyis ni rnam par 'byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pas ni
369a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu 'dzin pa rab tu spong ngo / / brtson 'grus kyis ni bdag gir 'dzin pa 'dor ro// dran pas ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las shin tu 'da' 'o// ting nge 'dzin gyis ni
369b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis 'dor ro/ / shes rab kyis ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu spong ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems
369b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dbang po'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang dbang po de dag gis nye bar
369b3(dkon brtsegs): brtan nas/ bdud thams cad kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di las phyir mi ldog
369b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ba dang / sngon gyi dam bcas pa la brtan par 'gyur ba dang / sems kyis shin tu brtan par 'gyur ba dang
369b5(dkon brtsegs): lus kyis stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams sbed par 'gyur ba dang / dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi bskyod par
369b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'o/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni bya ba ma yin pa mi byed do// brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bya ba byed do// dran pa'i stobs kyis
369b7(dkon brtsegs): ni byas pa'i las chud mi gson to/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa rnams kyis rma mi phyin to// shes rab kyi stobs
370a1(dkon brtsegs): na yang nga ban+d+ha nga rgyas sta shin tu 'ad/ / sa kyi d+hA nga kyang chu skyems dang nga rgyas smra/
370a2(dkon brtsegs): lnga dad pas mi 'gro'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis nI bar mdor zhum par mi 'gyur ro// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni gzungs dang spongs pa rab tu 'thob bo// ting nge 'dzin gyi stongs
370a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni mtshungs par chos ston to/ / shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi macom thams cad gcod do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyipa ni
370a4(dkon brtsegs): mos pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni rnam par grol ba'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni rnam par grol ba'i mang nas mdzang
370a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni sems dang bsam pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed do// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni sems can thams
370a6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi spyod pa tshim par byed do/ / rigs kyi bu bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni ser sna'i dri ma rab tu spyong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bdag ni 'dan
370a7(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad yongs su gtong ngo / / dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni mnyam pa'i sems kyis 'dor ro// shes rab kyi stobs
370b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni rnam par smin pa la re ba med do/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i dad par stobs kyis ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims ni rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis na
370b2(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa rnams las mi 'da' 'o/ / dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / cang shes kyi sa la 'gro'o//
370b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshul khrims rab tu spong ngo // rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni gnod sems kyi dri ma rab tu spong ngo //
370b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bzod pa sgom mo// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni sems can thams cad yongs su srung ngo //
370b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni bdag dang / sems can dang / bzod pa la rnam par mi rtog go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni le lo'i dri ma
370b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu spong ngo / / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni rtsom pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed do// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// ting nge 'dzin
370b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi stobs kyis ni lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa sgrub bo/ / shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni mi byed pa rnam par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i
371a1(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni rnam par g.yeng ba'i dri ma rab tu spong ngo / / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams yang dag par sgrub bo// dran pa'i/
371a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni rtse gcig tu yongs su sngo'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni ting nge 'dzin las mi gamo'o// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni bsam gtan de la chags pa rab tu spong ngo //
371a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i spobs kyis ni 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi dri ma rab tu spong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni thos pa yongs su tshol lo// dran pa'i
371a4(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ro/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni sems nges par sems pa rab tu 'thob bo// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni nan tan gyis yang dag par sgrub bo// rigs
371a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni nor bdun rab tu 'thob bo/ / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu 'thob bo// dran pa'i stobs kyis ni
371a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa drug rab tu 'thob bo/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa bdun las shin tu 'da'a'o// shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni log pa nyid du nges pa brgyad
371a7(dkon brtsegs): las shin tu 'da' 'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang mi byed cing sems dang bsam pa rnyog pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//
371b1(dkon brtsegs): gang phyir mi ldog cing blang ba med la dor ba med pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// gang dran pa sngon du 'grol dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa 'din dran par
371b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / gang sems rab tu dul bas rang bzhin gyis ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ldang ba shes pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
371b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / gang lta ba thams cad sel ba la mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dang bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni
371b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi spyod ba yongs su dag pa'o// mi brjed pa'i mtshan
371b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni dran pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// so sor rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ni
371b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub
371b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba ni bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/
372a1(dkon brtsegs): @#'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan las dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi san/
372a2(dkon brtsegs): lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms
372a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bsags shing bsags pa rnams chud mi gson pa yin te// 'di ni
372a4(dkon brtsegs): dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang lhag mthong gi tshogs dang zung du 'brel bar gyur pa yin te/ 'di ni chos
372a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang spong ba khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub
372a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag go/ / dka' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang mi dag la sel bar 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub
372a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag ni gang lus dang sems shin tu byang bar 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lab ni gang
372b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba snying por 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lab ni gang byed pa byas par 'gyur ba yin te/ 'di/
372b2(dkon brtsegs): ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang byang chub kyi bsam pa mi brjed pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// gang dam pa'i chos
372b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pa 'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ / gang sems can yongs su smin par byed pas yongs su mi skyo ba 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang
372b4(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag go/ / gang dam pa'i chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas gnas pa 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// gang shin tu sbyangs pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god pa
372b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ / gang ting nge 'dzin la sems can rnams rab tu 'god pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// gang mngon sum
372b6(dkon brtsegs): du shes pa btang snyoms pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'dod pa 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang nyan thos dang
372b7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis dran pa med cing yid la mi byed pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / bang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu da
373a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa 'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / gang lus dang / ngab dang / yid kyi las rtul
373a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / gang rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba yongs su spong ba 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod
373a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su dag pa'o/ / gang bya ba byas pa dang / byed pa byas pa 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// gang 'jig rten
373a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi bya ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug kyang gcig tu sboms par zhugs par yang 'gyur ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / gang gnyis
373a5(dkon brtsegs): su med pa'i chos la rab tu gnas te/ rtog pa dang sel ba med cing btang snyoms par yang kun tu snang la// sems can la'ang lta ba 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
373a6(dkon brtsegs): gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad khong du chud par byed pa dang / rjes su rtogs par byed pa dang / rab tu shes
373a7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang / 'jal bar byed pa dang / nye bar rtog pa 'ong du chud cing sems can gyi spyod pa mthong ba dang dma' ba thams cad rtogs pa ste// de la gnas nas kyang ngan song du 'gyur
373b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam sgom pa dang / dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bkal nyal dang / kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba 'di dag ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byang chud kyi yan lag rnams
373b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin gyi 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni phas kyi bdud sdig
373b3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no/ / 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni nga rgyal can thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni
373b4(dkon brtsegs): pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no/ / 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma la dmigs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags
373b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul
373b6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni tshor ba yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no/ / 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa rnams kyi spyod yul
373b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ / 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang // rnam par rig pa'i chos rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// 'phags
374a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni tha na mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pa rnams kyi spyod sul yang ma yin te/ chos thams cad kyi spyod yul ma
374a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ / chos thams cad la rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo//
374a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kun nas mi ldang ba'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// chos
374a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rtsod pa med pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// rigs kyi bu re
374a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar gang 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul yongs su dag pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang
374a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i lam gyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang
374a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes smos pa de la/ yang dag pa'i
374b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya ste// de bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srob tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du
374b2(dkon brtsegs): da'ang ldang bar mi byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so// de chang par
374b3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba'ang ldang bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so// de 'byung
374b4(dkon brtsegs): bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba'ang ldang bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so//
374b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / ngar 'dzin par lta ba dang / nga yir 'dzin par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba'ang ldang bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / ngar 'dzin
374b6(dkon brtsegs): bar lta ba dang / / nga yir 'dzin par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so// de sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba'ang sdang bar mi byed do//
374b7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so// rigs kyi bu de lta ba na lta ba'i dmigs pa ni ji tsam du chung
375a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu sa na 'a/ sat+yA sa na / d
375a2(dkon brtsegs): ang zla pa 'dzi ni yang das pa'i sna zhes bya'o/ / tshor rten/ 'di lar de marnam par sbya/ bi ses par yi no// d+hiswA r+yA smyan pa ma shA sgrug/ pa mnam pa na namaman
375a3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i chos rnams ni dman pa/ slod pa rnams kyi chos rnams ni dam pa'o snang dus tI bar spyan mi mam par gyu ga/ sa ma ma po'i chos rnams ni blag pa dang nganas pa/ ji slong pa
375a4(dkon brtsegs): / rnams ni zag pa med pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lhan mI man+t+ram par lta ba'o// so so'i skye ba'i chos rnams ni zang zing dang bcas pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnabs ni drang zing med pa'o snya
375a5(dkon brtsegs): du nas te de ltar ldan mi mnyam par lta ba'o/ / ma so sbya na nas rnams ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ nang chub sem pa'i chos rnams ni nyin mongs pa med pa'o snyam du gas te de steraH
375a6(dkon brtsegs): na mi mnyam par lbu ba'o/ / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni 'dus byas yin+da/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni 'dus ma byas yin no snyam du gas te de ltar snyun mi mnyam par ltung /
375a7(dkon brtsegs): nam so so'i skye ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad slob pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin bying bo nyid du mthong ste/ de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// sa so'i skyer 'acom
375b1(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid dang mi slob pa'i chos stong pa nyid mtshungs par mthong ste/ de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// so so'i skya ba'i chos kyi rkyen mnyam pa nyid 'ong du chud pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
375b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi rkyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chung ba mtshungs par mthong ste/ de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos dbyen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dbyen pa mnyam
375b3(dkon brtsegs): bapa nyid mtshungs par mthong ste/ de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// so so'i skye bo'i chos yongs su grub pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa med
375b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mnyam pa nyid mtshungs par mthong ste/ de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o// gang mtshungs par ma 'ong ba de'i phyir yang gnyis la blo mi 'jug ste/ gang gnyis su med par
375b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba de yang dag pa mthong ba'o/ / gang mtshungs par mthong ba de'ang tha dad du mi byed de/ tha dad pa med pa mthong ba ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// gang mtshungs par mthong ba de tha ma dang / 'bring
375b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rab kyi chos la rnam par rtog pa mi skyed de/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med par mthong ba ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// gang mtshungs par mthong ba ni mthong ba ci'ang med pa'o//
375b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba ci'ang med pa ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// gang mtshungs par mthong ba de la ni chos gang yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad snang ba med par mthong ba de ni yang dag
376a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong ba'o/ / rigs kyi bu gang chos 'di dag de ltar mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o// ji sa pa bzhin du mthong ba dang / mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba 'di ni
376a2(dkon brtsegs): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o/ / yang dag pa'i lta ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las
376a3(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po zhig ni mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid la bzod pa skyes so// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa
376a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ rtog pa gang rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ba'o// de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas kyis yongs su bsdus pa'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa ste/ de chos gang zhig chos gang dang ldan
376a5(dkon brtsegs): snyam du de chos de dag la rnam par lta'o/ / rnam par rtog go// des chos thams cad phan tshun mi ldan pa dang / rab tu ldan pa ma yin pa dang / ma 'dres par rab tu shes te/ des de ltar shes
376a6(dkon brtsegs): nas mnyam par yang mi rtog na/ gang mi mnyam par rtog par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas ma yin no// de chos su rtog pa dang / yong su rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad
376a7(dkon brtsegs): spangs te/ phyir yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ngag gang zhe na/ tshig gang gis bdag la'ang mi gdung
376b1(dkon brtsegs): / la/ gzhan la'ang ma yin pa dang / bdag kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi byed la/ gzhan la'ang ma yin pa dang / bdag la'ang mi gnod la/ gzhan la'ang ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni
376b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o/ / gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngag ni tshig gang gis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du nges par rtog pa'o// de'i chos nges par rtog pa de'ang chos nges pa'i tshig nges
376b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o/ / gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngag ni gang mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba rnams la ngag mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes ngag mnyam
376b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang / 'du byed thams cad mi rtag
376b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o// chos thams cad bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad ni bdag med pa dang / sems can
376b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / bdag dang bral ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ ngo bo nyid med pa'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang
376b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ci 'dra ba 'bras bu'ang de 'dra'o zhes ngag mnyam pa'o/ / gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya ba ni gang sems cad gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag yang dag pa'i chos la 'jungad pa
377a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub kyang yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin te/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o// de la yang dag pa'i ngag yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ ngag thams cad
377a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis yongs su zin par 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ngag yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag
377a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na/ las gang las zad par 'gyur gyi/ las mngon par 'du bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / las gang nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur gyi/ nyon mongs pa
377a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / las gang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ nyon mongs pa skye ba'i phyir ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu
377a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni gang chos 'di dag 'di ltar rab tu shes shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed kyang / de'i
377a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya ba de dag kyang gsob nyid du snang ba dang / gsog nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid du snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi rnam pas mngon
377a7(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrubs pa'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' 'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ 'tsho ba gang bdag la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur/ gzhan la'ang gnod par
377b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ gnyis ka la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'tsho ba gang nyon mongs pa thams cad mi sogs pa ste/
377b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o// gang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya ba ni/ gang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ 'tsho ba yongs su
377b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa de la ha cang 'dud par yang mi byed/ mau 'dud par yang mi byed la/ 'tsho ba gang gis dadag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don dang / chos kyi don yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi du
377b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o/ / rigs kyi du de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/ gang dge zhing zab pa'i chos de dag yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ sems
377b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu 'dzin pa dang / 'dun pa dang / brtson pa dang / spro ba dang / rtsom pa dang / mi zhum pa dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan gyis mngon du byed pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol
377b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni gang mnyam par rtsol gyi/ mi mnyam par ma yin no// ji ltar na mnyam par rtsol gyi/ mi mnyam par ma yin zhe na/ gang chos rnams mnyam par
377b7(dkon brtsegs): yang mi byed/ mi mnyam par yang mi byed la/ byed pa med cing rnam par mi byed pa'o// chos de dag gi chos nyid dang // chos gnas pa de nyidang ji lta ba de bzhin du rtsol ba'o// chos de dag gi yang dag pa'i
378a1(dkon brtsegs): chos cing ji lta ba de bzhin du rtsol ba'o/ / chos de dag gi mnyam pa nyid dang bye zab tu byu ba med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rtsolaba'o// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba de'ang sems can thams cad
378a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi log pa'i rtsol ba spang ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen par yongs su sngo ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
378a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub kyi sems dran pa dang / sbyin pa dran pa dang / tshul khrims dran pa dang / bzod pa dran pa dang / brtson 'grus dran pa dang / bsam gtan
378a4(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang / shes rab dran pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dran pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
378a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i dran pa ni/ yang dag pa'i dran pa gang gis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi skabs mi 'dod pa dang / dran pa gang gis bdud kyi las thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed
378a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dran pa gang gis lam grol ba dang / lam ngan par mi ltung ba dang / dran pa sgo ba lta bur gyur pa gang gis sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos mi dge ba thams cad kyi
378a7(dkon brtsegs): skabs mi 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i dran pa ni/ dran pa gang gis dran pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / skyon
378b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i rigs thob kyang 'bras bu mngon sum du mi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i
378b2(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin pang zhe na/ gang 'phags pa'i rnam par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes pa dang / mthun pa kun 'byung ba'i bden pa spang ba dang
378b3(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa 'gog pa'i bden pa mngon du bya ba dang / mthun pa lam gyi bden pa sgom pa dang mthun pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// bdag mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams
378b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mnyam pa nyid dang / bdag rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / bdag stong pa nyid pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du yang dag par snyoms par 'jug la
378b5(dkon brtsegs): gang de ltar snyoms par 'jug cing / / yang dag pa nyid la 'jug kyang / nges par yang mi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang
378b6(dkon brtsegs): gis sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis thams cad mkhyen pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi du
378b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su
379a1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa 'di bstan pa na/ lba dang mi srog chags nyan thos kyi theg pa can nges par gyur pa lam du zhubs pa'i drug stong blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
379a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes so/ / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la
379a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa
379a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcur rnam par lta bas snang ba thob pa de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
379a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la yang dag par lta bas mun pa mun nag dang bral ba de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no/ / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba la yang dag par lta bas shin tu nges par
379a6(dkon brtsegs): brtags pa de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no/ / phyobs bcu'i gzugs snang ba dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyings la yang dag par lta bas shin tu brgyan pa de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no//
379a7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi gzi ba rjid grub pas mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid du lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyi bor byin pa de ni
379b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i lha'i mig yin te/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa 'di lnga ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// de lnga'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa
379b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lta gang zhe na/ gang gis mi'i sgra rnams zos par 'gyur ba dang / mi ma yin pa'i sgra rnams thos par 'gyur ba dang / sems can
379b3(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba pa dang / dung 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sgra rnams thos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos bstan pa'i sgra thams cad thos par 'gyur ba dang /
379b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i skad dang sgra thams cad thos par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i rna ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga'o// de pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon
379b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ gang gis lha dang / mi dang / sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /
379b6(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mthar sems skyes pa gang yin pa de'ang rab tu shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar sems skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'ang rang
379b7(dkon brtsegs): tu shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus na sems skye ba gang yin pa de'ang rab tu shes pa dang / rgyu dang / rkyen dang / dmigs par ldan pa dang / nges pa dang / ma dre pa dang / log pa nyid du
380a1(dkon brtsegs): nges pa dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa dang / 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams dang / zhe sdang la spyod pa
380a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / gti mug la spyod pa rnams dang / cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams rab tu shes te/ de shes nas kyang de kho na bzhin du de dang mthun par chos ston pa ste//
380a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga'o// de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod
380a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ sems gang 'dod chags kyi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / zhe sdang gi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / gti mug
380a5(dkon brtsegs): gi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / de dag gis lus ci 'dra ba yongs su bzung ba de dag kyang rjes su dran pa dang / sems gang sbyin pa'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / tshul khrims kyi rgyu las byung
380a6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams dang / byams pa'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba yongs su bzung ba de dag/
380a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang rjes su dran pa dang / sems gang rgyu dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang / rkyen dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang / dmigs pa dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang / de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba yongs su
380b1(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba de dag kyang rjes su dran pa dang / sems gang lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang // ma rig pa dang / gti mug gis yang dag par bsdus pa rnams dang / de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba yongs su/
380b2(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba de dag kyang rjes su dran pa dang / de dag gi tshe dang / kha dog dang / gzugs dang / gzi brjod dang / g.yog dang / stobs dang / grags pa dang / brjod pa dang / dbang phyug ci/
380b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar gyur pa de'ang rjes su dran pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga'o//
380b4(dkon brtsegs): derdzu 'phrul bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang gzugs kun tu ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang
380b5(dkon brtsegs): chog dang skad rnam par rig par byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems dang yid mngon par 'du byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems can thams cad kyi skad du rnam par rig par byed
380b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon du mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul te/ rdzu 'phrul bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lnga dang ldan pa yin no// rigs
380b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga'o/ / rigs kyi bu bzhan yang shes rab kyi mig gis brtags pa ni byang chub
381a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rnam par shes pa rab tu gnas pa ni lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa
381a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'o/ / rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i
381a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yongs su gcod par rab tu gnas pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / mngon par 'du mi byed pa rab tu gnas pa ni rdzu 'phrul
381a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya ba de ni zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dwags so// rigs kyi bu de la
381a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par shes pa lnga po 'di dag gis rnam par rtsen zhing zag pa zad pa'i ye shes la'ang gnas so/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dpag tshad
381a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag bye ba bgrong dgos pa na grong khyer chen po zhig yod de/ grong khyer chen po de'i lam ni bgrod par dka' zhing ring la nyam nga ste/ 'jigs pa dang bcas pa/ zas dang / skom dang /
381a7(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba'ang med pa zhig na/ gang grong khyer chen po der phyin pa de'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ba zhig yod pa dang / de nas skyes bu la la zhig gis grong khyer chen po de'i
381b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa thos nas skyes bu de la bu mthong na dga' ba sdug pa yid du 'ong ba/ mi mthun pa ma yin pa'i bu gcig kyang yod pa las/ nges du gcig pu de bor
381b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ grong khyer chen po de'i lam du zhugs te/ de stobs kyi shugs dang brtson 'grus thams cad kyis sdug bsngal thams cad khyang du bsad nge/ lam ring po de 'das nas/ rkang pa ya gcig ni
381b3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer chen po de'i sgo'i them pa la bzhag/ rkang pa ya gcig ni phyi rol na 'dug pa las/ de'i bu gcig pu de yid la dran par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la kye ma'o bdag gis bu
381b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu de 'dir khrid de ma 'ongs pa lta zhig snyam nas/ bu gcig pu de sdug pas grong khyer chen po der ma zhugs kyi/ phyir phyogs nas der bu gcig pu de ga la 'dug par slar log pa de
381b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'bad pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i nan tan gyis mngon par
381b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa lnga po rnams bskyed de/ sems kyis bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de la zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de snying rje chen po'i sems
381b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir zag bzadang pa'i ye shes 'dris par byas pa las/ sems can rnams la lta ba'i phyir phyogs te/ slar log nas so sor skye
382a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i sa na'ang kun tu snang ngo / / rigs kyi bu grong khyer zhes bya ba de ni zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bye ba bad+mod dgos pa
382a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba da ngag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ / bar du gcod pa mang po bgrod ces bya ba de ni bdud kyis 'dun pa bzlog pa'i bar chad kyi tshig bla dgas so//
382a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dgas so// rkang pa ya gcig ni grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la bzhag/ rkang pa ya gcig ni sgo'i phyi rol tu bzhag ces bya ba de ni/
382a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang 'dres pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'jug pa'o// bu gcig pu dran nas grong khyer chen po der zhugs pa
382a5(dkon brtsegs): las phyir phyogs te slar log ces bya ba de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu gcig pu bzhin du byams pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba'o// de zag pa zad pa'i
382a6(dkon brtsegs): spyi bor phyin kyang zag pa'ang mi spong la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phyir phyogs shing ldog par yang 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ci 'dra ba'i thabs
382a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas sems can rnams la cher snying rje ba la ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
382b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'di ltar byang chub lag mthil du thob par yang mi 'tshal bar/ 'khor ba nyid kyi rjes su 'jug cing sems can yongs su smin
382b2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pas yongs su mi skyo ba ni ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du zhig dang ldan na/ 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba lags/
382b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos nyi shu dang ldan na/ 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba yin te/ chos nyi shu gang
382b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par zin pa'i byams pa chen po dang / byams pa chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin
382b5(dkon brtsegs): paba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pas yang dag par zin pa'i brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par zin pa'i lhag
382b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zin pa'i thabs dang / thabs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa'i bsam gtan dang
382b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyis yang dag par zin pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / mngon par shes pas yang dag par zin pa'i ye shes dang / ye shes kyis yang dag par zin pa'i rtul ba dang / rtul
383a1(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag par zin pa'i dran pa dang / dran pas yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam
383a2(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag par zin pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yang dag par zin pa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pas yang dag par zin pa'i
383a3(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i nan tan dang / thos pa'i nan tan gyis yang dag par zin pa'i gzungs dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i spobs pa dang / spobs pas yang dag par zin
383a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyi shu
383a5(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na/ 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches yang
383a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das
383a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i thos pas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// thos pas brgyan pa'i spobs pas ni skye bo mang po
383b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dran pa nyams pa med pa thob pa'i gzungs kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// lag na rin po che mi zad pa'i longs spyod
383b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// chos ston pas yongs su mi skyo bas ni skye bo mang po
383b3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pas ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// ye shes kyis brgyan pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar
383b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pas ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// de bzhin du byed pa nyid kyis kyang skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho
383b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// so so ci rigs par chos kyi sbyin pas ni skye bo mang po
383b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// thos pa yongs su dag pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar
383b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu ji ltar bas yod pas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang poche bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar
384a1(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa
384a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa dka' bar gyur pa zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
384a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
384a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir bskal pa de dga' bar gyur pa zhes bya zhe
384a5(dkon brtsegs): na/ rigs kyi bu bskal pa de la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur te/ de na gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha dag gis kye pa'o grogs po dag 'di ni bskal pa bzang po yin te/ bskal
384a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dga' ba'i sgra bsgrags pa dang / de na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dga' ba'i sgra de thos so// thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /
384a7(dkon brtsegs): dad pa dang / mos pa chen po skyes te/ de nas lha dang mi de dag gis kye ma'o bskal pa 'di ni dga' bar gyur pa'o zhes de skad smras pas/ de'i phyir bskal pa de'i ming dga' bar gyur
384b1(dkon brtsegs): pab zhes btags so/ / rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de lha thams cad kyis bltas brtags kyang / de ngoms par mi 'gyur ba de tsam du blta na sdug cing / de tsam du nyams dpa'
384b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de lhas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas pa de'i gzhi ni tsan dan sbrul gyi
384b3(dkon brtsegs): snying po sha stab ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po de'i phye ma khal gcig gi rin du'ang mi bzod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de nas spos kyi ngang langs pa'i dris ni
384b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag tu khyab bo/ / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las gyur pa'i sa chen po de las 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma chen po ba sngar
384b5(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur te/ pad+ma de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de rtag tu snang bar gyur to// mi de dag kyang tsan dan gyi phye ma la byas pa'i khang pa brtseg pa pu shu dang / sgro khang dang
384b6(dkon brtsegs): khyams dang / rta babs kyis legs par brgyan pa la longs spyod par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de ma grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal gnas pa med do// mi de dag thams
384b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang nam mkha' la 'gro'o/ / de dag mngon par shes pa rab tu thob nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs padag gi nang du 'jug cing nam mkha' la 'gro'o// 'jig rten
385a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams de na mngal na gnas pa'ang med de/ mi de dag thams cad kyang rdzus te skye ba sha smug go// de na bud med kyi ming yang mi zug go// ngan song rnams kyang med ro//
385a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gro rnams kyang med do// sdug bsngal yang med do// 'jig rten gyi khams de na kha zas rags pa'ang med do// mi de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa dang / bsam gtan gyi dka'
385a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i zas can no/ / mos pa rlabs po ches theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ste/ de na theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med do// gang 'jig rten gyi khams de'i mi de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi cod pan
385a4(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa/ dpung rgyan dang rna chas brgyan pa/ lnga'i kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par gyur pa sha stab go// gang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur pa de nyid de dag gi rab tu byung ba yin te/ bcom
385a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gos ngur smrig tu bka' stsal pa'ang med de/ 'di ltar sems la rnyog pa med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang
385a6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i kha dog lta bu spyod lam rab tu zhi bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston to/ / rigs kyi bu gang phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag kyang / bcom ldan
385a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas pa der lhags
385b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing 'dong ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par
385b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba de nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston pa de na/ ta la brgyad cu srid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ tshangs pa bkod pa'i seng ge'i khril bzhugs te chos ston
385b3(dkon brtsegs): to/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de ni ji ltar da ltar nga bzhin du mang du spros te rnam par phye bas chos kyi gtam mi ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de tshig dang yi ge nyung ngus chos kyi
385b4(dkon brtsegs): gtam mdon ston to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni zur tsam gyis go ba sha stag ste/ tshig gcig gis tshig brgya stong gi rjes su 'jug pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang 'di lta
385b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang
385b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / spyod pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag nyid byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mda' las brtsams te yang
385b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu ston to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dpa' ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar
386a1(dkon brtsegs): mdas 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur zhes gsol to// de bzhin bshegs
386a2(dkon brtsegs): pab des tshig de gnyis rgyas par rnam par phye ste bstan nas/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi blo thogs pa med pa ni 'khor ba na mdzes so//
386a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des bstan pa de lta bu bshad pa na/ byang
386a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug cu chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob bo/ / rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par
386a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar mangs des yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying
386a6(dkon brtsegs): po mdzes par bgyid la lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
386a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dkon mchog skar mda' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa'o// de la bas yod pa gang zhe na/
386b1(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du chos rnams sgrub pa'o// chos rnams sgrub pa'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
386b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba tshad med pa mthar gtugs pas go cha rtsom pa tshad med pa dang / sems can tshad med pa sdud pas sbyin pa mi zad pa tshad med pa dang /
386b3(dkon brtsegs): mi lhod cing sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul khrims kyis tshul khrims tshad med pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang du len pas bzod pa tshad med pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i
386b4(dkon brtsegs): las kyis brtson 'grus tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa bsgrub pas bsam gtan tshad med pa dang / chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyis shes rab tshad med pa dang / sems can
386b5(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pas byams pa tshad med pa dang / phan pa'i dngos pos snying rje tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pas 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa tshad med pa dang / bdag
386b6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba la mi chags pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa tshad med pa dang brtson 'grus brtan pas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa tshad med pa dang / yang dag par sbyor bas yon tan yang
386b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par sgrub cing sogs pa tshad med pa dang / ye shes tshad med pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa tshad med pa dang / shes rab sbyor bas thos pa yongs su tshol ba tshad med pa
387a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul shes pas sems la 'jug pa tshad med pa dang / byams pa nges pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la zhugs pa tshad med pa dang / sems
387a2(dkon brtsegs): bdul bas dgon pa la gnas pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs tshad med pa ste/ dkon
387a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog skar mda' chos 'di dag ni bag yod pa sgrub pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu bag yod pa ni byang chub
387a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi rtsa ba'o/ / bag yod pa na ye shes bsgrub pa'i chos rnams kyi gnas so// bag yod pa ni dge ba'i chos bsags shing bsags pa rnams so sor yang dag par
387a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'o/ / bag yod pa ni sngon thos pa'i chos rnams chud mi gson pa'o// bag yod pa ni bsdu bar bya ba'i chos rnams sdud pa'o// bag yod pa ni sgrib pa'i chos
387a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi sdud pa'o/ / bag yod pa ni sgrib par mi 'gyur ba'i chos rnams rab tu 'dzin pa'o// bag yod pa ni ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa'o// bag yod pa ni dam pa'i
387a7(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin pa 'bar bar byed pa'o/ / bag yod pa ni dbang po rnams sdom par byed pa'o// bag yod pa ni lamanyam nga ba las kun tu srung ba'o// bag yod pa ni dus dang
387b1(dkon brtsegs): dus ma yin par spyod pa las skul pa'o/ / bag yod pa ni stobs te/ stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// bag yod pa ni zil gyis ma non ste/ mi 'jigs
387b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ / bag yod pa ni yon tan dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i 'byung gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//
387b3(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa ni spyi bor phyin pa ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des 'di lta bu bstan
387b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mdar gyur pa
387b5(dkon brtsegs): de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za ba ma/ yid gnyis su gyur na'ang de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems
387b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dkon mchog skar ma dang zhes bya bar gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu khyod rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par
387b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyang bag yod pas thob par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
388a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi spyod pa ni tshad med mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste
388a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'ang mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams kyi bsam
388a3(dkon brtsegs): pa shes nas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar sems can la la ni tshul khrims kyis yongs su smin par 'gyur/ la la ni
388a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims spangs pas/ sems can la la ni tshig gis shin tu gdams pas yongs su smin par 'gyur/ la la ni 'jam pos/ la la ni nub pos/ la la ni de gnyis kas/ la la
388a5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jigs par byas pas/ la la ni 'jigs pa las yongs su thar par byas pas/ la la ni bslangs pas la la ni ma bslangs pas/ la la ni gnod pas/ la la ni mi gnod
