388a6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ la la ni zil gyis mnan pas// la la ni zil gyis ma mnan pas/ la la ni sbyang bas/ la la ni mi sbyang bas/ la la ni tshar bcad pas// la la ni sbyin pa la phyir byin pas/ la la
388a7(dkon brtsegs): ni blangs pas/ sems can la la ni yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos yid du
388b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ / sems can la la ni gzugs yid du mi 'ong banye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang /
388b2(dkon brtsegs): reg pa dang / chos yid du mi 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni spyo bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni rtag tu mthong bas/ la la
388b3(dkon brtsegs): ni mi mthong bas/ sems can la la ni sangs rgyas kyi sgras/ sems can la la ni chos kyi sgras// sems can la la ni dge 'dun gyi sgras/ la la ni mi rtag pa'i sgras/
388b4(dkon brtsegs): la la ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras/ la la ni bdag bdag med pa'i sgras/ la la ni zhi ba'i sgras/ sems can la la ni sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
388b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi sgras yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug
388b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ / la la ni lha'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam
388b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam gyis/ la la ni theg pa chen po'i gtam gyis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni sbyin pas yongs su smin par
389a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyi/ snyan par smra bas ma yin/ don spyod pas ma yin/ don mthun pas ma yin/ sems can la la ni snyan par smra bas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi
389a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pas ma yin/ don spyod pas ma yin/ don mthun pas ma yin/ sems can la la ni don spyod pas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pas ma yin/ snyan par smra bas ma yin/ don mthun
389a3(dkon brtsegs): pas ma yin/ sems can la la ni don mthun pas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pas ma yin/ snyan par smra bas ma yin/ don spyod pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ba ma yin/ sems
389a4(dkon brtsegs): can la la ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ / sems can la la ni nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/ la la ni phyi rol gyi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/
389a5(dkon brtsegs): la la ni phyi dang nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/ sems can la la ni chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo kun tu gtong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni
389a6(dkon brtsegs): lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / mgo kun tu gtong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la la ni rtsed mo dang / dga' ba dang / glu dang / sil snyan gyis
389a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ / la la ni gcig tu bde bas/ la la ni gcig tu sdug bsngal bas/ la la ni de gnyis kas/ la la ni gnyis ka ma yin pas sems can la la
389b1(dkon brtsegs): ni dge slong du sprul pas 'dul ba/ sems can la la ni dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen mar sprul pas 'dul ba/ sems can la la ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
389b2(dkon brtsegs): dang kha dog gis 'dul ba yin te/ de dag la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku bstan pas 'dul bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs byed
389b3(dkon brtsegs): pa shes nas/ sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su shes pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu nam byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa las nges par 'byung bar gyur
389b4(dkon brtsegs): cing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsdus par gyur te/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa la mkhas par gyur pa na/ de nas gdod sems can yongs su
389b5(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed nus pa'i skal ba dang mthu yod par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te
389b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yongs su mi skyo ba dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin par skul ba dang / bsam pa yongs su shes pa ste/ rigs kyi
389b7(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na
390a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bka' blo bde ba dang / byin par smra ba dang / ngang tshub gyis 'jam pa dang / bzhin 'dzum shing khrog
390a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byeng nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
390a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / snying rje chen po'i sems dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i sems
390a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag shin tu dul ba'i sems te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so// rigs
390a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa dag pa dang / g.yo med
390a6(dkon brtsegs): cing sgyu dang bral ba dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa bzod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na//
390a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang byang chub sems dpas yongs su mi skyo bas sems can rnams yongs su smin
390b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed nus par rig par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis
390b2(dkon brtsegs): m i khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa dga' byed la 'jig rten gyi khams zhi bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su
390b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
390b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams zhi ba de'ang 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba// lha dang
390b5(dkon brtsegs): mis rab tu gang bar gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par snang ba de'i nyan thos kyang nyan thos chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug
390b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur to/ / de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dus par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
390b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dri ma med par snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya ba
391a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bstan sdug pa/ mdog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ banas nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang /
391a2(dkon brtsegs): dri gzugs bzang ba dang / longs spyod dang / skyid pas dregs shing nga rgyal skyes te rgyags nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i gan du mi 'gro/
391a3(dkon brtsegs): sten par mi byed/ sten par mi byed/ rim gro mi byed do// rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la rgyal bu gzhon
391a4(dkon brtsegs): nu nor dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod na/ de gzugs dang / longs spyod
391a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / skyid pas rgyags dregs te/ nga rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du'ang mi 'ong na/ gal te rgyun mi 'chad par bskul na ni/ de de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'ong yang srid
391a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo/ / rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag bsdus so// bsdus nas kyang rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi nang
391a7(dkon brtsegs): n as yid yongs su mi skyo bar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim gyi sgor bgro zhing bde ba thams cad ni spangs sdug bsngal thams cad ni dang du blang te
391b1(dkon brtsegs): de las tha na kun tu smra ba'am/ yang dag par smra ba 'am/ stan tsam yang mi rnyed kyi steng du gshe rgya zhing tshig ngan pa rtsub po mi snyan pa zer yang spro bar 'gyur ba su yod ces tshul shing brims so//
391b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de ltar tshul shing brims kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las byang chub sems dpa' ba gang tsam yang spro bar ma gyur to// bcom ldan 'das des tshul
391b3(dkon brtsegs): shing thogs te lan gnyis lan gsum du brims kyang sus kyang ma blangs pa dang / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba zhig byang chub
391b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
391b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la 'di skad ces gsol
391b6(dkon brtsegs): to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du yid yongs su mi skyo bar bde ba thams cad ni spangs sdug bsngal thams cad ni ji mi snyam par bgyis te/ rgyal bu
391b7(dkon brtsegs): g zhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim du mchi'o zhes rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar gyis tshig de smras ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi rma
392a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos nas/ lha'i bu brgya stong gis kyang steng gi bar snang las kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar
392a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ / rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar de rgyal bu gzhon nu nor
392a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyi khyim du song ste/ khyim gyi sgo drung na 'dug pa dang / de skye bo'i tshogs chen po des mthong nas/ gshe rgya zhing ngan pa rtsub pa sna tshogs spras te/ de la sa dang rdul yang
392a4(dkon brtsegs): gtor/ de la lag pa dang / dbyig pa dang / bong bas kyang brdegs so// des mthong zhing thong te/ lus la reg cing tshor bar gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar 'khrug
392a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ gshe ba 'am/ khong khro ba 'am/ phyir log par ma gyur gyi steng du brtson 'grus brtan pa'i stobs rab tu bskyed nas/ stobs dang rab tu ldan pa dang / snying rje chen po'ang
392a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/ de lo stong lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gcig tu zhugs te/ smad pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / brdegs pa thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi skyo bar/ de lo khri lon
392a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gnyis kyi nang du zhugs so/ / de lo nyi khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gsum pa'i nang du zhugs pa nas lo bdun khri lon pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo
392b1(dkon brtsegs): khang drug pa'i nang du zhugs so/ / de lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang bdun pa'i nang du zhugs pa dang / de nas gdod rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dbul des tshig ster te/
392b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong khyod ci 'dod ci zhig nol/ khyod la ni dgos spros shig dung ci nus kyis rab tu sbyin par bya'o// rgyal bu gzhon nu de dge slong de la ngo mtshar chen po'i
392b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skyes nas/ ji tsam du dge slong des yongs su mi skyo ba rnag nus pa de ni ngo mtshar te snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
392b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus 'bar des rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal de sems rab tu dang bar shes nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zas dang skom dang gos dang bza' ba rnams
392b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu bdag la dgos pa ci yang med/ zang zing med pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas/ bdag ni chos kyi pho nyar 'dir 'ongs so// 'jig rten don mdzad drang srong che
392b6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba/ / mi mchog dri ma med par snang zhes bya// de ni sdug bsngal mthar pa byin chos ston te// sems can gang gis thos pa mi mchi 'thob// bskal pa stong phrag bye ba grangs
392b7(dkon brtsegs): med na/ sangs rgyas rnams ni brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur/ da ltar 'jig rten mun nag sbron gyur pa/ yon tan dam pa mnga' ba de skyes nas/ khyod ni 'di na 'dod pa'i yon tan
393a1(dkon brtsegs): chags/ / gzugs dang longs spyod rnams la rtag tu mos// myid myos de bzhin rgyal srid myos pas na// chos kyi rgyal po lta bar yong mi 'gro// mangs spyod mi rta
393a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rgyal srid srog/ nA rtse'i zil thigs 'dra zhes rgyal bas gsungs// gang phyir sangs rgyas thos kyang myos 'gyur ba// de ni rgyal bu khyod kyi cha ma yin// khyod ni bdin byang chub
393a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog zhugs la/ / sems can dag kyang gter te grol bar gyis// khyod bdag da ltar 'dod pa bran gyur na// ji ltar myos pas skye bo 'dul bar 'gyur// nga rgyal spongs te nyon
393a4(dkon brtsegs): mongs rnams sol la/ / de ni rgyal ba'i drung du 'gro bar gyis// brtson 'grus bskyed de 'jig rten snying brtse gyis// phyi ma'i dus na gdung bar gyur ta re// rgyal bus tshigs su bcad
393a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di thos nas/ / nga rgyal spangs te gus pa rab bskyed nas// brtson 'grus 'bar ba'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te// gang sngon bdag gis gnod bgyis bzod par gsol//
393a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni rgyal srid thams cad spangs par bya// 'dod dang de bzhin longs spyod kun mi tshol// nga rgyal tha ba'i skyon dang dregs spangs te// myur du bde bar gshegs pa'i gan
393a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro/ / de ni srog chags bye ba brgyad cus bskor// me tog na bza' spos dang bdug pa thogs// dri ma med par snang ba skyes bu mchog/ rgyal ba de yi drung dunye bar song //
393b1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa'i gan du phyin nas kyang // zhabs la phyag 'tshal de nas mchod byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa de yi spyan sngar 'dug/ rgyal bu de yis tshig ni 'di smras so//
393b2(dkon brtsegs): gang phyir skyo med sems kyis bskul ba san// brtson 'grus 'bar ba bdag gi ston pa mgon// ji ltar de ni mchod pa'i 'os lags na// de la lan du phan pa bgyi mi
393b3(dkon brtsegs): nus/ / bdag ni 'jig rten mgon la bzod par gsol// chos kyi rgyal la gus pa gang ma bgyis// de dag thams cad de ring so sor bshags// bdag gis nongs
393b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jig rten mgon mkhyen mdzod/ / sems can don du snying rje bskyed nas su// bdag ni byang chub mchog la rab zhugs te// byang chub dam mchog ma thob bar du ni// sman
393b5(dkon brtsegs): rmad bag med spyod pa mi bgyi'o/ / rgyal bu de yis rgyal srid rnams spangs te// sems can bye ba brgyad cu rnams kyis bskor// byang chub dam pa 'di ni yongs rtsol zhing // mngon byung rgyal
393b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bstan la rab tu byung / / rgyal bas de dag gi ni bsam mkhyen nas// byang chub lam mchog rab tu bstan pas na// chos thos sems can rtag tu dag pa rnams// thams cad kyis
393b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang rjes mthun bzod pa thob/ rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i 'jig rten gyi khams
394a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsngags pa brjod cing / gang chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su brjod kyang yon tan gyi mtha' zad par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus
394a2(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing the tshom za'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na'ang de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
394a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba der gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du
394a4(dkon brtsegs): dogs shing the tshom za ba ma/ yid gnyis su gyur na'ang de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na
394a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar sngon byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo zhing / 'di ltar shin tu
394a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang ldan te/ / brtson 'grus nye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'dod pas/ ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
394a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin no// rigs kyi
394b1(dkon brtsegs): / bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdud kyi las shi
394b2(dkon brtsegs): tu bdang pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / sangs
394b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i las te/ rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
394b4(dkon brtsegs): cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe
394b5(dkon brtsegs): na/ bsam pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang / dbang po yongs su shes pa'i ye shes dang / nad thams cad zhi bar byed par sman sbyin pa'i ye shes dang / nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu
394b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar byed pa mi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes te/ rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud
394b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon
395a1(dkon brtsegs): par grub pa/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu nor bu rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang bas kyang rin du mi bzod pa'i gtsug gi nor bu'in
395a2(dkon brtsegs): po che de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gtsug na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
395a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag spyi gtsug ltar mi snang ba thob pa dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang ldan par gyur cig
395a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ nam 'dzum pa mdzad paden/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi
395a5(dkon brtsegs): sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lnga ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/
395a6(dkon brtsegs): dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa de dag 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi gzi brjid kyang
395a7(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid kyis yongs su zad par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to//
395b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ldangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
395b2(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcang ba'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus so// mi mnyam mnyam pa dam pa 'jig rten mig sbyin
395b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mchog/ shAkya'i rgyal sras dbang po zhi zhing dri gsum dri ma spangs// mtshungs med mtshungs 'das byams pas 'phags pa rgyal ba ri rab bzhin// ci slang 'dir 'dzum
395b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes 'byung gnas bdag la lung bstan gsol/ / gya gyu mi mnga' rab tu mnyen la shin tu snyan pa'i gsung // skyes bu dam pa bde rab sbyin pa dran mchog blo gros thugs// bde gshegs
395b5(dkon brtsegs): mos pa mchog dang ldan pa lha dang mis mchod pa/ / ci slad 'dzum pa 'di mdzad phan pa mdzad pas bstan du gsol// stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' 'dom gang 'od dang bsod nams
395b6(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid 'od/ / 'khor gyi nang du seng ge lta bur rab gasgrags rgol ba bcom// thub pa srid gsum khyod dang mnyam pa'am lhag pa gang yang med// chos kyi dbang phyug ci slad
395b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan du gsol/ / rab tu bzhad cing mchog tu dgyes pa shin tu dri med zhal// zla ba lta bur nam mkhar gshegs nas phyogs su lam me bar// mun pa
396a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom zhing rdul bcom 'od dang dpal ni rab rgyas pa/ / bde bar gshegs pa 'dzum mdzad phan pa mdzad pas bka' stsol cig/ gser ri 'od 'dra brtul zhugs grub
396a2(dkon brtsegs): pab bsod nams ye shes 'phro/ / mkhas pas rtag tu rab bsngags 'jig rten ngo mtshar mchod pa'i 'os// srid pa'i dam pa 'jig rten 'das pa sbyin gnas mi zad cing // nam
396a3(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i ngos rab snang bar shAkya seng ges 'dzum pa bstan/ / lha dang mis mchog khyod 'dra sa dang lha yul dag na'ang med// yid mnyam mos pa mnyam pa khrel yod dpal gyis rab tu
396a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas/ / yon tan brgya rnams shin tu rgyas pa'i mtshan ni rab rdzogs pa// bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa thub pa dam pa bka' stsol cig/ kun tu khyod kyi ye shes dus
396a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum chags pa med par 'jug/ sems dang yid sbyor dbang po gang dang sems can bsam pa gang // sems can kun gyi bsam pa ci 'dra thams cad skad cig mkhyen//
396a6(dkon brtsegs): mi yi seng ges gang slad 'dzum mdzad rigs don bdag la gsungs// nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha mang yid kyang rab tu dga'/ mi tshogs sa la gnas pa thal sbyar phyag 'tshal gyis/
396a7(dkon brtsegs): gang thos lha mi mun pa'i rdul rnams sel 'gyur ba// mi mchog gis ni bdud ci ro mchog dbye bar gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
396b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs bsgyur bal bdi skad ces bka stsal te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bcug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bor gyur
396b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ched du/ gang gtsug gi nor bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
396b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
396b4(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byas/ bsti stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas shing / mchod nas/ thams cad du'ang tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag
396b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang theg pa gsum po de dag la yongs su smin par byas so/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong na/ bskal pa dri ma med pa
396b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig
396b7(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
397a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i sa gzhi ni rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'od gang byung ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
397a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'od de'ang gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag 'od des reg par 'gyur ba de dag kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gzir bar 'gyur
397a3(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa dbang 'byor pa rgyas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur ro// der byang chub sems dpa' rin po che ma gtogs par rin
397a4(dkon brtsegs): po che gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ming rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rab tu 'thob/
397a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de dag gi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang 'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang mi 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang bla
397a6(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ / de na mi khom pa dang ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur ro// de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin
397a7(dkon brtsegs): po che 'byung ba bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na
397b1(dkon brtsegs): bud med dang 'khrig cing 'du ba'i ming yang med par 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can long ba 'am/ zhar ba 'am/ zha bo 'am/ sgur po 'am/ yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur
397b2(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yang med de/ de dag thams cad kyang lus mtshan gyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dpag tu med par 'gyur
397b3(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa bar ma bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang byang chub dang rab tu ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa/ snying
397b4(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pa/ theg pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang dbang po rno ste zur tsam gyis go bar
397b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de dag kyang chos kyi sgo'i tshig re res sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi
397b6(dkon brtsegs): gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ / de la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshig gcig gis tshig thams cad la 'jug pa'o// tshig gcig pu
397b7(dkon brtsegs): de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshig mi zad pa'o// tshig mi zad pa de'ang gang zhe na/ tshig mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang zad par byed nus pa'o//
398a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig mi zad pa de'ang gang zhe na/ 'diny+dzaste/ a zhes bya ba ni tshig mi zad pa ste/ a zhes bya ba la zhugs na/ sig 'bru thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro//
398a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na yi ge thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/ yi ge 'bru gnyis snga phyi med par thos par bya mi nus so// yi ge 'bru re re nas brjod kyi/ yi ge'ang yi ge gnyis dang 'brel ba ma yin no// de bas na tshig
398a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu de nyid rnam par rig pa'i tshig ste/ gang rnam par rig pa'i tshig de'ang rnam par rig pa'i tshig ces rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed do// de ltar tshig de mi rtog rnam par
398a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog par dgos pa byed de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs la 'jug pa'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba de/ byang chub sems
398a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i bsngags
398a6(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che 'byung ba de'i chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su brjod kyang yon tan
398a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brjod pa zad par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni yon tan gyi rnam par bkod pa tshad med pa de snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
398b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas/ dga' mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang
398b2(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// chos rnams kun gyi pha rol gshegs// 'khrul pa'i skyon rnams
398b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las/ / de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'das// ye shes chen po khyod re mtshar// sangs rgyas bye ba de snyed la// bdag gis sngon mchod gang bgyid pa//
398b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen// 'das dang ma 'ongs dus dag dang // de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi// bdag gi spyod dang de bzhin du// srog chags kun gyi rab tu mkhyen// thub pa ci
398b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra de 'dra bar/ / 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur zhes// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag lung bstan// bdag ni the tshom yod ma mchis// sa rnams thams cad 'gas kyang gda'// nyi zla
398b6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' las ltung yang gda'/ / bcom ldan khyod kyi zhal sgo nas// phyin ci log gi gsung mi 'byung // ye shes ldan la shes rab che// des ni bdag la bden tshig gis// byang chub
398b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu lung bstan pas/ / sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur// thugs kyis yid ni mkhyen pas na// bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra dang // sangs rgyas zhing yang ci 'dra ba// de 'dra 'i
399a1(dkon brtsegs): du kun bstan to/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas// the chom ma mchis dbang po chem// sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur// mchog gi spyod pa spyad par brtsi/
399a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi spyod pa ci 'drab// sngon gyi mthar ni rnam sbyangs pa// debs shin tu dpagayas par// bdag gi spong ba sdud par bgyi// 'din khaM los mi 'dab bas// brtson 'grus pa/
399a3(dkon brtsegs): nga'i spyod pa 'di// bum pa ma mchis sems kyis su// byang chub spyod pa spyad par bgyi// bdag ni byang chub lung bstan pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni spro bsngal/ ji srid 'dren pa ma gyur pa/
399a4(dkon brtsegs): de srid brtson 'grus mi gtang ngo // rtag tu byang chub mchog gzhol te// sems can thams cad gnyer bar bgyi// byang chub dam pa don du btsal// de dag bdag gis bskyang bar
399a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
399a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par skye bar sems kyis smon te/ tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das nam de bzhin gshegs
399a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rin po che 'byung ba des byang chub thob par gyur pa den/ bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig ces spras pa dang / de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis
399b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung
399b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/
399b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la rno kyo rnam grangs 'di 'chang dam/ klog pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am
399b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lo stong du ci bzhed ces sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
399b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos te/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ de kho na bzhin du nan tan byed na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang ste/ tshad
399b6(dkon brtsegs): med grangs med par khong du chud par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
399b7(dkon brtsegs): gzung lags na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi
400a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ gtsug na rin po ches
400a2(dkon brtsegs): zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che dang / byang chub
400a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
400a4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya ba'i
400a5(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste/ bdus pa bzhi bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de d+harmA shI las zhus te/ skadagasar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa
400a6(dkon brtsegs): sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste/ bam po gsum mo// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya shrI ma la de bi sing ha nA da nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/
400a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa lha mo dpal baphreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
400b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mngon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs sa/ de nas de'i
400b2(dkon brtsegs): yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo dam pa btsun mo 'phrang ldan mas// lha mo dpal ba phreng chos rtogs nas ring po ma lon pa'i bar skabs su gtam glengs pa
400b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po kye ma khyod kyi sras mo lha mo dpal 'phreng ni mdzangs shing gsal la/ zab cing mkhas te/ gal te des bcom ldan 'das mthong ba lta na/ tshegs chung ngus chos rtogs
400b4(dkon brtsegs): la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la'ang the tsom ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis btsun mo 'phreng ldan ma la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phreng
400b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan ma'u bu cag gis lha mo dpal 'phreng la phonya nus pa zhig gtang gor ma chag go/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / btsun mo 'phreng ldan mas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi tshig de mnyan nas//
400b6(dkon brtsegs): ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo 'phreng ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rnam pa du ma bris te/ nang kor ma yid brtan pa zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba
400b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i lag tu 'phrin yig bskur nas/ de mthar gyis song ste grong khyer 'thab meng du phyin nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste/ lha mo dpal 'phreng la phyag 'tshal nas phan tshun
401a1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ba'i gtam byas te/ lha mo dpal 'phreng gi lag tu 'phrin yig byin no// de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis pha ma la gus pas 'phrin yig
401a2(dkon brtsegs): de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas mgo la gtugs te/ bdag nyid kyis 'phrin yig bklags nas/ 'phrin yig gi don bzang ngo zhes nges par bzung ste/ don du nges par bzung nas
401a3(dkon brtsegs): mgo la lhags te/ ya mtshan du bzung nas/ lha mo dpal 'phreng gis nang kor ma zla ba lta bu la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra 'di ni// 'jig rten dag
401a4(dkon brtsegs): na shin tu dkon/ / gal te tshig 'di bden gyur na// bdag gis khyod la bgo ba sbyin// gal te bcom ldan sangs rgyas de// 'jig rten don du byung gyur na// de ni bdag la thugs rje
401a5(dkon brtsegs): yis/ / bstan pa'i ched du 'dir spyon cig/ de nas de yi skad cig la// mgon po gshegs nas mkha' la bzhugs// bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sku// 'od zer 'gyed
401a6(dkon brtsegs): cing bzhugs pa mthong / / de nas de'i tshe lha mo ni// gus pas 'khor bcas langs nas kyang // spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas// smra ba'i mchog la bstod pa ni// mgon
401a7(dkon brtsegs): po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang / / dpal dpe gang na'ang yod ma mchis// bsam yas dpe bla ma mchis pa'i// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang /
401b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la yang bsam ma mchis// khyod kyi sangs rgyas chos mi bas// de bas thub khyod skyabs kyang lags// bsam yas rtsal ldan khyod kyis ni// sku gsung thugs kyi skyon rnams
401b2(dkon brtsegs): bsal/ / nyams ma mchis pa'i sa brnyes pa// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes bya thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// ye shes sku yi dbang phyug ste// sangs rgyas
401b3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad kyi/ / mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhal yas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dpe las 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// bsam yas chos khyod phyag
401b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ / mtha' yas gzugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni da ltar mgon pos bskyabs// byang chub sa bon rnam par bskyed// slan chad srid pa gzhan dag tu//
401b5(dkon brtsegs): thub pas bdag la phan gdags mdzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngon tshe rnams su lha mo khyod// ngas ni byang chub sbyor ba byas// phyis kyang tshe rabs
401b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag tu/ / ngas ni rjes su gzung bar bya// lha mo dpal 'phreng gis gsol pa// bdag gis 'di dang gzhan dag tu// bsod nams gang dang gang bgyis pa/
401b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams de yis mgon po khyod// rtag tu bdag gis mthong bar shog/ de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng dang lhan cig tu btsun mo kun dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis// bcom
402a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du lha mo dpal 'phreng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
402a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu lung bstan te/ lha mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i yon tan dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis lha mo
402a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod bskal pa tshad med grangs med par lha dang mi'i rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs thams cad du'ang nga mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur zhing / ngal
402a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du 'di lta bu'i bstod pa bsngags pas bsngags par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams la'ang mchod pa byed par 'gyur
402a5(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / da phyin chad bskal ba brgya stong phrag grangs med pa nyi shun/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar
402a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de'i tshe'ang lha mo khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ngan song dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sems can rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas
402a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag la nad kyang med// rga ba'ang med/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i gnod pa'ang med de/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi ming yang mi
402b1(dkon brtsegs): grag par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di ltar bde ba dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang
402b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / longs spyod thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/ sems can
402b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag shin tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / lha mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ro//
402b4(dkon brtsegs): lha mo de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag byas pa'i sems can rnams de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'du bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa thos
402b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ lha dang mi dpag tu med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo// de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung
402b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan to/ / de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas/ thal mo sbyar te yi dam chen po bcu yang dag par
402b7(dkon brtsegs): blangs so/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das da slan rmad bdag gis tshul khrims kyi dus las 'da' ba'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom
403a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das yid ma dang po 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par byung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das sran chad bdag gis bla ma dag pa mgus
403a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi ma gnyis pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das dablan
403a3(dkon brtsegs): tshacha bdag gis gong du'ang sems can la khro ba dang gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam gsum pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug
403a4(dkon brtsegs): gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis gzhan gyi dpal dang / gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dag la phrag dog gi sems bskyed par mi
403a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam bzhi pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das nga slan chad bdag gis tha na kham
403a6(dkon brtsegs): slad ma tsam la'ang ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam lnga pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo //
403a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das da than chad bdag gis bdag nyid kyis longs spyod pa'i slad du nor yongs su gzung bar mi bgyi ste/ bon kyang bcom ldan 'das sems can dbul po sdug bsngal zhing
403b1(dkon brtsegs): mgon ma mchis pa yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su gzung bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam drug pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang
403b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par blang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das de slan chad bdag gis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams la phan bdogs pa na/ bdag la sman du re ba'i slad du sems can bsdu bar
403b3(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyi ste/ bon kyang bcom ldan 'das zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang / chog par mi 'dzin pa dang / ldog pa ma mchis par sems can yang dag par bsdu bar 'tshal
403b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yi dam bdun pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das de slan chad bdag gis sems can mgon ma mchis
403b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / go rar stsal ba dang / bcings pa dang / nad kyis nyam thag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul po dang / 'phongs par gyur pa dang / tshegs chen pos 'tshe ba dag
403b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong na/ de dag la sman ma btags par gom pa gcig kyang dor bar mi bgyi'i bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dag mthong na/ sdug
403b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal de dang de dag las yongs su thar par bgyis la/ nor gyi bsdu bas pa sgrubs nas/ slad kyis bdag mchi bar bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam brgyad pa 'di'ang
404a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das dman chad bdag gis bga' tsho dang / bya ba la sogs pasdig pa'i las
404a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'tsho zhing / de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'i tshul can dag mthong na yal bar mi dor gyi bcom ldan 'das grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong
404a3(dkon brtsegs): rdornal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang dag na bdag gi mchid nyan pa de dang de dag tu tshar dgum pa'i rigs pa rnams la ni char dgum ldan gdags pa'i rigs pa
404a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni sman gdags par 'tshal lo/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das tshar dgum pa dang sman gdags pas ni 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i slad du ste/
404a5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas na lha dang mi rnams kyi lus rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / ngan song rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyurate/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bcom ldan
404a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjes su skor bar bgyid pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam dgu pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag
404a7(dkon brtsegs): par blang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis dam pa'i chos bzung ba las bskyud par bgyi ba'i sems gcig tsam yang bskyed par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
404b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos bzung ba las bskyed na theg pa chen po bskyud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po bskyud na pha rol tu phyin pa bskyud par 'gyur ro// bcom
404b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa bskyud na theg pa chen po la mi 'dun par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang theg pa chen po la ma nges pa de ni dam
404b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la mi 'dun par 'gyur zhing / rang nyam du gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sar mchi ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur
404b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis nyes dmigs dang gnod pa chen por mthong lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa las ni/ bdag dang
404b5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa'i don yongs su grub par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i yi dam bcu pa
404b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du dag gis yang dag par blang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyun
404b7(dkon brtsegs): sngar blangs pa lags te/ 'di la chos kyi rje nyid bdag gi dbang du gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das ston pa mngon sum du gyur tu lag kyang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa
405a1(dkon brtsegs): ba chung ngu la la dag kye ma yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni lcogs par dka' bo snyam du bdag la the tsom za'am/ yid gnyis 'tshal ba de dag ni/ bcom lda
405a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de nyid kyis yun ring por gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / phung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid la sman gdags pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das
405a3(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di bgyi bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yi dam chen po bcu po gang dag blangs pa'i yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dag la/ bcom
405a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das gal te bdag ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'dis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir lha'i me tog gi char 'ab
405a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig/ lha'i sgra grag par gyur cig/ des kyang bdag gi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di len par gyur cig/ lha mo dpal 'phreng gis tshig de skad ces smras ma
405a6(dkon brtsegs): zag tu/ de'i tshe lha'i me tog gi char chen po bab nas/ bar snang las lha'i sgra grag par gyur te/ des bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs de mnos nas/ lha mo ded pa
405a7(dkon brtsegs): no/ / ji ltar khyod kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas pa de ni de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no zhes byas so// de nas rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul de'ang mthong /
405b1(dkon brtsegs): masmras mnos pa de'ang thos nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor the tsom med cing mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/ lha mo dpal 'phreng dang mi 'bral zhing 'grogs par smon lam btab bo//
405b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam
405b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po gsum btab po/ / gsum gang zhe na// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'dis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag la sman
405b4(dkon brtsegs): btags pa gang lags pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag tshe rabs thams cad du dam pa'i chos rtogs pa thob par gyur
405b5(dkon brtsegs): cig/ bcom ldan padas 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po dang po lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos rtogs pa de thob nas kyang // ngal ba dang
405b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su skyo ba ma mchis par sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gnyis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag
405b7(dkon brtsegs): gis dam pa'i chos bstan pa de'ang lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan padas padi ni
406a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi smon lam chen po gsum pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam chen po gsum po de dag 'debs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo
406a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal ba phreng gi smon lam chen po yul che ba gsum po 'di dag lung ston pa mdzad de/ lha mo 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs
406a3(dkon brtsegs): su 'dus shing / khongs su gtogs la/ khongs su chud do// lha mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang / smon lam chen
406a4(dkon brtsegs): po 'di gsum gyi khongs su 'dus shing / khongs su gtogs la/ khongs su chud de/ smon lam chen po gsum po de dag ni de ltar yul che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
406a5(dkon brtsegs): mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di la smon lam chen po'i yul bstan pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gis spobs so//
406a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis/ khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng
406a7(dkon brtsegs): gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su
406b1(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba'i smon lam chen po gcig gi khongs su 'dus shing / khongs su chud de/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yul rmeb lags so// de nas
406b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 'phreng la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo legs so legs so// lha mo khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/ thabs kyis yongs su
406b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgos pa'i shes rab dang ldan no/ / lha mo sems can gang dag khyod kyis chos bstan pa'i don rtogs pa de dag ni dkon pa yin te/ yun ring po nas sangs rgyas du ma la dge ba'i rtsa
406b4(dkon brtsegs): ba bskyed bskyed pa yin no/ / lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
406b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba bstan pa de nyid bshad do/ / 'chad do// 'chad par 'gyur ro// lha mo nga'ang da ltar mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob
406b6(dkon brtsegs): nas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa rnam pa du mar ston te/ lha mo de ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa ngas rnam pa du mar bshad kyang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'jin
406b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yon tan rnams kyi mtha' 'am/ mu thug pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la'ang mtha' bam/ mu thug pa med do// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su
407a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'dzin pa ni de ltar don nano// lha so ma pa' mas yongs su 'dzin pa ni kar ldan san tshan// de nas bcom ldan 'das pa sa sod pa 'a'aphreng gis 'drig
407a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo de'i
407a3(dkon brtsegs): dus la bab par shes na khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// brtsa
407a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa des dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos
407a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong sdud pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dper na 'a chags pa'i dus kyi tshe'i sprin chen po ni kha dog mtha' yas ba'i rgyun dang
407a6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che mtha' yas pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'ang bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i chab kyi rgyun dpag tu ma
407a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / ye shes rin po che'i rgyun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na chags pa'i dus kyi tshe'i chab kyi phung po chen po stong
407b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas de las ni gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / dbyibs sna tshogs pa 'byung zhing / 'khor gling phran bye ba
407b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi chab kyi phung po chen po de las 'byung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa theg pa chen po yang dag par 'grub pa'i 'byung khung dang skye gnas su
407b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de las byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang / chos snang ba'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug thams
407b4(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba gang lags pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dper na sa chen po ni khur chen po
407b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i rten bgyid pa lags te/ / bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chab kyi phung po chen po rgya mtsho dang / ri mang po thams cad dang / gnas dang / rtswa dang // shing gal
407b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sman dang / lo tog dang / nags tshal thams cad dang / sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi rten bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po bas kyang khur chen po
407b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po bdi dag gi rten bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po
408a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi khyer ba lags so/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems can dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing zos pa dang mi ldan la/ chos
408a2(dkon brtsegs): can ma lags pa rnams lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par bgyid pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la sbyor ba ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/
408a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems can
408a4(dkon brtsegs): kha cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig theg pa chen/
408a5(dkon brtsegs): po la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag ni khur chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/
408a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni khur chen po 'di bzhi khyer ba lags te/ sa chen po pas kyang ches rten du gyur pa dang / sa chen po pas kyang ches khur chen po khyer
408a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / khur mtha' yas pa khyer ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi gzhi rten du gyur pa dang / byams pa bgyis pa dang / snying rje can dang / sman par 'tshal ba dang / snying
408b1(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba dang / chos kyis 'jig rten gyi sa zhes bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na sa chen po ni rin po che sna bzhi'i 'byung gnas lags te/ sna bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/
408b2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che rin thang mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che de bas chung ba dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che de bas kyang chung
408b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dag gi 'byung gnas lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po rin po che sna bzhi po 'di dag gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
408b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtan nas/ sems can rnams kyis rin po che'i mchog chen po rin po che thams cad kyi dam par gyur pa bzhi'i khe rnyed par 'gyur ro// bzhi
408b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la brten nas/ sems can rnams kyis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par bgyid pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs
408b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi khe rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge pa'i rtsa ba thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa
408b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshogs thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nye bar 'gro ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ches mthon po thob par bgyi ba rnyed
409a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas/ sems can rnams kyis rin po
409a2(dkon brtsegs): che thams cad kyi mchog ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rin po che chen po bzhi'i khe rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das gter chen po rin po che mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bgyi ba
409a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom
409a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i
409a5(dkon brtsegs): chos lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i
409a6(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni
409a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba de dag ni sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ pha na lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong bas kyang yongs su
409b1(dkon brtsegs): smin par bgyid de/ de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pa rnams dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur pa 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems
409b2(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag tshul khrims kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni dbang po drug bsdams pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pas yongs su smin/
409b3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid de/ tha na spyod lam gyis kyang de dag gi sems sung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de lta de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur
409b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bzod pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag la ni// de dag gis
409b5(dkon brtsegs): de la spros brgyad de gtse ba bgyis kyang / gnod sems ma mchis shing sman par 'tshal ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs dam pa dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/
409b6(dkon brtsegs): tha na bzhin gyi mdangs kyis kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'dzin ra
409b7(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag brtson 'grus kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems ma zhum zhing le lo ma
410a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / 'dun pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ ban rang gi spyod lam bsgrims pas kyang de
410a2(dkon brtsegs): dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas ngam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
410a3(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bsam gtan gyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems mi g.yeng ba dang / yid phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang /
410a4(dkon brtsegs): dran pa 'khrul pa ma mchis pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ za na bgyis nas yun ring du lags pa dang / smras nas yun ring du lags pa mi bskyad pas kyang de dag
410a5(dkon brtsegs): gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
410a6(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems can gyi don 'dri ba dag la le lo ma mchis par lung ston pa
410a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bstan bcos thams cad dang / rig pa dang / bzo'i gnas thams cad kyi mthar phyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ pha na bzo ga'i gnas chen po dag tu 'ang de dag gi
410b1(dkon brtsegs): sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// /
410b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos
410b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis
410b4(dkon brtsegs): spobs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis/ khyod kyis spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo
410b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dam
410b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'ang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po rang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa
410b7(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin pa lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa des ni/ bcom ldan
411a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slang du yan lag gsum yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang / srog dang
411a2(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod rnams te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo lus yongs su gtong bas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i myu dang mnyam pa/ rka
411a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang bral ba/ mi shigs pa/ rtag pa/ brtan pa/ zhi ba/ zer zug pa/ 'chi 'pho dang bral ba/ mthar yas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thob
411a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo srog yongs su gtong bas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par 'phrul par gnas pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu
411a5(dkon brtsegs): dang mnyam pa/ 'chi pho dang bral ba/ mtha' yas pa/ rtag pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/
411a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo longs spyod yongs su gtong bas ni sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma lags
411a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bas par mi 'gyur pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rtag par rgyun mi 'chad cing rtag tu gnas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur
411b1(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yan lag gsum po 'di dag yongs su gtong bas ni/ yon tan shin tu rmad du byung
411b2(dkon brtsegs): ba gsum po de dag thob par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyang lung ston par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig dam pa'i chos rnam par
411b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa'i tshe/ / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams bye zhing gnyis su gyur la/ sde sder chad de/ phyogs phyogs su gyes nas rtsod par
411b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa na/ g.yo ma mchis shing / gya gyu ma mchis la/ sgyu ma mchis par chos la dga' zhing / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du chos can gyi phyogs la 'dzug par bgyid
411b5(dkon brtsegs): na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de zhugs pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad las lung bstan pa nges par 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i
411b6(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar brtson 'grus chen po lags pa snyam bdag bgyid de/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spun du gyur pa lags te/ ye shes su gyur pa lags// bcom
411b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni mnga' bdag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 'phreng
412a1(dkon brtsegs): gis ngas pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/ lha mo dang bzhin te/ lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni brtson 'grus/
412a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po yin no// lha mo dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas kand du mi drag par bsnun du zin kyang / snang bar 'gyur zhing / nad skyed par byed do// lha mo de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs
412a3(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa ni chung ngu zan kyang bdud sdig can la gnod par 'gyur zhing / mya ngan skyed la/ smre sngags 'don par byed do// lha mongs ni bdud sdig can la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa
412a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar gnod par 'gyur zhing / mya ngan skyed la/ smre sngags 'don par byed pa de ltar gnod par ra gyur pa dang / de ltar mya ngan skyed pa dang / de ltar smre sngags 'don par byed pa'i dge ba'i chos
412a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gcig kyang ma mthong ngo / / lha mo dper na ba lang gi mchog khyu mchog gis ni 'di ltar 'phang mtho ba dang chu zheng gis pa lang gi tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ mngon par
412a6(dkon brtsegs): brjid cing yang dag par mngon par brjid do/ / lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'ang chung ngu zin kyang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por gyur pas//
412a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon to// lha mo dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis ni 'di ltar mtho ba dang rgya che bas ri nag po
412b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / mngon par lhag ger 'dug go// lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i lus dang srog la mi lta zhingab phan gdags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos
412b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa'ang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por gyur pas/ theg pa chen po pa theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa lus dang srog la lta ba rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis
412b3(dkon brtsegs): gnon na/ gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ lha mo de bas na sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ yang dag par bstan par bya
412b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya/ gzud par bya/ dgod par bya/ lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o// de ltar 'bras
412b5(dkon brtsegs): bu re'o/ / de ltar phan yon che'o// lha mo gal te bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par dam pa'i rlos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ngas bshad du zin kyang / lha mo
412b6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang phan yon bshad pa de dag gi mtha' 'am/ mu thug par mi 'gyur ro// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yon tan mtha' yas
412b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan no/ / lha mo ngas pa chos yongs su gzung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bzhed pa ngas ma bstan par khyod kyis bshad par spobs par gyis shig/ de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng
413a1(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
413a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das dam pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa chen po'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig
413a3(dkon brtsegs): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad ni theg pa chen pos rab tu phye ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na klung chen po bzhi ni mtsho ma dros pa las 'byung ngo //
413a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang theg pa chen po las
413a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das dper na sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci lags pa dag dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad ni sa chen po la brten
413a6(dkon brtsegs): cing / sa chen po la gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang lags pa dag dang
413a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten laso 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags pa thams cad dang / de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la brten cing / theg pa chen po la gnas te//
413b1(dkon brtsegs): skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas theg pa chen po la gnas shing / theg pa chen po yongs su bzung na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
413b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang rten cing gnas te/ yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
413b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang / dam pa'i chos nub pa dang / so sor thar pa dang / 'dul ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa gnas drug po
413b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing btags pa gang lags pa'i gnas drug po de dag kyang theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa las byung ba lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na//
413b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po gnas pa nyid ni dam pa'i
413b6(dkon brtsegs): chos gnas pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom
413b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das theg pa chen po nub pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos nub pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das so sor thar pa dang 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni don gcig ste/
414a1(dkon brtsegs): yi ge'i 'bru ni ba dang lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi bslab pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
414a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ 'di
414a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i cho ga'i tshul khrims kyi phung po lags so// bcom ldan
414a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi slad du rab tu 'byung
414a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni ma mchis kyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'byung zhing / bsnyen par
414a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la skyabs su mchi ba lags te/
414a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dpa
414b1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'du byed thams cad la mi zad par 'jigs pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dper na gshed mas ral gri gzas
414b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ de dag kyang nges par byung ba shin tu bde ba thob pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyabs su gyur pa ni
414b3(dkon brtsegs): skyabs gzhan tshol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can skyabs ma mchis pa rnams gang dang gang gis 'jigs skrag pa'i 'jigs skrag pa de dang de
414b4(dkon brtsegs): las 'byung ba'i tshol ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la'ang 'jigs pa de mchis te/ 'jigs pa des skrag pas dgra bcom
414b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi bar khas len pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
414b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang skye ba'i chos kyi lhag ma dang bcas
414b7(dkon brtsegs): pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi skye ba bas pa'ang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bsten par bgyi ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/ des na de dag ni dag pa
415a1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ las mthar byin pa ma lags te/ de dag gi bgyi ba mang lags so// de dag gis spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gzhan yang mang du mchis te/ de dag
415a2(dkon brtsegs): ma spangs pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes
415a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
415a4(dkon brtsegs): ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ma
415a5(dkon brtsegs): lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
415a6(dkon brtsegs): ' das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa lags la
415a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das yongs su
415b1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
415b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyed pas spang bar bgyi ba'i skyon thams cad spangs shing / mchog tu yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan
415b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni skyon gyi lhag ma rnams dang bcas pa yongs su ma dag pa'i chos can lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das yongs su
415b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
415b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya
415b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
415b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtha' dbugs phyin pa rjes su dran pa bzhi po gang lags pa de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa can dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / drang ba'i don dang /
416a1(dkon brtsegs): @rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bgyi ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'tsho 'bo ni 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ d+hun
416a2(dkon brtsegs): chad pa'i 'bring po dang / yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi'apho lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho na nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i
416a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho ni/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub
416a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang thob pa dang yid kyi lus rnams lags te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la 'chi 'pho 'di gnyis
416a5(dkon brtsegs): las rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho'i dbang du bgyis te/ bdag gi skye ba zad do snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das
416a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la brten nas/ bdag gis tshangs par spyad pa bsten to snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes
416a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'byung lags so/ / byis pa so so'i skye bo dang / lha dang / mi bgyi ba dang bcas pa thams cad dang / slob pa bdun po dag gis nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams
416b1(dkon brtsegs): gang brjod pa bgyis pa de spangs pa la brten nas bya ba byas so snyam dung sa bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs bras rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'dis
416b2(dkon brtsegs): bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba ni/ dgra bcom pas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i dbang du bgyis nas/ 'di lta bu/
416b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes
416b4(dkon brtsegs): so snyam pa'i shes pa de'ang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'ang ma lags/ skye ba thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba las byung ba 'ang ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na
416b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la'ang nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa dang / skye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su ma 'tshal
416b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang mchis pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dag ni rnam pa gnyis te/ gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs
416b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa'ang rnam pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lta ba gcig la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
417a1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis ste
417a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa bzhi po de dag gis nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad skyed lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang skad cig pa ste/ sems kyi skad
417a3(dkon brtsegs): cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa de ni sems dang mi ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan
417a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das gnas kyi sa bzhi po 'di dag gi nang na stobs che ba gang lags pa de ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa/ ma rig pa'i gnas kyis stobs che ba'i grangs sam/
417a5(dkon brtsegs): cha 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ dpe 'am/ rgyur yang mi bzod pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ni stobs che ba lags te/ srid pa'i 'dod
417a6(dkon brtsegs): chags la gnas pa'i sa zhes kyang bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dper na bdud sdig can ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du gtogs kyang / 'di ltar gzugs dang /
417a7(dkon brtsegs): kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / 'khor dang / dbang phyug gis gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams zil gyis gnon to// bcom ldan 'das /
417b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ma rig pa'i gnas kyis srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis zhes bgyi bas kyang / gnas kyis bzhi po 'di dag zil gyis gnon te/ nye ba'i na
417b2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed kyi rten du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa bzhi dang yang yun ring po nas lhan cig gnas pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
417b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi shes pas mi brdzi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni stobs che ba lags so//
417b4(dkon brtsegs): / bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na len pa'i rkyen gyis zag pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i srid pa
417b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum byung ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i rkyen gyis zag pa ma mchis pa'i las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
