417b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang thob pa rnams kyi yid kyi lus gsum 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni gsum po 'di dag tu yid kyi lus gsum po 'di
417b7(dkon brtsegs): dag 'byung ba dang / bab pa ma mchis pa'i las mngon par 'grub pa'i rten lags so// bcom ldan 'das rkyen mchis na rkyen 'byung ste/ de lta lags pas ma rig pa
418a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis ni yid kyi lus gsum po rnams dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i las kyi rkyen lags pa'i slad du/ srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas tu
418a2(dkon brtsegs): sa dang ming 'dra ba lags so/ / de lta lags kyang srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / las thun mong ba ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas
418a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni gnas kyi sa bzhi po de dag las tha dad pa kho na lags te/ yongs su grol ba'i sa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sas spang bar bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye
418a4(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni gnas kyi sa bzhi spangs kyang zag pa zad
418a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la dbang ba'i stobs kyang mi 'thob/ mngon sum du'ang mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das zag pa zad pa zhes bgyi ba de ni ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i tshig bla dgas lags so//
418a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pa sa dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / srid pa tha ma par gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ma rig pa'i
418a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sas bsgribs shing chod la/ yongs su dkris te ldongs par bgyis pas/ chos de dang de dag rab tu ma 'tshal cing rtogs so// bcom ldan 'das chos de dang re dag
418b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal cing ma mthong bas spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dang de dag mi spongs shing byang bar mi bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag ma spangs shing byang bar ma
418b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pas/ bcom ldan 'das de dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi/ skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag
418b3(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon tan
418b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa lags kyi/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi/ skyon thams cad
418b5(dkon brtsegs): las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags pa dang / rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma lags pa dang / lhag ma dang
418b6(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags kyi/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal ba lhag ma dang ces pa lags
418b7(dkon brtsegs): so/ / kun 'byung ba spangs pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so// sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so// sdug bsngal 'gog
419a1(dkon brtsegs): @par 'gro ba'i lam bsgoms pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal ba ldag sa dang / bcas pa dang /
419a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba spangs pa lhag sa dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgoms
419a3(dkon brtsegs): pa lhag ma dang bcas pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de'i yan lag gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de
419a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba
419a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spangs pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyis pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgoms pa gang lags pa de dag
419a6(dkon brtsegs): ni/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pas bcom zhing / rtag tu na ba'i 'jig rten du rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / bsil ba'i dngos por mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/ bcom ldan
419a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag ni skyob pa ma mchis pa dang / skyabs ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gyi skyob pa dang skyabs lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bzang ngan du 'byed
419b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos can dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba mnyam
419b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gos mya ngan lnga 'das pa thob/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i slang du'o// bcom ldan 'das
419b3(dkon brtsegs): lta lags pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni ro gcig ste/ 'di ltar rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i ror ro mtshungs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la ngag ma rig pa'i
419b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sa ma spangs shing / byang bar ma bgyis pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su ro gcig pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar rig pa dang / 'di ltar
419b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol bar ro mtshungs pa ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pas ni spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i klung
419b6(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pa'i slang du ste/ bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed de dag ma spangs shing ma sbyangs
419b7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ chos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa steng ma thob cing / mngon sum du ma bgyis par gyur pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ ma rig pa'i
420a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis ni bsgom pas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de las na
420a2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / zhi gnas kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / lhag mthong gi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi
420a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / shes pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / 'bras bu'i nye ba'i
420a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa dang / rtogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / stobs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'ang 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das
420a5(dkon brtsegs): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi
420a6(dkon brtsegs): sa las 'byung lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad kyi rgyu dang / gzhi dang / rkyen lags so//
420a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kun nA ldang ba gang lags pa de dag ni skad cig pa ste/ sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas
420b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed
420b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyi gzhom zhing spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad kyi gzhi dang rten ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa lags so/ / bcom ldan
420b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das dper na sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci lags pa dag dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das sa la rten cing sa la gnas
420b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das sa chen po tshig cing zhig la mi ganga' bar gyur te/ ma mchis par gyur na ni sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci
420b5(dkon brtsegs): lags pa dag dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad kyang tshig cing zhig la mi gda' bar 'gyur zhing ma mchis par 'gyur lags so//
420b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams
420b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la rten cing / ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lags so// so ldan das ma rig
421a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas kyis spangs shing sbyangs te/ ma mchis par gyur na ni spang bar bgyi ba'i chos kad+hA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa ste gang dag de ban
421a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang spangs shing sbyangs te/ ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang
421a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag thams cad spangs shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed brnyed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
421a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa brnyes te/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang / thams cad gzigs pa dang / skyon thams cad spangs pa dang / yon
421a5(dkon brtsegs): tan thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po// chos kyi dbang phyug/ chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba'i sar gshegs nas/ nga'i skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyad pa
421a6(dkon brtsegs): brten to/ / bya ba byas so// 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ de bzhin gshegs
421a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi seng ge'i sgra 'di ni nges pa'i don lags te/ don 'di ni 'go gcig tu lung bstan par bgyi ba'ang lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes
421b1(dkon brtsegs): so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes la'ang rnam pa gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rgyas pa blan ma mchis pas bdud bzhi bcom ste/ pham par/
421b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad nas/ chos kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa sems can thams cad kyis blta bar bgyi ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa brnyes te/ shes byi'i sa thams cad
421b3(dkon brtsegs): la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa na 'di las lhag par bya ba'am/ rtogs par bya ba'i sa med do zhes yang dag par gzigs te/ stobs bcu po dag gi stobs
421b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhing / mi 'jigs pa'i sa bla na med pa'i mchog tu yang dag par gshes te/ shes bya thams cad la sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gzigs nas/ 'di lta bu
421b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes kyis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do/ / bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i 'dzags pa las
421b6(dkon brtsegs): rgal ba de ma thag tu rnam par grol ba dag gis bde ba nyams su myong ba rnams ni/ 'di ltar bdag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las yongs su grol gyi/ bdag gis ni phyin chad
421b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro snyam du yang dag par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes
422a1(dkon brtsegs): @so zhes bgyi ba rtogs nas dbugs phyin pa'i mchog mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la so sor rtog go/ / bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rtogs nas kyang sa de la
422a2(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bdag gis ni 'di ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i sa thob ste/ bdag bla na med
422a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to snyam du 'tshal to/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams ni theg pa chen
422a4(dkon brtsegs): po la yang dag par 'jug pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar
422a5(dkon brtsegs): na theg pa gsum po 'di dag ni theg pa gcig kho na'i grangs su mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig rtogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs
422a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bgyi ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom
422a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mthar
422b1(dkon brtsegs): ni theg pa gcig pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ chos kyi skurang gzhan ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
422b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid chos kyi sku lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig gi mtha' lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig mtha' zhes bgyi ba de ni
422b3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa gcig gi mthar sbyar ba'i tshig bla dgas lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes sa pa rnams ni dus kyi mtha' mchis pa la gnas pa ma
422b4(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pa'i spang du'o// bcom
422b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'jig rten la sman pa'i slad du/ dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs rje can dang / dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs dam mnga' ba ma
422b6(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir dus kyi mtha' med par snying rje dang ldan pa dang / rus kyi mtha' med par yi dam bcas pa'i sems can a la la zhes mchi ba dag ni bcom
422b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so/ / kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir chos mi zad pa dang / chos rtag pa dang / chos brtan pa dang / skyabs
423a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems can a la la zhes mchi ba dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ 'di ltar de/
423a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni skyabs ma mchis pa dang / skyob pa ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na phyi ma'i mthar thug par skyabs mi zad pa
423a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / skyabs rtag pa dang / skyabs brtan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das dge
423a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi tshig bla dgas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das skyabs 'di gnyis ni de'i yan lag gi skyabs zhes bgyi ste/ skyabs kyi rab ma lags
423a5(dkon brtsegs): so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyang chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i pha rol na theg pa gcig
423a6(dkon brtsegs): gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyis ni bgyi ba ci'i nga ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das theg pa gsum pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchis pa
423a7(dkon brtsegs): radang / 'byung ba'i thabs tshol ba dang / slob pa dang / bgyi ba dang bcas pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa 'gas so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar
423b1(dkon brtsegs): na skyabs 'di gnyis ni skyabs kyi rab ma lags te/ dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i skyabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas btul ba de dag ni
423b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba na/ chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la'ang skyabs su mchi ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi rgyu
423b3(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa la mngon par dad pas skyabs su mchi ba ni gnyis la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba ni chos nyid kyi rgyu
423b4(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa la mngon par dad pas mchi bar bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba ni skyabs su mchi ba yang dag pa lags so// bcom ldan
423b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das skyabs su mchi ba gnyis kyang yang dag par na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi zhes bgyi ba'i mtha' logs par khong du chud par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
423b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ skyabs gnyis kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid skyabs gsum lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
423b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gsung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
424a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mos pa ji lta ba dag la de bzhin gshegs pas theg pa gnyis po thabs kyi bsgrub pas bsgrubs pa de dag
424a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang theg pa chen po bdag nyid kyi slad du lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das theg pa 'di gnyis kyi ming ni ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par na 'di la theg pa gcig pa ni theg pa
424a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa lags te/ theg pa gsum yang yang dag par 'du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i bden pa thog mar mngon par rtogs pa'i shes
424a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig pus ni gnas kyis de snyed cig spong bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das shes pa de gcig pus yongs su 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i yon tan bzhi po rnams mngon sum du bgyid par 'gyur
424a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing / don bzhi po bdag nyid chos nyid kyis shin tu so sor rtogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa la shes pa bzhi 'pho ba dang / dmigs pa bzhi po 'pho
424a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa rdo rje lta bu ni mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'di la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
424a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi gnas kyis spong ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa dang po ni yang dag pa'i shes pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa rnam pa
424b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyi gnas kyis spong ba ni ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bam
424b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs spong ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das
424b3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad 'byed pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de ni yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa 'tshal ba dang po
424b4(dkon brtsegs): ni mthar phyin pa'i ye shes ma lags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa'i shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i don de ni nyan thos
424b5(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan tshad ma mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
424b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i yan lag gi yon tan dang ldan pa'i slad du/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'phags pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi ba de
424b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa ma lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan ma lags te/ bden pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs
425a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thog mar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / mngon par mkhyen la/ so sor rtog/
425a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de mngon par mkhyen pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs su bcug pa'i 'jig rten la bstan cing btags te/ de'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden
425a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams zhes bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa ni zab cing phra la brtag par bya ba ma yin la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag mi nus la/
425a4(dkon brtsegs): rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags te/ mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das zab mo bstan pa
425a5(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa 'od ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lags te/ nyan thos dang
425a6(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa 'di'i gnas lags so//
425a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i gnas zab pas na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don yang zab cing phra la brtags pa ste/ rtogs par dka' zhing brtag
425b1(dkon brtsegs): mi nus la/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags te/ mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa zhes bgyi ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gang nyon
425b2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs kyi mthas dkris pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la the tsom ma mchis pa de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs nas rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin
425b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la'ang the tsom ma mchis pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang gi yid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang /
425b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dgongs pa'i mthar phyin pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa 'di gnyis la yid ches
425b5(dkon brtsegs): shing dad de mos pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis ni rig par dka' zhing / rtogs par dka' ba lags so//
425b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba mchis pa dang / bgyi ba ma mchis pa
425b7(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das re la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba mchis pa ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa dang btags pa tshang mchis pa
426a1(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / de ci'i spang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis bgying du lhal kyang sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'dral ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung /
426a2(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad spang ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgom par mi nus te/ bcom ldan
426a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das de lta lags pas 'khor ba la'ang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa mchis so/ / mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
426a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa dang btags pa dag dpag tu ma mchis pa
426a5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyis btsal la kyang zin pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams
426a6(dkon brtsegs): cad spang ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgom par nus pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan
426a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa bshad pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de
426b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bstan par gyi ba ma mchis pa bzhi po dag la rdzogs par mdzad pa
426b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rdzogs par bgyid pa ma lags so// de cir slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rab 'bring tha ma'i chos rtogs pas mya
426b3(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rtogs pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
426b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i don bshad pa bgyi ba ma mchis pa dag la rdzogs par mdzad pa lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
426b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni yongs su mkhyen/ bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
426b6(dkon brtsegs): cad 'du ba'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad ni spangs/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi phung po thams cad 'gog par sdug bsngal thams cad 'gog pa ni mngon sum du mdzad de/ bcom
426b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa ni chos chung gson pa ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa
427a1(dkon brtsegs): ma bgyis pa/ ma skyes pa/ mings pa/ bas pa ma mchis pa/ rtag pa/ brtan pa/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi
427a2(dkon brtsegs): sbubs nas nges par grol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas pa/ grol bas shes pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed dang ldan pa ni//
427a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i ming gis bstan pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa'i sbubs nas nges par grol ba
427a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po shes pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni
427a5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sngon ma mthong / ma rtogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das
427a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa ni 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs
427a7(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyi sbubs dang tha dad du gnas pa ma grol bas shes pa rnams kyis stong pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po sangs rgyas kyi chos tha
427b1(dkon brtsegs): dang du mi gnas shing grol bas shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyer dag gis mi stong pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/
427b2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid shes pa rnam pa 'di gnyis la nyan thos chen po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid la yid ches pas 'jug par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
427b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi stong pa nyid shes pa ni phyin ci log gi dmigs pa bzhi po dag la 'jug lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sdu/
427b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'gog pa thams cad sngon ma mthong / sngon ma rtogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do// nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad
427b5(dkon brtsegs): 'joms pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad kyang bsgoms so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag la bden pa gsum ni mi rtag pa
427b6(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bden pa gcig ni rtag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsum ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du gtogs pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das
427b7(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du gtogs pa de ni mi rtag pa lags so/ / gang mi rtag pa de ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can
428a1(dkon brtsegs): / den mi bden pa dang / mi rtag pa lags te/ skyabs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ 'phag sa pa'i sdug bsngal bden pa dang / sdug bsngal
428a2(dkon brtsegs): kun 'byung ba bden pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'ang yang dag par na mi bden pa dang mi rtag pa lags te/ skyabs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di
428a3(dkon brtsegs): la bden pa gcig ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa de ni rtag pa lags so// gang rtag pa de
428a4(dkon brtsegs): ni mi slu ba'i chos can lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang mi slu ba'i chos can de ni bden pa dang / rtag pa dang / skyabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ 'di la
428a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa nyid ni yang dag par na bden pa dang / rtag pa dang / skyabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul
428a6(dkon brtsegs): las 'dra ba sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i spyod yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper
428a7(dkon brtsegs): na dmus long gzugs la lta mi nus pa dang / bu btsa' ba'i gnas na mchis pa'i byis pa dgung bdun lags pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la lta mi nus pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan
428b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa'ang byis pa me sor skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul yang ma lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyal thams cad kyi shes pa'i yul
428b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni mtha' gnyis la lta ba'i phyin ci log pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas lags so//
428b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni shes pa dag pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das mtha' gnyis su lta ba zhes
428b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rtog ge pa dag gi tshig bla dgas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di gnyis ni mthar
428b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba zhes bgyi ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'du byed rnams la ni rtag par lta na// de ni
428b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i chad par lta ba ma lags te/ de ni de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te mya ngan las 'das pa la rtag par lta na/ de ni de'i rtag par lta
428b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma lags te/ de ni de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rtog ge pa dag gi lta ba ni 'di lta bu lags te/ lus dang
429a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / tshor ba dang / sems pa rnams tshe 'di nyid la 'jig par mthong nas/ srid pa'i mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par mi bgyid cing ma 'tshal bar ljongs
429a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa skad de chad par lta bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das rtog ge pa dag gi lta ba ni sems kyi rgyud la rmongs shing / sems kyi skad cig 'jig pa la'ang 'jug par mi bgyid
429a3(dkon brtsegs): la/ rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa skad de rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar rtog ge pa dag gi lta ba ni de lta bu dag lags pa skad de/ de dag ni don
429a4(dkon brtsegs): de las thal ba'i lta ba dang / don de'i tha chad kyi lta ba dang / gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang 'dres pa'i lta bas chad par rlom sems bgyid pa dang / rtag par rlom sems bgyid pa lags so// /
429a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ni zin pa'i phung po lnga po dag la phyin ci log par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal
429a6(dkon brtsegs): ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das thams cad
429a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa dag pas kyang sngon ma mthong lags so// bcom
429b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gtsang bar 'du shes pa'i
429b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba can du 'gyur ba lags so// de ci'i slad du
429b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nyid rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // gtsang
429b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la de ltar mthong ba de dag ni yang dag par mthong ba lags so//
429b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mthong ba gang lags pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thugs las skyes pa dang / zhal nas skyes pa dang / chos las skyes pa dang / chos kyis
429b6(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa dang / chos kyi sgo skal la spyod pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das shes pa dag pa zhes bgyi ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
429b7(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ 'di ltar shes pa dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni shes pa dag pa de'i spyod yul yang ma lags/ yul yang ma lags na
430a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa rton pa bzhi'i shes pa can dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing / yul ma lags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal
430a2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa gsum pa'i las dang po pa rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can dag gis don khong du chud par 'gyur zhing / don de rtogs par 'gyur
430a3(dkon brtsegs): paba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rton pa bzhi bshad cing btags pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rton pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das rton pa
430a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni rton pa thams cad kyi mchog dang 'jig rten las 'das pa lags te/ de ni yang dag par ston par bgyi ba dang skyabs lags so// /
430a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhini gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'khor ba na rton pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid kyi dbang du bgyis nA sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi
430a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' med do zhes bshad cing btags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchos na/ 'khor ba zhes mchin ni tshig de rigs pa lags so// bcom ldan
430a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'khor ba zhes bgyi ba ni zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams 'phos ma thag tu zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams len pa la 'khor ba zhes bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho dang
430b1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba zhes bgyi bar chos gnyis kyi ming de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshig tha dgas lanas so/ / bcom ldan 'das thamams bkyi ba dang / skyes zhes bgyi ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi sa//
430b2(dkon brtsegs): skad lags so// bcom ldan 'das gum zhes bgyi ba ni dbang po 'gag pa 'di legs so// bcom ldan 'das skye zhes bgyi ba ni dbang po gsar pa rnams byung ba 'di lags te
430b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la ni skye ba 'am/ 'gum pa 'am/ 'pho ba 'am/ 'byung ba'ang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni
430b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang // ther zug pa lags so// bcom
430b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni tha dad du mi gnas shing 'brel la sbubs nas grol ba'i shes pa can dag gi gzhi dang / rten dang / gnas lags so
430b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'brel pa ma mchis shing tha dad du gnas la shes pa grol ba ma lags pa/ phyi rol gyi 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi
430b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhi dang / rten dang / gnas kyang lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma mchis na ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod
431a1(dkon brtsegs): cing don du gnyer ba dang / smon pa'ang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa drug po gang lags pa 'di dag dang
431a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa gang lags pa 'di dag dang / / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bdun po 'di dag ni mi gnas pa dang / skad cig pa dang / sdug bsngal rnams myong ba lags pas/ chos de
431a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang / smon par mi rigs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni thog ma
431a4(dkon brtsegs): dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i mthar mchis pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag pa'i chos can sdug bsngal myong ba lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni
431a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal la'ang skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang / smon par 'os so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'ang bdag ma
431a6(dkon brtsegs): lags/ sems can ma lags// srog ma lags// gang zag ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni sems can 'jigs tshogs la lta bar lhung ba
431a7(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / phyin ci log gis nyams par gyur pa dag dang / stong pa nyid las sems g.yengs pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
431b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i snying po 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po lags so/ / chos kyi sku'i snying po lags so// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snying po lags so// rang bzhin gyis yongs
431b2(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa'i chos kyi snying po lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mong bas nye bar nyon mongs pa 'di ni
431b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/ bsam gyis mi khyab po snyam bdag bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na// bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i sems ni skad cig pa ste/ nyon mongs pa
431b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das mi dge ba'i sems kyang skad cig pa ste/ sems de'ang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kur nas nyon mongs pa ma lags
431b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems la mi reg/ sems kyang nyon mongs pa rnams la mi reg pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la ji ltar sems
431b6(dkon brtsegs): mi reg pa'i chos can nye bar nyon mongs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'ang mchos la/ sems nye bar nyon mongs pa'ang mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das
431b7(dkon brtsegs): sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni khong du chud par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spun du gyur pa lags te//
432a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes su gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni mnga' bdag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lags
432a2(dkon brtsegs): so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 'phreng gis rtogs par dka' ba'i don bshad pa gsan nas/ rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/ lha mo de de bzhin no// lha mo de de bzhin te/
432a3(dkon brtsegs): sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni rtogs par dka' 'o// lha mo chos 'di gnyis ni rtogs par dka' ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ sems rang bzhin gyis
432a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa rtogs par dka' ba dang / sems de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rtogs par dka' ba'o// lha mo chos 'di gnyis nyan nus pa ni khyod dam/ byang chub sems dpa' chos chen
432a5(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pa gzhan dag yin no/ / lha mo lhag mnyan thos rnams ni chos 'di gnyis la de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas 'gro bar zad de/ lha mo nga'i nyan thos gang dag dang pa
432a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag ni dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas/ chos dang mthun par sdud pa'i shes pas 'di la nges par 'gyur ro// lha mo chos dang mthun par
432a7(dkon brtsegs): sdud pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha mo dbang po'i rnam par rig pa yid kyi spyod yul la rnam par lta ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par lta ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams
432b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnyid la rnam par lta ba dang / sems la dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi bsam gtan la dga' ba dang / bde ba la rnam par lta ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa
432b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul la rnam par lta ba ste/ lha mo rnam par lta ba'i rang bzhin rnam pa lnga la mkhas pa 'di dang ldan na/ lha mo da ltar dang nga 'das pa'i 'og ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nga'i nyan thos dad pa dang
432b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas/ chos dang mthun par sdud pa'i shes pas rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang / sems kyi nye bar nyon mongs pa la de
432b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ / lha mo de dag gi nges pa de nyid ni theg pa chen po'i lam du 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/ lha mo de ltar na 'di lta ste/ chos zab mo mi spong ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas
432b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ni phan pa mang ba yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la sman pa mang ba'i don bshad pa gzhan yang de
432b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag spobs so/ / bcom ldam 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpar
432b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos zab mo dag la ma smas ma nyams par bdag nyid la srung ba dang /
433a1(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyang mang du skyed pa dang / theg pa chen po'i lam du'ang zhugs par 'gyur ba lags so// gsum gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am//
433a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo gang dag rang gis rig pa'i chos zab mo dang ldan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos dang mthun par sdud pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa
433a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid kyi shes pa zhum par 'tshal nas/ 'di ni bdag gis mi shes te/ don 'di ni de bzhin
433a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen par zad do zhes bcom ldan 'das la sems rnam par gtod par bgyid de/ sems rnam par gtod pa de dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gsum
433a5(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos brab mo dag la ma smas ma nyams par bdag nyid la srung ba dang / bsod rnams kyang mang du skyed pa dang / theg pa chen po'i lam du'ang
433a6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par 'gyur ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gsum po 'di dag las gzhan pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag ni chos zab mo dag la
433a7(dkon brtsegs): nan tan gyis mchog tu bzung nas/ gob lob kyi sems 'dzin cing mngon par zhen te/ ston par bgyid/ kun tu smra bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de dag la dam pa'i
433b1(dkon brtsegs): chos la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / sa bon rul ba lags te/ rgyal po'i thad du'ang mchis la/ brlag par bgyi'o zhes mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das sa
433b2(dkon brtsegs): bon rul bar gyur pa de dag ni lha dang / mi deng / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par tshar gcad par bgyi ba lags so// de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis de skad
433b3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal 'phreng la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo khyad
433b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis du sa dang skabs su chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid yang dag par bsrung ba'i thabs kyi don bstan pa bshad pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi dgra tshar gcad pa bshad pa legs so
433b5(dkon brtsegs): legs so/ / lha mo khyod ni sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin pas/ khyod kyis don bshad pa 'di las ngo mtshar che ba med do// de nas
433b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus la 'od kyis khyab par mdzad nas/ ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags de/ zhabs kyi
433b7(dkon brtsegs): gom pa 'dor ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer ga la ba der gshegs so/ / de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng 'khor dang bcas pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas blta ba
434a1(dkon brtsegs): chog mi shes shing mig mi 'dzum par lta bas/ bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mig rgyang gis mi slebs par
434a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de'i tshe/ lha mo dpal 'phreng 'khor dang bcas pa mchog tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i bzhin dang ldan pas// gcig gis gcig gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams
434a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa du mar bsngags shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa ma brjed bzhin du grong khyer 'thab med du dong ngo / / de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng gis rang gi khyim thabs rgyal po grags
434a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bshes gnyen theg pa chen po la nges par bcug go/ / grong khyer chen po'i bud med kyi tshogs bu mo lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud do// rgyal po grags
434a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa'i 'khor khye'u lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud par gyur te/ de ltar zong khyer pa thams cad theg
434a6(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po la mngon du phyogs par byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon te/ nang du gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la'ang bka'
434a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal cing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la'ang dgongs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan
434b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par bstan te//
434b2(dkon brtsegs): ko'u shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis zung zhig/ ko'u shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la shod cig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rnam
434b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di zung zhig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la shod cig/ de nas bcom
434b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
434b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan te/ ko'u shi ka nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mdo 'di'i don thams cad
434b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lus par shes pa 'am/ blta ba 'am/ nye bar brtag par mi nus na/ sems can gzhan dag gis lta ci smos/ ko'u shi ka de de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zab la yon
434b7(dkon brtsegs): tan chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no/ / ko'u shi ka de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan gyi ming yongs su brjod pa tsam zhig bshad kyis/ de legs par rab tu nyon la
435a1(dkon brtsegs): yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/
435a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa yang
435a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par bstod pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ ko'u shi ka 'di ni yi dam chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ smon lam thams cad sdud pa smon lam chen
435a4(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba bstan pa
435a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa brgyad bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ chos kyi sku
435a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ stong pa nyid kyi don gyi dgongs pa yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bden pa gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig
435a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa dang / skyabs gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ phyin ci log gis bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rang
435b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su dag pa'i sems la dgongs pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ ko'u shi ka 'di ni
435b2(dkon brtsegs): lha mo dpal 'phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ ko'u shi ka mdo 'dir bstan pa gang dag bshad pa de dag thams cad ni/ rgyu ba bcad pa dang / nges pa'i don dang / rton pa
435b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ ko'u shi ka lha mo dpal 'phreng gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngas khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyi/ 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas
435b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad du yang dag par sgrogs shig/ ston cig/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol to//
435b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung zhing kun chub par byas nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gzhan yang gang der 'dus
435b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon
435b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa lha mo dpal 'phreng gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa
436a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs so/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na si tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab /
436a2(dkon brtsegs): sh+lo ka drug brgya'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya byA sa pa ri prits+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa drang srong rgyas pas zhus
436a3(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
436a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram/ brgal bar bya ba ma yin pa/ khu byug dang / ne tse dang / bung ba dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po dang / bya'i tshogs du ma sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ shing
436a5(dkon brtsegs): p+lag sha dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / tsan dan dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / sa la ka'i yal gas bskyabs pa/ rtag tu me tog dri zhim pos sil ma bkram pa de na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po/
436a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rdul zad pa/ chos las mi zlog pa/ bsam gtan dang kha ton la gnas pa// 'chag sa dang khri'i steng na 'dug pa/ dang pa'i
436a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ltar sa phyogs de mdzes par byed pa sha stag la/ kha cig ni nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa/ kha cig ni shing drung na gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' kun bgro bar byed pa
436b1(dkon brtsegs): cha byad dul zhing brtan pa/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/ 'dod pa la 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / le lo dang bral ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/
436b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sbyin pa byin cig/ bya ba gang yin pa gyis shig/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams shing / dbang po sbas
436b3(dkon brtsegs): la yid zhi bar gnas par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / shA ri'i bu dang /
436b4(dkon brtsegs): bku la dang / nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u do n+ya dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar
436b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i gtam mdzad do/ / de'i tshe nub phyogs logs na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan
436b6(dkon brtsegs): babadas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs logs na 'bar zhing snang ba zhugs kyi 'od zer lta bur gda' ba 'di ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang
436b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo 'di ni dri nag ma'i bu drang srong 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa
437a1(dkon brtsegs): drang srong rnams kyi mchog/ drang srong rgyas pa zhes bya ste/ drang srong dka' thub drag po la gnas pa/ bsnyen par gnas pa brgyad stong gis nub pa/ lus kyi mdzes
437a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa lnga brgya tsam phyi bzhin du 'brang ba la/ drang srong dkar min gzhon nu dang / mi lA dang / rnam par bde srung gi bu dang / ri dgas mo'i bu dang / sgra byed kyi bu dang / phur
437a3(dkon brtsegs): bu rna dang / me'i bu dang / rnam par rko'i bu dang / bsten par dka' dang / de la sogs pas yongs su bskor nas rjes su 'chag pa'o// de nas de'i bar skabs
437a4(dkon brtsegs): su rgyas pas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ bsam gtan dben pa la dgyes pa// shing ljon pa stug po'i
437a5(dkon brtsegs): nang na bzhugs pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang rgyas pa 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o ma la ngo mtshar te/ 'di bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ phyin ci ma log
437a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gsung ba zhes 'jig rten du grags pa ni gnas yin no/ / ji ltar kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan zhing rmad du byung ba'i gzugs rgya chen po phun sum tshogs pa las na// 'di
437a7(dkon brtsegs): gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gzugs rgya chen po 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug gi bdag po drug dang
437b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa bzhan du spangs te/ bud med rin po chos 'tsho ma la sogs pa bud med drug stong yang spangs nas/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal gyi nang du gshegs te bzhugs pa 'di ni/
437b2(dkon brtsegs): kye mapo 'jig rten na ngo mtshar rmad du 'byung ba'o snyam du sems so// de nas drang srong mes sbyin gyi bus kyang rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // mthong
437b3(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
437b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod do/ / shing ljon dag gi khrod 'dug cing / btso ma'i gser ltar ser bar snang / gzugs ni shin tu 'bar ba ste/ skye bo kun gyi dga' ba skyed// bai dUR+Ya ni dri
437b5(dkon brtsegs): med brag/ stug nang ri rab rtse gcig 'phags// ston gyi nyi ma rab lhan ltar// dpal gzugs 'bar ba 'di su zhig/ de nas drang srong chen po de dag thams cad dga' ste/ mig phye
437b6(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgra 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i dring
437b7(dkon brtsegs): srong me'i phung po ltar 'bar ba/ ral pa'i cod pan can// rgas pa/ rab tu rke ba/ zas mi za zhing bsten par gnas pa// shing shun dang g.yang gzhi gyon pa/ thal bas
438a1(dkon brtsegs): byugs pa/ thang dang brag khrod na gnas pa/ bkres bkres ltar 'dug pa/ rlung 'gam pa/ zla ba phyed bsten gnas byas pa/ yan lag skem pa/ gcer du/
438a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shing shun gyon pa/ ag tsom dang / sen mo dang / s+phu ring ba/ bung ba'i kha dog lta bu/ dka' thub kyi nor can/ bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / bsrung ba dang
438a3(dkon brtsegs): bkra shis pa byas pa/ sa dang / bla gab med pa dang / shing drung na gnas pa/ rkang pa gyen du bsgreng ba/ tsog tsog por 'dug pa/ chu'i nang du 'dug pa/ me ma dag 'bar ba dang
438a4(dkon brtsegs): bsreg me rab tu 'bar ba dang / nyi mas lus shin tu gdungs pa/ dka' thub drag pos yongs su bskor ba/ bab bab tu gnas pa/ rigs tsam gyis yongs su dga' ba/ bla na
438a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i ye shes dang bral ba de dag la ltos/ dge slong dag drang srong chen po 'di dag ni 'khor ba las 'byung ba mi shes pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni 'dod pa dang rgyags pas myos pa//
438a6(dkon brtsegs): yang srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa/ lta ba'i rgyu ba yongs su ma dag pa sha stag go/ de nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems zag pa nas skyabs su dong nas 'di skad
438a7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni tshangs par spyod pa'i tshogs sgrub pa ste/ de'i slad du bdag cag srid par skye ba mi 'dzin to// de nas drang srong chen
438b1(dkon brtsegs): po rgyas pas/ drang srong chen po de dag gi sems dang mi 'jigs pa dman zhing // lta ba dman par khad kyis khad kyis brtags nas gus pa skyes te/ zhe sa dang bcas par drang srong gi
438b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi sa yongs su bskor nas/ / ral pa mang po brdzes te/ mchod phyir thogs thogs pa/ sngo bsangs po/ mig gnyis ser ba/ skra rtsub cing grugs pa// lag na dbyug gu gsum
438b3(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa/ gzugs rab tu mi sdug pa dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i ngos la 'gro ba/ gtam sna tshogs kyi gtan tshogs dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
438b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / 'khor 'di ni kun tu rmongs pa ste/ 'di na gnas lags na/ bdag 'di ri mchis par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen par mdzad du gsol//

438b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ gsal ba/ zur phyin pa/ zhi ba/ mkhas pa/ blo dang /

439a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis rgyas pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su ma grol ba lags na/ dka' thub drag po
439a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyon mongs pa rnyed pa 'dis ci zhig thob/ dgra bcom pa de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyas pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das la gtam gang bdag med pa'i gtam mam/ sprin
439a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang tshul khrims dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam mam/ ci'i rgyud nga rkyen gyi gtam zhig zhu snyam mo// de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cem

439a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bdag la skabs bye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces
439a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po khyod cing ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de de lta de ltar lung brta
439b1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sbyin pa sbyin par bgyi/ sbyin pa ma lags pa'i don gang lags/
439b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i don gang lags/ sbyin bdag ji ltar rab tu 'tshal bar bgyi/ ji ltar na gtong ba por 'gyur/ ji ltar na sprin bdag lags la gtong ba po ma lags/ ji ltar na sbyin
439b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag sbyin pa'i mthar 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ spungs par gnas pa 'am/ brtsegs par gnas pa'am/ ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ ji ltar na sbyin bdag len pa la mi gnas par sbyin
439b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sbyin pa lags/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa lags/ bsod nams de'i rnam par smi
439b5(dkon brtsegs): pabapa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur pa gang lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas
439b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / drang srong chen po sems dang po bskyed pa'i gtam khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rtsing ngo // de nas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu smin ma
439b7(dkon brtsegs): ring ba/ gter ma can/ mgo skya bos lag pa g.yas pas smin ma gzar nas/ mig pags bteg ste bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong chen po rgyas pa 'di 'dzam
440a1(dkon brtsegs): rten na grags pa yin na/ gtan tshigs kyi rig pa mi shes pa'i byis pa rogs rgod lta bur mkhas pa'i blo med de/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi gtam spangs shing / bdag med pa'i
440a2(dkon brtsegs): gtam bor la/ / lha yul pa'i rgyu'i gtam btang ste/ ci'i phyir sbyin pa'i gtam nyid zhus par gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
