459b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod can gyi lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs mi gnas so/ / drang srong chen po skyed mos tshal dam pa shi ri sha ka de na me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa mang po las rtag tu lha'i gtam brjod pa'i
459b5(dkon brtsegs): sgro 'byung ngo / / drang srong chen po de na nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa'i gnas brtan pa lang bdag bram ze'i rigs su skyes pa bsam gtan la gnas pa/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
459b6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'dug go// drang srong chen po de zhag bdun gyi bar du dbugs phyi nang du mi rgyu'o// rang srong chen po de byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
459b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe 'dod na rlung mi ldang ngo / / drang srong chen po sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshes me lce gcig tu gyur pa na'ang de'i lus yungs 'bru tsam yang tshig par mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshigs kyis ri'i rgyal por rab kyang
460a1(dkon brtsegs): phigs so/ / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo stobs che ba/ cher gdug pa'i shugs can/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbugs kyis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'jig pa/ rgya mtsho chen po
460a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'ang skam par byed pa/ gtsum zhing cher gdug pa'i shugs can/ klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kyang / dge slong ba lang bdag de'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus gdug pa med par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen
460a3(dkon brtsegs): po gnas brtan pa lang bdag skyed mos tshal shi ri sha ka na gnas shing bsam gtan la 'dug par lha gzhon nu de dag dang lha'i bu mo de dag gis mthong nas gus pa dang bcas/ ri mo dang
460a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pas gnas brtan de la dga' ba dang dad pa skyes nas/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / dri mchog
460a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / pad+ma dkar pos gtor nas thal mo sbyar ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis gnas brtan pa lang bdag la yongs su skor te mchod pa chen po byas nas mdun
460a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis bltas te gnas nas/ lha'i zas bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pas tshim par byed cing ci bder byed do// gnas brtan pa lang bdag de lha'i bu de dag la chos ston pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs
460a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu
460b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / 'dul ba'i sde dang / mdo sngo'i lung gi phyogs yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de dag dga' ba dang dad pa skyed do// de lha'i skyed mos tshal de na bsam
460b2(dkon brtsegs): gtan la gnas te/ thams cad bde ba dang ldan par skyed mos tshal shi ri sha ka na rten cing gnas so// drang srong chen po gzhan yang sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris de na lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang zhes
460b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yod de/ de'i ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po las byas pa/ tsan dan mchog shing gi snying po la sogs pa/ dril bu g.yer ka sgra snyan pa'i dra bas
460b4(dkon brtsegs): khebs par byas pa/ sa phyogs gser gyi bye ma brdal ba'o// lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs lha'i ras rab tu spangs pa/ rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba da ma bsgreng ba/ lha'i rol mo khong hu dang /
460b5(dkon brtsegs): pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga pa ta ha dang / lcags kyi sil khrol dang / dung dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa rab tu sgrogs pa/ gzha dang / sil khrol dang / ca co'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa
460b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / khu byug gnas shing phan tshun nas sgra 'byin pa de na lha dang lha mo de dag dga' ba dang bde ba skye ba'i bzhin gyis gnas so// drang srong
460b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs de'i sa'i ngos nor bu rin po ches rab tu spras pa/ ljang khus byugs pas mdog snam zhing bai DUR+Ya ltar dri ma med de/ me long gi ngos lta bur byas pa/
461a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'jam pa na spos kyi phye ma dang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 'thor ba/ rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrul gyi nyes pa yongs su spadras pa/ ngang gis
461a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyid dang / snyoms pa dang / le lo rnam par spangs pa// mthongs khung dang skar khung zla gam lta bu'i dra ba'i bu ga nas reg na bde ba'i rlung gtong ba/ rta babs dang / yang tog dang / yang tog chung ngu nas
461a3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i rlung gtong ba/ rin po che 'phreng ba bres pa'i sgras rtag tu mdzes par byas pa/ dri rab tu zhim par 'byung ba'i spos dang me tog gi sil ma 'thor ba// yid du 'ong ba/ bzhin zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / me 'o/
461a4(dkon brtsegs): gi dkyil 'khor lta bu lha'i khyad par gyis gzugs rab tu brgyan pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gnas te/ drang srong chen po lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de na lha'i bu mo rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sgrogs so// lha'i 'dun
461a5(dkon brtsegs): sa chos bzang de ni gru bzhi lham pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ ngos yangs pa/ shing ljon pa dang / skyed mos tshal dang / nags dang / nags tshal gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/
461a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyar kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya yod pa/ gser ra ngul bkram pa/ me tog sil ma bkram pa/ glu dbyangs kyi sgra 'byung ba/ pad+ma dang shing yongs 'dus brtol gyis mdzes par byas pa'o/
461a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de ni yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po las byas pa// rin po che'i phung po yongs su bzung ba/
461b1(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi snying pos kun tu khyab pa/ ri rnam pa du mas nye bar bskor cing / sna tshogs rnam par bku bas mdzes par byas pa/ ngos skyed mos tshal brgya stong gis mdzes par byas pa ste/ sum cu rtsa
461b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi lha mya ngan dang nad kyi rnam pa'i nyes pa las grol ba dag skyed mos tshal mchog tu dga' 'dun myong nas/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang der 'dus te rtse ba rjes su myong ngo // drang song chen po sum
461b3(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris de ni blta na sdug ces bya ba'i gzhal med khang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / me long gi ngos ltar dri ma med pa/ dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos dang me tog gis mdzes par byas pa/ 'phre
461b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang byug pas bres pas mdzes par byas pa/ bud med brgya stong gis mdzes par byas pa/ 'dze zhing sgeg pa// mig zur gyis lta zhing / khro gnyer gyi rim pa g.yo ba'i cha byad can 'khod pa/ ngos me tog
461b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs phal po ches mdzes par byas pa/ nor bu'i skang nul byas pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pas mdzes par byas pa/ rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta'i rmig pas reg na gser gyi rdul
461b6(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba dang / cod pan chags shing 'byor pas mdzes par byas pa yod do// drang srong chen po blta na sdug ces bya ba'i gzhal med khang de la ka ba drug khri yod de/ ka zhu lnga'i gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas
461b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / sna tshogs kyi 'phras rnam par spras pa/ shing ta ma la'i lo ma dang / a ka ru dang / bdug pa'i 'phreng ba dri rab tu zhim par byas pa'i khyad par can no// gzhal med khang de na lha'i dbang po brgya
462a1(dkon brtsegs): byin gnas te/ lha'i bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba/ gser dang rdo rje'i myu gus lus mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i 'dod pa la rtse ba rjes su myong ba/ glang po che dgu khri'i stob dang ldanapa
462a2(dkon brtsegs): lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu mdog gser dri ma med pa ltar ser ba/ lus grims pa/ ro stod seng ge 'dra ba// rna cha dri med pa 'gul bas lus snang bar byas pa/ gos mchog tu phra la ring zhing nar ba/ dbang po'i
462a3(dkon brtsegs): brda sprod pa 'don cing / bstan bcos shes shing mabs pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong du ma rjes su 'brang zhing / lha'i gser gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na rgyu ba/ gser gyi skud pa dang / se mo do dang / rdo shal gyis
462a4(dkon brtsegs): brang brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa/ ha cang 'tsho ba'ang ma yin/ ha cang rid pa'ang ma yin pa/ rkang pa shin tu gnas pa/ bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa'i kha zas za ba/ mkhur tshes bud med brgya stong gis zur gyis
462a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang ldan pa/ glang po ches srungs kyi bu rgyags pa'i rna ba'i rlung gis sgra phyung ba ste/ drang srong chen po lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i lus la rus pa med do// de'i lus la nad thams cad med de/ dri rab tu
462a6(dkon brtsegs): zhim pa dang ldan la/ gdangs shin tu snyan cong 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang ldan no// lha'i rgyal po de'i lus kyi dris phog na/ spos kyi glang po che rab tu rgyags shing bdo ba'ang rgyags pa yongs su 'bri bar 'gyur ro//
462a7(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po lha'i dbang po de'i lus kyi tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad tsam mo// de'i gzugs che ba gser gyi gzugs lta bu de mthong nas/ 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyang de'i gan du 'dong ste/ lha'i dbang
462b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra'o zhes brjod do/ / de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas dbang po'i lus kyi tshad thos nas ngo mtshar du 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa
462b2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po dbang po chen po'i lus chung ngu mi rtag pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/ gar mkhan gyi cha byad lta bur shin tu spras pa/ glegs shing gi las dang / shing gi las dang / 'khrul 'khor gyi las lta bur byas pa/ me tog gi
462b3(dkon brtsegs): las lta bur yud tsam zhig mdzes pa/ me long gi nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu la khyod ci'i phyir ngo mtshar du byed/ drang srong chen po khyod dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus pa dang ma las skyes pa'i tshigs tshigs
462b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshams mtshams re re la'ang dbang po chen po 'dun par 'gyur ba la ltos/ drang srong chen po gzhan yang dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus la rdzu 'phrul gyi sgyu ma la da ltos/ de nas dge slong ma 'gags da bcom
462b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bskul bar shes nas/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus dge slong ma 'gags pa lha'i gsar 'bar ba dang / byu ru'i sdong po'i kha dog mchog dang ldan pa/ gtsug gi
462b6(dkon brtsegs): nor bu dang / cod pan 'phyang ba'i gtsug phud dang ldan pa/ mkhur ba rgyas shing mdangs sdum pa'i mdog can/ mig lha'i ut+pa la sngon po 'dra la/ nor bu dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang ldan pa'i klu'i rgyal po lta bur
462b7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu snang ste/ de'i gzugs chen por mngon par grub pa'i lha'i dri dang gzugs kyis 'khor thams cad la snang bar byas nas/ ngo mtshar dang dga' bar gyur te/ dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang ldan par gyur to// de'i
463a1(dkon brtsegs): che 'phrul de drang srong chen po rgyas pas mthong nas/ snying 'phar zhing stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur pas sgra cher kye a la la legs so// gang gi phyir bdag de bzhin
463a2(dkon brtsegs): gshes pa dang phrad cing 'dus la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo nas 'di lta bu sngon ma mthong ba'i cho 'phrul mthong ba'i mi nyid thob pa bdag don mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka'
463a3(dkon brtsegs): stsal to/ / drang srong 'di ji snyam du sems// dbang po chen po'i lus dang / gang 'di dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus gser 'bar ba dang / nor bu mchog las grub pa 'di gnyis gang bzang / de skad ces bka
463a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus de la dbang po chen po'i lus kyis brgya'i char yang nye
463a5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi mchi/ stong gi cha'am/ brgya stong gi cha'am/ grangs sam/ char ram/ grang bar ram/ dper yang mi bzod do// drang srong chen po bsod nams las bsgrubs pa'i lus la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa'i khyad
463a6(dkon brtsegs): par ni de ltar blta'o/ / drang srong chen po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ri si de na/ brgya byin gyi chung ma'i dam pa bde sogs zhes bya ba lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing / dga' tshal na 'dug ste/ lus spos dang /
463a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba dang / me tog gis brgyan cing 'bar ba/ lha'i me tog pad+ma dang ut+pal dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang ldan pa/ ma chu gser dang bis pa 'dra ba/ mchog tu 'bar ba'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ gos mchog tu phra la 'tsher
463b1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ skyed mos tshal dang / nags na rgyu ba/ lha'i rgyan dang / rkang gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu sgril ma dang / do shal dang / se mo ngos lus dud pa/ 'phral ba dang mabur ba che la shin tu rnam par phye ga/ nor/
463b2(dkon brtsegs): bu dang gi bar shin tu rnam par phye ba'i ska rags kyis bcings pa/ 'dze zhing sgeg pa'i rjes su chags pa/ mi ring zhing phye la 'jam pa/ lag pa'i nang ri mo ring pos khyab pa/ lte ba zab pa/ khro ba dang / ser sna dang / phrag
463b3(dkon brtsegs): dog dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa'i nyes pa spangs pa/ bzhin khro gnyer gyi rim pa g.yo ba dang bral ba/ mngal 'dzin pa'i skyon rnam par spangs pa'i lus dang ldan pa'o// lha'i bu mo bde sogs zhes bya ba de shin tu 'dod pa
463b4(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa las byung ba'i sgra pa/ ri rab la yod pa'i gzhal med khang dang / shing gel ba dang / 'khri shing gi bla res khebs par byas pa las byung ba'i 'dod pa skyes pas byung ba/ me tog 'thor ba dang bcas pa'i rlung
463b5(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba/ ha cang ring ba'ang a yin/ ha cang thung ba'ang ma yin pa/ dku ha cang sbom pa'ang ma yin/ ha cang phra ba'ang ma yin pa/ lus ha cang sbom pa'ang ma yin/ ha cang phra ba'ang ma yin ra/ bzhin mdangs can/
463b6(dkon brtsegs): gtsang zhing mdzes pa/ pad+ma 'dod pa/ dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri'i dang rlung gis bdas pa/ rmad du byung bas mdzes par byas pa'o// drang srong chen po de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha de dag ni nad med pa/ rims
463b7(dkon brtsegs): nad med pa/ skyed mos tshal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi nang na gnas shing rgyu ba'o// de dag gi tshe naM lha'i lo stong thub bo// de dag lha'i gnas de na gnas pa las/ bsod nams za ma
464a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe zad par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ shing pho ba'i ltas sngon ma byung ba lnga 'byung ste/ rdzing bu shel rdo lta bur gsal ba/ reg na bde ba'i rlung ldang ba/ rdzing bu'i 'gram 'khri shing gi bla re dang / shing
464a2(dkon brtsegs): gel ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par zhugs pa na/ 'bru mar gyis gtor ba lta bu 'byung ngo // des 'bru mar gyis gtor ba de mthong nas/ snying dang ngas skrag ste rdzing bu de nas byung nas/ nags stug por rgyug cing
464a3(dkon brtsegs): bros so/ / de rings par 'gro ba lha'i bu mo de dag gos mthong nas/ phyi bzhin du 'brangs pa dang / de nags stug po de'i nang na shing drung zhig na gnas shing 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu mo de dag snying rje rje skad du gachad par du
464a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'di skad ces/ jo bo bdag cag bor te gcig pu shing drung 'di na ci dga' zhes 'dzer to// de du zhing dman pa'i sgras slar 'di skad ces smas so// bdag 'di na sngon ma byung ba 'bru mar gyis gtor ba lta bu
464a5(dkon brtsegs): lus las byung ngo zhes de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan khung gnyis nas rdul byung nas/ de dag gis rdul byung ba mthong ba dang / lha'i bu mo de dag ring du dong ste/ yongs su spangs so// des yongs su spangs par
464a6(dkon brtsegs): shes nas mya ngan gyis reg go/ / de mya ngan gyis reg pas dbugs drag tu rgyu'o// dbugs rgyu ba'i rgyus lus la gdung ba skyes so// de lus dang sems gdungs pas/ me tog gi thod sngon rnyis mi srid pa'ang rnyes
464a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba'ang yongs su rnyis/ sngon brnyings mi srid pa'i gos kyang brnyings/ lha'i gding ba bting ba'i mal cha la'ang dga' ba mi rnyed do// de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis 'chi 'pho ba'i ltas kyis nyen par shes nas
464b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i dri de mi bzod de/ ring du spangs nas stong rje rje skad du ga chad par bdag la dbang med par du'o// 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen nas rab tu ngu zhing / kyi hud lus mchog tu shin tu 'jam pa/ lha'i
464b2(dkon brtsegs): skyed mos tshal dang nags tshal na rgyu ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gling na ngur pa dang 'dra ba/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra ba/ dga' tshal na bya ka ran da ka lta bu/ rdzing bu na spos kyi glang po che
464b3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra ba/ shing yongs 'du sa brtol dang skyed mos tshal na bung ba lta bu/ 'dres pa'i tshal na me tog gi rna rgyan lta bu/ bdag cag bor te da gar song gang na gnas zhes 'dzer cing bdag la dbang med par du'o//
464b4(dkon brtsegs): de bdag la dbang med par rims nad kyis btab ste/ rims nad des lus dang sems dkrugs nas/ 'gron po 'gron pa mang po dang bral te 'brog 'tshol ba dang mtshungs/ lam grogs gru zhig pa dang 'dra/
464b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu stor ba dang mtshungs/ ri zhig pa dang 'dra bar mi rtag pa'i rlung gis gtor nas/ lus sa'i steng na 'gre ldog ste/ nam mkha' lding gi mchus glu gzhon nu zin pa dang 'dra bar 'dar
464b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du myur ba myur bar thal mo sbyar nas/ lha'i bu mo de dag la gsol ba btab pa/ tshur shog lag pa'i thal mos nga'i lus la reg par gyis shes snying 'ad ra la gdungs bzhin du de smre sngags 'don cing
464b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba btab pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag gis bltas nas mi nye bar spangs te/ yan lag la reg par lhag la byed kyi/ me tog can gyi yal gathogs te/ 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba'i lha'i bu de'i snying khar
465a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhag nas 'di skad ces zer to/ / mtho ris kyi bsod nams yongs su nyams te/ da myur du 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras pa dang / lha'i bu de bdag lus kyis yongs
465a2(dkon brtsegs): su btang bar shes nas/ kyi hud kyi hud ces sgra cher snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing / kye ma'o mtho ris lha'i gnas 'di'i lha'i yo byad dang / rgyan dang / skyed mos tshal mchog na rtse ba rjes su myong zhing / lha'i bu mo 'di dag
465a3(dkon brtsegs): la ba dag gis sdug par bsams pa las/ da bdag 'chi ba'i dus la phyogs shing zhugs pa'i tshe/ de dag nye bar mi gnas shing / 'di skad ces khyod 'dzam bu gling du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to snyam nas/
465a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dang yang du bdag gi gnas la lta zhing sa la 'argyal nas/ snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te/ kyi hud dga' tshal dang / 'dres tshal dang / ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa'i rdo leb dang / kyi hud lha'i 'dun
465a5(dkon brtsegs): sa chos bzangs dang / shing yongs 'du dang / rnam par mdzes dang / dga' tshal dang / skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu dang / gzhal med khang dam pa sgo mang po 'di dag dang / lha yul pa'i lha'i gnas 'di dag bor te/
465a6(dkon brtsegs): da ni mtho ris kyi g.yang sa nas gdon mi za bar lhung ngo zhes skrag pa skyes nas/ de rang gi gnas la lta zhing / kyi hud bdag gi mdza' bo byams pa rnams 'chir ten/ ci'i phyir mi smra/ 'di ltar nga ni da 'khor ba'i 'brog
465a7(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa dgongs lam ring por chas kyis tshur shog/ nga la 'khyud/ phyis ngas kyang khyod mi mthong / khyed kyis kyang nga mi mthong ngo // kyi hud mtho ris 'di nas bsod nams kyi 'bras bu zad pas 'pho bar 'gyur
465b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe/ bdag la mun pa lta bur snang ngo // ci mtho ros 'di stong ngam/ 'di na'ang rol mo dang sil snyan yang mi len tam/ de dag gi sgra'ang mi grag go// las kyi nyes pas bdag ni 'dir nyams par gyur to zhes de skad/
465b2(dkon brtsegs): smras nas/ yang smre sngags 'don to// kyi hud mtho ros lha dang dri zas mdzes par byas pa na/ gang mig stong pa'i lha'i bu 'khor du 'gro ba dang / phyis yang de mthong bar 'gyur ba ni bsod nams che'o// kun
465b3(dkon brtsegs): nas skyes pa'i me tog nga'i klad pa la 'dug pa ci'i phyir rnyis zhes lha'i bu de sa smras pa dang / lha'i bu de sems dman pa dri ma med pa'i rna cha'i gdu bu 'gul ba thogs pa de dag thams cad me tog
465b4(dkon brtsegs): khyer te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing lha mo bi de sogs dang / lha mo dag phyi bzhin 'brang ba mig sprin gyi bu dang / smig rgyu dang / sna tshogs rgyan dang / gtsug phud
465b5(dkon brtsegs): lnga pa dang / tu ma bu ru la sogs pa lha dang dri za rnams lha'i glu dbyangs len cing 'dong ba dag gis ltas lnga po des nyam thag par gyur pa mthong nas snying rje bskyed de/ nga ro gcig tu kyi hud mi rtag pa 'di
465b6(dkon brtsegs): nirab tu drag cing mi bzad do zhes tshig smra'o/ / lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis kyang / lha'i bu de ltas nas tshangs pa'i glu dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so// chog go lha'i bu bdag cag thams cad kyi 'gro ba'ang
465b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'bras sred par ma byed/ ngan 'gror ma gnas shog/ lha'i bu de dag gis dbyangs gcig tu smras pa/ grogs pa dge ba byed pa'i 'jig rten mi'i 'jig rten du song zhig ces byas pa dang / lha'i bu des bdag ni
466a1(dkon brtsegs): @nges par 'chi yang dag snyam du bsams te thal mo sbyar nas/ lha mang po de dag la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// bdag ni 'chi 'pho ba'i dus la nye bar gnas kyi/ lha'i bu thams cad bdag la
466a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod par mdzod cig/ de'i tshe shugs ring du phyung nas/ ltas gnyis byung nas/ mig pad+mo'i lo ma lta bur 'gyur ba dang / rgyan thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ba'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis rgyan mi snang bar gyur pa
466a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas/ me tog man dar ba dang pad+ma la logs pas rab tu gtor/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / sil snyan gyi sgra'ang byas nas/ rgyan de dag kyang lhas bsdus par mthong nas 'dzam bu'i gling la dga' ba skyed de/
466a4(dkon brtsegs): de mchim zag cing ga chad par du ste/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi chos rnams sbyor ro// lha'i bsod nams dang tshe yongs su zad nas rlung drag po langs so// rlung dri rab tu zhim pa dang ldan pa de sa de'i lus la phog
466a5(dkon brtsegs): nas gtor te/ lha'i bu de gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro// gnas de nas 'pho ba na lus kyi gnas mi shes so// de gnas de nas 'phos nas mir skye ba yongs su len to// mir skyes te ma'i
466a6(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ ma la mtshal mar blta ba ni/ de nyid glu dang / bar dang / rtse ba dang / dgod pa la dga' ba'i dbang por 'gyur/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang
466a7(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la dga' bar 'gyur/ kha dog sna tshogs 'tsher ba'i gos 'chang bar 'gyur/ lha'i kha zas shin tu bzang po la sred par 'gyur ro// de ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/
466b1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas bskor bar mi 'gyur/ de dri rab tu zhim pa'i cha lugs la dga' bar 'gyur// gnyid log na'ang rmi lam na lha'i don skul pa mthong bar 'gyur ro//
466b2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po de mangs na gnas pa na phyin ci ma log pa'i rmi lam mthong ngo // btsa' ba'i dus na'ang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par spangs nas btsam
466b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ de gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ rkang pa shin tu gnas pa/ shis pa'i yan lag dang nying lag 'brel ba/ lag pa dang rkang
466b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rang la sbom pa/ ro spyod seng ge'i lta bu/ so thags bzang ba/ shin tu 'jam pa'i lus so// de gcig tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la chags
466b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ 'dod chags mi bzad pa gos phra ba la dga' ba/ skyed mos tshal la dga' ba// lU'i dri dang rol mo la dga' bar 'gyur ro// de gsesar dang
466b6(dkon brtsegs): nor thams cad 'byor pa'i rigs chen por skyes te/ sbyin pa dang / rul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod pa la shin tu
466b7(dkon brtsegs): chags nas smin pa dang tshul khrim sa la mi dga' bar gyur na/ / de phyis gcig nas gcig tu dbul po'i rigs su skye bar gyur te/ ser sna can dang / tshul khrims 'chal
467a1(dkon brtsegs): @#pa rnams la bstod pa dang / ha cang sngo ba'ang ma yin pa dang / ha cang dkar ba'ang ma yin pa dang / skye bo thams cad dga' ba dang / gzhan
467a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi chung ma la chags shing bdag gi chung ba la mi dga' ba dang / rtse lag gi skye bo la dga' bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris nas
467a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phos pa'i ltas 'byung ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ drang srong chen po rgyas pa dang / drang srong chen po de dag dang
467a4(dkon brtsegs): lta dang / mi dang / lha ma yin drung / dri zar bcus po'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon
467a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ drang srong rgyas pas zhes pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so//
467a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mo tra dang / dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa be ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos
